[\[22b.2\]]khye'u pang nas skyes kyi ne'u ldangs rnams bram ze'i khye'u pang nas skyes kyi pha ma gnyis ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bram ze'i khye'u pang nas skyes kyi pha ma gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yab yum dag mkhyen par mdzod cig_/zhi ba gzhon nu pang nas skyes gum 
[\[22b.3\]]pas ci zhig bgyi rab tu 'byung ba ni mkhas pas bsngags pa lags pas gal te rab tu byung nas mngon par dga' bar gyur na yang de gson po nyid du gzigs par 'gyur la/_mngon par dga' bar ma gyur na yang drang srong dag ni slar ldog pa lags pas bu'i gnas pha 
[\[22b.4\]]ma gnyis las ma gtogs pa gzhan su zhig mchis par 'gyur gyis rab tu byung na legs so/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u pang nas skyes kyi pha ma gnyis kyis bram ze'i khye'u pang nas skyes la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu gzhon nu pang nas skyes khyod la rab tu 'byung ba 
[\[22b.5\]]legs pa byed pa yin la/_khyim na gnas pa legs pa byed pa ma yin nam/_yab yum bdag la rab tu 'byung ba legs pa bgyid pa lags la/_khyim na gnas pa legs pa bgyid pa ma lags so/_/bu gzhon nu pang nas skyes 'o na da de'i dus la bab par 
[\[22b.6\]]shes par gyis shig_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u pang nas skyes pha ma gnyis kyis gnang nas 'bras khu'i rim gyis lus kyi mthu dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus bskyed de/_grong shing thags can nas phyir byung nas/_grong na la dag la ba der 'phags so/_/
[\[22b.7\]]bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal dben pa la dga' bas gnas mal dgon par song ste/_bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam bram ze'i gsang tshig dag klog tu 'jug go/_/bram ze'i khye'u pang nas skyes mthar gyis grong na la dar phyin nas bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal gyi pha ma gnyis la smras 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]pa/_yab yum bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal gar mchis/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal dben pa la dga' bas gnas mal dgon par song ste/_bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam bram ze'i gsang tshig dag klog tu 'jug go/_/
[\[23a.2\]]bram ze'i khye'u pang nas skyes bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas smras pa/_nye rgyal tshur shog bdag cag yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo /_/des smras pa/_khyod pha ma gnyis kyis gnang ngam/_gnang ngo /_/
[\[23a.3\]]des smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u kho bos pha ma gnyis la dris te 'ong gi bar du re zhig sdod cig_/des smras pa/_nye rgyal kho bo ni dus de srid kyis pha mas gnang na khyod da ji srid kyis gnang bar 'gyur/_des smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u kho bo da kho na gnang bar 
[\[23a.4\]]byas te 'ong ngo /_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal pha ma gnyis ga la ba der song ste phyin nas pha ma gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yab yum mkhyen par mdzod cig_/bdag yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de gnyis 
[\[23a.5\]]kyis smras pa/_bu khyod la rab tu 'byung ba legs pa byed pa yin nam/_yab yum bdag la rab tu 'byung ba legs pa bgyid pa lags so/_/bu 'o na song la rab tu byung shig_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal bram ze'i khye'u pang nas skyes kyi gan du song ste smras 
[\[23a.6\]]pa/_/pang nas skyes tshur shog bdag cag yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo /_/des smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u khyod pha ma gnyis kyis gnang ngam/_gnang ngo /_/nye rgyal kho bo ni dus de srid kyis pha ma gnyis kyis gnang na khyod pha ma 
[\[23a.7\]]gnyis kyis myur du gnang ba'i sbyor ba gang yin/_'di ltar khyod ni 'ching ba dam pa dang /_'ching ba brtan pa dang /_'ching ba ma rul ba dang /_gags shing sbom pa yin gyi/_kho bo ni 'ching ba stobs med pa dang /_'ching ba stobs chung ba dang /_'ching ba rul 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]ba dang /_gags shing phra ba yin no/_/'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ni tshe rabs lnga brgyar rab tu byung bar gyur cing 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smon lam 'di skad ces/_ha cang phyug pa'i khyim dang ni/_/dbul po'i khyim du mi skye bar/_/bar ma'i khyim du 
[\[23b.2\]]skye 'gyur zhing /_/rtag tu rab byung mang bar shog_/ces btab pa'i phyir ro/_/bram ze'i khye'u pang nas skyes kyis bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u bdag cag ni bram ze rab tu grags pa dag yin pas bdag cag gang yang rung ba rab tu 'byung bar 
[\[23b.3\]]mi nus kyis/_'di ltar legs par brtag par bya ste rab tu 'byung bar bya'o zhes de gnyis mthar gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to/_/de'i tshe na rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug po thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin par thams cad mkhyen par mngon pa'i nga rgyal can 
[\[23b.4\]]'di lta ste/_'drob skyong gi bu rdzogs byed dang /_gnag lhas kyi bu kun du rgyu dang /_smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang /_mi pham skra'i la ba can dang /_ka t+ya'i bu nog can dang /_gnyen gyi bu gcer bu dag rgyal po'i khab na nye bar rten cing gnas so/_/
[\[23b.5\]]de nas bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal dang /_pang nas skyes gnyis 'drob skyong gi bu rdzogs byed ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas 'drob skyong gi bu rdzogs byed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan khyod kyi chos kyi tshul ni gang yin/_slob ma la gdams pa ni gang yin/_
[\[23b.6\]]tshangs par spyod pa'i 'bras bu ni gang yin/_phan yon ni gang yin/_rdzogs byed kyis smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u dag kho bo ni 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad smra ste/_sbyin pa med do/_/mchod sbyin med do/_/sbyin sreg med do/_/legs par spyad pa med do/_/nyes par 
[\[23b.7\]]spyad pa med do/_/legs par spyad pa dang nyes par spyad pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu dang rnam par smin pa med do/_/'jig rten 'di med do/_/'jig rten pha rol med do/_/ma med do/_/pha med do/_/sems can rdzus te skye ba med do/_/'jig rten na dgra bcom pa 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]yang dag par song ba yang dag par zhugs pa gang dag tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te bdag cag ni skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyad pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/
[\[24a.2\]]srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed pa dag med do/_/srog ni 'di nyid la 'tsho zhing de phyis chad par 'gyur/_zhig par 'gyur te shi ba'i 'og tu mi 'byung ngo /_/skyes bu'i lus ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa yin te/_de ni gang gi tshe dus 
[\[24a.3\]]byed pa na de'i sa'i lus ni sa'i bag la zha/_chu'i lus ni chu'i/_me'i lus ni me'i/_rlung gi lus ni rlung gi bag la zha bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po rnams ni nam mkha'i rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu'i ro ni khri dang lnga'i mi dag gis khyer te dur khrod du 
[\[24a.4\]]'gro zhing bsregs phan chad mi mngon par 'gyur ro/_/bsreg bya dag ni thal bar 'gyur ro/_/rus pa dag ni thi ba'i mdog 'dra bar gnas so/_/'di ltar rmongs pas nye bar bsten pa ni sbyin la/_mkhas pas nye bar bsten pa ni len to/_/de la gang dag yod 
[\[24a.5\]]par smra ba de dag thams cad ni gsob gsog [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du gdol pa dag yin no/_/'di ltar byis pa dang mkhas pa de gnyis ni phyis chad par 'gyur/_zhig par 'gyur te shi ba'i 'og tu mi 'byung ngo /_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal dang /_pang nas skyes gnyis 'di snyam 
[\[24a.6\]]du sems te/_ston pa shes ldan 'di ni lam gol bar zhugs pa/_lam ngan pa legs par sgrub pa yin te/_lam 'jigs pa dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhas pa rnams kyis spang bar bya ba yin no snyam du rig nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_blo ngan log 
[\[24a.7\]]par ston byed pa/_/dman pa ston par grags pa ste/_/gang gi chos ni de 'dra ba/_/de yi chos min ci zhig 'dra/_/zhes smras nas snod stong pa bzhin du brdabs te dong ngo /_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis gnag lhas kyi bu kun du rgyu ga la ba der 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]dong ste phyin nas gnag lhas kyi bu kun du rgyu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan khyod kyi chos kyi tshul ni gang yin/_slob ma la gdams pa ni gang yin/_tshangs par spyod pa'i 'bras bu ni gang yin/_phan yon ni gang yin/_kun du rgyus smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[24b.2\]]dag kho bo ni 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad smra ste/_sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba la rgyu med rkyen med do/_/sems can rnams rgyu med rkyen med par kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ro/_/sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba la rgyu med 
[\[24b.3\]]rkyen med do/_/sems can rnams rgyu med rkyen med par rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/sems can rnams shes pa med par 'gyur ba dang /_mthong ba med par 'gyur ba la rgyu med rkyen med do/_/sems can rnams rgyu med rkyen med par shes pa med pa dang /_mthong 
[\[24b.4\]]ba med par 'gyur ro/_/sems can rnams shes par 'gyur ba dang /_mthong bar 'gyur ba la rgyu med rkyen med do/_/sems can rnams rgyu med rkyen med par shes pa dang /_mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs med do/_/brtson 'grus med do/_/stobs dang brtson 
[\[24b.5\]]'grus med do/_/skyes bu'i rtsal med do/_/pha rol gnon pa med do/_/skyes bu'i rtsal dang pha rol gnon pa med do/_/bdag gi rtsal med do/_/gzhan gyi rtsal med do/_/bdag gi rtsal dang gzhan gyi rtsal med do/_/sems can thams cad dang /_srog thams 
[\[24b.6\]]cad dang /_'byung po thams cad mthu med/_stobs med do/_/dbang med do/_/brtson 'grus med do/_/pha rol gnon pa med do/_/'gro ba mtshams sbyor ba'i srid pa dag nges par gyur to/_/'di ltar 'gro ba drug po dag tu bde ba dang sdug bsngal so sor myong 
[\[24b.7\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal dang /_pang nas skyes gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/_ston pa shes ldan 'di yang lam gol bar zhugs pa/_lam ngan pa legs par sgrub pa yin te/_lam 'jigs pa dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhas pa 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]rnams kyis spang bar bya ba yin no snyam du rig nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_blo ngan log par ston byed pa/_/dman pa ston par grags pa ste/_/gang gi chos ni de 'dra ba/_/de yi chos min ci zhig 'dra/_/zhes smras nas snod stong pa bzhin 
[\[25a.2\]]du brdabs te dong ngo //_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po gsum pa/_de nas bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal dang /_pang nas skyes gnyis smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can la 'di 
[\[25a.3\]]skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan khyod kyi chos kyi tshul ni gang yin/_slob ma la gdams pa ni gang yin/_tshangs par spyod pa'i 'bras bu ni gang yin/_phan yon ni gang yin/_yang dag rgyal ba can gyis smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u dag kho bo ni 'di ltar 
[\[25a.4\]]lta zhing 'di skad smra ste/_byed pa dang byed du 'jug pa dang /_gcod pa dang gcod du 'jug pa dang /_sreg pa dang sreg tu 'jug pa dang /_rdeg pa dang rdeg tu 'jug pa dang /_srog chags la 'tshe ba dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pa dag la log par spyod 
[\[25a.5\]]pa dang /_shes bzhin du [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba dang /_myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba 'thung ba dang /_khyim 'bigs pa dang /_mdud pa dgrol ba dang /_ril gyis 'phrog pa dang /_lam 'gog cing 'dug pa dang /_grong 'joms par byed pa dang /_grong khyer 'joms 
[\[25a.6\]]par byed pa dang /_yul 'joms par byed pa dang /_sa gzhi chen po 'di la sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad 'khor lo'i mtha' spu gri las byas pas kun du gcod par byed/_kun du gsheg par byed/_kun du rdung bar byed/_kun du 'dral bar byed 
[\[25a.7\]]cing sems can de dag thams cad kun du bcad/_kun du gshegs/_kun du brdungs/_kun du dral nas sha'i thang ma gcig tu byed/_sha'i tshoms gcig tu byed/_sha'i bungs gcig tu byed/_sha'i phung po gcig tu byed cing sha'i thang ma gcig tu 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]byas/_sha'i tshoms gcig tu byas/_sha'i bungs gcig tu byas/_sha'i phung po gcig tu byas nas de ltar kun du sgrub par byed pa la gzhi de las sdig pa yang med/_gzhi de las sdig par 'gyur ba yang med do/_/chu klung gang gA'i lho nas kun du gcod par 
[\[25b.2\]]byed/_kun du gsheg par byed/_kun du rdung bar byed/_kun du 'dral bar byed cing 'gro la/_chu klung gang gA'i byang nas sbyin pa byed/_mchod sbyin byed cing 'gro bar gyur na/_gzhi de las sdig pa dang bsod nams kyang med/_gzhi de las sdig pa dang bsod 
[\[25b.3\]]nams su 'gyur ba yang med do/_/sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_yang dag par sdom pa dang /_don spyod pa dang /_don mthun pas de ltar byed pa yang bsod nams mi byed pa kho na yin no/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis 'di snyam du 
[\[25b.4\]]sems te/_ston pa shes ldan 'di yang lam gol bar zhugs pa/_lam ngan pa yang dag par sgrub pa yin te/_'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i lam ji lta ba bzhin du mkhas pa rnams kyis spang bar bya ba yin no snyam du rig nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_blo 
[\[25b.5\]]ngan log par ston byed pa/_/dman pa ston par grags pa ste/_/gang gi chos 'di de 'dra ba/_/de yi chos min ci zhig 'dra/_/zhes smras nas snod stong pa bzhin du brdabs te dong ngo /_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis mi pham skra'i la ba 
[\[25b.6\]]can ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas mi pham skra'i la ba can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan khyod kyi chos kyi tshul ni gang yin/_slob ma la gdams pa ni gang yin/_tshangs par spyod pa'i 'bras bu ni gang yin/_phan yon ni gang yin/_mi pham gyis smras pa/_
[\[25b.7\]]bram ze'i khye'u dag kho bo ni 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad smra ste/_lus bdun po 'di dag ni ma byas pa/_byas pas ma byas pa/_ma sprul pa/_sprul pas ma byas pa/_gnod par bya ba ma yin pa/_ther zug tu gnas pa/_ka ba bzhin du gnas pa dag yin te/_
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste sa'i lus dang /_chu'i lus dang /_me'i lus dang /_rlung gi lus dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_srog gson pa nyid ni bdun pa ste/_lus bdun po de dag ni ma byas pa/_byas pas ma byas pa/_ma 
[\[26a.2\]]sprul pa/_sprul pas ma byas pa/_gnod par bya ba ma yin pa/_ther zug tu gnas pa/_ka ba bzhin du gnas pa dag yin no/_/de dag ni 'di lta ste/_bsod nams su 'gyur ba'i phyir ram/_sdig par 'gyur ba'i phyir ram/_bsod nams dang sdig par 
[\[26a.3\]]'gyur ba'i phyir ram/_bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ram/_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ram/_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir g.yo bar mi byed/_rnam par 'gyur bar mi byed/_gcig la gcig gnod par mi byed do/_/skyes bu gang 
[\[26a.4\]]gis skyes bu'i mgo gcod par byed pa des kyang 'jig rten na g.yo ba'am/_gnas pa la gnod pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang mi byed de/_lus bdun po dag la bar med par mtshon thal byung du 'gro zhing der srog la gnod pa'ang med do/_/de la gsod par byed pa'am/_
[\[26a.5\]]gsod du bcug pa'am/_skul bar byed pa'am/_skul du bcug pa'am/_dran par byed pa'am/_dran par byed du bcug pa'am/_rnam par rig par byed pa'am/_rnam par rig par byed du bcug pa 'ga' yang med do/_/byis pa'am mkhas pa gang 
[\[26a.6\]]dag yin pa dag ni skye gnas gtso bo dang ldan pa khri bzhi stong dang /_rtog pa chen po drug khri dang drug brgya dang /_las lnga dang /_las gsum dang /_las gnyis dang las dang /_las phyed dang /_lam drug bcu rtsa gnyis dang /_rtog pa bar ma drug bcu 
[\[26a.7\]]rtsa gnyis dang /_sems can dmyal ba sum bcu rtsa drug dang /_dbang po brgya nyi shu dang /_rdul gyi khams drug bcu rtsa gnyis dang /_klu'i rigs bzhi khri dgu stong dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rigs bzhi khri dgu stong dang /_kun du rgyu'i rigs bzhi khri 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]dgu stong dang /_kun du 'tsho'i rigs bzhi khri dgu stong dang /_gcer bu pa'i rigs bzhi khri dgu stong dang /_'du shes can gyi gnas bdun dang /_'du shes med pa'i gnas bdun dang /_gcer bu pa'i gnas bdun dang /_lha ma yin bdun dang /_sha za bdun 
[\[26b.2\]]dang /_lha bdun dang /_mi bdun dang /_mtsho chen po bdun dang /_mtsho bdun brgya dang /_rmi lam chen po bdun dang /_rmi lam bdun brgya dang /_'bri ba chen po bdun dang /_'bri ba bdun brgya dang /_'phel ba chen po bdun dang /_'phel ba bdun brgya dang /_
[\[26b.3\]]sad pa chen po bdun dang /_sad pa bdun brgya dang /_g.yang sa chen po bdun dang /_g.yang sa bdun brgya dang /_rigs btsun pa drug dang /_mngon par mtho ba bcu dang /_skyes bu chen po'i sa brgyad po de dag tu bskal pa chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong du mtshams 
[\[26b.4\]]sbyar cing 'khor nas sdug bsngal mthar byed do/_/'di lta ste/_dper na skud pa'i dru bu yang ba steng gi nam mkha' las 'phangs pa gzangs pa nas la 'bab pa de bzhin du byis pa'am mkhas pa gang dag yin pa dag kyang de dag tu bskal pa chen po brgyad khri bzhi 
[\[26b.5\]]stong du mtshams sbyar cing 'khor nas sdug bsngal mthar byed do/_/de la dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gang 'di skad ces/_bdag tshul khrims sam/_brtul zhugs sam/_dka' thub bam/_tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa 'dis las yongs su ma 
[\[26b.6\]]smin pa ni yongs su smin par bya zhing yongs su smin pa ni reg par byas nas byang bar bya'o zhes zer ba 'ga' yang med do/_/bde ba dang sdug bsngal 'di nges pa yin no/_/yar skye ba dang mar 'grib pa ni mi srid do/_/'di lta bu 'di nyid dang gzhan ma yin pas 'khor 
[\[26b.7\]]ba gzhal lo/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/_ston pa shes ldan 'di yang lam gol bar zhugs pa/_lam ngan pa legs par sgrub pa yin te/_lam 'jigs pa dang bcas pa ci lta ba bzhin du mkhas pa 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]rnams kyis spang bar bya ba yin no snyam du rig nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_blo ngan log par ston byed pa/_/dman pa ston par grags pa ste/_/gang gi chos 'di de 'dra ba/_/de yi chos min ci zhig 'dra/_/zhes smras nas snod stong pa 
[\[27a.2\]]bzhin du brdabs te dong ngo /_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis ka t+ya'i bu nog can ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_ka t+ya'i bu nog can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan khyod kyi chos kyi tshul ni gang yin/_slob ma la gdams pa ni 
[\[27a.3\]]gang yin/_tshangs par spyod pa'i 'bras bu ni gang yin/_phan yon ni gang yin/_nog can gyis smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u dag kho bo ni 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad smra ste/_gal te 'ga' zhig kho bo'i gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces 'jig rten pha rol yod dam 
[\[27a.4\]]zhes dri ba 'dri na/_de la kho bo 'jig rten pha rol yod do zhes dri ba dris pa'i lan 'debs par byed do/_/'jig rten pha rol med dam zhes dri ba 'dri na/_de la kho bo 'jig rten pha rol med do zhes dri ba dris pa'i lan 'debs par byed do/_/'jig rten pha rol yod 
[\[27a.5\]]pa dang med pa yin nam zhes dri ba 'dri na/_de la kho bo 'jig rten pha rol yod pa dang med pa yin no zhes dri ba dris pa'i lan 'debs par byed do/_/'jig rten pha rol yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin nam zhes dri ba 'dri na/_de la kho bo 'jig rten pha rol 
[\[27a.6\]]yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin no zhes dri ba dris pa'i lan 'debs par byed do/_/de bzhin du gal te 'ga' zhig kho bo'i gan du 'ongs te 'di skad ces 'jig rten pha rol 'di lta bu nyid dang /_'di lta bu nyid ma yin pa yin nam dri ba 'dri na/_de la kho bo 
[\[27a.7\]]'jig rten pha rol 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bu nyid ma yin pa yin no zhes dri ba dris pa'i lan 'debs par byed do/_/'jig rten pha rol gzhan nyid dang gzhan nyid ma yin pa yin nam zhes dri ba 'dri na/_de la kho bo 'jig rten pha rol gzhan nyid dang gzhan nyid ma yin 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]pa yin no zhes dri ba dris pa'i lan 'debs par byed do/_/'jig rten pha rol gzhan ma yin pa nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa nyid ma yin pa yin nam zhes dri ba 'dri na/_de la kho bo 'jig rten pha rol gzhan ma yin pa nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa nyid ma yin pa yin no zhes 
[\[27b.2\]]dri ba dris pa'i lan 'debs par byed do/_/'jig rten pha rol de nyid dang de nyid ma yin pa yin nam zhes dri ba 'dri na/_de la kho bo 'jig rten pha rol de nyid dang de nyid ma yin pa yin no zhes dri ba dris pa'i lan 'debs par byed do/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal dang 
[\[27b.3\]]pang nas skyes gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/_ston pa shes ldan 'di yang lam gol bar zhugs pa/_lam ngan pa legs par sgrub pa yin te/_lam 'jigs pa dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhas pa rnams kyis spang bar bya ba yin no snyam du rig nas tshigs su 
[\[27b.4\]]bcad pa smras pa/_blo ngan log par ston byed pa/_/dman pa ston par grags pa ste/_/gang gi chos ni de 'dra ba/_/de yi chos min ci zhig 'dra/_/zhes smras nas snod stong pa bzhin du brdabs te dong ngo /_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis 
[\[27b.5\]]gnyen gyi bu gcer bu ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas gnyen gyi bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan khyod kyi chos kyi tshul ni gang yin/_slob ma la gdams pa ni gang yin/_tshangs par spyod pa'i 'bras bu ni gang yin/_phan yon ni gang yin/_gcer bus 
[\[27b.6\]]smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u dag kho bo ni 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad smra ste/_skyes bu gang zag 'dis so sor myong ba gang yin pa ci yang rung ste de thams cad sngon byas pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no/_/las rnying pa rnams ni dka' thub kyis 'byang bar 'gyur la las sar pa rnams 
[\[27b.7\]]ni mi bya ba'i chu lon gyis ldog par bya'o/_/de ltar na phyin chad zag pa med do/_/zag pa med na las zad do/_/las zad na sdug bsngal zad do/_/sdug bsngal zad na sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]'di snyam du sems te/_ston pa shes ldan 'di yang lam gol bar zhugs pa lam ngan pa legs par sgrub pa ste/_lam 'jigs pa dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhas pa rnams kyis spang bar bya ba yin no snyam du rig nas tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[28a.2\]]smras pa/_blo ngan log par ston byed pa/_/dman pa ston par grags pa ste/_/gang gi chos 'di de 'dra ba/_/de yi chos min ci zhig 'dra/_/zhes smras nas snod stong pa bzhin du brdabs te dong ngo /_/de'i tshe na mu stegs can gyi gnas yang dag rgyal ba can zhes bya 
[\[28a.3\]]ba zhig byung nas ring po ma lon par gyur to/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis ston pa yang dag rgyal ba can ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas dris pa/_shes ldan dag ston pa yang dag rgyal ba can gang na/_nang du yang dag 'jog la'o/_/kye ma 
[\[28a.4\]]bdag cag gis yun ring mo zhig nas nang du yang dag 'jog gi sgra gdod thos so/_/de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag gis ston pa nang du yang dag 'jog las bslang ba ni bdag cag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyis/_gang gi tshe nang du yang dag 
[\[28a.5\]]'jog las langs par gyur pa de'i tshe na drung du 'dong bar bya'o snyam nas/_de gnyis phyogs gcig tu dong ste 'khod do/_/de nas ston pa yang dag rgyal ba can nang du yang dag 'jog las langs pa dang de bsam gtan dag gis dbang po rnams tshim par gyur to/_/
[\[28a.6\]]de gnyis kyis bsams pa/_gang la byad bzhin yod pa de dag la yon tan dag kyang yod do snyam nas de gnyis de'i gan du dong ste phyin nas smras pa/_shes ldan yang dag rgyal ba can khyod kyi chos kyi tshul ni gang yin/_slob ma la gdams pa ni gang yin/_tshangs par 
[\[28a.7\]]spyod pa'i 'bras bu ni gang yin/_phan yon ni gang yin/_yang dag rgyal ba can gyis smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u dag kho bo ni 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad smra ste/_bden pa dang mi 'tshe ba ni chos so zhi ba dang /_rga ba med pa dang /_'chi ba med pa dang /_nyams pa med pa'i 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]gnas de ni tshangs pa'o/_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_mkhan po smras pa de'i don ci lags/_bden pa zhes bya ba ni bden pa'i bsam pas rab tu 'byung ba'o/_/mi 'tshe ba zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mi 'tshe ba'i gzhi las byung ba'o/_/zhi ba dang /_rga ba med pa 
[\[28b.2\]]dang /_'chi ba med pa dang /_nyams pa med pa'i gnas zhes bya ba de dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i rnam grangs kyi tshig dag yin no/_/de ni tshangs pa'o zhes bya ba ni gal te re zhig tshe 'di nyid la mya ngan las 'das pa sgrub par byed na de lta na legs/_gal te sgrub par mi 
[\[28b.3\]]byed na yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/_de lta na yang bram ze dag ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du gzhol ba dang /_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'bab pa dang /_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du bab pa yin no/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten yang de lta bu yin zhing /_
[\[28b.4\]]tshangs pa'i 'jig rten yang de 'dra ba yin te/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang skal ba mnyam par sgrub pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol ba yin no/_/mkhan po bdag cag rab tu 'byung bar gnang na bdag cag mkhan po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/
[\[28b.5\]]des de gnyis rab tu phyung ngo /_/gang gi tshe ston pa yang dag rgyal ba can gyis bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis rab tu phyung ba de'i tshe na thams cad du ston pa yang dag rgyal ba can gyis bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis rab tu phyung ngo zhes sgra grags 
[\[28b.6\]]shing de la rnyed pa dang bkur sti mang po byung bar gyur to/_/des bsams pa/_sngon yang bdag shaN Di la'i rigs yin la da ltar yang bdag shaN Di la'i rigs yin na da ltar bdag la rnyed pa dang bkur sti mang po byung bar gyur pa'i sbyor ba gang yin snyam mo/_/des bsams 
[\[28b.7\]]pa/_'di ni bdag gi mthu ma yin te/_'di ltar bram ze'i khye'u 'di gnyis kyi mthu yin no snyam nas bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam bram ze'i gsang tshig dag klog tu 'jud pa na des gcig la nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad cing cig shos la yang nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad do/_/
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]dus gzhan zhig na ston pa yang dag rgyal ba can na bar gyur nas nye rgyal gyis pang nas skyes la smras pa/_pang nas skyes ci khyod mkhan po'i g.yog byed dam 'on te sman tshol bar byed/_des bsams pa/_'di ni shes rab can yin pas 'di nyid g.yog 
[\[29a.2\]]byed du bcug la bdag gis ni sman btsal bar bya'o snyam nas des smras pa/_khyod mkhan po'i g.yog byos shig dang kho bos sman btsal lo/_/nye rgyal gyis g.yog bya bar brtsams nas pang nas skyes sman tshol bar byed do/_/de la rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_'dab 
[\[29a.3\]]ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu'i sman dag gis bsnyen bkur byas kyang nad de nye bar zhi bar ma gyur cing nyam dmas nas des 'dzum pa bstan pa dang bram ze'i khye'u nye rgyal gyis smras pa/_mkhan po khyod lta bu'i skyes bu gtso bo dag ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis 
[\[29a.4\]]par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_mkhan po 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags/_des smras pa/_nye rgyal de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_kho bo lta bu skyes bu gtso bo dag ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi ston te/_'di ltar gser gling na 
[\[29a.5\]]rgyal po gser bdag ces bya ba dus la bab pa de'i chung ma me'i phung por mchongs pa na de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems te/_sems can 'di dag ni 'dod pa'i rgyu dang /_'dod pa'i gzhi dang /_'dod pa'i gnas kyi rgyus 'di ltar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar byed 
[\[29a.6\]]do snyam mo/_/mkhan po dus gang gi tshe/_dus mang ge mo zhig gi tshe'o/_/zla ba gang la/_zla ba mang ge mo zhig la'o/_/nyi ma gang la/_nyi ma mang ge mo zhig la'o/_/des dris pa de glegs bu la bris te bzhag go/_/des smras pa/_mkhan po bdag cag cung 
[\[29a.7\]]zad rab tu phyung ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad bdud rtsi don du gnyer zhing bdud rtsi tshol ba lags na/_gal te mkhan pos bdud rtsi cung zad brnyes pa lta na/_kye ma mkhan pos bdag cag la yang bdud rtsi bgo bsha' mdzad du gsol/_bu kho bo yang cung 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]zad rab tu byung ba de thams cad bdud rtsi don du gnyer zhing bdud rtsi tshol ba yin na kho bos bdud rtsi cung zad kyang ma rnyed de/_'di ltar 'di nyid kyi gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa la lha dag steng gi nam mkha' la rgyu ba rnams kyi sgra thos nas gangs kyi ngos dang nye ba chu klung skal ldan 
[\[29b.2\]]shing rta pa'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang mi ring bar shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu byung ste/_de bram ze ltas pa dang mtshan mkhan dag gis gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang na bzhugs par gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal ba/_chos kyi rgyal 
[\[29b.3\]]po chos dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de'i rin po che bdun po de dag ni 'di lta bur 'gyur te/_'di lta ste 'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim 
[\[29b.4\]]bdag rin po che dang /_dmag dpon rin po che nyid ni bdun pa yin no/_/'di la bu dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong tshang ba yod par 'gyur ro/_/de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma 
[\[29b.5\]]lus pa gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/_chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas 
[\[29b.6\]]khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du rnam par grags pa'i sgra dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to zhes zer ba'i sgra thos kyis/_khyed gnyis de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung la rigs 
[\[29b.7\]]smra bar mi bya/_rus smra bar mi bya/_bram ze'i khye'ur smra ba mi bya bar rgyags pa dang nga rgyal nges par bcom pa dag gis de'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig dang /_de las khyed gnyis kyis bdud rtsi chen po thob par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/_bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]cing /_mthon po rnams ni mtha' ltung 'gyur/_/phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/_/gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/_/zhes bya ba yin pas dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to/_/de de rnams kyi gos sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dag 
[\[30a.2\]]gi phyogs brgyan te dur khrod du bskyal nas bsregs te/_de'i 'og tu mya ngan bsang ba dag byas nas 'khod do/_/gser gling nas bram ze'i khye'u ral pa gser 'dra zhes bya ba zhig mthar gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas de de rnams kyi 'dug gnas su zhugs pa dang nye rgyal gyis smras pa/_
[\[30a.3\]]bram ze'i khye'u khyod de bar ga las 'ongs/_des smras pa/_gser gling nas so/_/bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis gser gling na ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos cung zad ci mthong /_des smras pa/_bdag gis ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos chen po ma mthong ste/_'di ltar bdag 
[\[30a.4\]]gis gser gling na ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos cung zad ci mthong ba de nyon cig_/gser gling na rgyal po gser bdag ces bya ba dus la bab pa de'i chung ma me'i phung por mchongs so/_/dus gang gi tshe/_dus mang ge mo zhig gi tshe'o/_/zla ba gang la/_zla ba mang ge mo 
[\[30a.5\]]zhig la'o/_/nyi ma gang la/_nyi ma mang ge mo zhig la'o/_/des dris pa glegs bu la bris pa bltas na ji tsam na thams cad de kho na bzhin du mthong nas nye rgyal gyis pang nas skyes la smras pa/_mkhan pos slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud byas te/_des shin tu bdud rtsi rnyed 
[\[30a.6\]]na bdag cag la bdud rtsi'i bgo bsha' ma byas te/_'di ltar lha'i mig gis yul gzhan na 'dug pa'i gzugs dag mthong ba dang /_lha'i rna bas sgra yid du 'ong ba dag thos pa las na/_des bdud rtsi ma rnyed do zhes bya ba ni chos med do/_/pang nas skyes kyis bsams 
[\[30a.7\]]pa/_nye rgyal 'di ni shes rab can yin pas 'dis kyang bdud rtsi rnyed na bdag la mi rjod pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro snyam nas des smras pa/_nye rgyal tshur shog khrims su bya ba bcas/_bdag cag gnyis las gang gis dang por bdud rtsi rnyed pa des 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]phan tshun bsnyad par bya'o zhes de gnyis kyis khrims su bya ba de lta bu bcas te ljongs rgyur dong ngo /_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lo nyi shu rtsa dgu pa zhes kyang 'dod pa dag la ma rol te rgan po dang /_na ba dang /_shi ba gzigs pas thugs byung nas 
[\[30b.2\]]mtshan mo nam phyed na/_nags su gshegs nas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad de dka' ba byed pa ci yang med par rig nas ci bder dbugs rngub par mdzad/_ci bder dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing 'bras chan dang zan dron la sogs pa zhal zas rgya chen po dag kyang gsol 
[\[30b.3\]]bar mdzad/_zhun mar dang /_'bru mar dag gis sku dag kyang skud par mdzad/_chu dron pos kyang sku bsil bar mdzad cing grong sde 'dod du gshegs nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs ma gnyis las lan bcu drug bzlas pa'i 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang 
[\[30b.4\]]bsres pa gsol te/_klu'i rgyal po nag pos mngon par bstod pa na rtswa bkra shis 'tshong ba las rtswa gser gyi mdog lta bu dag bzhes nas byang chub kyi gzhi ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas nyid kyis rtswa ma 'khrugs shing kun du ma 'khrugs pa'i gdan bshams nas 
[\[30b.5\]]skyil mo krung bcas te sku drang por bsrang nas dran pa phyogs par bzhag ste bzhugs nas/_ji srid zag med ma thob pa/_/de srid skyil krung gzhig mi bya/_/zhes thugs bskyed cing gsung brjod de/_de yis ji srid zag med pa/_/ma brnyes skyil krung 'jig mi 
[\[30b.6\]]mdzad/_/ces bya ba dang /_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo'i gung thun la bdud 'byung po dung phyur phrag gsum dang /_bye ba phrag drug gi 'khor dang ldan pa byams pa'i stobs kyis mngon par btul te bla na med pa'i mkhyen pa thugs su chud nas tshangs 
[\[30b.7\]]pas gsol te bA rA Na sIr gshegs nas lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos dang ldan pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i tshe lnga pa dang /_nye lnga dag dang /_grong pa'i khye'u mtho ba mtho ba lnga bcu btul te rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad do/_/ras 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]bal can gyi tshal gseb tu gshegs nas bzang sde'i tshogs drug bcu bden pa dag la bkod do/_/grong sde 'dong du gshegs nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs ma gnyis bden pa dag la bkod do/_/lteng rgyas su gshegs nas 
[\[31a.2\]]ral pa can stong rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad do/_/ga yA mgo'i mchod rten du gshegs nas dge slong stong po de dag cho 'phrul gsum gyi gdams pa mdzad nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te shin tu mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba bla na med 
[\[31a.3\]]pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do/_/ltang brang gi tshal gseb tu gshegs nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lha brgyad khri dang ma ga d+hA pa'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig bden pa dag la bzhag go/_/rgyal 
[\[31a.4\]]po'i khab tu gshegs nas 'od ma'i tshal bzhes te/_de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis kyang ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba na rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang de na grong khyer 
[\[31a.5\]]rgyal po'i khab chem me chems se 'dug pa mthong nas/_de gnyis kyis bsams pa/_rgyu gnyis kyis grong khyer chen po 'di lta bu chem me chems ser gyur te/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang /_dge sbyong ngam bram ze bsod nams dang dbang che bar 
[\[31a.6\]]grags pa 'ga' zhig gnas pa las 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de gnyis kyi rgyu skar dag la blta bar brtsams nas de gnyis kyis bsams pa/_re zhig pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa ni med pas sang shes par bya'o snyam mo/_/de gnyis kyi kun du spyod pa ni gang gi tshe de 
[\[31a.7\]]gnyis 'phral ris gsum byas te spyod yul du 'dong ba de'i tshe na srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag phyi bzhin phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/de gnyis phyi de nyin par 'phral ris gsum byas te/_spyod yul du dong ba dang de'i nyin par sems can gcig kyang phyi 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]bzhin phyi bzhin rjes su mi 'brang ngo /_/de gnyis phyir byung ste bltas na/_ji tsam na sems can gcig kyang phyi bzhin phyi bzhin rjes su mi 'brang bar mthong nas de gnyis kyis bsams pa/_bdag cag gnyis sngon chad spyod yul du 'dong ba de'i tshe na srog chags 'bum phrag du 
[\[31b.2\]]ma dag phyi bzhin phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang bar gyur na/_da ltar sems can gcig kyang phyi bzhin phyi bzhin rjes su mi 'brang ba 'di la rgyu gang yin snyam mo/_/de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ni mi mkhyen pa dang /_ma gzigs pa dang /_ma rig pa dang /_
[\[31b.3\]]rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' bas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'tsho zhing bzhugs la gson zhing gzhes pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/_srung ba gcig pu pa/_nyag gcig dpa' ba/_gnyis pa med pa/_
[\[31b.4\]]gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis bzhugs pa/_rig pa gsum gsal bar mdzad pa/_bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/_dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis spyod 
[\[31b.5\]]pa'i gzhi la legs par gnas pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su sbyangs pa mdzad pa/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ston pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba yan lag lnga spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 
[\[31b.6\]]'das pa/_phung po lnga bdag med par ston pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu gnas pa drug gis gnas pa/_dbang po drug gi sgo bsdams pa/_yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i chos drug la goms par mdzad 
[\[31b.7\]]pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_'phags pa'i nor bdun ston pa/_'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa/_kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu la mkhas pa/_lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcur dbang sgyur ba las khyad par du 'phags pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du sangs rgyas 
[\[32a.2\]]kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas/_gang na nyams par gyur/_gang ni 'phel bar gyur/_gang ni gnod par gyur/_gang na nyam nga bar gyur/_gang ni mi bde bar gyur/_gang ni gnod pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_mi bde bar gyur/_gang ni ngan song la 
[\[32a.3\]]gzhol/_gang ni ngan song la 'bab/_gang ni ngan song la bab/_ngas gang ni ngan song gi lam las bslong ste mtho ris dang /_thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba gang gi lag nas ni drang bar bya/_'phags pa'i nor gyi dbyig dang bral ba 
[\[32a.4\]]gang ni 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug la gzhag par bya/_gang gi sangs rgyas 'byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten ni 'bras bu dang bcas par bya/_gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya/_gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa ni yongs su smin par bya/_yongs 
[\[32a.5\]]su smin pa gang ni rnam par grol bar bya zhes mkhyen pa dang gzigs pa la 'jug go/_/smras pa/_chu srin gnas kyi dug can pa/_/dus las 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi/_/sangs rgyas gdul la byams pa ni/_/dus las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar ma ni bu sdug 
[\[32a.6\]]gcig pu la/_/rtog cing de srog srung bar byed pa ltar/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'ang gdul ba'i skye bo la/_/rtog par mdzad cing de srog srung bar mdzad/_/kun mkhyen rgyud la mnga' ba'i thugs rje yis/_/bzhon ma gdul ba'i be'u tshol mi skyo ste/_/srid 
[\[32a.7\]]dang ngan 'gros nyams la byams pa ni/_/rab nyams be'u la byams pa'i ba bzhin no/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na kun du rgyu nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis rgyud yongs su smin pa/_sngon gyi sangs rgyas 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]rnams la bya ba lhag par byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa yin te/_de gnyis gdul ba'i dus ni 'bras yongs su smin pa mtshon gyis brtol pa la sdod pa lta bu yin par gzigs nas/_bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ci 'di gnyis re zhig 
[\[32b.2\]]ston pas gdul ba yin nam/_'on te nyan thos kyis gdul ba yin snyam du dgongs na/_nyan thos kyis gdul ba yin par gzigs so/_/sgo gang nas 'jug par 'gyur/_ci rdzu 'phrul gyis gdul ba yin nam/_'on te spyod lam gyis gdul ba yin snyam du 
[\[32b.3\]]dgongs na/_spyod lam gyis gdul ba yin par gzigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das ni gang la spyod lam gyis gdul ba de la tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gtong bar mdzad de/_'di ltar de'i spyod lam gyis ni lha dang mi'i yid sdud par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom 
[\[32b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la bka' stsal pa/_rta thul khyod kyis kun du rgyu nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis la soms shig_/tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis cang mi smra bas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang du blangs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta 
[\[32b.5\]]thul bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' la lhag par bya ba byed pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod pa dang rjes su yi rang ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga 
[\[32b.6\]]nas song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_'gro ba dang /_ldog pa dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]blta ba dang /_rnam par blta ba dang /_bskum pa dang /_brkyang ba dang /_snam 
[\[32b.7\]]sbyar dang /_chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/de'i tshe na kun du rgyu nye rgyal rgyal po'i khab tu bya ba zhig gi phyir spyod yul du zhugs pas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul 'gro ba dang /_ldog pa dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]blta 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]ba dang /_rnam par blta ba dang /_bskum pa dang /_brkyang ba dang /_snam sbyar dang /_chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab na bsod snyoms la rgyu ba thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems 
[\[33a.2\]]te/_rgyal po'i khab 'dir rab tu byung ba ji snyed cig lhags shing gnas pa dag las 'di lta ste/_rab tu byung ba 'di'i spyod lam lta bu ni bdag gis sngan chad 'ga' yang ma mthong bas bdag de'i gan du song ste/_dge slong khyod kyi ston pa ni gang yin/_gang gi 
[\[33a.3\]]phyir ni rab tu byung /_su'i chos la ni dga' zhes dri'o snyam du rig nas lam po che rub pa zhig na 'gro ba dang ldog pas shas cher sdod cing 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul kun du rgyu nye rgyal ga la ba der song ngo /_/de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[33a.4\]]rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge slong khyod kyi ston pa ni gang yin/_gang gi phyir ni rab tu byung /_su'i chos la ni dga'/_tshe dang ldan pa shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong gau ta ma shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig dag bgos te yang dag pa 
[\[33a.5\]]kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba zhig yod de/_de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas kho bo'i ston pa ni bcom ldan 'das de yin no/_/kho bo de'i phyir rab tu byung ngo /_/kho bo de'i chos la dga'o/_/
[\[33a.6\]]dge slong de'i phyir chos ston cig_/tshe dang ldan pa kho bo ni na gzhon pa dang rab tu byung ba gsar pas de'i phyir kho bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par 
[\[33a.7\]]sla ba ma yin te/_'di ltar de'i don bstan par bya'o/_/dge slong kho bo la ni don dgos kyi tshig ni shin du mang pos kyang ci bya ste/_khyod kyis don mang yang rung nyung yang rung ston cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_chos 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang /_/de yi rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa'ang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te/_/de skad gsung ba'i tshul can dge sbyong che/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na kun du rgyu nye rgyal chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med 
[\[33b.2\]]cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal chos mthong ba dang /_chos thos pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos kyi gting sleb pa dang /_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_the tshom las rgal ba dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_gzhan gyis mi bkri 
[\[33b.3\]]ba dang /_ston pa'i bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_skyob pa rnams kyi chos 'di 
[\[33b.4\]]yin/_/bskal mang bye ba khrag khrig tu/_/sngan chad ma mthong ma thos pa/_/'chi med mya ngan med pa yi/_/go 'phang 'di la rjes su rtogs/_/tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das de da ltar ga la bzhugs/_tshe dang ldan pa rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka 
[\[33b.5\]]lan da ka'i gnas 'di nyid na'o/_/de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa la mngon par bstod pa dang rjes su yi rang ba byas te/_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la lan gsum bskor ba 
[\[33b.6\]]byas te song nas kun du rgyu pang nas skyes ga la ba der song ngo /_/kun du rgyu pang nas skyes kyis kun du rgyu nye rgyal thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang kun du rgyu nye rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni rnam par rang bzhin gyi 
[\[33b.7\]]mdog ni yongs su dag_/pags pa'i mdog ni shin du dkar na khyod kyis bdud rtsi rnyed dam/_tshe dang ldan pa rnyed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir chos ston cig_/de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang /_/
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]de yi rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa'ang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te/_/de skad gsung ba'i tshul can dge sbyong che/_/tshe dang ldan pa da dung yang lan gcig brjod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa brjod par bya'o/_/chos rnams gang 
[\[34a.2\]]dag rgyu las byung ba dang /_/de yi rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa'ang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te/_/de skad gsung ba'i tshul can dge sbyong che/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na kun du rgyu pang nas skyes chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri 
[\[34a.3\]]ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de nas kun du rgyu pang nas skyes chos mthong ba dang /_chos thos pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos kyi gting sleb pa dang /_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_the tshom las rgal ba dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_gzhan gyis mi bkri 
[\[34a.4\]]ba dang /_ston pa'i bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_skyob pa rnams kyi chos 'di yin/_/bskal 
[\[34a.5\]]mang bye ba khrag khrig tu/_/sngan chad ma mthong ma thos pa/_/'chi med mya ngan med pa yi/_/go 'phang 'di la rjes su rtogs/_/tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das de da ltar ga la bzhugs/_tshe dang ldan pa rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas 'di nyid na'o/_/
[\[34a.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir je 'khor la blta bar bya ste/_bdag cag lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa shes par gyur pa dag gis 'khor la blta ba ni legs pa yin no/_/de nas kun 
[\[34a.7\]]du rgyu nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis kyis bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u rnams shes par gyis shig_/kho bo cag gnyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod par byed na khyed cag ji ltar byed/_mkhan po gnyis bdag cag 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]cung zad ci 'tshal ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad mkhan po gnyis las brten nas 'tshal ba lags na/_gal te mkhan po gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod na bdag cag kyang mkhan po gnyis rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[34b.2\]]bram ze'i khye'u rnams da de'i dus la bab par shes par gyis shig_/de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu lnga bcu dang 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa rta thul nyin mo spyod pa'i phyir shing 
[\[34b.3\]]ljon pa zhig gi drung na rten cing 'dug go/_/kun du rgyu nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang nye rgyal gyis pang nas skyes la smras pa/_pang nas skyes ci je bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya'am/_'on 
[\[34b.4\]]te gang las chos thos pa de la bya/_des smras pa/_je gang las chos thos pa de la bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/de'i tshe na bram ze 
[\[34b.5\]]zla ba la dga' ba zhig zla ba la bsnyen bkur byed cing phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/_rgan pa dang ni gzhon pa'ang rung /_/gang las chos ni rnam shes pa/_/de la gus par phyag bya ste/_/zla ba tshes 
[\[34b.6\]]la ji bzhin no/_/bram ze me la dga' ba zhig kyang me la bsnyen bkur byed cing phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_rgan pa dang ni gzhon pa'ang rung /_/gang las chos ni rnam shes pa/_/de la gus par 
[\[34b.7\]]phyag bya ste/_/me la bram ze gtsang ma bzhin//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bzhi pa/_de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te dong nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]ngo /_/de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos ston cing bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun du rgyu nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis thag ring po kho na nas gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la 
[\[35a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis grogs yongs su sdud pa/_tshogs yongs su 'dren pa/_tshogs kyi mdun nas 'ong ba 'di lta ste/_nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong ngo /_/'di gnyis ni nga'i nyan thos zung dang /_zung gi mchog dang /_
[\[35a.3\]]zung bzang bor 'gyur te/_gcig ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur la/_cig shos ni shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_ston pa dgongs yul mtha' yas pa/_/skyes bu'i 
[\[35a.4\]]dbang po mkhyen mthar byon/_/bcom ldan srid pa'i mthar mdzad pas/_/grogs po nye rgyal pang nas skyes/_/'od ma'i tshal du ma phyin par/_/de ltar mchi ba gzigs gyur nas/_/tshogs mchog dbus su de gnyis ni/_/'di gnyis nga yi nyan thos kyi/_/zung mchog 'gyur 
[\[35a.5\]]zhes nges bstan te/_/gcig ni rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog_/cig shos shes rab ldan pa yi/_/mchog tu 'gyur bar lung bstan mdzad/_/de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal dang pang nas skyes gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis 
[\[35a.6\]]la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/_bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs 
[\[35a.7\]]par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung zhing dge slong dag tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i mjug kho nar skra byi ba dang snam sbyar gyon par gyur 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]te/_skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang /_lag pa na lhung bzed dang /_bya ma bum thogs pa dang /_dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/_/yang smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/_/skra 
[\[35b.2\]]byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing /_/mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_rgyal po'i khab tu bsod 
[\[35b.3\]]snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_de na rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu stegs can gyi gnas rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pas yi ma rangs shing mngon par mi dga' ba de dag gis dge slong de dang de dag mthong nas co 'dri zhing tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[35b.4\]]smras pa/_sangs rgyas ma ga d+hA dag gi/_/grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas/_/yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid na/_/phyin chad ci zhig bkri bar bya/_/des dge slong rnams spa gong zhing mi dga' ba dang mi 'jigs pa med par gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag rgyal 
[\[35b.5\]]po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te phyi dro bsod snyoms mi len pas lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te sdug bsngal zhing mi bde bas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 
[\[35b.6\]]mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di na bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thabs 'tshal/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs 
[\[35b.7\]]te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_de na rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu stegs can gyi gnas rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lags pas yi ma rangs shing mngon par mi dga' ba de dag gis dge slong de dang de dag mthong nas 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]co 'dri zhing tshigs su bcad pa/_sangs rgyas ma ga d+hA dag gi/_/grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas/_/yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid na/_/phyin chad ci zhig bkri bar bya/_/zhes mchi nas des bdag cag rnams spa gong zhing mi dga' ba dang /_mi 
[\[36a.2\]]'jigs pa ma mchis par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rgyal po'i khab kyi mi de skad zer ba rnams la 'di skad ces/_'di la dpa' chen bde gshegs dag_/dam pa'i chos kyis khrid mdzad de/_/de dag chos kyis khrid mdzad la/_/
[\[36a.3\]]mkhas pa su zhig mi bzod byed/_/ces brjod na rgyal po'i khab kyi mi de skad zer ba rnams kyi rlom pa tsam mam spobs pa tsam gang yin pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te 
[\[36a.4\]]rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_de na rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu stegs can gyi gnas rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pas yi ma rangs shing mngon par mi dga' ba de dag gis dge slong de dang de dag mthong nas co 'dri 
[\[36a.5\]]zhing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_sangs rgyas ma ga d+hA dag gi/_/grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas/_/yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid na/_/phyin chad ci zhig bkri bar bya/_/de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_'di na dpa' chen bde gshegs 
[\[36a.6\]]dag_/dam pa'i chos kyis khrid mdzad de/_/de dag chos kyis khrid mdzad la/_/mkhas pa su zhig bzod mi byed/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_rgyal po'i khab kyi mi de skad zer ba rnams kyi rlom pa tsam mam spobs pa tsam gang yin pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du med par gyur 
[\[36a.7\]]to/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bram ze gnas len gyi bu dus la bab cing de'i chung ma yang dus la bab/_bram ze skar rgyal yang dus la bab/_shA ri kA yang dus la bab bo/_/bram ze'i bu khye'u stod [{]rings kyang [,]ring yang [}]lho phyogs nas 'jig rten rgyang 'phen bzung nas grong na la dar phyin pa dang /_
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]de sgo bas bzhin gyi gzugs las ngo shes nas smras pa/_shes ldan khyod stod [{]rings [,]ring [}]yin nam/_kho bo skye bo dag gis de ltar shes so/_/bram ze gnas len gyi bu de ga re/_dus la bab bo/_/de'i chung ma de ga re/_de yang dus la bab bo/_/bram ze skar rgyal ga re/_de yang dus 
[\[36b.2\]]la bab bo/_/shA ri kA ga re/_de yang dus la bab bo/_/shA ri'i bu de ga re/_rgyal po'i khab tu ston pa yang dag rgyal ba can zhes bya ba byung nas ring po ma lon pa de'i gan du rab tu byung ngo /_/'di lta ste re zhig rab tu 'byung bar bya ba de ni bram zes bya ba yin no/_/de mthar gyis rgyal po'i 
[\[36b.3\]]khab tu phyin nas de der song ste dris pa/_ston pa yang dag rgyal ba can ga re/_dus la bab bo/_/de'i mu stegs kyi gnas ga re/_thams cad dge sbyong gau ta ma'i drung du rab tu byung ngo /_/dge sbyong gau ta ma ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung bstan pas de yang de'i mdun na 'don du 'gyur bas legs so/_/de nas kun 
[\[36b.4\]]du rgyu sen [{]rings [,]ring [}]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig phan tshun mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 
[\[36b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la kun du rgyu sen [{]rings kyis [,]ring gis [}]'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma bdag ni thams cad mi bzod do/_/mer 'jug gi bu khyod kyis bdag thams cad mi bzod par lta ba gang yin pa'i lta ba de yang mi bzod do/_/kye gau ta ma bdag ni thams cad mi bzod par lta ba gang 
[\[36b.6\]]yin pa'i lta ba de yang mi bzod do/_/mer 'jug gi bu 'o na khyod kyis de ltar shes shing de ltar mthong na lta ba de yang spong ba dang /_'dor ba dang /_med par 'gyur la/_lta ba gzhan yang mtshams mi sbyor ba dang /_nye bar mi len pa dang /_mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/kye gau ta ma bdag 
[\[36b.7\]]gis de ltar shes shing de ltar mthong na lta ba de yang spong ba dang /_'dor ba dang /_med par 'gyur la/_lta ba gzhan yang mtshams mi sbyor ba dang /_nye bar mi len pa dang /_mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mer 'jug gi bu khyod ni skye bo phal po che dang lhan cig mtshungs shing 'dra bar 'gyur te/_skye 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]bo phal po che yang de ltar lta zhing de skad smra bas khyod kyang de dang 'dra ba kho nar 'gyur ro/_/mer 'jug gi bu 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang la la dag lta ba 'di yang 'dor zhing lta ba gzhan yang nye bar mi len pa'i dge sbyong ngam bram ze de dag ni nyung ba bas kyang 
[\[37a.2\]]ches nyung ba zhes bya'o/_/mer 'jug gi bu gsum po 'di dag ni lta ba'i gnas yin te/_gsum gang zhe na/_mer 'jug gi bu 'di la la la bdag ni thams cad bzod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra ba dang /_gzhan yang 'di la la la bdag ni thams cad mi bzod do zhes de 
[\[37a.3\]]ltar lta zhing de skad smra ba dang /_gzhan yang 'di la la la bdag ni kha cig bzod la kha cig mi bzod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra ba'o/_/mer 'jug gi bu de la bdag ni thams cad bzod do zhes lta ba'i lta ba gang yin pa 'di ni kun du 'dod chags par 'gyur gyi/_kun du 'dod chags 
[\[37a.4\]]pa med par mi 'gyur ba dang /_kun du zhe sdang bar 'gyur gyi/_kun du zhe sdang ba med par mi 'gyur ba dang /_kun du gti mug par 'gyur gyi/_kun du gti mug pa med par mi 'gyur ba dang /_kun du [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]par 'gyur gyi/_kun du [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa med par mi 'gyur ba dang /_kun du sbyor bar 
[\[37a.5\]]'gyur gyi/_kun du sbyor ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi/_rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_bdag ni thams cad bzod do zhes lta ba'i lta ba gang yin pa 'di ni mngon par dga' ba dang /_nye bar len pa dang lhag par chags par 'gyur ba yin 
[\[37a.6\]]no/_/mer 'jug gi bu de la bdag ni thams cad mi bzod do zhes lta ba'i lta ba gang yin pa 'di ni kun du 'dod chags pa med par 'gyur gyi/_kun du 'dod chags par mi 'gyur ba dang /_kun du zhe sdang ba med par 'gyur gyi/_kun du zhe sdang bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_kun du gti mug pa 
[\[37a.7\]]med par 'gyur gyi/_kun du gti mug par mi 'gyur ba dang /_kun du [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa med par 'gyur gyi/_kun du [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]par mi 'gyur ba dang /_kun du sbyor ba dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/_kun du sbyor bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_rnam par byang bar 'gyur gyi/_kun nas nyon mongs par mi 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]'gyur ba dang /_bdag ni thams cad mi bzod do zhes lta ba'i lta ba gang yin pa 'di ni mngon par mi dga' ba dang /_nye bar len pa med pa dang /_lhag par chags pa med par 'gyur ba yin no/_/mer 'jug gi bu de la bdag ni kha cig bzod la kha cig mi bzod do zhes lta ba'i 
[\[37b.2\]]lta ba gang yin pa 'di la ni re zhig bdag ni kha cig bzod do zhes lta ba'i lta ba gang yin pa 'di ni kun du 'dod chags par 'gyur gyi/_kun du 'dod chags pa med par mi 'gyur ba dang /_kun du zhe sdang bar 'gyur gyi/_kun du zhe sdang ba med par mi 'gyur ba dang /_kun du gti 
[\[37b.3\]]mug par 'gyur gyi/_kun du gti mug pa med par mi 'gyur ba dang /_kun du [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]par 'gyur gyi/_kun du [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa med par mi 'gyur ba dang /_kun du sbyor bar 'gyur gyi/_kun du sbyor ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi/_rnam par byang 
[\[37b.4\]]bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_bdag ni kha cig bzod do zhes lta ba'i lta ba gang yin pa 'di ni mngon par dga' ba dang /_nye bar len pa dang /_lhag par chags par 'gyur ba yin no/_/bdag ni kha cig mi bzod do zhes lta ba'i lta ba gang yin pa 'di ni kun du 'dod chags pa med 
[\[37b.5\]]par 'gyur gyi/_kun du 'dod chags par mi 'gyur ba dang /_kun du zhe sdang ba med par 'gyur gyi/_kun du zhe sdang bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_kun du gti mug pa med par 'gyur gyi/_kun du gti mug par mi 'gyur ba dang /_kun du [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa med par 'gyur gyi/_kun du [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]
[\[37b.6\]]par mi 'gyur ba dang /_kun du sbyor ba dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/_kun du sbyor bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_rnam par byang bar 'gyur gyi/_kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba dang /_bdag ni kha cig mi bzod do zhes lta ba'i lta ba gang yin pa 'di ni mngon par mi dga' ba dang /_nye bar 
[\[37b.7\]]len pa med pa dang /_lhag par chags pa med par 'gyur ba yin no/_/de la 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa ni 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/_gal te bdag thams cad bzod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra na bdag ni thams cad mi bzod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra ba 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]gang yin pa dang /_bdag ni kha cig bzod la kha cig mi bzod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra ba gang yin pa gnyis dang bdag lhan cig rtsod par 'gyur/_'gyed par 'gyur te/_rtsod na 'gyed par 'gyur/_'gyed na rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rtsod pa dang /_
[\[38a.2\]]'gyed pa dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba yang dag par mthong nas lta ba 'di'ang dor zhing lta ba gzhan nye bar mi blang ste/_de ltar na bdag la lta ba de yang spong ba dang /_'dor ba dang /_med par 'gyur la/_lta ba gzhan yang mtshams mi sbyor ba dang /_nye bar mi len pa dang /_mi 'byung 
[\[38a.3\]]bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de la 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa ni 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/_gal te bdag thams cad mi bzod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra na de bdag ni thams cad bzod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra ba gang yin pa dang /_bdag ni kha cig bzod la 
[\[38a.4\]]kha cig mi bzod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra ba gang yin pa gnyis dang bdag lhan cig rtsod par 'gyur/_'gyed par 'gyur te/_rtsod na 'gyed par 'gyur/_'gyed na rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba yang dag par mthong nas 
[\[38a.5\]]lta ba 'di yang dor zhing lta ba gzhan nye bar mi blang ste/_de ltar na bdag la lta ba de yang spong ba dang /_'dor ba dang /_med par 'gyur la/_lta ba gzhan yang mtshams mi sbyor ba dang /_nye bar mi len pa dang /_mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de la 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang 
[\[38a.6\]]ldan pa ni 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de gal te bdag kha cig bzod la kha cig mi bzod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra na bdag ni thams cad bzod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra ba gang yin pa dang /_bdag ni kha cig bzod la kha cig mi bzod do zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra ba 
[\[38a.7\]]gang yin pa gnyis dang bdag lhan cig rtsod par 'gyur/_'gyed par 'gyur te/_rtsod na 'gyed par 'gyur/_'gyed na rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba yang dag par mthong nas lta ba 'di yang dor zhing lta ba gzhan 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]yang nye bar mi blang ste/_de ltar na bdag la lta ba de yang spong ba dang /_'dor ba dang /_med par 'gyur la/_lta ba gzhan yang mtshams mi sbyor ba dang /_nye bar mi len pa dang /_mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/mer 'jug gi bu lus 'di ni gzugs can rags pa 'byung 
[\[38b.2\]]ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa yin te/_de la 'phags pa'i nyan thos kyis yang dang yang du 'byung ba dang 'jig pa rjes su blta zhing gnas par bya'o/_/de la 'phags pa'i nyan thos yang dang yang du 'byung ba dang 'jig par rjes su lta zhing gnas na/_de la lus la 'dun pa dang /_
[\[38b.3\]]lus la chags pa dang /_lus la dga' ba dang /_lus la zhen pa dang /_lus la chums pa dang /_lus la lhag par chags pa 'byung ba gang yin pa des de'i sems yongs su gtugs te mi gnas so/_/mer 'jug gi bu gsum po 'di dag ni tshor ba yin te/_gsum gang 
[\[38b.4\]]zhe na/_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'o/_/mer 'jug gi bu gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed pa de'i tshe na de la sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba gnyis 
[\[38b.5\]]'gag par 'gyur te/_de'i tshe na 'phags pa'i nyan thos bde ba'i tshor ba 'ba' zhig myong bar byed de/_bde ba'i tshor ba yang mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_'gog pa'i chos can yin no/_/gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar byed pa 
[\[38b.6\]]de'i tshe na de la bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba gnyis 'gag par 'gyur te/_de'i tshe na 'phags pa'i nyan thos sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba 'ba' zhig myong bar byed de/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yang mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_'gog 
[\[38b.7\]]pa'i chos can yin no/_/gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba myong bar byed pa de'i tshe na de la bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba gnyis 'gag par 'gyur te/_de'i tshe na 'phags pa'i nyan thos sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'ba' zhig myong bar byed de/_sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba yang mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_'gog pa'i chos can no/_/de 'di snyam du sems te tshor ba 'di dag gi gzhi ni gang yin/_kun 'byung 
[\[39a.2\]]ba ni gang yin/_rigs mthun pa ni gang yin/_rab tu skyed pa ni gang yin snyam na/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_tshor ba 'di dag gi gzhi ni reg pa yin/_kun 'byung ba ni reg pa yin/_rigs mthun pa ni reg pa yin/_rab tu skyed pa ni reg pa yin te/_reg pa 
[\[39a.3\]]de dang de kun 'byung ba las tshor ba de dang de dag kun 'byung ngo /_/reg pa de dang de 'gags pa las tshor ba de dang de dag 'gag par 'gyur/_nye bar zhi bar 'gyur/_bsil bar 'gyur/_nub par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_sdug bsngal yang 
[\[39a.4\]]ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba gang yang rung ba myong bar byed pa na des de dag gi kun 'byung ba dang /_nub pa dang /_ro myang ba dang /_nyes dmigs dang /_nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/de tshor ba de dag gi kun 'byung ba dang /_nub pa 
[\[39a.5\]]dang /_ro myang ba dang /_nyes dmigs dang /_nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes pa na tshor ba byung ngo cog la mi rtag par rjes su lta zhing gnas/_zad par rjes su lta ba dang /_'jig par rjes su lta ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral bar rjes su lta ba dang /_'gog 
[\[39a.6\]]par rjes su lta ba dang /_rab tu spong bar rjes su lta zhing gnas so/_/de tshor ba byung ngo cog la mi rtag par rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang /_zad par rjes su lta ba dang /_'jig par rjes su lta ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral bar rjes su lta ba dang /_'gog par rjes su lta ba dang /_
[\[39a.7\]]rab tu spong bar rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na 'jig rten la cung zad kyang nye bar len par mi byed do/_/nye bar len par mi byed na yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yongs su mi gdung na bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing bdag nyid kho nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed do/_/de lus kyi mtha' pa'i tshor ba myong bar byed pa na lus kyi mtha' pa'i tshor ba myong ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/srog gi mtha' pa'i tshor ba myong bar byed pa na srog gi 
[\[39b.2\]]mtha' pa'i tshor ba myong ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/lus zhig pa'i 'og tu srog yongs su gtugs pas 'di nyid du de'i tshor ba thams cad ma lus par 'gag par 'gyur/_ma lus par nub par 'gyur/_ma lus par zad par 'gyur/_ma lus par yongs 
[\[39b.3\]]su gtugs par 'gyur ro/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed pa na lus zhig par gyur na de nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/_/bdag sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba myong bar byed pa na lus zhig par gyur 
[\[39b.4\]]na de nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no snyam mo/_/de bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed pa na mi ldan pa myong bar byed kyi ldan pa ni ma yin no/_/de sdug bsngal dang /_sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba myong bar byed pa na mi ldan pa myong bar byed kyi ldan pa ni ma yin no/_/
[\[39b.5\]]ji zhig dang mi ldan zhe na/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang mi ldan pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dag dang mi ldan pa dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[39b.6\]]dang mi ldan pa rang smra'o/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bsnyen par rdzogs nas zla ba phyed lon pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na bsil yab thogs te bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das chos de dang 
[\[39b.7\]]de dag gi spong ba nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod pa mdzad cing 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang /_'gog pa nyid dang /_rab tu spong ba nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod par mdzad kyis/_bdag gis kyang chos de dang de dag la spong ba rjes su lta zhing gnas par bya/_'dod chags dang bral bar rjes su lta ba dang /_'gog 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]par rjes su lta ba dang /_rab tu spong bar rjes su lta zhing gnas par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos de dang de dag la spong bar rjes su lta zhing gnas/_'dod chags dang bral bar rjes su lta ba dang /_'gog par rjes su lta ba dang /_rab tu spong bar 
[\[40a.2\]]rjes su lta zhing gnas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos de dang de dag la spong bar rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral bar rjes su lta ba dang /_'gog par rjes su lta ba dang /_rab tu spong bar rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems 
[\[40a.3\]]rnam par grol lo/_/kun du rgyu sen [{]rings kyang [,]ring yang [}]chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de nas kun du rgyu sen [{]rings [,]ring [}]chos mthong ba dang /_chos thos pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos kyi gting sleb pa dang /_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_the tshom las 
[\[40a.4\]]rgal ba dang /_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /_ston pa'i bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[40a.5\]]skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dge slong tshur 
[\[40a.6\]]shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung zhing dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i mjug kho nar skra byi ba dang snam sbyar gyon par gyur te skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang /_lag pa na lhung bzed dang bya ma bum thogs shing dge 
[\[40a.7\]]slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/_/yang smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/_/skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing /_/mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]bkab par gyur/_/de de ltar rab tu byung nas gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid btang bar gnas so/_/gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid btang bar gnas pa na rigs kyi bu gang dag gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos 
[\[40b.2\]]nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 
[\[40b.3\]]'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing tshe dang ldan pa de kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom pa sems shin tu rnam par grol bar gyur to//_//bar sdom la/_bdag ni thams cad mi bzod dang /_/'o na khyod kyis de ltar shes/_/khyod ni skye bo phal chen mtshungs/_/
[\[40b.4\]]'jig rten dge sbyong bram ze dang /_/lta ba'i gnas ni gsum po dang /_/'phags pa'i nyan thos thos ldan dang /_/lus dang tshor dang tshor gzhi 'gag_/kun 'byung la sogs shes pa dang /_/mya ngan 'das dang lus srog mtha'/_/lus zhig srog ni yongs gtugs dang /_/
[\[40b.5\]]sdug bsngal mtha' dang mi ldan dang /_/shA ri'i bu ni tha ma yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste/_dge slong stod [{]rings [,]ring [}]mchog yin no/_/dge 
[\[40b.6\]]slong rnams the tsom skyes nas the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas shes rab rno ba dang /_shes rab zab pa dang /_nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab can du gyur/_bcom ldan 
[\[40b.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag shA ri'i bu nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas/_shA ri'i bu nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba 
[\[41a.2\]]byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 
[\[41a.3\]]ri brags shig na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod pa de'i bu byung nas des de'i ming zhib ma zhes bya bar 
[\[41a.4\]]btags so/_/yang rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i bu mo zhig byung nas des de'i ming zhib ma mo zhes bya bar btags so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de gnyis kyi pha bram ze de chung ma dang bcas te dus la bab bo/_/bram ze'i khye'u zhib ma 
[\[41a.5\]]de yang dben pa la dga' ba'i phyir sring mo khrid nas dgon pa'i nags su song ste 'dug go/_/gang gi tshe bu mo zhib ma mo chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe na nyon mongs pa dag gis gnod par gyur nas des smras pa/_ming po bdag ni dgon pa'i sman dag gis 'tsho bar mi nus kyis bdag cag grong 
[\[41a.6\]]mthar 'dong ngo /_/des sring mo khrid de grong mthar song nas de gnyis cig car khyim gcig tu slong mo la zhugs pa dang bram ze nang na 'dug pas bud med dang skyes pa'i tshig brjod pa thos so/_/thos nas de phyir byung ste smras pa/_ci drang srong yang chung ma dang lhan cig yongs su rgyu'am/_
[\[41a.7\]]des smras pa/_'di ni kho bo'i chung ma ma yin gyi/_'di ni kho bo'i sring mo yin no/_/ci 'ga' zhig la byin nam/_des smras pa/_ma byin no/_/gal te ma byin na 'di kho bo'i chung mar byin cig_/des smras pa/_'dis ni sdig pa can dam pa ma yin pa'i chos de spangs so/_/zhib 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]ma mos smras pa/_ming po bdag ni dgon pa'i sman dag gis 'tsho bar mi nus kyis bdag cag grong mthar 'dong ngo zhes smras pa/_de ji snyam du sems/_'di ltar bdag ni nyon mongs pa dag gis gnod par gyur to/_/gal te de lta na khyod nyid shes so/_/bram ze des de dpal gyi 'byor 
[\[41b.2\]]pa chen pos bag mar blangs so/_/zhib ma mos smras pa ming po tshur shog dang lhan cig 'khod do/_/des smras pa/_kho bo ni 'dod pa dag don du mi gnyer bas kho bo dgon par 'gro'o/_/ming po gal te de lta na ji ste khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]thob na bdag la rjod cig_/zhib 
[\[41b.3\]]ma mtha' gcig tu song ste mkhan po med pa dang slob dpon med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum bcu rtsa bdun bskyed nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so/_/des bsams pa/_bdag gis sring mo de la khas blangs pas song ste nye bar bstan par bya'o snyam mo/_/bdag 
[\[41b.4\]]nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis chos ston gyi tshig gis mi ston pas de de la snying brtse ba'i phyir des ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bebs pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar 
[\[41b.5\]]brtsams so/_/so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas zhib ma mos shing ljon pa rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/_'phags pa khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu brnyes sam/_thob bo/_/
[\[41b.6\]]'phags pa khyod ni bsod snyoms bzhes pa lags la/_bdag ni bsod nams 'tshal ba lags pas 'di nyid du bzhugs shig dang /_bdag gis khyod la bsod snyoms kyi mkho ba bstab par bgyi'o/_/sring mo je khyim thab la dris shig_/de khyim thab kyi gan du song ste smras pa/_
[\[41b.7\]]rje'i sras bdag gi ming po rab tu byung ba brtul zhugs grub pa bdag nyid chen por gyur gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_bdag gis de la bsod snyoms kyi mkho ba bstab par bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_gal te rab tu ma byung na yang mi 'dod bzhin du sbyin par bya ba yin na/_rab tu byung ba 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]brtul zhugs grub pa bdag nyid chen por gyur na lta smos kyang ci dgos kyis song la ci bder bsod snyoms kyi mkho ba stobs shig_/des rang sangs rgyas de la zla ba gsum du bsod snyoms kyi mkho ba bstabs nas ras yug chen chen po la 'os pa bskon te khab dang /_
[\[42a.2\]]gri dang /_skud pa yang phul lo/_/des ras yug chen dang /_gri dang /_khab dang /_skud pa de blangs te/_de nyid kyi mdun du dra bar brtsams pa dang gri de rno ba rno bar gcod nas zhib ma mos de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smon lam 'di skad ces/_ji ltar gri 'di rno ba rno bar gcod 
[\[42a.3\]]pa de ltar bdag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis shes rab rno bar gyur cig ces btab bo/_/rang sangs rgyas des khab kyis dbug par brtsams pa dang khab de zab mo zab mor 'bigs nas zhib ma mo des de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smon lam 'di skad ces/_ji ltar khab 'di zab 
[\[42a.4\]]mo zab mor 'bigs pa de ltar bdag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis shes rab zab mor gyur cig ces btab bo/_/rang sangs rgyas des skud pas drub par brtsams pa dang skud pa de thal byung thal byung du 'gro nas zhib ma mo des de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smon lam 'di skad ces/_ji ltar 
[\[42a.5\]]skud pa 'di thal byung thal byung du 'gro ba de ltar bdag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab can du gyur cig ces btab bo/_/dge slong dag de la de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i bu mo zhib ma mo gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin te/_des rang sangs rgyas la 
[\[42a.6\]]mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas da ltar shes rab rno ba dang /_shes rab zab pa dang /_nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab can du gyur to/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin 
[\[42a.7\]]la/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/_las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs te/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/yang dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas khyim ha cang phyug 
[\[42b.2\]]par yang ma skyes/_khyim ha cang dbul bar yang ma skyes/_khyim 'bring por skyes shing rab tu 'byung ba mang bar gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag shA ri'i bu nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas 
[\[42b.3\]]pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas/_shA ri'i bu nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams 
[\[42b.4\]]la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang 
[\[42b.5\]]tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri brags shig na rgyal po zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod 
[\[42b.6\]]par byed do/_/rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i bu byung nas bsrings shing bskyed de chen por gyur to/_/des pha chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug pa mthong nas des bsams pa/_bdag kyang yab 'das nas rgyal por 'gyur la/_
[\[42b.7\]]bdag gis kyang chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du bcug na sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de rgyal po'i gan du song ste phyin nas smras pa/_yab gnang bar mdzod cig dang bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ngo /_/rgyal pos 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]smras pa/_bu gang gi don du mchod sbyin sbyin par byed/_sbyin sreg sreg par byed/_dka' thub kyis gdung bar byed pa'i rgyal srid de khyod kyi lag mthil du 'ongs shing glang po ches 'gro ba'i rigs su skyes na ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung zhes spyos te de phas rab tu 'byung
