[\[84a.5\]]ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis rigs kyi bu pha mas ma gnang ba rab tu dbyung bar mi bya/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_pha mas ma gnang ba yul thag ring ba pha mas gtam 
[\[84a.6\]]yang mi thos pa gzhan dag 'ongs na/_dge slong rnams kyis de dag kyang rab tu 'byin par mi byed pas de dag rab tu 'byung ba ma thob par dong ste/_de nyid tshe dang ldan pa de dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi 
[\[84a.7\]]dngos po'i bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_pha mas ma gnang ba yul thag ring po pha mas gtam yang mi thos pa gang dag 'ongs na de dag ni rab tu dbyung bar bya ste/_'di la 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]'gyod par mi bya'o//_//sdom la/_bya rog skrod dang sun phyung dang /_/rku thabs gnas dang ma ning dang /_/dud 'gro dang ni mu stegs can/_/ma bsad pa dang pha bsad pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi 
[\[84b.2\]]kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe 'phags skyes po mi gti mug can gyis ser skya'i gnas na gnas pa'i shAkya khon med pa dang /_mi 'gran pa dang /_mi 'khu ba dag bsad pa de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i sring mo'i bu gnyis shig pha mas bor nas/_de dang de na 
[\[84b.3\]]'khyam pa las mnyan yod kyi tshong pa dag zong thogs te ser skya'i gnas su dong ba dang /_de dag gis de gnyis bzhin gzugs las ngo shes nas smras pa/_khye'u gnyis khyod kyi pha ma gnyis gang na/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_'phags skyes po mi gti mug can gyis bsad do/_/
[\[84b.4\]]mnyan yod na khyed gnyis kyi zhang po btsun pa kun dga' bo zhes bya ba dge slong rab tu grags pa 'dug na ci'i phyir der mi 'dong /_des gnyis kyis smras pa/_kho bo cag su zhig gis der khrid par 'gyur/_kho bo cag gis bkri'o/_/de dag gi zong sgyur nas rin blangs te khye'u de gnyis 
[\[84b.5\]]khrid nas mnyan yod du dong ste/_de dag gis khye'u de gnyis rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgor bor ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de gnyis bzhin gzugs las ngo shes nas des smras pa/_khye'u gnyis khyed gnyis kyi pha ma gnyis gang na/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_'phags 
[\[84b.6\]]skyes po mi gti mug can gyis bsad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nye du la mnyes gshin pa yin pas des nye du dang bral ba thos nas mchi mas brnangs te 'dug go/_/dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod kyi khye'u 'di gnyis su dag cig 
[\[84b.7\]]yin/_sring mo'i bu dag go/_/khyod ci'i phyir 'di gnyis sdud par mi byed/_des smras pa/_kho bo ni lto 'grangs tsam gyi bsod snyoms blangs nas phyir 'byung na kho bos 'di gnyis la gang nas sbyin/_de dag gis smras pa/_khye'u 'di gnyis kyis dge slong dag la lo ma dang /_
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]me tog dang /_'bras bu dag 'bul na/_dge slong dag kyang 'di gnyis la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/des de gnyis bsdus nas dge slong dag la lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dag 'bul du gzhug par brtsams pa dang /_
[\[85a.2\]]dge slong dag kyang de gnyis la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma sbyin par byed do/_/de dag gis de gnyis la zhag nyung shas shig byin nas yang mi sbyin par brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo lto 'grangs tsam gyi bsod snyoms blangs nas phyir 'byung bar byed cing de phyed ni bdag nyid 
[\[85a.3\]]za bar byed/_phyed ni de gnyis la sbyin par byed pa na skya bo bseng bseng po rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang /_skam pa dang /_lus ma thob par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/_mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa/_
[\[85a.4\]]mkhyen kyang mi rmed pa/_dus su rmed pa/_dus las yol bar mi rmed pa/_don dang ldan pa rmed pa/_don dang mi ldan pa mi rmed pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni don dang mi ldan pa rmed pa la chu lon gyis zlog par mdzad pa yin no/_/de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[85a.5\]]'das rnams ni don dang ldan pa rmed pa la dus mkhyen pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rmas pa/_dge slong dag ci'i phyir dge slong kun dga' bo skya bo bseng bseng po rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang /_skam pa dang /_lus ma thob par 
[\[85a.6\]]gyur/_de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i sring mo'i bu gnyis shig pha mas bor nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo g.yar bltam gyi bsod snyoms blangs nas slar 'byung zhing de phyed ni bdag nyid 'tshal bar bgyid/_phyed ni de gnyis la stsol bas 
[\[85a.7\]]des na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di skya bo bseng bseng po rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang /_skam pa dang /_lus ma thob par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khye'u de gnyis rab tu mi 'byin tam/_
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'byin to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa dge 'dun gyi zan sbyin par rjes su gnang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa dge 'dun gyis zan sbyin par bya'o zhes bka' stsal 
[\[85b.2\]]nas/_dge slong dag gis zhag nyung shas shig byin nas smod par brtsams so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la yang lan gnyis su bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khye'u de gnyis rab tu mi 'byin tam/_btsun pa de gnyis kyis dgung lo 
[\[85b.3\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga ma lags so/_/khye'u de gnyis kyis dge 'dun gyi skos mal nas bya rog skrod nus sam/_btsun pa rdo thog go/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na lo bdun lon pa bya rog skrod nus pa yongs su spang bas rab tu dbyung bar rjes su gnang ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 
[\[85b.4\]]de gnyis rab tu phyung ngo /_/rab tu phyung nas klog tu gzhug par brtsams pa dang /_de gnyis kyis zhag nyung shas shig bklags nas mi nyan par brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[85b.5\]]dga' bo dge tshul 'di gnyis ci'i phyir klog tu mi gzhug_/des smras pa/_gnas brtan bdag la mnyan par mi bya bar sems na bdag gis ji ltar bya/_bdag gis 'di gnyis klog tu gzhug go/_/des smras pa/_gnas brtan de bzhin gyis shig_/des de gnyis 
[\[85b.6\]]klog tu gzhug par brtsams so/_/de gnyis kyis de la yang zhag nyung shas shig bklags nas de la yang mi nyan par brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_gnas brtan dge tshul 'di gnyis ci'i phyir klog tu mi gzhug_/des smras pa/_tshe dang 
[\[85b.7\]]ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di gnyis kyis bdag la yang mi mnyan par brtsams so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_gnas brtan dge tshul 'di gnyis re zhig yid byung bar gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis la smras pa/_dge tshul 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]gnyis nyin mo spyod du 'dong ngo /_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_'phags pa bzhud do/_/stan khyer cig_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos dge tshul de gnyis khrid nas nyin mo spyod du song ngo /_/de na tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos phyogs gcig 
[\[86a.2\]]tu sems can dmyal ba dag tu sprul te/_de na gcod pa dang /_'tsheg pa dang /_rdung ba dang /_'dral ba la sogs pa'i sgra dag grag go/_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_'phags pa 'di ci lags/_des smras pa/_deng la ltos shig_/de gnyis der dong ba dang ji 
[\[86a.3\]]tsam na gcod pa dang /_'tsheg pa dang /_rdung ba dang /_'dral ba la sogs pa'i las dag byed cing /_de na kha cig ni sog le dag gis 'tsheg par byed/_kha cig ni rang thag dag gis 'thag par byed/_kha cig ni zangs po che khol ba dag gi nang du 'jud par byed de/_
[\[86a.4\]]de na lcags kyi zangs po che gnyis shig khol zhing 'dug pa mthong nas de gnyis kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di gnyis su su yang mi gzhug gam/_de dag gis smras pa/_su yang mi gzhug ste/_'di ltar 'phags pa kun dga' bo'i sring mo'i bu gnyis rab tu byung 
[\[86a.5\]]nas le los 'da' bar byed pa de gnyis shi zhing dus la bab na 'dir skye bar 'gyur bas de gnyis kyi don du bzhag go/_/de gnyis shin tu skrag nas gal te shes na deng nyid du bcug par 'ong ngo snyam nas phyogs bzhir rnam par blta bar brtsams nas/_de gnyis tshe dang ldan 
[\[86a.6\]]pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i gan du dong ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/_khyed kyis mthong ngam/_'phags pa mthong ngo /_/de na ci yod/_sems can dmyal ba dag mchis so/_/de na ci byed/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_gcod pa dang /_'tsheg 
[\[86a.7\]]pa dang /_rdung ba dang /_'dral ba la sogs pa'i las dag bgyid cing de na kha cig ni sog le dag gis 'tsheg par bgyid/_kha cig ni rang thag dag gis 'thag par bgyid/_kha cig ni zangs po che khol ba dag gi nang du stsol bar bgyid de/_de na lcags kyi zangs po che gnyis 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]shig khol zhing mchis pa mthong nas bdag cag gis shes ldan dag 'di gnyis su su yang mi gzhug gam zhes bgyis na/_de dag gi mchid nas su yang mi gzhug ste/_'di ltar 'phags pa kun dga' bo'i sring mo'i bu gnyis rab tu byung nas le los 'da' bar byed pa de 
[\[86b.2\]]gnyis shi zhing dus la bab na 'dir skye bar 'gyur bas de gnyis kyi don du bzhag go zhes mchi'o/_/dge tshul gnyis de ltar na nyes dmigs 'di dag dang /_gzhan dag kyang le los 'byung bar 'gyur bas brtson 'grus gyis shig_/de gnyis brtson 'grus rtsom pa 
[\[86b.3\]]bklag par bya bar brtsams shing /_gal te snga dro sems can dmyal ba dran na ni zan za bar yang mi byed la/_gal te phyi dro dran na ni zas de skyug par 'gyur bas de gnyis skya bo bseng bseng po rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang /_skam pa dang /_lus ma thob par 
[\[86b.4\]]gyur nas des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo de gnyis yid byung bar byas zin to/_/gnas brtan da ni gzengs stod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis la smras pa/_dge tshul gnyis nyin mo spyod du 'dong ngo /_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_'phags 
[\[86b.5\]]pa bzhud de/_phyogs gzhan du bzhud kyi der ni mi bzhud do/_/stan khyer cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis khrid nas nyin mo spyod du song ngo /_/de na tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos phyogs gcig cig tu lha dag sprul te/_de na pi bang 
[\[86b.6\]]dang /_'od ma dang /_bal la ri dang /_ma ha ti dang /_su g+ho Sha ka dag gi sgra dag grag go/_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_'phags pa 'di ci lags/_des smras pa/_deng la ltos shig_/de gnyis der dong ba dang /_ji tsam na pi bang dang /_'od ma dang /_bal la ri dang /_ma 
[\[86b.7\]]ha ti dang /_su g+ho Sha ka dag gi sgra dag sgrogs shing de na gzhal med khang mal cha dang stan bshams pa lha'i bu mo dag gis yongs su gang ba gnyis shig yod de/_de gnyis na lha'i bu su yang mi 'dug pa mthong nas de gnyis kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir gzhal 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]med khang 'di gnyis na lha'i bu su yang mi 'dug_/de dag gis smras pa/_su yang mi 'dug go/_/ci'i phyir/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa kun dga' bo'i sring mo'i bu gnyis rab tu byung nas brtson 'grus brtsams shing spyod pa de gnyis shi zhing dus 
[\[87a.2\]]la bab na 'dir skye bar 'gyur bas de gnyis kyi don du bzhag go/_/de gnyis yongs su dga' nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i gan du dong ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis la smras pa/_khyed kyis mthong ngam/_'phags pa mthong ngo /_/de 
[\[87a.3\]]na ci yod/_lha dag mchis so/_/de na ci byed/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_pi bang dang /_'od ma dang /_bal la ri dang /_ma ha ti dang /_su g+ho Sha ka dag gi sgra dag sgrogs shing de na gzhal med khang mal cha dang stan bshams pa lha'i bu mo dag gis yongs su gang ba 
[\[87a.4\]]gnyis shig mchis te/_de gnyis na lha'i bu su yang ma mchis pa mthong nas/_bdag cag gnyis kyis shes ldan dag ci'i phyir gzhal med khang 'di gnyis na lha'i bu su yang mi 'dug ces bgyis na/_de dag gi mchid nas su yang mi 'dug go/_/ci'i phyir zhes 
[\[87a.5\]]bgyis na de dag gi mchid nas/_'phags pa kun dga' bo'i sring mo'i bu gnyis rab tu byung nas brtson 'grus brtsams shing spyod pa de gnyis shi zhing dus la bab na 'dir skye bar 'gyur bas de gnyis kyi don du bzhag go zhes mchi'o/_/dge tshul gnyis de lta na phan yon 'di 
[\[87a.6\]]dag dang /_gzhan dag kyang brtson 'grus brtsams pa las 'byung bar 'gyur bas brtson 'grus gyis shig/_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po brgyad pa/_de gnyis brtson 'grus rtsom pas bklag par bya bar brtsams te lung nod pa dang /_ji tsam na gleng gzhi dang /_yang 
[\[87a.7\]]dag par ldan pa'i rgyud du gtogs pa las/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi sen mo'i rtse mos rdul dag bzhes nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_ngas sen mo'i rtse mos rdul dag blangs pa gang dag yin pa dang /_sa la gnas pa'i 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]rdul gang dag yin pa de dag gang mang snyam/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi sen mo'i rtse mos rdul dag bzhes pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni nyung ba dang /_nyung ngu dang /_nyung shas dang /_nyung zad lags te/_de dag dogs la gnas pa'i rdul dag dang bskrun na 
[\[87b.2\]]brgya'i char yang nye bar mi mchi/_stong gi cha dang /_brgya stong gi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang nye bar mi mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems 
[\[87b.3\]]can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 
[\[87b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal 
[\[87b.5\]]ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag 
[\[87b.6\]]ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi 
[\[87b.7\]]nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas 
[\[88a.2\]]pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos 
[\[88a.3\]]te lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro 
[\[88a.4\]]rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa 
[\[88a.5\]]de snyed kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed 
[\[88a.6\]]kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro dag gi nang nas shi 'phos te mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i 
[\[88a.7\]]rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi 
[\[88b.2\]]nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang nas 
[\[88b.3\]]shi 'phos te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can 
[\[88b.4\]]dag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas 
[\[88b.5\]]pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te mi rnams kyi nang du 
[\[88b.6\]]skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang 
[\[88b.7\]]nas shi 'phos te lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]dag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas 
[\[89a.2\]]pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni lha rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 
[\[89a.3\]]'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni lha rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni lha rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te dud 'gro 
[\[89a.4\]]rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni lha rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni lha rnams kyi nang nas shi 
[\[89a.5\]]'phos te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni lha rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag 
[\[89a.6\]]ni mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji 
[\[89a.7\]]snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/_sen mo'i rtse mo la gnas pa'i rdul dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can dag ni mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur 
[\[89b.2\]]ro/_/zhes gsungs pa 'khor lo bzhin du sbyar ba blags pa dang /_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_'phags pa bdag cag gis kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skye bar bgyi'am/_
[\[89b.3\]]des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gnyis 'gro ba lnga pa'i 'khor bar ji srid du nyon mongs pa rnams rgyun chad par ma gyur pa de srid du zo chun rgyud mo'i tshul gyis yongs su 'khor bar bya dgos so/_/de gnyis yid byung nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_gang phyir mi gnas 
[\[89b.4\]]lha rnams mi bzang ste/_/'tsho ba thung ba'i mi rnams mi bzang ngo /_/gang na zhi med srid pa mi bzang ste/_/mya ngan 'das pa mchog ces bde gshegs gsung /_/'phags pa ci nas kyang bdag cag 'khor bar 'khor ba na slan chad nyon mongs pa de lta bu dag kun du spyod par 
[\[89b.5\]]mi 'gyur ba de ltar bdag cag la chos bstan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de gnyis kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin khong du chud nas gang thos nas de gnyis kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra 
[\[89b.6\]]bcom pa nyid mngon du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar 
[\[89b.7\]]gyur cing /_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang /_'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon du smra 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]bar bya bar gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan pa byas so/_/de gnyis rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' la me tog dag thu zhing 'dong ba dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di gnyis gang dag yin/_che ge mo dang che ge mo yin 
[\[90a.2\]]no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag lhung bzed nag por zos nas so dag lhung zhing mgo skya bor gyur kyang bdag cag gis sems rtse gcig pa yang ma thob na/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di gnyis dang po lo bdun kho na lon te rab tu byung na nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom 
[\[90a.3\]]pa nyid mngon du byas pas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo brtson 'grus kyis byang chub 'thob bo zhes bka' stsal pa de ni legs par gsungs pa yin no/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa 
[\[90a.4\]]dge tshul 'di gnyis kyis las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas lo bdun kho na lags na rab tu byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa gang lags pa de 'di gnyis kho na la brten nas bag yangs su mdzad 
[\[90a.5\]]cing nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bgyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di gnyis nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[90a.6\]]ba dag byas shing bsags pas 'di gnyis nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams 
[\[90a.7\]]la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang /_skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /_zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar 
[\[90b.2\]]gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ste/_de dge slong gi 'khor nyi khri dang bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na nye bar rten cing 
[\[90b.3\]]bzhugs so/_/bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag phan tshun bshes pa gnyis shig gzhon nu'i gnas skabs su rab tu 'byung bar 'dod na de gnyis kyis nye du dag las rab tu 'byung ba ma thob nas/_gang gi tshe lang tsho yol bar gyur pa de'i tshe na de gnyis kyis nye du dag la bltas te yang dag 
[\[90b.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/'di ni chos nyid de rtag tu gzhon rim gyis las bya ba yin pas dge slong rnams kyis rgan zhugs 'di gnyis deng shig_/rgan zhugs 'di gnyis khyed cig ces bsgo'o/_/de na gcig ni spro ring ba'i rang 
[\[90b.5\]]bzhin can yin/_cig shos ni spro thung ba'i rang bzhin can yin pas de khro bar byed pa dang cig shos kyis smras pa/_rgan zhugs gzhon pa'i gnas skabs su rab tu ma byung na da ci'i phyir khro/_de na 'di gnyis kyi tshe ji srid bar tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' 
[\[90b.6\]]yang ma thob nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam 'di skad ces/_bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung la tshe ji srid bar tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang 
[\[90b.7\]]ma thob ste/_bdag cag gis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs 
[\[91a.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag cag lo bdun kho na lon nas rab tu byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des 'dul 
[\[91a.3\]]ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa gang yin pa de bdag cag gnyis kho na la brten nas bag yangs su mdzad cing nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du gyur cig ces gdab par brtsams so/_/dge slong dag de la de'i tshe 
[\[91a.4\]]de'i dus na khyim bdag gnyis gang dag yin pa de dag ni dge tshul 'di gnyis yin te/_de gnyis kyis der smon lam btab pa gang yin pa des da ltar lo bdun kho na lon nas rab tu byung ste/_ngas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bcas pa gang yin pa 'di 
[\[91a.5\]]gnyis kho na la brten nas bag yangs su byas shing nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na phyogs gcig cig tu byon pa dang 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/chos 
[\[91a.6\]]nyid kyis na gang gi tshe/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe na zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas kha cig ni 'og logs su 'dong /_
[\[91a.7\]]kha cig ni steng logs su 'dong bas gang dag 'og logs su 'dong ba de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_bsdus gzhom dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]bur rdol ba dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a chu zer dang /_ut+pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por dong ste/_sems can dmyal ba tsha ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu bsil bar gyur te 'bab par byed 
[\[91b.2\]]la/_sems can dmyal ba grang ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab par byed do/_/des sems can dmyal ba de dag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun gcod par byed cing de dag 'di snyam du shes ldan dag ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/_'on te 
[\[91b.3\]]gzhan du skyes snyam du sems so/_/de dag dad pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa gtong bar mdzad de/_de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin la/_gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin 
[\[91b.4\]]te/_'di ltar sems can sngon ma mthong ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun chad par gyur to snyam du sems so/_/de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas gang du bden pa 
[\[91b.5\]]dag gi snod du gyur par 'gyur ba'i lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba len par byed do/_/gang dag steng logs su 'dong ba de dag ni rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul 
[\[91b.6\]]dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu 
[\[91b.7\]]che dang /_mi che dang /_mi gdung dang /_gya nom snang dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du dong nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs par byed cing tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po/_brtsam 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/_/sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/_/gang zhig rab tu bag yod par/_/chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs 
[\[92a.2\]]nas/_/sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba yang smras so/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byul nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi slad bzhin slad bzhin du rjes su 'dong ste/_de la bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i 
[\[92a.3\]]las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su nub par 'gyur/_sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur/_dud 
[\[92a.4\]]'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni long bur nub par 'gyur/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur/_mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mor nub par 'gyur/_stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par 
[\[92a.5\]]bzhed na ni phyag mthil g.yon par nub par 'gyur/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag mthil g.yas par nub par 'gyur/_lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar nub par 'gyur/_nyan thos kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du 
[\[92a.6\]]nub par 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni mdzod spur nub par 'gyur/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor 
[\[92a.7\]]ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil du nub bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te zhus pa/_btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_btsun pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags/_tshigs su bcad pa yang gsol pa/_kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi/_/tshogs rnams zhal gyi sgros nas byung gyur te/_/de yis phyogs rnams thams cad snang 
[\[92b.2\]]bgyis pa/_/nyi gdugs bdal bar gyur pa ji bzhin no/_/rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa rab spangs la/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba mchog gi rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis par/_/rtsa ba dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad/_/de slad brtan pa 
[\[92b.3\]]rang blo dus mkhyen nas/_/thub pa khyu mchog dge sbyong skye dbang po/_/nyan pa'i skye bo som nyi ldan rnams la/_/the tshom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang /_/dam pa dge ba dag gis bsal du gsol/_/tshwa chu ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/sangs rgyas mgon 
[\[92b.4\]]rnams glo bur 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pa ji slad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/skye bo'i tshogs rnams de ni nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[92b.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/_kun dga' bo phyogs 'di nyid du g.yon can rab tu mang po dag gis dge slong ma rab tu mang po dag lus bskyod pas sun phyung ste/_de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas sems can dmyal ba rnams 
[\[92b.6\]]kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa g.yon can rab tu mang po dag gis dge slong ma rab tu mang po dag lus bskyod pas sun phyung ba 
[\[92b.7\]]gang dag lags pa de dag gi nang nas gcig bdag lags so/_/mi gti mug can khyod kyis kyang dge slong ma rab tu mang po dag lus bskyod pas sun phyung ngam/_btsun pa bdag gis kyang dge slong ma rab tu mang po dag lus bskyod pas sun phyung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gang zag dge slong ma sun phyung ba ni chos 'dul ba 'di la mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas dge slong dag khyed kyis gang zag dge slong ma sun phyung ba chos 'dul ba 'di las bsnyil bar bya'o/_/'ga' zhig 
[\[93a.2\]]gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/_des de la dge slong ma sun phyung ba ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med 
[\[93a.3\]]zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ongs so/_/dge slong dag 'dod chags dang bral ba med pa na dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba 'byin par byed de/_kha cig gzhon nu'i gnas skabs su ltung ba byung nas rgan por 
[\[93a.4\]]gyur/_kha cig ni rgan po'i gnas skabs na ltung ba 'byin par byed do/_/de dag gis gang gi tshe dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa rnams las thos pa de'i tshe na chos bzhin du sgrub par byed de/_de dag yongs su spo ba dang mgu bar bya bar 
[\[93a.5\]]spyod pa na dge 'dun la rim gro byed cing de na kha cig ni btung ba 'drim par byed/_kha cig ni bsil yab thogs te g.yob par byed do/_/ji tsam na khyim bdag des de na gnas mal bzang po dag bshams shing kha zas bsod pa'i spyi bungs bshams pa mthong nas des bsams pa/_
[\[93a.6\]]'di dag gi chos ni bzang na 'di ltar 'di dag la skyon yang yod de/_'di dag la rjes dang gus pa med de/_rgan pa rgan pa dag las byed du 'jug go snyam nas de skad smras pa dang /_drug sde dag gis thos nas de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag ci zer/_'phags pa khyed 
[\[93a.7\]]cag gi chos ni bzang na 'di ltar khyed cag la skyon yang mchis so/_/khyim bdag kho bo cag la skyon ci yod/_des smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed cag la rjes dang gus pa ma mchis te/_rgan pa rgan pa dag las bgyid du stsol to/_/rgan pa dag la yang las byed du 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]gzhug dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag khyed kyi nang du nga rab tu phyung na yang las bgyid du stsol tam/_de dag gis smras pa/_khyod pas gang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rab tu phyung na yang de yang nged kyis las byed du gzhug na khyod lta ci smos/_des bsams pa/_gal 
[\[93b.2\]]te bdag 'di dag gi nang du rab tu byung na bdag kyang 'di dag gis las byed du bcug par 'gyur gyis/_thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o snyam mo/_/khyim bdag de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin pas des dge slong dag gi gan nas kun du spyod pa'i chos dag bslabs so/_/bslabs 
[\[93b.3\]]nas mtha' 'khob cig tu song ste skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig dag bgos te 'dug pa dang /_ji tsam na dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyogs de nas 'ong zhing 'gro bar byed pa de dag gis de mthong nas smras pa/_gnas brtan mnyan yod na chos kyi rje mngon 
[\[93b.4\]]sum du bzhugs shing de na dus dang dus su lha'i gzugs dag kyang snang /_snang ba rgya chen po dag kyang 'byung /_lha'i sgra dag kyang grag_/kun shes pa brda sprod pa dag kyang grag_/longs spyod gnyis po zang zing gi longs spyod dang /_chos kyi longs spyod kyang yod na ci'i 
[\[93b.5\]]phyir mnyan yod du mi 'gro/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di nyid du 'dug par bya'o/_/de dag gis de la yang dang yang du smras pa/_gnas brtan mnyan yod na chos kyi rje mngon sum du bzhugs shing de na dus dang dus su lha'i gzugs dag kyang snang /_snang ba chen po 
[\[93b.6\]]dag kyang 'byung /_lha'i sgra dag kyang grag_/kun shes pa brda sprod pa dag kyang grag_/longs spyod gnyis po zang zing gi longs spyod dang /_chos kyi longs spyod dag kyang yod na ci'i phyir mnyan yod du mi 'gro/_de tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis dus bskyed pa na mnyan 
[\[93b.7\]]yod du song ngo /_/ji tsam na des de na gnas mal bzang po bshams shing kha zas bsod pa'i spyi bungs bshams pa mthong nas des bsams pa/_gal te bdag gral gyi dang por 'dug na ni yon bshad pa bya dgos par 'gyur ro snyam nas des stan gcig bor nas stan gnyis pa la 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya 'ongs nas des bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan 'chang ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan na 'di su zhig yin snyam mo/_/ji tsam na bsams pa dang rku thabs su gnas pa zhig yin 
[\[94a.2\]]par mthong nas des de se gol gyi sgras bskrad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /_bzang ldan dang /_rlangs pa dang /_ming chen dang /_grags pa dang /_gang po dang /_dri med dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang 
[\[94a.3\]]ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan thams cad kyis kyang se gol gyi sgras bskrad do/_/ji tsam na drug sde dag gi gan du song ba dang de dag gis de la smras pa/_gnas brtan khyod lo du lon/_des na tshod kyi dbang du byas te kho bo lo drug bcu lon 
[\[94a.4\]]no zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis kyang lo drug bcu ma bzhes na 'dis ga la lon/_de dag gis de la smras pa/_rgan zhugs khyod kyi mkhan po gang yin/_des smras pa/_dge sbyong gau ta ma'i mkhan po gang yin/_de dag gis 
[\[94a.5\]]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag rgan zhugs 'di ni rang gis rtags blangs pa yin no zhes de dag gis de lag pa dang rkang pa dag nas bzung ste rgan pa'i mthar khrid nas smras pa/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'jig rten na rang byung gcig ni bcom ldan 'das 
[\[94a.6\]]lags na gnyis pa ni rgan zhugs 'di lags so/_/'di ni gsol ba'o zhes smras nas rgan pa'i mtha' nas bskrad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gang zag rku thabs su gnas pa ni chos 'dul ba 'di la mi skye ba'i chos 
[\[94a.7\]]can yin pas/_dge slong dag khyed kyis gang zag rku thabs su gnas pa chos 'dul ba 'di las bsnyil bar bya'o/_/'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/_des de la rku thabs su gnas pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par rab tu 'byin par 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag rku thabs su gnas pa bsnyil bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/_btsun pa ji tsam gyis na gang zag rku thabs su gnas 
[\[94b.2\]]pa lags/_nye ba 'khor gang tshun chad nas dge slong rang bzhin du gnas pa dag dang lhan cig gso sbyong gi las dag lan gnyis sam gsum du nyams su myong bar gyur na de tsam gyis na gang zag rku thabs su gnas pa yin no//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[94b.3\]]mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/rtse bar byed/_
[\[94b.4\]]dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das te btsas pa las ma ning skyes pa 'dra ba bud med kyang ma yin skyes pa yang ma yin pa zhig byung nas bsrings shing bskyed de che bar gyur to/_/de khye'u dag 
[\[94b.5\]]dang lhan cig rtse bar byed pa na de de dag la mtshan ma ston par byed nas de dag gis de la smras pa/_khyod ci yin/_des smras pa/_bdag ma ning ngo /_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyod ni bram ze yin pas khyod kyi khyim du mi snyan pa grags par gyur na mi rung gis de lta ma byed cig_/de dag 
[\[94b.6\]]gis de'i pha ma la smras pa/_khyod kyis ma ning 'di 'di lta 'di lta byed kyis zlog shig_/de dag gis de la smras pa/_ma ning bdag cag ni bram ze yin pas bdag cag gi khyim du mi snyan par grags par gyur na mi rung gis de lta ma byed cig_/de de dag gis bzlog kyang mi 'dug go/_/
[\[94b.7\]]de dus gzhan zhig na rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_ji tsam na des dge slong gzhon nu gzhon nu dag mthong nas des bsams pa/_bdag 'di dag gi nang du rab tu byung na 'di dag bdag la skyes pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur zhing bdag kyang 'di dag la bud med kyi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]snyam nas/_de dge slong gi gan du song ste smras pa/_'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/_/des de la smras pa/_khyod pha mas gnang ngam/_des smras pa/_ma gnang ngo /_/song la pha ma la gsol cig_/de pha ma'i gan du song ste smras pa/_
[\[95a.2\]]yab yum bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/_/de gnyis des yongs su gdungs pas bsams pa/_bdag cag 'di dang bral bar byas rab tu 'byung la rag go snyam nas/_de gnyis kyis de la smras pa/_ma ning gnang ngo /_/de dge slong gi nang du song ste smras pa/_'phags 
[\[95a.3\]]pa bdag pha mas gnang gis rab tu dbyung du gsol/_des de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyi mdun du mtshan ma ston par byed nas/_de dag gis de la smras pa/_khyod ma ning yin nam ci/_des smras pa/_yin no zhes zer ba'i 
[\[95a.4\]]skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_de na bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gang zag ma ning ni chos 'dul ba 'di la mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas/_dge slong dag khyed kyis gang zag ma ning chos 'dul 
[\[95a.5\]]ba 'di las bsnyil bar bya'o/_/'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/_des de la ma ning ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag ma ning ni lnga po 'di dag yin te/_lnga gang zhe na/_
[\[95a.6\]]skyes nas ma ning dang /_zla ba phyed pa'i ma ning dang /_'khyud nas ldang ba'i ma ning dang /_phrag dog can gyi ma ning dang /_nyams pa'i ma ning ngo /_/de la skyes nas ma ning gang zhe na/_gang skyes nas bud med kyang ma yin skyes pa yang ma yin pa'o/_/zla ba phyed pa'i ma ning gang 
[\[95a.7\]]zhe na/_gang zla ba phyed ni bud med zla ba phyed ni skyes par 'gyur ba'o/_/'khyud nas ldang ba'i ma ning gang zhe na/_gang la gzhan dag gis 'khyud na dbang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o/_/phrag dog can gyi ma ning gang zhe na/_gang la gzhan dag rtsol ba mthong na dbang po 'byung 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]bar 'gyur ba'o/_/nyams pa'i ma ning gang zhe na/_gang gi dbang po nad kyis nyams pa'am mtshon gyis bcad pa'o/_/de la ma ning snga ma bzhi po skyes nas ma ning dang /_zla ba phyed pa'i ma ning dang /_'khyud nas ldang ba'i ma ning dang /_phrag dog can gyi ma ning gang dag yin pa 
[\[95b.2\]]de dag ni rab tu ma byung na ni rab tu dbyung bar mi bya la/_rab tu byung na ni bsnyil bar bya'o/_/de la nyams pa'i ma ning gang yin pa de ni rab tu ma byung na ni rab tu dbyung bar mi bya la/_rab tu byung na ni gal te 'gyur ba mi sten na btang snyoms su bya'o/_/gal te 'gyur ba bsten na 
[\[95b.3\]]bsnyil bar bya'o//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/klu rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni lus la nyin mo bye ma me'i mdog lta bu lan gsum 'bab cing des de dag rus pa'i keng 
[\[95b.4\]]rus tsam zhig lus par byed do/_/klu gzhon nu skyes nas ring po ma lon pa zhig gi lus la nyin mo bye ma me'i mdog lta bu lan gsum 'bab cing des de rus pa'i keng rus tsam zhig lus par byas pa dang des ma la smras pa/_ma bdag gis yun ji srid cig tu sdug bsngal 'di 
[\[95b.5\]]lta bu mnag par bgyi 'tshal/_bu ji srid du ris mthun pa yod kyi bar du'o/_/de na klu rdzu 'phrul che ba dang mthu che ba gzhan gang dag yin pa de dag gi lus la bye ma me'i mdog lta bu mi 'bab nas des smras pa/_ma 'di dag la ci'i phyir mi 'bab/_mas smras pa/_'di dag 
[\[95b.6\]]ni rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba/_bskal par gnas pa/_sa 'dzin pa/_'dab chags kyi rgyal po 'dab [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]dbyung bar mi nus pa yin pas de'i phyir 'di dag la mi 'bab bo/_/de na klu phra mo gzhan gang dag yin pa de dag gi lus la bye ma me'i mdog lta bu mi 'bab 
[\[95b.7\]]nas des smras pa/_ma 'di dag la ni rigs na 'di dag la ci'i phyir mi 'bab/_mas smras pa/_'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs pas de'i phyir 'di dag la mi 'bab bo/_/des smras pa/_gal te de lta na 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag blang ngo /_/mas smras pa/_bu tshe gcig gi sdug bsngal ni bla'i tshe rabs mang po'i ni ma yin te/_gal te khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas skyabs su 'gro 
[\[96a.2\]]ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs nas yang dag par ma bsrungs na yun ring por sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal mnag par bya dgos so/_/des bsams pa/_sdug bsngal 'di bas ches sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba ci zhig yod kyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan 
[\[96a.3\]]sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag len du 'gro'o snyam nas/_de bram ze'i cha lugs su mngon par sprul nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_ji tsam na des dge slong dag bsam gtan dang /_klog pa dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la byed pa la brtson zhing gnas 
[\[96a.4\]]pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dad pa skyes te/_des bsams pa/_ji je dang por skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag blang ngam/_'on te rab tu 'byung bar bya snyam mo/_/des yang bsams pa/_rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas de dge slong gi gan du song ste smras 
[\[96a.5\]]pa/_'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/_/des smras pa/_kho bo ni gsar bu yin pas gnas brtan gzhan 'ga' zhig gi drung du song shig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis gzhan ngo 'tshal ba ma mchis te/_'di ltar bdag thog mar kho nar 
[\[96a.6\]]'phags pa'i gan du mchis pas khyod nyid kyis bdag dge slong 'ga' zhig la gtad par gsol/_dge slong de'i mkhan po dgon pa pa zhig dgon pa na 'dug pas des de khrid de de'i gan du song nas smras pa/_mkhan po rigs kyi bu 'di rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal gyis rab tu 
[\[96a.7\]]dbyung du gsol/_des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gshan pa byed du bcug pa ni bla'i rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas yal bar bor ba ni mi rung ngo zhes bka' stsal pas/_'di yang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]la/_kho bo yang ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur bas kho bo 'di rab tu mi 'byin to/_/des smras pa/_mkhan pos rab tu dbyung ba 'ba' zhig mdzod cig dang /_bdag gis 'di bslab par bgyi zhing klog tu stsal bar bgyi'o/_/des de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas 
[\[96b.2\]]nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di nyid khyod kyi mkhan po gcig pa yin/_'di nyid slob dpon yin gyis khyod kyis 'di nyid la dri bar bya/_khyod kyis 'di nyid la bklag par bya'o/_/khyod kyis 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/des gcig las 'phros pa'i lung bklags 
[\[96b.3\]]pas des de gcig las 'phros pa'i lung klog tu gzhug par brtsams pa dang /_des shin tu brtson 'grus brtsams pas kha ton du lhogs nas dge slong slob dpon de shin tu mig gang ste des de la smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci lhan cig tu bsod snyoms la 'jug par bya'am/_
[\[96b.4\]]'on te so sor/_des bsams pa/_bdag gis mi'i zas kyis 'tsho bar mi nus kyis/_bdag klu'i gnas su song la bdud rtsi zos shing zos shing phyir 'ong bar bya'o snyam nas/_des smras pa/_slob dpon so sor 'jug par bya'o/_/des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[96b.5\]]de ltar gyis shig_/de klu'i gnas su lha'i bdud rtsi zos nas phyir 'ong ngo /_/klu rnams ni gnyid che ba yin pas de gang gi tshe gnyid log nas langs pa de'i tshe na dge slong de bsod snyoms blangs nas phyir 'ong ngo /_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge slong des bsod snyoms glo 
[\[96b.6\]]bur ba rnyed nas des de blangs te phyir 'ongs pa dang /_ji tsam na gnas khang na mgar ba'i sbud pa 'bud pa lta bu'i sgra thos nas des gtan pa'i bu ga nas bltas na/_gnas khang de thams cad klu'i lus bskyil bas gang ba mthong nas des sprul pa sprul pa zhes sgra phyung ba dang /_
[\[96b.7\]]de sgra la mkhas pas myur ba myur ba kho nar sad nas rang bzhin gyi cha lugs mi snang bar byas te de sprul pa'i cha lugs su 'dug go/_/dge slong dag lhags nas de dag gis de la smras pa/_'di ci yin/_des smras pa/_sprul pa yin no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]ldan pa brtson 'grus brtsams pas rtag tu kha ton la brtson pa yin na ci khyod 'di la ser sna byed dam/_des smras pa/_kho bo ni 'di la cung zad kyang ser sna mi byed de/_'di ltar 'di ni sprul pa yin no/_/de dag phan tshun smra ba na bcom ldan 'das kyang 
[\[97a.2\]]phyogs der gshegs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di ci yin/_dge slong dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sprul pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gang zag sprul pa ni chos 'dul ba 'di la mi skye 
[\[97a.3\]]ba'i chos can yin pas/_dge slong dag khyed kyis gang zag sprul pa chos 'dul ba 'di las bsnyil bar bya'o/_/'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/_des de la sprul pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 
[\[97a.4\]]'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag klu'i rang bzhin lnga po 'di dag yin la lhag ma ni sprul pa yin no/_/lnga gang zhe na/_rang bzhin gyis skye ba dang /_rang bzhin gyis 'chi ba dang /_rang bzhin gyis nyal ba dang /_rang bzhin gyis za ba dang /_rang bzhin 
[\[97a.5\]]gyis mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos sten par byed pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyis phung po 'di dag gis yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang thob par mi nus kyis/_dge slong rnams la ma 'tshe bar song shig_/des 
[\[97a.6\]]bsams pa/_'babs par ga la bya snyam nas des sA la'i dgon pa zhig tu song nas gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa/_mthongs khung dang /_skar khung dra ba can dang /_lan kan gyis brgyan pa/_snying dang mig 'phrog par byed pa/_mtho ris kyi them skas 
[\[97a.7\]]su gyur pa/_khri dang /_khri'u dang /_yo byad phun sum tshogs pa zhig sprul te/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_'gro bar chas pa rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs par byed do/_/rgan zhugs shig gtsug lag khang der dbyar gnas nas mnyan yod du song ngo /_/
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]drug sde dag gi kun du spyod pa ni 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la yang chos bstan par bya/_rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya'o/_/snyam pas drug sde dag las gang yang rung bas rgyal 
[\[97b.2\]]byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas nye dga' nang par sngar langs te so shing bor nas snam sbyar dmar ser gyon te rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug go/_/des thag ring po kho na nas rgan zhugs mgo spra ba'i me tog ltar skya ba smin ma 'phyang ba zhig 'ong ba de mthong 
[\[97b.3\]]nas des bsams pa/_'di ni dge slong gnas brtan 'ga' zhig yin gor ma chag snyam nas des bsu ste gnas brtan byon pa legs so byon pa legs so zhes byas pa dang des smras pa/_slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bsams pa/_kye ma 'di ni rgan zhugs 
[\[97b.4\]]zhig ste/_slob dpon yang mi shes/_mkhan po yang mi shes so snyam nas des de la smras pa/_rgan zhugs khyod ga las 'ongs/_sA la'i dgon pa nas so/_/ci de na gtsug lag khang yod dam/_des smras pa/_gtsug lag khang yod do/_/ci de gtsug lag 
[\[97b.5\]]khang yin nam/_'on te phongs pa yin/_gtsug lag khang ni ci 'dra/_phongs pa ni ci 'dra/_gang na yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang yin la/_gang na yo byad thams cad dang bral ba ni phongs pa yin no/_/de gtsug lag khang yin no/_/de na ci yod/_
[\[97b.6\]]de na dge slong zhal ta byed pa gnas te/_des dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang 'gro bar chas pa rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs par byed do/_/drug sde dag gi kun du spyod pa ni gang cung zad ci thos pa de phye 'bred kyi dus kyi tshe gcig tu 'dus nas phan tshun rjod par byed pa 
[\[97b.7\]]yin pas nye dga' gtsug lag khang du song ste drug sde dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa bdag cag gis yun ji srid kyis brel ba spang bar bya/_khyod kyis thos pa cung zhig yod dam/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_yod de/_sA la'i dgon pa na gtsug lag khang yod do/_/
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]de na ci yod/_de na zhal ta byed pa gnas te/_des dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang 'gro bar chas pa rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs par byed kyis/_tshur shog bdag cag der 'dong ngo /_/de dag der dong ba dang /_des de dag thag ring po kho 
[\[98a.2\]]na nas 'ong ba mthong nas des bsams pa/_gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa de dag 'dir 'ongs so snyam mo/_/des yang bsams pa/_bdag gis 'di dag la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs na/_'di dag gis bdag la ci byar yod snyam nas/_des de dag la rgan 
[\[98a.3\]]rims kyis gnas mal yang tog dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa dag bskos shing yo byad thams cad kyis kyang bstabs so/_/de dag nyi ma nyung shas shig 'khod nas smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' rgan zhugs 'di la 'du ba yang mi snang 'god pa yang mi snang bas bdag cag 
[\[98a.4\]]gis 'di la grangs dag 'debs su gzhug go zhes de dag gis de la smras pa/_rgan zhugs khyod la 'du ba yang mi snang /_'god pa yang mi snang bas tshur shog grangs thob shig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa dag cung zad nyams pa'am gcig tu ma gyur tam/_de dag 
[\[98a.5\]]gis smras pa/_cung zad kyang nyams par ma gyur te tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis drug sde dag gtsug lag khang de nyid du dbyar gnas na de dag gis 'du ba yang mi shes/_'god pa yang mi shes so zhes bdag cag smad par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_gnas brtan dag 
[\[98a.6\]]gal te de lta na bgyi'o/_/ji tsam na bya/_lo bcu gnyis na'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_rgan zhugs lo bcu gnyis na khyod kyis gtsug lag khang 'di sgo 'phar yang zos par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_lo bdun na'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_mi rung ngo /_/des 
[\[98a.7\]]smras pa/_zla ba bdun na'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_mi rung ngo /_/des smras pa/_nyin zhag bdun na'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' nyin zhag bdun gyis rgan zhugs 'dis ci zhig zos par gyur te de bzhin bya'o/_/de dag gis de la smras pa/_rgan zhugs 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]de bzhin gyis shig_/des bsams pa/_zhag bdun lon na gtsug lag khang 'di mi snang bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/_des de nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa des pa des pa rnams la la la la ni snam sbyar 'bul bar byed/_la la la ni bla gos/_la la la ni sham thabs/_
[\[98b.2\]]la la la ni rngul zan/_la la la ni lhung bzed/_la la la ni lhung bzed chung ngu 'bul bar byed do/_/drug sde dag gis de mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' rgan zhugs 'di phyogs tshol gyis zhag bdun 'das nas phyogs dang bcas nas rtsa nas gdon 
[\[98b.3\]]to/_/des kyang zhag bdun 'das nas de dag nyal ba dang gtsug lag khang de mi snang bar byas nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram du song ngo /_/de dag kyang sa sgre bo la nyal zhing 'khod nas smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' longs la rdo rgyus long shig dang grangs 'debs su gzhug go/_/
[\[98b.4\]]de dag gis ji tsam na bdag cag sa sgre bo la nyal bar mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la mchod pa byed pa zhig bdag cag gis tho btsams nas gtsug lag khang mi snang bar byas te song 
[\[98b.5\]]ba de lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_su yin zhes zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong zhal ta byed pa de ni sprul pa gang yin pa de nyid yin te/_gal te dge 
[\[98b.6\]]slong drug sde dag gis tho btsams par ma gyur na bstan pa mthar thug gi bar du sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dag la mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag gtsug lag khang gang na 'du 
[\[98b.7\]]'god mi mngon pa der grangs 'debs su 'jug pa las gyur pa yin no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gang na 'du ba yang mi mngon 'god pa yang mi mngon pa der yang dge slong gis grangs 'debs su gzhug par mi bya'o/_/gang na 'du ba ni mngon la 'god pa mi mngon pa 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]der yang dge slong gis grangs 'debs su gzhug par mi bya'o/_/gang na 'god pa ni mngon la 'du ba mi mngon pa der yang dge slong gis grangs 'debs su gzhug par mi bya'o/_/gang na 'du ba dang 'god pa mngon pa der ni dge slong gis dran pa dang shes bzhin 
[\[99a.2\]]gyis tshod rig par bya'o//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po dgu pa/_de'i 'og tu rgya mtsho'i 'gram du song ste gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa/_mthongs khung dang skar khung dra ba can dang ldan pa/_lan kan gyis brgyan pa/_snying dang mig 'phrog 
[\[99a.3\]]par byed pa/_mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa/_khri dang khri'u dang yo byad phun sum tshogs pa gnyis pa zhig sprul te/_der rgya mtsho chen po'i klu dag bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gi cha byad kyis mngon du lhags nas de dag de la chos nyan par byed do/_/de dag gis de la chos 
[\[99a.4\]]thos nas dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang 'gro bar chas pa rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs par byed do/_/rgan zhugs shig gtsug lag khang der dbyar gnas nas mnyan yod du song ngo /_/drug sde dag gi kun du spyod pa ni 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag 
[\[99a.5\]]'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la yang chos bstan par bya/_rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya'o snyam pas drug sde dag las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas nye dga' nang par sngar langs te so shing bor 
[\[99a.6\]]nas snam sbyar dmar ser gyon te rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug go/_/des thag ring po kho na nas rgan zhugs mgo spra ba'i me tog ltar skya ba smin ma 'phyang ba zhig 'ong ba de mthong nas des bsams pa/_'di ni dge slong gnas brtan 'ga' zhig yin gor ma chag 
[\[99a.7\]]snyan nas des de bsu ste gnas brtan byon pa legs so byon pa legs so zhes byas pa dang des smras pa/_slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bsams pa/_kye ma 'di ni rgan zhugs shig ste/_slob dpon yang mi shes mkhan po yang mi shes so snyam nas/_des de la smras 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]pa/_rgan zhugs khyod ga las 'ongs/_rgya mtsho'i 'gram nas so/_/ci de na gtsug lag khang yod dam/_des smras pa/_gtsug lag khang yod do/_/ci de gtsug lag khang yin nam/_'on te phongs pa yin/_gtsug lag khang ni ci 'dra/_phongs pa ni ci 'dra/_gang 
[\[99b.2\]]na yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang yin la/_gang na yo byad thams cad dang bral ba de ni phongs pa yin no/_/de gtsug lag khang yin no/_/de na ci yod/_de na dge slong chos smra ba gnas te/_de de na bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos ston par byed cing 
[\[99b.3\]]de dag gis de la chos thos nas dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang 'gro bar chas pa rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs par byed do/_/drug sde dag gi kun du spyod pa ni gang cung zad ci thos pa de phyi 'bred kyi dus kyi tshe gcig tu 'dus nas phan tshun rjod par byed pa yin pas nye dga' 
[\[99b.4\]]gtsug lag khang du song ste drug sde dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gis yun ji srid kyis brel ba spang bar bya/_khyod kyis thos pa cung zhig yod dam/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa yod de/_rgya mtsho'i 'gram na gtsug lag khang yod do/_/de na ci yod/_de 
[\[99b.5\]]na dge slong chos smra ba gnas te/_de de na bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos ston par byed cing de dag gis de las chos thos nas dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang 'gro bar chas pa rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs par byed kyis/_tshur shog bdag cag der 'dong ngo /_/
[\[99b.6\]]de dag der dong ba dang /_des de dag thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong nas des bsams pa/_gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa de dag 'dir yang 'ongs so snyam mo/_/des yang bsams pa/_bdag 'di dag la cung zad kyang rag lus pa med na 'di dag gis bdag la ci byar 
[\[99b.7\]]yod snyam mo/_/de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i klu da dag bram ze dang khyim bdag gi cha lugs kyis mngon du lhags pa dang /_des de dag la chos bstan to/_/de dag gis de las chos thos nas dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang 'gro bar chas pa rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]pa dang drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' rgan zhugs 'dis ci zhig shes/_gcig las 'phros pa'o/_/'di ni re zhig rdzubs pas gcig las 'phros pa'i chos ston gyis dge slong 'di dag ni sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/_chos sgrogs 
[\[100a.2\]]pa/_rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can sha stag yin na/_ci'i phyir 'di dag la gsol ba mi 'debs/_de dag gis de la smras pa/_rgan zhugs khyod kyis ci shes/_des smras pa/_gcig las 'phros pa'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_rgan zhugs khyod ni re 
[\[100a.3\]]zhig rdzubs pas gcig las 'phros pa'i chos ston gyi/_dge slong 'di dag ni sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/_chos sgrogs pa/_rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can sha stag yin na/_ci'i phyir 'di dag la gsol ba mi 'debs/_des smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag 
[\[100a.4\]]gis bzlog gam ci na khyed ci'i phyir chos mi ston/_de dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' rgan zhugs 'di bdag cag dang mi mthun par byed kyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o/_/des bsams pa/_gal te bdag la gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas na klu'i 
[\[100a.5\]]gnas su yang skabs mi rnyed do snyam nas des de dag nyal ba dang gtsug lag khang de yang mi snang bar byas te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so/_/de dag bye ma'i thang la nyal zhing 'khod 'khod nas smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' longs la seng ge'i khri shoms shig dang chos bstan par 
[\[100a.6\]]bya'o/_/de dag gis ji tsam na bdag cag bye ma'i thang la nyal ba mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la mchod pa byed pa zhig bdag cag gis tho btsams nas gtsug lag khang mi snang 
[\[100a.7\]]bar byas te song ba de lha'am/_klu 'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_su yin zhes zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong chos smra ba de ni sprul pa gang yin pa de nyid yin 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]te/_gal te dge slong drug sde dag gis tho btsams par ma gyur na bstan pa mthar thug gi bar du sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dag la mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag 
[\[100b.2\]]ma gsol bar chos ston par byed pa las gyur pa yin no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis ma gsol bar chos bstan par mi bya'o/_/dge slong ma gsol bar chos ston na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/de'i ngor mgron du bos pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/
[\[100b.3\]]mnyan yod na khyim bdag sangs rgyas 'tsho zhes bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gdul ba la 
[\[100b.4\]]ltos pas de'i khyim du song ste/_des khyim bdag de chung ma dang bcas pa skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag go/_/ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sems can de nges par 
[\[100b.5\]]skal ba dang ldan pa nyid du shes nas phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong med par de'i khyim du song ba dang khyim bdag des rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_ci 'phags pa la slad bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong ma mchis sam/_des smras pa/_khyim bdag ci kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge 
[\[100b.6\]]sbyong rtswa ka sha'i byings sam/_ku sha'i byings nas 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_'di ltar khyod lta bu dag las thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong du 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag sangs rgyas 'tshos smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gi mchis 'brang 'di 
[\[100b.7\]]la sems can zhig zhugs par gyur gyis/_gal te bu pho zhig btsas par gyur na de bdag gis 'phags pa'i slad bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong du 'bul lo/_/des smras pa/_khyim bdag thabs yin no/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_blta na 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_gsal ba/_gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/_mgo gdugs lta bu dang ldan pa/_lag pa ring ba/_dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/_smin ma 'jar ba/_sna'i gzangs mtho ba zhig btsas so/_/btsas nas de'i nye du dag 'dus shing 
[\[101a.2\]]lhags nas de nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_khye'u 'di sangs rgyas 'tsho'i bu yin pas khye'u 'i ming dge 'dun 'tshor gdags so zhes de'i 
[\[101a.3\]]ming dge 'dun 'tsho zhes bya bar btags so/_/de dag gis khye'u dge 'dun 'tsho 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi snying gu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/_skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du 
[\[101a.4\]]myur du skyed par byed do/_/gang kho na'i nyin mo dge 'dun 'tsho btsas pa de kho na'i nyin mo tshong pa lnga brgya dag gi bu dag kyang btsas te/_de dag kyang rigs dang mthun pa'i ming dag btags so/_/gang gi tshe khye'u dge 'dun 'tsho chen por gyur pa de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA 
[\[101a.5\]]ri'i bus de rab tu dbyung ba'i dus shes nas gdul ba la ltos pas phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong med par gcig pu de'i khyim du song ba dang khyim bdag sangs rgyas 'tshos rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te stan bting ba dang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'dug go/_/'dug nas kyang khyim 
[\[101a.6\]]bdag sangs rgyas 'tsho la brda bya bar brtsams so/_/de nas khyim bdag sangs rgyas 'tshos dge 'dun 'tsho la smras pa/_bu kho bos khyod ma'i rum na 'dug cing ma btsas pa nyid nas 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong du phul gyis khyod song la 'di la 
[\[101a.7\]]bsnyen bkur gyis shig_/de sems can srid pa tha ma pa yin pas 'dzum sngon du btang ste/_'jigs pa med cing bzhin nyams pa med pa dang /_dman pa med pas de ltar bgyi'o zhes khas blangs nas de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i phyi bzhin phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang ngo /_/de nas 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas kun du spyod pa'i chos dag bslabs te lung bzhi klog tu bcug go/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/_tshong pa lnga brgya po dag gi bu lnga brgya po de dag gis phan tshun gros byas te rgya mtsho chen por 'dong ba'i zong sta gon byas nas rgya mtsho chen 
[\[101b.2\]]por 'phags pa dang /_de dag 'di snyam sems te/_shes ldan dag rgya mtsho chen po ni 'jigs pa du mas kun du gang ba yin pas bdag cag gis gang bdag cag rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du dong ba rnams la chos ston par 'gyur ba'i 'phags pa 'ga' zhig gshegs su gsol na/_des 
[\[101b.3\]]bdag cag bde legs su 'gyur snyam nas/_de dag gis dpyad par brtsams te smras pa/_su gshegs su gsol/_gzhan dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho 'di bdag cag gi ne'u ldangs lhan cig skyes pas rdul la lhan cig rtse rtse 
[\[101b.4\]]ba yin pas bdag cag gis 'di la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/de nas de dag de'i gan du song ste rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/_'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho bdag cag gi ne'u ldangs lhan cig skyes pa sa rdul la lhan cig rtse rtse ba lags te/_bdag cag ni rgya 
[\[101b.5\]]mtsho chen por 'phags na rgya mtsho chen po ni 'jigs pa du mas kun du gang ba lags pas 'phags pas bdag cag rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du mchis pa rnams la chos bstan na des bdag cag bde legs su 'gyur ba lags kyis/_de'i slad du 'phags pa bdag cag dang thabs cig rgya 
[\[101b.6\]]mtsho chen por gshegs par gsol/_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bo la rang dbang med kyis deng la mkhan po la zhus shig_/de dag tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_tshe dang 
[\[101b.7\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa shA ri'i bu mkhyen par mdzod cig_/'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho 'di bdag cag gi ne'u ldangs lhan cig skyes pa sa rdul la lhan cig rtse rtse ba lags te/_bdag cag ni rgya mtsho chen por 'phags na rgya mtsho chen po ni 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]'jigs pa du mas kun du gang ba lags pas 'phags pa dge 'dun 'tshos bdag cag rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du mchis pa rnams la chos bstan na des bdag cag bde legs su 'gyur lags kyis/_de'i slad du 'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho bdag cag dang 
[\[102a.2\]]thabs cig rgya mtsho chen por gtang bar gsol/_des smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das nyid la zhus shig dang kho bos zlog par mi byed do/_/de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom 
[\[102a.3\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho 'di bdag cag gi ne'u ldangs lhan cig skyes pa sa rdul la lhan cig rtse rtse ba lags te/_bdag cag ni rgya mtsho chen por 'phags na rgya mtsho chen 
[\[102a.4\]]po ni 'jigs pa du mas kun du gang ba lags pas 'phags pa dge 'dun 'tshos bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por mchis pa rnams la chos bstan na des bdag cag bde legs su 'gyur ba lags kyis/_de'i slad du 'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho bdag cag dang thabs cig rgya mtsho 
[\[102a.5\]]chen por gtang bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_ci tshong pa 'di dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam/_'on te med snyam na yod par gzigs so/_/su la rag lus snyam nas dge slong dge 'dun 'tsho la rag lus par gzigs nas/_de 
[\[102a.6\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho la bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun 'tsho khyod rgya mtsho chen por 'jug tu song la khyod kyis 'jigs pa dang 'jigs su rung ba dag bzod par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tshos bcom ldan 'das la cang mi smra bar 
[\[102a.7\]]dang du blangs so/_/de nas tshong pa lnga brgya po de dag tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho dang lhan cig dge mtshan dang /_bkra shis dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba dag byas te/_shing rta dag dang /_khur dag dang /_spyad dag dang /_gle ba dag dang /_rnga mo dag dang /_ba lang 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]dag dang /_bong bu dag gis rgya mtsho chen por 'dong ba'i zong khyer te/_rgya mtsho chen por 'phags nas mthar gyis grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_tshong rdal dag tu rnam par rgyu ba na rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du phyin nas de dag 
[\[102b.2\]]gis lam [(]gis [,]gyis [)]dub pa bsal te/_zong rnying pa lnga brgyas gru bo che sbyar nas zho shas 'tsho ba lnga brgya po stobs par byed pa dang /_sel bar byed pa dang /_rkyal chen dang /_gru pa dang /_rlung yor thogs pa dag khrid de/_lan gsum dril bsgrags nas nor bsgrub pa'i phyir 
[\[102b.3\]]rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so/_/ji tsam na de dag rgya mtsho chen por dong ba dag gi gru bo che de klu rnams kyis bzung nas de dag zhi ba dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams la rgya mtsho chen po 'di na lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod 
[\[102b.4\]]sbyin nam/_dri za'am/_gang gnas pa de bdag cag la ci 'dod pa smra bar gyur cig ces gsol ba gdab par brtsams pa dang /_de nas rgya mtsho chen po nas 'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho nged la byin cig ces sgra phyung ngo /_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dge 
[\[102b.5\]]'dun 'tsho ni bdag cag gi ne'u ldangs lhan cig skyes pa sa rdul la lhan cig rtse rtse ba/_bcom ldan 'das dang btsun pa shA ri'i bus bdag cag la gnang ba yin pas bdag cag 'di dang lhan cig 'chi ba dang dus byed pa ni bla'i/_'di yongs su gtang bar ni mi bya'o/_/
[\[102b.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tshos de dag la smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci zer/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa rgya mtsho chen po nas 'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho nged la byin cig ces sgra byung ngo /_/des smras pa/_ci'i phyir mi sbyin/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags 
[\[102b.7\]]pa khyod ni bdag cag gi ne'u ldangs lhan cig skyes pa sa rdul la lhan cig rtse rtse ba/_bcom ldan 'das dang /_btsun pa shA ri'i bus bdag cag la gnang ba lags pas bdag cag khyod dang thabs cig 'gum pa dang dus bgyid pa ni bla'i/_khyod yongs su gtang bar ni 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]mi bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tshos bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la dge 'dun 'tsho khyod rgya mtsho chen por 'jug tu song la khyod kyis 'jigs pa dang 'jigs su rung ba dag bzod par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa gang yin pa de ni 'di 
[\[103a.2\]]yin no snyam nas/_des lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te bdag nyid rgya mtsho chen por mchong bar brtsams pa dang /_de nas tshong pa de dag gis des de ltar brtsams pa mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho ci mdzad ci mdzad/_de de dag de ltar bzlog bzhin 
[\[103a.3\]]du rgya mtsho chen por mchongs pa dang /_de ma thag kho nar klu rnams kyis gru bo che de btang ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho yang klu rnams kyis khrid de klu'i gnas su zhugs so/_/de nas klu de rnams klu'i bu mo rnams dang lhan cig 'dzum pa sngon du btang ste ya mtshan skyes 
[\[103a.4\]]nas mig tshugs su lta zhing tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho mchod rten de dag la phyag 'tshal du gzhug par brtsams te smras pa/_'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dri gtsang khang lags so/_/'di ni gtsug tor can 
[\[103a.5\]]dang /_thams cad skyob dang /_'khor ba 'jig dang /_gser thub dang /_'od srung gi dri gtsang khang lags so/_/'di ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dri gtsang khang lags so/_/des de dag dang lhan cig mchod rten dag la phyag 'tshal nas klu'i tshogs 
[\[103a.6\]]kyi gung la stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/_/de nas klu de rnams kyis thal mo sbyar nas gsol ba btab pa/_'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho lha dang mi rnams la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde dang /_ma mo rab tu gnas na/_bdag cag klu rnams ni mi khom par skyes/_
[\[103a.7\]]log par ltung ba'i lus dang ldan pas/_kye ma 'phags pas bdag cag la mdo sde'i mtha' rab tu gnas par mdzad du gsol/_des de ltar bya'o zhes khas blangs so/_/de nas sprul pa des klu gzhon nu gsum spro ba bskyed nas gcig la smras pa/_re zhig khyod kyis ni 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]yang dag par ldan pa lhogs shig_/gnyis pa la smras pa/_khyod kyis ni bar ma lhogs shig_/gsum pa la smras pa/_khyod kyis ni ring po lhogs shig_/kho bos kyang gcig las 'phros pa'i lung brjod pa'i skabs de dag nyid la gsal bar bya'o/_/de dag 
[\[103b.2\]]gis bklag par brtsams nas de na gcig ni mig btsums te lung nod par byed do/_/gnyis pa ni rgyab kyis phyogs te lung nod par byed do/_/gsum pa ni thag ring por 'dug ste lung nod par byed do/_/de dag gi nang nas sprul pa de nyid ni sngon gyi bag chags kyi khyad 
[\[103b.3\]]par gyis gus pa dang bcas pa dang /_zhe sa dang bcas pa dang /_'phral gyi bya ba thams cad la thog mar 'gro ba yin pas de nang par sngar langs te/_'phags pa bzhengs la tshems shing 'or cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor dang mchod rten la phyag mdzod 
[\[103b.4\]]cig_/bshos gsol cig_/gzims mal shoms shig ces smra bar byed do/_/ji tsam na de thams cad kyis rim gyis lung rnams bklags pa dang /_sprul pa des smras pa/_'phags pa 'di dag gis lung rnams bklags na ci 'dzin tam 'on te mi 'dzin/_
[\[103b.5\]]des smras pa/_'di dag dran pa dang ldan pas 'dzin par ni 'gyur na 'di ltar 'di dag la nyes pa yod do/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa nongs pa ci mchis/_'di dag thams cad gus pa med pa dang zhe sa med pa yin te/_re zhig gcig ni mig btsums te lung nod 
[\[103b.6\]]par byed/_gnyis pa ni rgyab kyis phyogs te lung nod par byed/_gsum pa ni thag ring por 'dug ste lung nod par byed do/_/khyod 'ba' zhig gus pa dang bcas pa dang /_zhe sa dang bcas pa dang 'phral gyi bya ba thams cad la thog mar 'gro ba yin no/_/des smras pa/_
[\[103b.7\]]'phags pa de dag ni gus pa ma mchis pa dang /_zhes ma mchis pa ma lags te/_re zhig mig btsums te lung nod pa gang lags pa ni mig gdug pa lags so/_/rgyab kyis phyogs te lung nod pa gang lags pa ni dbugs gdug pa lags so/_/thag ring por mchis 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]te lung nod pa gang lags pa de ni reg pa gdug pa lags so/_/bdag gcig pu ni mche ba gdug pa lags so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho skrag nas bsams pa/_bdag kho bo dgra bo rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa lta snyam nas/_de skya bo 
[\[104a.2\]]bseng bseng po/_rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang skam pa dang lus ma thob par gyur to/_/klu sprul pas smras pa/_'phags pa khyod ci'i slad du skya bo bseng bseng po/_/rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang /_skam pa dang /_lus ma thob par 
[\[104a.3\]]gyur/_des smras pa/_kho bo ni dgra bo rnams kyi nang na 'dug ste gang gi tshe khyed cag las gang yang rung ba zhig 'khrugs par gyur pa de'i tshe na kho bo ming tsam zhig lus par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_bdag cag 'phags pa la gnod pa mi bgyid de/_'di ltar 
[\[104a.4\]]'phags pa slar 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs bzhed dam ci/_des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo 'di na dga' ba med pas 'gro 'dod do/_/de nas klu de rnams kyis phan tshun gros byas te/_gang gi tshe gru bo che de phyogs der 'ongs pa de'i tshe na 'phags pa dge 'dun 
[\[104a.5\]]'tsho bteg ste gru bo che'i nang du bzhag go/_/de nas tshong pa de dag 'dzum pa sngon du btang ste ya mtshan skyes nas mig tshugs su lta zhing smras pa/_'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho byon pa legs so/_/byon pa legs so des smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bos ni klu'i 
[\[104a.6\]]gnas su klu rnams la lung bzhi po dag rab tu gnas par byas kyis rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa 'di lta ste/_gzhan la phan 'dogs pa 'di ni ston pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung bas bgyi ba lags te rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de 
[\[104a.7\]]nas tshong pa de dag tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho dang lhan cig tshogs shing kun dga' bzhin du mthar gyis rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin to/_/ji tsam na thams cad ngal zhing dub pas gnyid log pa na tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho yang rgya mtsho chen po la blta bar brtsams so/_/
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag lnga po 'di dag ni blta bas chog mi shes shing mthong na mi mthun pa med pa yin te/_lnga gang zhe na/_dge slong dag glang po che cang shes gzhon sha can dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /_rgya mtsho dug can pa dang /_ri'i rgyal 
[\[104b.2\]]rgyal po ri rab dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni blta bas chog mi shes shing mthong na mi mthun pa med pa yin no zhes gsungs pas/_de yun ring du rgya mtsho chen po la lta ba na dub pas tho rangs gnyid stug pos non to/_/
[\[104b.3\]]de nas tshong pa de dag khal dag bkal te 'phags nas mtshan mo nam nangs pa na tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho mi snang nas/_de dag brtad cing shes ldan dag 'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho ga re zhes phan tshun du blta bar brtsams pa dang /_de na kha cig na re mdun du song ngo 
[\[104b.4\]]zhes zer ro/_/kha cig na re phyi bzhin 'ong ngo zhes zer ro/_/kha cig na re dbus nas 'gro'o zhes zer ro/_/de dag rnam pa thams cad du kun du tshol ba na yi chad par gyur cing ma mthong ngo /_/de nas de dag bzhin nyams shing dman par gyur te smras pa/_shes
