[\[104b.5\]]ldan dag bdag cag gis 'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho bor ba ma legs pa byas kyis phyir ldog par bya'o/_/yang bsams pa/_'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba yin pas 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen por yang dus la ma bab na de da lta skam la phyin na dus la 
[\[104b.6\]]bab par ga la 'gyur/_de ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba yin pas de ches sngon du song ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod do snyam nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag tshur sheg 'dong zhes de dag 'phags so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho yang bye ma'i thang stong pa la nyi ma 
[\[104b.7\]]'char ba'i dus kyi tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer dag gis phog nas sad pa dang /_ji tsam na ci yang mi snang nas des bsams pa/_tshong pa de dag ni dong na da ji ltar bya/_gar bab bab tu 'gro'o snyam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa de snying stobs che bas song ba dang lam mi snang nas des 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]phan tshun btsal nas lam srang zhig mthong nas de der zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam na sa la'i dgon pa zhig na gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa/_mthongs khung dang /_skar khung dra ba can dang /_lan kan gyis brgyan pa/_snying dang mig 
[\[105a.2\]]'phrog par byed pa/_mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa/_khri dang khri'u dang yo byad phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/_shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis bskor ba/_rdzing bu dang mtshe'us nye bar mdzes par byas pa/_ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tsho dang /_
[\[105a.3\]]ri skegs dang /_khu byug mngon par sgra 'byin pa/_lha'i gnas ltar dpal gyis 'bar ba zhig dang /_de na dge slong legs par bgos shing legs par sbyangs pa/_spyod lam zhi bas gnas pa dag mthong nas gus pa dang bcas pas de dag gi gan du song ngo /_/de nas 
[\[105a.4\]]de dag gus par sgrim pa dang bcas pas de la smras pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho byon pa legs so byon pa legs so khyod da gzod ga las byon/_des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad brjod pa dang /_de nas de dag gis ngal sor bcug ste/_lam gyi dub pa bsal nas gtsug 
[\[105a.5\]]lag khang du khrid do/_/ji tsam na stan bzang po bshams pa dang /_kha zas bsod pa'i spyi bungs bshams pa mthong nas de dag gis de la smras pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho mi skyems sam/_mi sbrebs sam/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag skom mo/_/
[\[105a.6\]]bkres so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho gsol cig_/des smras pa/_dge 'dun gyi nang du bza'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho khyod shul gyis dub pa lags kyis da gsol cig_/slad kyis 'dir nyes dmigs 
[\[105a.7\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/des nyes dmigs mthong bas zos nas mtha' gcig tu song ste 'dug go/_/ji tsam na de dag dro la bab ste/_gaN+DI brdungs pa na rang rang gi lhung bzed thogs te gral rims bzhin 'khod do/_/de dag 'khod pa dang gtsug lag khang de yang mi snang bar gyur 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]cing de dag gi rang rang gi lhung bzed kyang lcags kyi tho ba rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur to/_/de nas de dag ji srid du dro ma yol gyi bar du lcags kyi tho ba de dag gis phan tshun [{]glad pa [,]klad pa [}]bcom nas de dag [{]glad pa [,]klad pa [}]zhom zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin to/_/
[\[105b.2\]]ji tsam na dro yol ba dang gtsug lag khang de yang de kho na bzhin du phyir byung zhing dge slong de dag kyang de kho na bzhin du spyod lam zhi bas gnas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho de dag gi gan du song ste dris pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed su yin/_las gang gis 'dir 
[\[105b.3\]]skyes/_de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka' bas khyed yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_kho bos mngon sum kho nar mthong na ci'i phyir yid ches par mi 'gyur/_de dag gis smras pa/_btsun 
[\[105b.4\]]pa dge 'dun 'tsho bdag cag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nyan thos su gyur te/_ji tsam na bdag cag gis zan gyi gral du 'thab mo bgyis pas las de'i rnam par smin pas bdag cag nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes te/_bdag 
[\[105b.5\]]cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa dag sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas kyang mchis par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho de'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[105b.6\]]dag 'di lta ste/_dper na 'od srung gi dge slong dag ltar zan gyi gral du thab mo ma byed cig_/sdug bsngal gyi tshogs de lta bu'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar ma byed cig ces don 'di rgya cher brjod na legs so/_/des de ltar bya'o zhes khas blangs te song ngo /_/ji tsam na 
[\[105b.7\]]de kho na bzhin du sa la'i dgon pa zhig na gtsug lag khang gnyis pa rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa/_mthongs khung dang /_skar khung dra ba can dang /_lan kan gyis brgyan pa/_snying dang mig 'phrog par byed pa/_mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa/_khri dang khri'u dang yo byad 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/_shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis bskor ba/_rdzing bu dang mtshe'us nye bar mdzes par byas pa/_ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu byug dag mngon par sgra 'byin pa/_lha'i 
[\[106a.2\]]gnas ltar dpal gyis 'bar ba zhig dang /_de na dge slong legs par bgos shing legs par sbyangs pa/_spyod lam zhi bas gnas pa dag mthong nas gus pa dang bcas pas de dag gi gan du song ngo /_/de nas de dag gis gus pa dang sgrim pa dang bcas pas de la smras 
[\[106a.3\]]pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho byon pa legs so byon pa legs so/_/khyod da gzod ga las byon/_des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad brjod pa dang /_de nas de dag gis ngal sor bcug ste/_lam gyis dub pa bsal nas gtsug lag khang du khrid do/_/ji tsam 
[\[106a.4\]]na stan bzang po bshams pa dang /_kha zas bsod pa'i spyi bungs bshams pa dag mthong nas de dag gis de la smras pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho mi skyems sam/_mi sbrebs sam/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag skom mo/_/bkres so/_/de dag gis smras 
[\[106a.5\]]pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho gsol cig_/des smras pa/_dge 'dun gyi nang du bza'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho khyod shul gyis mnyel ba lags kyis da gsol cig_/slad kyis 'dir nyes dmigs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/des nyes 
[\[106a.6\]]dmigs mthong bas zos nas mtha' gcig tu song ste 'dug go/_/ji tsam na de dag dro la bab ste gaN+DI brdungs pa na rang rang gi lhung bzed thogs te gral rims bzhin du 'khod do/_/de dag 'khod pa dang gtsug lag khang de yang mi snang bar gyur cing bza' ba dang btung ba de dag 
[\[106a.7\]]kyang lcags khu dag tu gyur to/_/de nas de dag ji srid dro ma yol gyi bar du lcags khu de dag gis phan tshun gtor nas de dag lus tshig cing sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin to/_/ji tsam na dro yol ba dang gtsug lag khang de yang de kho na bzhin du phyir 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]byung zhing dge slong de dag kyang de kho na bzhin du spyod lam zhi bas gnas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho de dag gi gan du song ste dris pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed su yin/_las gang gis 'dir skyes/_de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho 'dzam bu'i 
[\[106b.2\]]gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka' bas khyod yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_kho bos mngon sum kho nar mthong na ci'i phyir yid ches par mi 'gyur/_de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho bdag cag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od 
[\[106b.3\]]srung gi nyan thos su gyur te/_ji tsam na dge 'dun la snum bag gi rnyed pa byung zhing dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag kyang lhags pa na/_bdag cag ser snas yongs su bzung ba dag gis ji srid du dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag ma dong ba de srid du bza' bar mi bya'o zhes de 
[\[106b.4\]]ltar sems bskyed cing tshig tu yang rjod la/_zhag bdun gyi bar du dus ma yin par yul ngan pa byung nas des bza' ba dang btung ba de dag rul cing ma rung bar gyur pa de ltar bgyis te/_bdag cag gis dad pas sbyin par bya ba chud gsan pas las de'i rnam par smin pas 
[\[106b.5\]]bdag cag nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes te/_bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa dag sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas kyang mchis par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho de'i slad du 'dzam bu'i 
[\[106b.6\]]gling du gshegs nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di lta ste/_dper na 'od srung gi dge sbyong dag ltar dad pas sbyin par bya ba chud ma gzon cig_/sdug bsngal gyi tshogs de lta bu'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar ma byed cig ces don 'di rgya cher brjod na legs 
[\[106b.7\]]so/_/des de ltar bya'o zhes khas blangs nas song ngo /_/ji tsam na yang de kho na bzhin du sA la'i dgon pa zhig na gtsug lag khang gsum pa rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa/_mthongs khung dang /_skar khung dra ba can dang /_lan kan gyis brgyan pa/_snying dang mig 'phrog par byed pa/_
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur ba/_khri dang khri'u dang yo byad phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/_shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis bskor ba/_rdzing bu dang mtshe'us nye bar mdzes par byas pa/_ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu 
[\[107a.2\]]byug dag mngon par sgra 'byin pa/_lha'i gnas ltar dpal gyis 'bar ba zhig dang /_de na dge slong legs par bgos shing legs par sbyangs pa/_spyod lam zhi bas gnas pa dag mthong nas gus pa dang bcas pas de dag gi gan du song ngo /_/de nas de dag gus pa dang 
[\[107a.3\]]sgrim pa dang bcas pas de la smras pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho byon pa legs so byon pa legs so/_/khyod da gzod ga las byon/_des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad brjod pa dang /_de nas de dag gis ngal sor bcug ste lam gyis dub pa bsal nas gtsug lag khang du khrid 
[\[107a.4\]]do/_/ji tsam na stan bzang po bshams pa dang /_kha zas bsod pa'i spyi bungs bshams pa dag mthong nas de dag gis de la smras pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho mi skyems sam/_mi sbrebs sam/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag skom mo/_/bkres so/_/de dag gis 
[\[107a.5\]]smras pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho gsol cig_/des smras pa/_dge 'dun gyi nang du bza'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho khyod shul gyis mnyel ba lags kyis da gsol cig_/slad kyis 'dir nyes dmigs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/des nyes dmigs 
[\[107a.6\]]mthong bas zos nas mtha' gcig tu song ste 'dug go/_/ji tsam na de dag dro la bab ste gaN+DI brdungs na rang rang gi lhung bzed thogs te gral rims bzhin du 'khod do/_/de dag 'khod pa dang de dag gi gtsug lag khang de 'bar rab tu 'bar kun du rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu 
[\[107a.7\]]gyur nas sreg par brtsams so/_/de nas de dag ji srid du dro ma yol gyi bar du me lce des bsregs nas de dag lus tshig cing sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin to/_/ji tsam na dro yol ba dang gtsug lag khang de yang de kho na bzhin du phyir byung zhing dge slong 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]de dag kyang de kho na bzhin du spyod lam zhi bas gnas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho de dag gi gan du song ste dris pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed su yin/_las gang gis 'dir skyes/_de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni 
[\[107b.2\]]yid ches par dka' bas khyed yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_kho bos mngon sum kho nar mthong na ci'i phyir yid ches par mi 'gyur/_de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho bdag cag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nyan thos su 
[\[107b.3\]]gyur te/_ji tsam na bdag cag tshul khrims 'chal ba dang sdig pa'i chos can du gyur nas/_dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams kyis bdag cag gtsug lag khang nas bskrad pa dang bdag cag gtsug lag khang stong pa zhig tu 'khod do/_/ji tsam na dge slong tshul 
[\[107b.4\]]khrims dang ldan pa gcig cig rgyu ba na der phyin pa dang /_de nas bdag cag la blo skyes pa/_'di gcig pus bdag cag gi yon sbyong bar 'gyur gyis 'dug la rag go snyam pa dang /_de de nyid du 'dug go/_/ji tsam na de'i zhar gyis yang dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa mang 
[\[107b.5\]]po dag lhags nas de dag gis bdag cag de nas bskrad do/_/de nas bdag cag mi bzod pa skyes pa dag gis shing dang /_rtswa dang /_lci ba skam po dag bcer te gtsug lag khang la me btang nas der dge slong bslab pa 'dod pa mang po dag bsregs pas las de'i rnam par smin 
[\[107b.6\]]pas bdag cag nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes te/_bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa dang sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas kyang mchis par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho de'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[107b.7\]]du gshegs nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di lta ste/_dper na 'od srung gi dge sbyong ltar tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag la sdang ba'i sems ma skyed cig_/sdug bsngal gyi tshogs de lta bu'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar ma byed cig ces don 'di rgya cher 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]brjod na legs so/_/des de ltar bya'o zhes khas blangs te song ngo /_/ji tsam na sems can rtsig pa 'dra ba dag dang /_ka ba 'dra ba dag dang /_shing ljon pa 'dra ba dag dang /_lo ma 'dra ba dag dang /_me tog 'dra ba dag dang /_'bras bu 'dra ba dag dang /_thag 
[\[108a.2\]]pa 'dra ba dag dang /_phyags ma 'dra ba dag dang /_phor pa 'dra ba dag dang /_gtun 'dra ba dag dang /_phru ba 'dra ba dag dang /_rked pa chad pa chu rgyus kyis bzung ba dag 'dong ba yang mthong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho yang mthar gyis ljongs su song ba dang /_ji tsam na 
[\[108a.3\]]bsti gnas shig na drang srong lnga brgya tsam 'khod de/_de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/de nas de dag gis gros bya bar brtsams pa shes ldan dag nyon cig_/shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni smra ba mang ba yin pas 'di la 
[\[108a.4\]]sus kyang tshig sbyin par mi bya'o zhes de dag gis khrims su bya ba bcas te 'khod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho yang spyod lam zhi bas de dag gi gan du song ste bsti gnas brnya bar brtsams pa na 'gas kyang tshig ma ster to/_/de na drang srong bsod nams 'dod pa gcig 
[\[108a.5\]]cig gis smras pa/_khyod la ci'i phyir bsti gnas mi brnyan te 'di ltar khyed la nyes pa yod do/_/khyed ni smra ba mang ba yin no/_/de lta mod kyi dam tshig gis brnya bar bya ste/_gal te cung zad kyang mi smra na brnyan no/_/tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tshos smras pa/_drang srong de 
[\[108a.6\]]bzhin du byas mi smra'o/_/de na drang srong gcig cig ljongs rgyur song ba de'i spyil bu stong par 'dug pa de tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho la 'dir nyol cig ces brnyan no/_/tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tshos spyil bu de chag chag btab/_phyag dar byas/_ba lang gi lci ba sar pas byug 
[\[108a.7\]]pa byas so/_/de dag gis de mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni gtsang sbra byed pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tshos spyil bu'i phyi rol du rkang pa gnyis bkrus te spyil bur zhugs nas skyil mo krung bcas te lus drang por 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\](]bsang [,]bsrang [)]nas dran pa phyogs par bzhag ste 'dug go/_/de nas bsti gnas de na lha mo zhig 'dug pa gang yin pa de mtshan mo thun dang po la tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho ga la ba der song ste phyin nas des smras pa/_'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho chos bstan du gsol/_des smras pa/_
[\[108b.2\]]lha mo khyod bde bar gyur cig_/kho bos khrims su bya bas bsti gnas rnyed pa khyod kyis ma mthong ngam/_ci kho bo bskrad par 'dod dam/_des bsams pa/_rab tu byung ba 'di ngal gyis 'di ltar gung thun la 'ong bar bya'o snyam nas de gung thun la 'ongs te smras pa/_'phags 
[\[108b.3\]]pa dge 'dun 'tsho chos bstan du gsol/_des smras pa/_sring mo khyod kha rog mi sdod pas kho bo nges par bskrad par 'dod dam/_des bsams pa/_rab tu byung ba 'di da dung gnyid kyis myos kyis thun tha ma la 'ong bar bya'o snyam nas de thun tha ma la 'ongs te smras pa/_
[\[108b.4\]]'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho ci'i slad du gzims/_mtshan mo'i dgung sangs kyis bzhengs la chos bstan du gsol/_des smras pa/_sring mo khyod kyis kho bo rnam pa thams cad du bskrad do/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa mtshan mo'i dgung sangs pas gal te bskrad na yang 
[\[108b.5\]]cir 'gyur bzhud do 'tshal/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jigs pa dang 'jigs su rung ba bzod par bya'o zhes bka' ma stsal tam/_tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tshos bsams pa/_sring mo 'di zer ba ni bden te/_gal te kho bo bskrad na 'gro la rag gis 'di 
[\[108b.6\]]ltar 'di dag ni bram ze yin pas bram ze dang yang dag par ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o snyam nas/_des bram ze'i sde tshan 'di skad ces/_som nyi ma rgal gcer bu'i spyod pa dang /_/ral pa rdzab dang sna tshogs zas dang ni/_/thang la nyal dang rdul dang dri ma dang /_/
[\[108b.7\]]tsog bu'i spong bas mi dag 'byung mi 'gyur/_/'byung po kun la 'tshe ba rnam spangs te/_/chos spyod zhi dul yang dag sdom pa dang /_/tshangs spyod ldan pa rgyan gyis brgyan gyur kyang /_/de nyid bram ze dge sbyong dge slong yin/_/zhes kha ton bya bar brtsams so/_/de dag gis 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]de thos nas de dag gis bsams pa/_bram ze dang yang dag par ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa zer ro snyam nas gcig nye bar 'ongs so/_/de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa nas de dag thams cad kyi bar du nye bar lhags pa dang /_lha mo des ci nas kyang 
[\[109a.2\]]de dag gcig gis gcig mi mthong ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/_/de'i 'og tu tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tshos grong khyer lta bu'i mdo gdon par brtsams so/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[109a.3\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon nga rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa'i tshe gcig pu dben par song ste nang du yang dag bzhag pa na 
[\[109a.4\]]sems la sems kyi yongs su rtog pa 'di lta bu byung ste/_kye ma 'jig rten 'di sdug bsngal bar gyur te/_'di lta ste skye bar 'gyur/_rga bar 'gyur 'chi bar 'gyur/_nyams par 'gyur/_'byung bar 'gyur yang 'on kyang sems can 'di dag gis rga shi bas bla ma yod 
[\[109a.5\]]bzhin du nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mi shes so snyam nas nga 'di snyam du sems te/_gang yod na rga shi 'byung zhing rkyen gang gis rga shi 'byung snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/_'di ltar skye ba yod na rga shi 'byung zhing skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi 'byung 
[\[109a.6\]]ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/nga 'di snyam du sems te/_gang yod na skye ba 'byung zhing rkyen gang gis skye ba 'byung snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/_'di ltar srid pa yod na skye ba 'byung zhing srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba 'byung ngo snyam 
[\[109a.7\]]du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/nga 'di snyam du sems te/_gang yod na srid pa 'byung zhing rkyen gang gis srid pa 'byung snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/_'di ltar len pa yod na srid pa 'byung zhing len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa 'byung ngo snyam du yang 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/nga 'di snyam du sems te/_gang yod na len pa 'byung zhing rkyen gang gis len pa 'byung snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/_'di ltar sred pa yod na len pa 'byung zhing sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa 'byung ngo snyam du 
[\[109b.2\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/nga 'di snyam du sems te/_gang yod na sred pa 'byung zhing rkyen gang gis sred pa 'byung snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/_'di ltar tshor ba yod na srid pa 'byung zhing tshor ba'i rkyen gyis srid pa 'byung ngo snyam du 
[\[109b.3\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/nga 'di snyam du sems te/_gang yod na tshor ba 'byung zhing rkyen gang gis tshor ba 'byung snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/_'di ltar reg pa yod na tshor ba 'byung zhing reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'byung ngo snyam 
[\[109b.4\]]du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/nga 'di snyam du sems te/_gang yod na reg pa 'byung zhing rkyen gang gis reg pa 'byung snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/_'di ltar skye mched drug yod na reg pa 'byung zhing skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis 
[\[109b.5\]]reg pa 'byung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/nga 'di snyam du sems te/_gang yod na skye mched drug 'byung zhing rkyen gang gis skye mched drug 'byung snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/_'di ltar ming dang gzugs yod na skye mched 
[\[109b.6\]]drug 'byung zhing ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug 'byung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/nga 'di snyam du sems te/_gang yod na ming dang gzugs 'byung zhing rkyen gang gis ming dang gzugs 'byung snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid 
[\[109b.7\]]la byed pa na/_'di ltar rnam par shes pa yod na ming dang gzugs 'byung zhing rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs 'byung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/nga 'di snyam du sems te/_gang yod na rnam par shes pa 'byung zhing rkyen 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]gang gis rnam par shes pa 'byung snyam pa las/_nga'i yid rnam par shes pa nas phyir log cing de phan chad du 'jug par mi byed de/_'di lta ste/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched 
[\[110a.2\]]drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_
[\[110a.3\]]yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig pa 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/nga 'di snyam du sems te/_gang med na rga shi mi 'byung zhing gang 'gags pas rga shi 'gag snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid la byed 
[\[110a.4\]]pa na/_'di ltar skye ba med na rga shi mi 'byung zhing /_skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag go snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/nga 'di snyam du sems te/_gang med na skye ba mi 'byung zhing gang 'gags pas skye ba 'gag snyam du nga tshul bzhin 
[\[110a.5\]]yid la byed pa na/_'di ltar srid pa med na skye ba mi 'byung zhing /_srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag go snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/nga 'di snyam du sems te/_gang med na srid pa mi 'byung zhing /_gang 'gags pas srid pa/_
[\[110a.6\]]'gag snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/_'di ltar len pa med na srid pa mi 'byung zhing len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag go snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/nga 'di snyam du sems te/_gang med na len pa mi 'byung zhing gang 
[\[110a.7\]]'gags pas len pa 'gag snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/_'di ltar sred pa med na len pa mi 'byung zhing sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag go snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/nga 'di snyam du sems te/_gang med na sred pa mi 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]'byung zhing /_gang 'gags pas sred pa 'gag snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/_'di ltar tshor ba med na sred pa mi 'byung zhing tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag go snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/nga 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[110b.2\]]gang med na tshor ba mi 'byung zhing gang 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/_'di ltar reg pa med na tshor ba mi 'byung zhing reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag go snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/nga 'di snyam 
[\[110b.3\]]du sems te/_gang med na reg pa mi 'byung zhing gang 'gags pas reg pa 'gag snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/_'di ltar skye mched drug med na reg pa mi 'byung zhing skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag go snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par 
[\[110b.4\]]rtogs par gyur to/_/nga 'di snyam du sems te/_gang med na skye mched drug mi 'byung zhing gang 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/_'di ltar ming dang gzugs med na skye mched drug mi 'byung zhing ming dang gzugs 'gags 
[\[110b.5\]]pas skye mched drug 'gag go snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/nga 'di snyam du sems te/_gang med na ming dang gzugs mi 'byung zhing gang 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/_'di ltar rnam par shes 
[\[110b.6\]]pa med na ming dang gzugs mi 'byung zhing rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag go snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/nga 'di snyam du sems te/_gang med na rnam par shes pa mi 'byung zhing gang 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 
[\[110b.7\]]'gag go snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/_'di ltar 'du byed rnams med na rnam par shes pa mi 'byung zhing 'du byed rnams 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag go snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/nga 'di snyam du sems te/_gang med na 'du 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]byed rnams mi 'byung zhing gang 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag snyam du nga tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/_'di ltar ma rig pa med na 'du byed rnams mi 'byung zhing ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag go snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mngon 
[\[111a.2\]]par rtogs par gyur to/_/'di lta ste ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag 'du byed rnams 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye 
[\[111a.3\]]mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 
[\[111a.4\]]dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig pa 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro snyam mo//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bcu pa/_dge 
[\[111a.5\]]slong dag nga 'di snyam du sems te ngas sngon gyi lam dang /_sngon gyi bgrod pa dang /_sngon gyi lam srol sngon gyi drang srong rnams gshegs shing rjes su 'dong ba rnyed do snyam mo/_/'di lta ste dper na mi zhig dgon pa nags mchog tu 'khyam zhing 'gro ba na sngon gyi lam dang /_sngon 
[\[111a.6\]]gyi bgrod pa dang /_sngon gyi lam srol sngon gyi mi rnams dong zhing rjes su 'dong ba zhig rnyed nas de de'i rjes su song ba dang /_sngon gyi grong khyer dang /_sngon gyi rgyal po'i pho brang kun dga' ra ba phun sum tshogs pa/_tshal phun sum tshogs pa/_rdzing bu phun sum tshogs pa/_
[\[111a.7\]]bzang ba nags dang ldan pa/_dga' bar 'gyur ba zhig mthong zhing mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag rgyal po'i gan du song ste brjod par bya'o snyam nas/_de rgyal po'i gan du song ste lha mkhyen par mdzod cig_/'di na bdag dgon pa nags mchog cig tu 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]'khyam zhing mchi ba na sngon gyi shul dang /_sngon gyi bgrod pa dang /_sngon gyi shul srol sngon gyi mi rnams mchis shing rjes su mchi ba zhig rnyed nas bdag de'i rjes su mchis pa dang /_sngon gyi grong khyer dang /_sngon gyi rgyal po'i pho brang kun dga' ra ba phun sum tshogs pa/_
[\[111b.2\]]tshal phun sum tshogs pa/_rdzing bu phun sum tshogs pa/_bzang ba nags dang ldan pa/_dga' bar 'gyur ba zhig mthong ste lhas de grong khyer bgyid du gsol la/_de rgyal po'i pho brang bgyid du stsol cig dang /_dus gzhan na de rgyal po'i pho brang 'byor pa/_rgyas pa/_
[\[111b.3\]]bde ba/_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos bltam par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba de bzhin du dge slong dag ngas kyang sngon gyi lam dang /_sngon gyi bgrod pa dang /_sngon gyi lam srol sngon gyi drang srong rnams gshegs shing rjes su 'dong ba rnyed do/_/dge slong dag sngon gyi lam dang /_
[\[111b.4\]]sngon gyi bgrod pa dang /_sngon gyi lam srol sngon drang srong rnams gshegs shing rjes su 'dong ba de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'di lta ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang 
[\[111b.5\]]dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/_dge slong dag 'di ni sngon gyi lam dang /_sngon gyi bgrod pa dang /_sngon gyi lam srol sngon gyi drang srong rnams 
[\[111b.6\]]gshegs shing rjes su 'dong ba yin no/_/ngas der son cing der son pa na rga shi mthong /_rga shi kun 'byung ba dang /_rga shi 'gog pa dang /_rga shi 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mthong ste/_skye ba dang /_srid pa dang /_len pa dang /_sred pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_reg pa dang /_
[\[111b.7\]]skye mched drug dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_'du byed rnams mthong zhing 'du byed rnams kun 'byung ba dang /_'du byed rnams 'gog pa dang /_'du byed rnams 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mthong ste/_ngas rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon par 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]rdzogs par byang chub nas dge slong rnams dang /_dge slong ma rnams dang /_dge bsnyen rnams dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams dang /_gzhan mu stegs can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang spyod pa can dang /_kun du rgyu sna tshogs dag la brjod do/_/de la dge 
[\[112a.2\]]slong gis kyang yang dag par sgrub pa na sgrub par byed pa yin zhing rigs pa dang ldan pa/_chos dang ldan pa/_dge ba sgrub par byed do/_/dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen mas kyang yang dag par sgrub pa na sgrub par byed pa yin zhing /_rigs pa dang ldan pa/_chos 
[\[112a.3\]]dang ldan pa/_dge ba sgrub par byed do/_/de ltar na tshangs par spyod pa 'di ni rgya che ba/_skye bo mang po la phan pa/_yang dag par gyur pa/_lha dang mi'i bar dag la yang dag par rab tu bstan pa yin no zhes bton cing /_de nas mjug tu/_'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags 
[\[112a.4\]]gyur cing /_/sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag_/skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing /_/nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig_/ces yongs su bsngos pa dang /_de dag thams cad kyis bden pa mngon par rtogs ma thag tu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 
[\[112a.5\]]thob ste rdzu 'phrul yang mngon par bsgrubs so/_/de nas de dag thams cad kyis btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho legs par gsungs so/_/legs par gsungs so zhes mgrin gcig tu sgra phyung ngo /_/de nas lha mo des rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de brtul ba dang /_gcig gis 
[\[112a.6\]]gcig mthong bar gyur to/_/de dag gis gcig gis gcig mthong nas smras pa/_kye khyod kyang 'ongs sam/_khyod 'ongs sam/_kho bo 'ongs so/_/legs so/_/de dag gis 'byor pa rnyed cing rnyed nas smras pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun 'tshos bdag cag legs par 
[\[112a.7\]]gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/des 'dzum pa sngon du btang ste smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed spobs pa rgya chen po zhum pa med pa 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]dge ba dang ldan pa legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phan yon lnga yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos pa kho nar rigs te/_lnga gang zhe na/_bdag gis rang gi don ma 'dres pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang dag par 
[\[112b.2\]]rjes su mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba kho nar rigs pa dang /_bdag gang dag gi bran dang /_mngag gzhug pa dang /_bsgo ba dang /_rang dbang med dang /_dga' mgur 'gror med pa yin pa de dag gi mchod par bya ba dang /_bstod par bya bar 'gyur 
[\[112b.3\]]ro zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba kho nar rigs pa dang /_grub pa dang /_bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos 
[\[112b.4\]]par bya ba kho nar rigs pa dang /_grub pa dang /_bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob pa las nyams na yang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba kho nar rigs pa dang /_rab tu byung 
[\[112b.5\]]ba ni sangs rgyas rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dam pa yang dag par song ba/_yang dag par zhugs pa/_skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis rnam grangs du mas bsngags so zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba kho nar 
[\[112b.6\]]rigs so zhes gsungs kyis rab tu byung shig_/de'i phyir ci/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rab tu 'byung ngam/_'on te kho bo las/_de dag gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tshos smras pa/_gal te de lta na tshur sheg_/bcom 
[\[112b.7\]]ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dong ngo /_/de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa dge 'dun 'tsho ci bdag cag gi rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhud dam/_'on te khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tshos thos nas nyam nga bar gyur te/_des bsams pa/_bdag gi mthus 'di 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]dag gi yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob na/_bdag ni gzings lta bur gyur pa lta snyam nas/_de bzhin nyams shing gyur te smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kho bo la bya ba cung zhig yod kyis/_re zhig yud tsam zhig sdod cig ces de shing ljon pa 
[\[113a.2\]]zhig gi drung du brten nas skyil mo krung bcas te lus drang por bsrang nas dran pa phyogs par bzhag ste 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa la phan yon lnga yod de/_lnga gang zhe na/_phung po la mkhas pa dang /_khams la mkhas pa dang /_skye mched la 
[\[113a.3\]]mkhas pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /_de'i gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa gzhan la rag ma las pa yin no zhes gsungs pas des brtson 'grus brtsams pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/_'du byed 
[\[113a.4\]]kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnan cing nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/_rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu dag bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag 
[\[113a.5\]]pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan 
[\[113a.6\]]mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar 
[\[113a.7\]]gyur cing /_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang /_'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon du 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/des de dag la smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bo'i chos gos kyi grwa nas zung shig dang /_kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dong bar bya'o/_/de dag de'i chos gos kyi grwa la 'jus pa dang /_de nas tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang 
[\[113b.2\]]pa ltar rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' la song ngo /_/ji tsam na tshong pa lnga brgya po de dag rdzas mkhos su 'bebs par byed pa na/_de dag gis de mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho khyod byon tam/_byon pa legs so/_/kho bo 'ongs so/_/
[\[113b.3\]]gang du bzhud/_des smras pa/_rigs kyi bu lnga brgya po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'dod pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_
[\[113b.4\]]'phags pa dge 'dun 'tsho bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung gis bobs la bdag cag rdzas mkhos su 'bebs kyi bar du re zhig gzhes su gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho babs pa dang /_de dag gis rdzas mkhos su phab bo/_/de nas des rigs kyi bu stong po de dag 
[\[113b.5\]]khrid nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston par mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho skyes dang chas te thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba gzigs so/_/
[\[113b.6\]]gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong dge 'dun 'tsho thag ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong ngo /_/dge slong dag dge slong dge 'dun 'tsho 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la skyes dang bcas shing 'ong ste/_de bzhin 
[\[113b.7\]]gshegs pa'i skyes ni 'di ltar gdul ba las gzhan pa lta bu med do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tsho bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tshos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa rigs kyi bu stong po 'di dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na/_
[\[114a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'di dag rab tu dbyung du gsol/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung zhing dge slong dag tshur shog tshangs par spyod pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[114a.3\]]bka'i mjug kho nar skra byi ba dang snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/_skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang /_lag pa na lhung bzed dang bya ma bum thogs pa dang /_dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/_/yang smras pa/_de bzhin 
[\[114a.4\]]gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/_/skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing /_/mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la gdams ngag stsal nas/_de dag 
[\[114a.5\]]gis brtson pa dang /_'bad pa dang /_brtsal bas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_
[\[114a.6\]]tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang /_'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang /_nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams 
[\[114a.7\]]kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tshos zhus pa/_btsun pa 'di na bdag gis sems can rtsig pa 'dra ba dag dang /_ka ba 'dra ba dag dang /_shing ljon pa 'dra ba 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]dag dang /_lo ma 'dra ba dag dang /_me tog 'dra ba dag dang /_'bras bu 'dra ba dag dang /_thag pa 'dra ba dag dang /_phyags ma 'dra ba dag dang /_phor pa 'dra ba dag dang /_gtun 'dra ba dag dang /_phru ba 'dra ba dag dang /_rked pa chad pa chu rgyus kyis bzung ba mthong na/_
[\[114b.2\]]btsun pa de dag gis las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas de 'dra ba dag tu gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun 'tsho sems can de dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas 
[\[114b.3\]]pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bstsags pas de dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge 'dun 'tsho las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_
[\[114b.4\]]chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa 
[\[114b.5\]]brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge 'dun 'tsho sngon byung pa 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[114b.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung 
[\[114b.7\]]ste/_de bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na nye bar rten cing bzhugs pa na de dag de'i nyan thos su gyur to/_/dge 'dun 'tsho khyod kyis sems can rtsig pa 'dra ba gang dag mthong ba de dag ni dge slong dag tu gyur pa na/_de dag gis dge 'dun gyi rtsig pa mchil mas ma rung bar 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]byas pas las de'i rnam par smin pas rtsig pa 'dra ba dag tu gyur to/_/khyod kyis sems can ka ba 'dra ba gang dag mthong ba de dag kyang dge slong dag tu gyur pa na/_de dag gis dge 'dun gyi ka ba snabs kyis ma rung bar byas pas las de'i rnam par smin pas 
[\[115a.2\]]ka ba 'dra ba dag tu gyur to/_/khyod kyis sems can shing ljon pa 'dra ba dag dang /_lo ma 'dra ba dag dang /_me tog 'dra ba dag dang /_'bras bu 'dra ba gang dag mthong ba de dag kyang dge slong dag tu gyur pa na/_de dag gis dge 'dun gyi shing ljon pa dang /_lo ma dang /_me 
[\[115a.3\]]tog dang /_'bras bu dag gang zag gi longs spyod du spyad pas las de'i rnam par smin pas shing ljon pa 'dra ba dag dang /_lo ma 'dra ba dag dang /_me tog 'dra ba dag dang /_'bras bu 'dra ba dag tu gyur to/_/khyod kyis sems can thag pa 'dra ba dag dang /_phyags ma 'dra 
[\[115a.4\]]ba dag mthong ba de dag kyang dge slong dag tu gyur pa na/_de dag gis dge 'dun gyi thag pa dang phyags ma gang zag gis longs spyod du spyad pas las de'i rnam par smin pas thag pa 'dra ba dag dang /_phyags ma 'dra ba dag tu gyur to/_/khyod kyis sems can phor pa 'dra ba dag 
[\[115a.5\]]gang dag mthong ba de dag ni dge tshul skom gyi gtsang sbyor du gyur pa na de dag phor pa 'khru bar byed pa'i tshe/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag lhags nas de dag gis dge tshul de dag la dris pa/_dge tshul dag ci dge 'dun la skom 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_dge tshul de dag ser 
[\[115a.6\]]snas dkris te smras pa/_kho bo cag gis phor pa bkrus pa ma mthong ngam/_skom 'thungs zin to/_/de dag gis bsams pa/_dus yol ba lta snyam nas/_re ba med par gyur te bzhin gyur cing nyams te dong bas las de'i rnam par smin pas phor pa 'dra ba dag tu gyur to/_/
[\[115a.7\]]khyod kyis sems can gtun 'dra ba gang dag mthong ba de dag kyang dge slong dag tu gyur pa na/_de dag la lhung bzed kyi las dag byung nas de na dge tshul dgra bcom pa cig dam zhag par bskos pa de la de dag gis smras pa/_dge tshul kho bo cag la gtun du 'bru mar gyi tshigs ma 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]nyung ba zhig rdungs te byin cig_/des smras pa/_gnas brtan dag bdag brel gyis re zhig yud tsam zhig gzhes shig dang /_slad kyis gsol lo/_/de dag mi bzod pa skyes nas kun nas dkris pa drag pos smras pa/_dge tshul gal te kho bo cag gtun la reg tu rung na kho 
[\[115b.2\]]bo cag gis khyod nyid gtun du bcug ste/_brdung bar yang bya na/_'bru mar tshigs ma nyung zhig lta ci smos/_dge tshul des bsams pa/_'di dag kun nas dkris pa drag pos dkris pas gal te bdag gis 'di dag la lan btab na lhag par yang rab tu 'khrugs 
[\[115b.3\]]par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_des cang mi smra bar bsdad nas gang gi tshe de dag kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba de'i tshe na gan du song ste smras pa/_gnas brtan dag khyed kyis bdag su lags pa mkhyen tam/_de dag gis smras pa/_shes te/_khyod ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[115b.4\]]sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i dge tshul yin no/_/kho bo cag kyang dge slong yin no/_/gnas brtan dag gal te de ltar lags kyis kyang 'di ltar bdag gis ni rab tu byung bas bgyi ba gang lags pa de bgyis so/_/ci zhig byas/_nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[115b.5\]]cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bgyis so/_/khyed ni 'ching ba mtha' dag gis bcings pa lags la/_bdag ni 'ching ba mtha' dag las nges par grol ba lags na/_khyed kyis ngag gi las rtsub po brjod kyis sdig pa sdig pa las shogs shig dang /_de 
[\[115b.6\]]ltar na las bsrabs pa nyid dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_yongs su mthar thug par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis sdig pa sdig pa las bshags kyang las de'i rnam par smin pas gtun 'dra ba dag tu gyur to/_/khyod kyis sems can phru ba 'dra ba gang dag mthong ba de dag ni dge 'dun 
[\[115b.7\]]rnams la rim gror byed pa'i lha 'bangs su gyur te/_de dag sman skol bar byed pa na/_dge slong rnams kyis mi snyan par smras pa dang /_de dag sems rab tu khros pas phru ba de dag bcag pas/_las de'i rnam par smin pas phru ba 'dra ba dag tu gyur to/_/khyod kyis sems 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]can rked pa chad pa chu rgyus kyis bzung ba gang dag mthong ba de dag kyang dge slong rnyed pa stobs pa dag tu gyur pa na/_de dag ser snas zil gyis non pas rnyed pa bsgyur te/_dbyar gyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni dgun gyir bsgyur/_dgun gyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni dbyar gyir 
[\[116a.2\]]bsgyur bas las de'i rnam par smin pas rked pa chad pa chu rgyus kyis bzung ba dag tu gyur to/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun 'tshos las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i 
[\[116a.3\]]rnam par smin pas phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes shing dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bgyis pa dang /_gdul ba'i don chen po bgyis par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge 'dun 'tsho nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs 
[\[116a.4\]]su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas/_dge slong dge 'dun 'tsho 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing 
[\[116a.5\]]bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye 
[\[116a.6\]]mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye 
[\[116a.7\]]dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na nye bar rten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas zhal ta byed par gyur cing de la lhan cig gnas pa lnga brgya yod par gyur to/_/ri brags na 
[\[116b.2\]]gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de yang phal cher de la mngon par dad par gyur to/_/de nas des tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob bo/_/de dus gzhan zhig na na bar gyur nas de la rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog 
[\[116b.3\]]dang /_'bras bu'i sman dag gis bsnyen bkur byas kyang nad de nye bar zhi bar ma gyur cing nyam dmas nas de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe smon lam 'di skad ces/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung 
[\[116b.4\]]la tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob ste/_bdag gis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma 
[\[116b.5\]]la/_bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na 
[\[116b.6\]]med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed par gyur cig ces gdab par brtsams 
[\[116b.7\]]so/_/de nas de'i lhan cig gnas pa dag lhags te dris pa/_mkhan pos yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad brnyes pa mchis sam/_des smras pa med do/_/de dag gis dris pa/_smon lam ji skad btab/_des smras pa/_'di dang 'di skad ces so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]bdag cag kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen mkhan po la brten nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed par gyur cig_/de nas ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 
[\[117a.2\]]des 'phags pa de na'o zhes thos nas de dag kyang de'i gan du song ste dris pa/_'phags pas yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad brnyes pa mchis sam/_des smras pa med do/_/de dag gis smras pa/_smon lam ji skad btab/_des smras pa/_'di dang 'di skad ces so/_/de dag 
[\[117a.3\]]gis smras pa/_bdag cag kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa la brten nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed par gyur cig_/dge slong dag de la de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong 
[\[117a.4\]]zhal ta byed par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong dge 'dun 'tsho 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i lhan cig gnas pa lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag ni drang srong lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin no/_/ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag ni tshong pa lnga brgya po 'di dag 
[\[117a.5\]]yin no/_/'dis der chos dang ldan pas zhal ta byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes so/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe smon lam btab pa des ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du 
[\[117a.6\]]byas shing gdul ba'i don chen po byas par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/_las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam 
[\[117a.7\]]par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs te las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la btsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa klu gzhon nu sprul pas dang po gang du dad pa thob par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_ston pa de bzhin gshegs 
[\[117b.2\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 
[\[117b.3\]]'jig rten du byung ste/_de dge slong nyi khri'i 'khor dang /_bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na nye bar rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag dgon pa dang /_shing drung dang /_khyim gyis stong pa dang /_ri sul dang /_ri phug dang /_rtsa 
[\[117b.4\]]spyil dang /_bla gab med pa dang /_dur khrod dang /_nags khrod dang /_ri drung dang /_bas mtha'i gnas mal 'di dag tu bsam gtan gyis shig_/dge slong dag bag yod par sgrubs la phyis 'gyod par mi 'gyur bar gyis shig_/'di ni nga'i gdams ngag dang rjes 
[\[117b.5\]]su bstan pa yin no zhes chos ston par mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong rnams dgon pa dang /_shing drung dang /_khyim gyis stong pa dang /_ri sul dang /_ri phug dang /_rtswa spyil dang /_bla gab med pa 
[\[117b.6\]]dang /_dur khrod dang /_nags khrod dang /_ri drung dang /_bas mtha'i gnas mal dag tu zhugs so/_/kha cig ni ri rab kyi bang rim na bsam gtan byed/_kha cig ni gser gyi ri bdun po dag na/_kha cig ni mtsho chen po ma dros pa na/_kha cig ni rdzing bu dal gyis 
[\[117b.7\]]'bab na/_kha cig ni rnal 'byor pa'i skye bo dang rjes su mthun pa'i grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang gi phyogs de dang de dag na bsam gtan byed do/_/ji tsam na klu gzhon nu skyes nas ring po ma lon pa zhig 'dab chags kyi 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]rgyal po 'dab [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]ri rab kyi bang rim gyi steng du drangs pa dang /_ji tsam na des dge slong spyod lam zhi bas bsam gtan dang /_klog pa dang /_rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson pa dag mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de'i sems mngon par dad par gyur to/_/
[\[118a.2\]]de sems dad pa skyes nas 'phags pa bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni sdug bsngal gyi bye brag 'di lta bu las grol ba yin no snyam du sems skyed par byed cing /_de de dag la sems mngon par dad par byas nas dus la bab pa dang /_las drug la brtson pa'i bram ze'i khyim zhig tu 
[\[118a.3\]]skyes nas ji tsam na bsrings shing bskyed de chen por gyur to/_/de dus gzhan zhig na bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung nas des brtson pa dang /_'bad pa dang /_brtsal bas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas 
[\[118a.4\]]dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral 
[\[118a.5\]]bar gyur cing /_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang /_'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang /_nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_
[\[118a.6\]]mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/des bsams pa/_bdag ga las shi 'phos/_gang du skyes/_las gang gis byas snyam na/_des dud 'gro nas shi 'phos shing mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams la sems mngon par dad par byas pas skyes par 
[\[118a.7\]]mthong ngo /_/des pha ma la bsams te/_bdag gi pha ma ga la 'dug snyam na/_klu'i gnas na 'dug par mthong ngo /_/ci byed snyam na/_klu'i skye gnas na ngu zhing 'dug par mthong nas de rdzu 'phrul gyis der song ste dri bar brtsams pa/_yab yum ci'i slad du bshum/_de gnyis 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]kyis smras pa/_'phags pa bdag cag gi klu gzhon nu skyes nas ring po ma lags pa zhig 'dab chags kyi rgyal po 'dab [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]phrogs na/_de gar mchis ma 'tshal to/_/des smras pa/_yab yum de ni bdag nyid lags te/_shi zhing dus la bab nas las 
[\[118b.2\]]drug la brtson pa'i bram ze'i khyim du skyes te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bgyis so/_/'phags pa de 'dra bar skyon chags par gyur pa de bdag cag gis 
[\[118b.3\]]bde 'gror mchi bar yang ma bsams na/_dgra bcom pa lta ci smos te/_de ni ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba lags na/_khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu brnyes sam/_thob bo/_/'phags pa khyod ni bsod snyoms bzhed pa lags la/_bdag cag ni bsod 
[\[118b.4\]]nams 'tshal ba lags kyis/_khyod 'di nyid du gdugs re re zhing gshegs te/_zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod la bzhud cig_/des dang du blangs nas des rtag par klu'i gnas su bdud rtsi zos shing ldog par byed do/_/de'i lhan cig gnas pa'i dge tshul de la dge 
[\[118b.5\]]slong rnams kyis smras pa/_dge tshul khyod kyi mkhan po 'di gang du zos shing 'ong /_des smras pa/_ma 'tshal to/_/de dag gis smras pa/_klu'i gnas su lha'i bdud rtsi zos shing 'ong na khyod ci'i phyir mi 'gro/_des smras pa/_de ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba lags pas 
[\[118b.6\]]des mchi na bdag nyid ji ltar mchi/_de dag gis smras pa/_gang gi tshe 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba de'i tshe na khyod kyis 'di'i chos gos kyi grwa nas zung shig_/des smras pa/_mi ltung ngam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gal te de'i chos gos kyi grwa la ri'i rgyal po ri rab btags na 
[\[118b.7\]]de yang mi ltung na khyod lta ci smos/_de dag gis de spro bar byas nas/_gnas gang du de rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar byed pa der song ste bsdad pa dang /_de yang mi snang bar byed nas/_des kyang chos gos kyi grwa nas bzung ste/_de gnyis steng gi nam mkha' la dong ngo /_/ji tsam 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]na klu rnams kyis mthong nas de gnyis kyi phyir stan gnyis bshams shing dkyil 'khor yang gnyis byas so/_/des bsams pa/_ci'i phyir stan bshams pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gzhan 'di byas snyam nas/_des rgyab tu blta bar brtsams pa dang /_
[\[119a.2\]]ji tsam na dge tshul de mthong nas/_des smras pa/_bu khyod kyang 'ongs sam/_mkhan po mchis so/_/legs so/_/klu rnams kyis bsams pa/_'phags pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba yin pas lha'i bdud rtsi zhu bar nus na/_'phags pa 'dis ni zhu bar mi nus kyis/_
[\[119a.3\]]'di la kha zas tha mal pa sbyin par bya'o snyam nas/_de rnams kyis gcig la ni lha'i bdud rtsi byin no/_/dge tshul la ni kha zas tha mal pa byin no/_/dge tshul de de'i lhung bzed thogs pa yin pas des mkhan po la lhung bzed blangs pa dang /_de 'bras can gyi gzegs ma 
[\[119a.4\]]gcig chags nas/_dge tshul des de khar bcug ste myangs na lha'i bdud rtsi yin nas/_des bsams pa/_klu rnams ni ser sna can yin te/_lhan cig tu 'khod pa gnyis la/_gcig la ni lha'i bdud rtsi byin la/_gcig la ni kha zas tha mal pa byin no snyam mo/_/
[\[119a.5\]]de nas de mi bzod pa skyes pas bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung gi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag klu 'di gnas 'di nas nyams par byas te 'di nyid du skye bar gyur 
[\[119a.6\]]cig ces smon lam log par btab bo/_/las shin tu chen po yongs su rdzogs pa dag ni lus rje ba la mi ltos pas/_tshe de nyid la de'i lag pa gnyis nas chu 'dzag par gyur cing /_klu de yang klad pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur nas des 'phrigs te smras pa/_'phags 
[\[119a.7\]]pa dge tshul 'dis sems mi bzang ba bskyed kyis/_'di zlog shig_/des dge tshul de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu 'di dag la sems mi bzang ba bskyed pa bzlog shig_/des tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_sems ni thag ring gyur pa ste/_/'di ltar 'di na gnas 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]bzhin du/_/bdag gi lag tu chu 'dzags pas/_/bzlog par bgyi bar mi nus so/_/des klu de gnas de nas nyams par byas nas de nyid du skyes te/_dge slong dag klu gzhon nu sprul pas dang por der dad pa thob par gyur to//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod 
[\[119b.2\]]na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/ji tsam na mu stegs can zhig rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang /_des de na stan bzang po bshams pa dang /_bza' ba dang btung ba bsod pa'i spyi bungs bshams pa mthong nas des bsams pa/_zang 
[\[119b.3\]]zing gi longs spyod ni shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag gi bzang la/_chos kyi longs spyod ni bdag cag gi bzang bas de'i phyir 'di dag gi nang du rab tu byung la/_zang zing gi longs spyod ni 'dir bya zhing chos kyi longs spyod ni der bya'o snyam nas/_de dge slong gi gan du song ste smras pa/_
[\[119b.4\]]'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/_/des de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so/_/mu stegs can rnams kyi gso sbyong ni bcu bzhi pa yin la/_dge slong rnams kyi gso sbyong ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa yin pas de tshes bcu bzhi la ni mu stegs can rnams kyi gso sbyong 
[\[119b.5\]]nyams su myong bar byed/_tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la ni dge sbyong rnams kyi'o/_/ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na zhag bri bar gyur nas/_dge slong rnams kyi gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa la bab pa dang /_de la the tsom skyes te/_ci der 'gro bar bya 'am/_'on te 'di nyid du gso sbyong nyams su 
[\[119b.6\]]myong bar bya snyam pa las/_de la blo skyes pa shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni des pa 'grogs na bde ba yin la bdag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams ni ngang tshul ngan pa yin pas gal te ma song na bdag gi tshul shing yang phyung bar 'gyur/_spang leb khri'u yang bsgyur bar 
[\[119b.7\]]'gyur/_slong phor yang khas bub par 'gyur/_khar ba yang bor bar 'gyur/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi nang nas kyang phyung bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de mu stegs can rnams kyi nang du song ngo /_/ji tsam na dge skos rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'greng ste/_dge 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]slong rnams bsngos pa na de mi snang nas des dri bar brtsams pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig 'dir 'ongs sam/_de'i 'dun pa yang 'ongs sam/_de dag gis smras pa/_ma 'ongs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bzhir bltas nas 
[\[120a.2\]]gso sbyong bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas/_dge slong de dag gis phyogs bzhir bltas te gso sbyong byas so/_/de'i 'og tu phyi de nyin par dge slong de 'ongs pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod gang nas 'ongs/_des smras pa/_tshangs pa mtshungs par 
[\[120a.3\]]spyod pa dag gi gan nas so/_/khyod kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag su yin/_mu stegs can dag yin te/_kho bo zang zing gi longs spyod ni khyed cag gi gan du byed la/_chos kyi longs spyod ni de dag gi gan du byed do zhes zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge 
[\[120a.4\]]slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_de na bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gang zag 'di ni mu stegs can zhugs pa yin te/_dge slong dag gang zag mu stegs can zhugs pa ni chos 'dul ba 'di la mi skye ba'i chos can yin 
[\[120a.5\]]pas dge slong dag khyed kyis gang zag mu stegs can zhugs pa chos 'dul ba 'di las bsnyil bar bya'o/_/'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/_des de la mu stegs can zhugs pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 
[\[120a.6\]]'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag mu stegs can zhugs pa chos 'dul ba 'di las bsnyil bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/_btsun pa ji tsam gyis na gang zag 
[\[120a.7\]]mu stegs can zhugs pa bsnyil bar bgyi ba lags/_nye ba 'khor gang tshun chad nas rgyal mtshan 'di 'chang zhing lta ba de la dga' bas der skya rengs 'char bar byed na/_de tsam gyis na gang zag mu stegs can zhugs pa bsnyil bar bya ba yin no//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/rtse bar byed/_
[\[120b.2\]]dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i bu byung nas des chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo 'u bu cag gi bu lon 'khor bar byed pa/_nor spyod pa btsas pas kho bo zong thogs te yul gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o/_/des smras pa/_rje'i sras de bzhin mdzod cig_/de zong 
[\[120b.3\]]thogs te yul gzhan du song ba dang /_de nyid du tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/des kyang bu de nye du'i stobs dang lag mthus bsnyod cing gsos te bskyed do/_/de dus gzhan zhig na ne'u ldangs dang lhan cig khyim zhig gi drung du song ba na/_khyim de'i steng na bu mo zhig 
[\[120b.4\]]'dug pa des de'i steng du me tog gi chun po 'phangs pa dang /_des bu mo de mthong ngo /_/ne'u ldangs des smras pa/_grogs po khyod kyis khyim der brda ma byas sam/_des smras pa/_de yin te/_kho bos brda byas so/_/des smras pa/_grogs po khyim 'di na ya nga ba yin 
[\[120b.5\]]gyis ma 'jug shig_/tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re zhes des nyin thog thag tu 'phyan du bcug ste/_ma'i gan du khrid nas smras pa/_ma khyod kyi bu 'dis khyim che ge mo zhig tu brda byas pa/_kho bos nyin thog thag tu bsrungs kyis mtshan mo srungs shig_/khyim de ni 
[\[120b.6\]]ya nga ba yin gyis 'jug tu ma gzhug cig_/tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/_des smras pa/_bu khyod kyis kho mo la bsnyad pa khyod kyis legs par byas so/_/des khye'u de khyim gyi nang du mal bcas te gyo mo gnyis dang /_chu dang /_sa dag bzhag nas khyim 
[\[120b.7\]]der bcug ste/_bdag nyid sgor khri bcas nas nyal lo/_/des smras pa/_ma sgo phye shig_/bu ci'i phyir/_gcir 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_bu 'di nyid du kho mos gyo mo bzhag gis der gcis cig_/des yud tsam zhig bsdad de smras pa/_ma sgo phye shig_/bu ci'i phyir/_
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]bshang du 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_bu 'di nyid du kho mos gyo mo dang /_chu dang /_sa bzhag gis 'di nyid du bshang ba byos shig_/des yang yud tsam zhig bsdad de smras pa/_ma sgo phye shig_/des smras pa/_bu khyod gang du 'gro 'dod pa kho mos mi shes sam 
[\[121a.2\]]ci/_kho mos sgo dbye bar mi nus so/_/ma kho bos khyod bsad do/_/des smras pa/_bu kho mo shi ba ni bla'i/_kho mo bu shi ba la lta ni mi phod do/_/'dod pa sten pas ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med pas snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_'jig rten pha rol btang ba 
[\[121a.3\]]des ral gri shubs nas phyung ste de'i mgo drungs nas bcad de sa la bsgyel to/_/des ma bsad nas song ba dang /_sems can sdig pa'i las byas pa 'dar bas/_bu mo des de la smras pa/_rje'i sras 'di na su yang ma mchis te/_bdag bu mo dang gnyis su bas kyis ma 
[\[121a.4\]]bsnyengs shig_/des bsams pa/_de 'di la smras na dga' bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/_des smras pa/_bzang mo kho bos khyod kyi phyir ma bsad do/_/des smras pa/_ci ma ma'am/_'on te skyed ma mo/_des smras pa/_skyed ma mo'o/_/des bsams pa/_'di yon 
[\[121a.5\]]tan dag mngon par mi shes te ma gsod par byed pas gang gi tshe bdag la khro ba skyes na/_bdag la gnas skabs ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag steng gi khang thog tu 'dzegs nas slar mchi ba'i bar du re zhig yud tsam zhig gzhes shig_/
[\[121a.6\]]des smras pa/_de bzhin gyis shig_/de nas de steng gi khang thog tu 'dzegs nas chom rkun pa chom rkun pa zhes sgra phyung ba dang /_des 'jigs shing skrag nas bros te rang gi khyim du song nas sgo drung du ral gri bzhag ste chom rkun pa de ni 'di yin te/_kho bo'i ma bsad nas bros so 
[\[121a.7\]]zhes sgra phyung nas des de'i ma'i ro de bkur sti byas te song ngo /_/sems can sdig pa'i las byas pas ni brtan pa mi rnyed pas de mu stegs can gyi gnas dang /_dka' thub kyi gnas de dang de dag tu song ste dris pa/_shes ldan dag las ci zhig byas na sdig pa'i las zad par 'gyur/_
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]de na kha cig na re mer zhugs shig ces zer ro/_/kha cig na re dug zo shig ces zer ro/_/kha cig na re g.yang sar mchongs shig ces zer ro/_/kha cig na re thag pas 'gegs te shi shig ces zer te/_thams cad kyang shi ba'i thabs ston par byed kyi nges par 'byung ba'i 
[\[121b.2\]]thabs ston pa ni 'ga' yang med do/_/de dus gzhan zhig na rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_des de na dge slong zhig_/gang gis sdig pa'i las byas pa/_/dge ba yis ni 'gog byed de/_/nyi zla sprin nas byung ba ltar/_/'jig rten 'dir ni der snang 'gyur/_/zhes 
[\[121b.3\]]kha ton zer ba thos nas/_des bsams pa/_sdig pa'i las kyang dgag par nus kyis 'di dag gi nang du rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas/_de dge slong gi gan du song ste smras pa/_'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/_/des de rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs 
[\[121b.4\]]par byas nas/_des shin tu brtson 'grus brtsams te bklag par brtsams so/_/des klog cing kha ton byed pa na sde snod gsum bklags shing sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/_rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can du gyur to/_/de la dge slong dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang 
[\[121b.5\]]ldan pa khyod brtson 'grus 'dis ci zhig don du gnyer des smras pa/_sdig pa'i las zad par bya'o/_/khyod kyis sdig pa'i las ci byas/_ma bsad do/_/ci ma ma'am/_'on te skyed ma mo yin/_des smras pa/_skyed ma mo yin no zhes zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das 
[\[121b.6\]]la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di ni gang zag ma bsad pa bsnyil bar 'os pa yin te/_dge slong dag gang zag ma bsad pa ni chos 'dul ba 'di la mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas dge slong 
[\[121b.7\]]dag khyed kyis gang zag ma bsad pa chos 'dul ba 'di las bsnyil bar bya'o/_/'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'ongs pa na des de la ma bsad pa ma yin nam/_zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/des bsams pa/_
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]ci 'babs par bya'am/_mtha' 'khob tu 'gro bar bya snyam nas/_de mtha' 'khob tu song ste/_khyim bdag cig rjes su 'jug par byas so/_/des mngon par dad pas de'i phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug ste/_de phyogs dang yul tha dad pa na 'khod 
[\[122a.2\]]pa'i dge slong dag gnas shing de'i gdams ngag gis mang po dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so/_/de dus gzhan zhig na na bar gyur nas rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu'i sman dag gis rim gro byas na/_nyam dmas pa nyid du gyur 
[\[122a.3\]]nas/_des lhan cig gnas pa rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i phyir dge 'dun la bsro khang gyis shig_/de rnams kyis de'i phyir bsro khang bgyis so/_/bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing /_/mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur/_/phrad pa'i mtha' ni 
[\[122a.4\]]'bral ba ste/_/gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/_/zhes bya ba yin pas de shi zhing dus la bab nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so/_/de'i lhan cig gnas pa dgra bcom pa zhig gis bdag gi mkhan po gang du skyes zhes sems par zhugs nas 
[\[122a.5\]]de lha rnams kyi nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams na ma mthong zhing mi dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du rnam par bltas na de yang ma mthong ngo /_/sems can dmyal ba'i nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams na/_sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par 
[\[122a.6\]]skyes par mthong nas/_des bsams pa/_mkhan po ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa mang du thos pa/_chos kyi 'khor sdud sdud pa yin na/_des las ci zhig byas na des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes snyam nas bsams na ma bsad pa yin par mthong ngo 
[\[122a.7\]]de mnar med pa'i 'od zer dag gis phog pa dang smras pa kye ma bsro khang 'di me re tsha zhes smras pa dang sems can dmyal ba'i srung mas tho ba blangs te mgor bsnun nas skal chad khyod kyi bsro khang ga la yod 'di ltar 'di ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa yin no/_/
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]zhes smras so/_/de dge ba'i sems kyis dus la bab nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/lha'i bu'am/_lha'i bu mo'i chos nyid ni skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye ste/_gang nas shi 'phos pa dang gang du skyes pa dang las gang gis skyes 
[\[122b.2\]]pa'o/_/des sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang /_dge 'dun la bsro khang gi khrus byas pas skyes pa mthong ngo /_/de nas sngon sems can dmyal ba'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te gang gi phyir 
[\[122b.3\]]bdag zhag lon par gnas te bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyis/_bdag zhag lon par ma gnas pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam 
[\[122b.4\]]mo/_/de nas sngon sems can dmyal ba'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor g.yo zhing dri ma med pa thogs te/_do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis lha'i ut+pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dag gis thu ba bkang ste kha dog shin tu 'das pas mtshan mo 
[\[122b.5\]]la bab pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_'di ltar sngon sems can dmyal ba'i lha'i bu'i 
[\[122b.6\]]kha dog gi mthus rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sems can dmyal ba'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos nas sems can dmyal ba'i 
[\[122b.7\]]lha'i bus stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/des 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]bden pa mthong nas/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_
[\[123a.2\]]dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag 
[\[123a.3\]]ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go zhes lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/yang smras pa/_khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i/_/ngan song shul bkag bsod 
[\[123a.4\]]nams rab ldan pa'i/_/mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur/_/shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni/_/de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing /_/go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste/_/sdug bsngal rgya 
[\[123a.5\]]mtsho'i pha rol rgal bar gyur/_/'gro bar lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po/_/srid pa stong du mthong bar rab dkon pa/_/thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis/_/de nas 'dud byas do shal rab 'phyang bas/_/zhabs la phyag 'tshal 
[\[123a.6\]]rangs pa skyes gyur nas/_/dgra thul g.yas nas yongs su bskor byas te/_/lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song /_/de nas sngon sems can dmyal ba'i lha'i bu tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /_zhing pa lo tog 'byor pa lta bu dang /_dpa' bo g.yul 
[\[123a.7\]]las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang /_nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar pa lta bur gyur te/_cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i cha lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/de'i lhan cig gnas pa dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dgra bcom 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]pa zas kyi gral du 'dug ste/_de'i lhan cig gnas pa gzhan zhig dge 'dun la chu 'grim par byed do/_/ji tsam na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan des chu kha phor du blangs nas sor mo'i rtse mos reg na shin tu grangs nas des bsams pa/_bdag cag ni chu shin tu grang mo 'di lta bu 'thung 
[\[123b.2\]]na/_mkhan po ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa na zangs khu bskol ba 'thung ngo snyam nas/_des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par rnam par blta bar brtsams na mi snang ngo /_/dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_mi dang /_sems can dmyal ba 
[\[123b.3\]]gzhan rnams su yang rnam par bltas na/_de rnams na yang mi snang nas/_lha rnams kyi bar gyi nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams na/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te lhar gyur pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas te lha rnams kyi nang 
[\[123b.4\]]na 'dug pa mthong nas 'dzum pa sngon du btang ste/_bcom ldan 'das la dad pa thob nas/_kye ma sangs rgyas/_kye ma chos/_kye ma dge 'dun/_kye ma chos kyi legs par gsungs pa nyid/_'di ltar sdig pa byed pa log par ltung bar song ba de lta bu dag gis kyang yon tan 
[\[123b.5\]]gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob bo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/mkhan po gcig pa des de rangs shing mgu ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod mkhan po dus la bab pas bdag dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur to snyam nas rangs shing mgu 
[\[123b.6\]]ba dang mchog tu dga' bar gyur tam/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa re zhig khyod kyi dri ba'i lan gdab pa'i dus ma yin gyis/_dge 'dun gyi nang du dris shig dang der khyod kyi dri ba'i lan gdab pa'i dus la bab par 'gyur ro/_/ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na dge slong gi dge 
[\[123b.7\]]'dun tshogs shing 'khod pa na/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis mkhan po gcig pa de la dris pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis de'i tshe ci smras des smras pa/_khyod la kho bos khyod mkhan po dus la bab pas bdag dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur to snyam nas rangs shing mgu ba 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]dang mchog tu dga' bar gyur tam zhes smras so/_/des skabs de dge 'dun gyi nang du de la rgya cher brjod pa dang /_de yang yi rangs shing dge slong rnams kyang kye ma sangs rgyas/_kye ma chos/_kye ma dge 'dun/_kye ma chos kyi legs par gsungs pa 
[\[124a.2\]]nyid 'di ltar sdig pa byed pa log par ltung bar song ba de lta bu dag gis kyang yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob bo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bcu gcig pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[124a.3\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' 
[\[124a.4\]]mgur spyod par byed pa de'i bu byung nas/_de dus gzhan zhig na ne'u ldangs dang lhan cig khyim zhig gi drung du song ba na khyim de'i steng na bu mo zhig 'dug pa des de'i steng du me tog gi chun po 'phangs pa dang /_des bu mo de mthong ngo /_/ne'u ldangs kyis smras pa/_grogs po khyod kyis khyim der brda 
[\[124a.5\]]ma byas sam/_des smras pa/_de yin te/_kho bos brda byas so/_/des smras pa/_grogs po khyim 'di ni ya nga ba yin gyis ma 'jug shig_/tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re zhes des nyin thog thag 'phyan du bcug ste pha'i gan du khrid nas smras pa/_yab khyod kyi bu 'dis khyim che ge mo zhig 
[\[124a.6\]]tu brda byas pa/_kho bos ni nyin thog thag tu bsrungs kyis/_da khyod kyis mtshan mo srungs shig_/khyim de ni ya nga ba yin gyis 'jug tu ma gzhug cig_/tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/_des smras pa/_bu khyod kyis kho bo la bsnyad pa khyod kyis legs par 
[\[124a.7\]]byas so/_/des khye'u de khyim gyi nang du mal bcas te/_gyo mo gnyis dang /_chu dang /_sa dag bzhag nas khyim der bcug ste/_bdag nyid sgor khri bcas nas nyal lo/_/des smras pa/_yab sgo phye shig_/bu ci'i phyir/_gcir 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_bu 'di nyid du 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]kho bos gyo mo bzhag gis der gci shig_/des yud tsam zhig bsdad de smras pa/_yab sgo phye shig_/bu ci'i phyir/_bshang du 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_bu 'di nyid du kho bos gyo mo dang /_chu dang /_sa dag bzhag gis 'di nyid du bshang ba byos shig_/des yang yud 
[\[124b.2\]]tsam zhig bsdad de smras pa/_yab sgo phye shig_/des smras pa/_bu khyod gang du 'gro 'dod pa kho bos mi shes sam ci/_kho bos sgo dbye bar mi nus so/_/yab kho bos khyod bsad do/_/des smras pa/_bu kho bo shi ba ni bla'i/_kho bo bu shi ba la lta ni mi phod do/_/'dod 
[\[124b.3\]]pa sten pas ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med pas snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'jig rten pha rol btang ba des ral gri shubs nas phyung ste/_de'i mgo drungs nas bcad de sa la bsgyel to/_/des pha bsad nas song ba dang sems can sdig pa'i las byas pa 'dar bas bu mo 
[\[124b.4\]]des de la smras pa/_rje'i sras 'di na su yang ma mchis te/_bdag bu mo dang gnyis su bas kyis ma bsnyengs shig_/des bsams pa/_de 'di la smras na dga' bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/_bzang mo kho bos khyod kyi phyir pha bsad do/_/des smras pa/_ci pha ba'am/_'on 
[\[124b.5\]]te skyed pha/_des smras pa/_skyed pha'o/_/des bsams pa/_'di yon tan dag mngon par mi shes te pha gsod par byed pas gang gi tshe bdag la khro ba skyes na/_bdag la gnas skabs ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur snyam nas des smras pa/_rje'i sras bdag steng gi khang thog 
[\[124b.6\]]tu 'dzegs nas slar mchi ba'i bar du re zhig gzhes shig des smras pa/_de na de bzhin gyis shig de steng gi khang thog tu 'dzegs nas chom rkun pa chom rkun pa zhes bya ba sgra phyung ba dang /_de 'jigs shing skrag nas bros te rang gi khyim du song nas sgo drung du ral gri bzhag ste chom 
[\[124b.7\]]rkun pa de ni 'di yin te/_kho bo'i pha bsad nas bros so zhes sgra phyung nas/_des pha'i ro de bkur sti byas te song ngo /_/sems can sdig pa'i las byas pas ni brtan pa mi rnyed pas de mu stegs can gyi gnas dang dka' thub kyi nags de dang de dag tu song ste dris pa/_shes ldan 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]dag las ci zhig byas na des sdig pa'i las zad par 'gyur/_de na kha cig na re mer zhugs shig ces zer ro/_/kha cig na re dug zo shig ces zer ro/_/kha cig na re g.yang sar mchongs shig ces zer ro/_/kha cig na re chur mchongs shig ces zer ro/_/
[\[125a.2\]]kha cig na re thag pas 'gegs te shi shig ces zer te/_thams cad kyang shi ba'i thabs ston par byed kyi/_nges par 'byung ba'i thabs ston pa ni 'ga' yang med do/_/de dus gzhan zhig na rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_des de na dge slong zhig_/gang gis sdig pa'i 
[\[125a.3\]]las byas pa/_/dge ba yis ni 'gog byed de/_/nyi zla sprin nas byung ba ltar/_/'jig rten 'dir ni de snang 'gyur/_/zhes kha ton zer ba thos nas des bsams pa/_sdig pa'i las kyang dgag par nus kyis/_'di dag gi nang du rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas/_
