[\[125a.4\]]dge slong gi gan du song ste smras pa/_'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/_/des de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas des shin tu brtson 'grus brtsams te bklag par brtsams so/_/des klog cing kha ton byed pa na sde snod gsum bklags shing sde 
[\[125a.5\]]snod gsum dang ldan pa/_rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can du gyur to/_/de la dge slong dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod brtson 'grus 'dis ci zhig don du gnyer/_des smras pa/_sdig pa'i las zad par bya'o/_/khyod kyis sdig pa'i las ci zhig byas/_
[\[125a.6\]]pha bsad do ci pha ba'am/_'on te skyed pha yin/_des smras pa/_skyed pha yin no zhes zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di ni gang zag pha bsad pa 
[\[125a.7\]]bsnyil bar 'os pa yin te/_dge slong dag gang zag pha bsad pa ni chos 'dul ba 'di la mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas dge slong dag khyed kyis gang zag pha bsad pa chos 'dul ba 'di las bsnyil bar bya'o/_/'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par 'ongs na/_des 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]de la pha bsad pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/des bsams pa/_ci de 'babs par bya'am/_mtha' 'khob cig tu 'gro bar bya snyam nas/_des mtha' 'khob tu song ste khyim bdag cig rjes su 
[\[125b.2\]]'jug par byas so/_/des mngon par dad pas de'i phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug ste/_der phyogs dang yul tha dad pa na 'khod pa'i dge slong dag gnas shing de'i gdams ngag gis mang po dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so/_/de dus gzhan zhig na na 
[\[125b.3\]]bar gyur nas rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu'i sman dag gis rim gro byas na nyam dmas pa nyid du gyur nas/_des lhan cig gnas pa rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i phyir dge 'dun la bsro khang gyis shig_/de rnams 
[\[125b.4\]]kyis de'i phyir bsro khang byas so/_/bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing /_/mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur/_/phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/_/gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/_/zhes bya ba yin pas de shi shing dus la bab nas sems can dmyal ba chen po 
[\[125b.5\]]mnar med par skyes so/_/de'i lhan cig gnas pa dgra bcom pa zhig gis bdag gi mkhan po gang du skyes zhes sems pa la zhugs nas/_des lha rnams kyi nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams na ma mthong zhing mi dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du rnam par blta 
[\[125b.6\]]bar brtsams na/_sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes par mthong nas des bsams pa/_mkhan po ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_mang du thos pa/_chos kyi 'khor sdud sdud pa yin na des las ci zhig byas na/_des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par 
[\[125b.7\]]skyes snyam nas bsams na/_pha bsad pa yin par mthong ngo /_/de mnar med pa'i 'od zer dag gis phog pa dang smras pa/_kye ma bsro khang 'di me re tsha zhes smras pa dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i srung mas tho ba blangs te mgor bsnun nas skal chad khyod la bsro khang ga la yod/_
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]'di ltar 'di ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa yin no zhes smras so/_/de dge ba'i sems kyis dus byas nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo'i chos nyid ni skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye 
[\[126a.2\]]ste/_gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /_gang du skyes pa dang /_las gang gis skyes pa'o/_/des sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang /_dge 'dun la bsro khang gi khrus byas pas skyes pa mthong 
[\[126a.3\]]ngo /_/de nas sngon sems can dmyal ba'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/_gang gi phyir bdag zhag lon par gnas te bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyis/_bdag zhag lon par ma gnas 
[\[126a.4\]]pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas sngon sems can dmyal ba'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor g.yo zhing dri ma med pa thogs te/_do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis lha'i ut+pal dang /_pad ma 
[\[126a.5\]]dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dag gis thu ba bkang ste/_kha dog shin tu 'das pas mtshan mo la bab pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis mngon par gtor te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo 
[\[126a.6\]]bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_'di ltar sngon sems can dmyal ba'i lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sems can dmyal ba'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang /_bag 
[\[126a.7\]]la nyal ba dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos nas sngon sems can dmyal ba'i lha'i bus stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan par mdzad do/_/des bden pa mthong nas btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_
[\[126b.2\]]lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag 
[\[126b.3\]]las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/yang smras 
[\[126b.4\]]pa/_khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i/_/ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i/_/mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur/_/shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni/_/de ring skyon bral dag 
[\[126b.5\]]pa'i mig thob cing /_/go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal bar gyur/_/'gro bar lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po/_/srid pa stong du mthong bar rab dkon pa/_/thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu 
[\[126b.6\]]mchis/_/de nas 'dud byas do shal rab 'phyang bas/_/zhabs la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas/_/dgra thul g.yas nas yongs su bskor byas te/_/lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song /_/de nas sngon sems can dmyal ba'i lha'i bu tshong pa khe spogs 
[\[126b.7\]]rnyed pa lta bu dang /_zhing pa lo tog 'byor pa lta bu dang /_dpa' bo g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang /_nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar ba lta bur gyur te/_cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i cha lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]song ngo /_/de'i lhan cig gnas pa dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dgra bcom pa zas kyi gral du 'dug ste de'i lhan cig gnas pa gzhan zhig dge 'dun la chu 'grim par byed do/_/ji tsam na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan des chu kha phor du blugs nas sor mo'i rtse mos reg 
[\[127a.2\]]na shin tu grangs nas des bsams pa/_bdag cag ni chu shin tu grang mo 'di lta bu 'thung na mkhan po ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa na zangs khu bskol ba 'thung ngo snyam nas/_des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par rnam par blta bar brtsams na mi snang ngo /_/
[\[127a.3\]]dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_mi dang /_sems can dmyal ba gzhan rnams su yang rnam par bltas na de rnams na yang mi snang nas/_lha rnams kyi nang du rnam par blta bar brtsams na/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/_lhar gyur pas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[127a.4\]]kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas te/_lha rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa mthong nas 'dzum pa sngon du btang ste/_bcom ldan 'das la dad pa thob nas/_kye ma sangs rgyas/_kye ma chos/_kye ma dge 'dun/_kye ma chos kyi legs par gsungs pa nyid/_'di ltar sdig pa byed pa/_
[\[127a.5\]]log par ltung bar song ba de lta bu dag gis kyang yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob bo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/mkhan po gcig pa des de rangs shing mgu ba dang mchog tu dga' bar mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod mkhan po dus la bab pas bdag ni 
[\[127a.6\]]dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur to snyam nas rangs shing mgu ba dang mchog tu dga' bar gyur tam/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa re zhig khyod kyi dri ba'i lan gdab pa'i dus ma yin gyis/_dge 'dun gyi nang du dris shig dang /_der khyod kyi dri ba'i lan gdab pa'i dus la 
[\[127a.7\]]bab par 'gyur ro/_/ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na dge slong gi dge 'dun tshogs shing 'khod pa na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis mkhan po gcig pa de la dris pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis de'i tshe ci smras/_des smras pa/_khyod la kho bos khyod mkhan po dus la bab pas bdag dge 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur to snyam nas rangs shing mgu ba dang mchog tu dga' bar gyur tam zhes smras so/_/des skabs de dge 'dun gyi nang du de la rgya cher brjod pa dang de yang yi rangs shing dge slong rnams kyang kye ma sangs rgyas/_kye ma chos/_kye ma dge 'dun/_kye ma chos 
[\[127b.2\]]kyi legs par gsungs pa nyid/_'di ltar sdig pa byed pa/_log par ltung bar song ba de lta bu dag gis kyang yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob bo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do//_//sdom la/_dgra bcom bsad dang dge 'dun dbyen/_/ngan sems kyis ni khrag phyung dang /_/pham par 'gyur ba bzhi po 
[\[127b.3\]]dang /_/gnas nas dbyung ba gsum yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ltang brang gi tshal gseb tu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po 
[\[127b.4\]]lha brgyad khri dang /_ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig bden pa dag la bkod pa na/_des rang gi yul du dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste/_nga'i yul du sus kyang chom rkun mi bya'o/_/gang zhig byed pa na ngas de yul med par bya zhing skyin pa 
[\[127b.5\]]ni nga nyid kyi mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin par bya'o zhes bsgo'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdo sdes btul ba de'i tshe na des kyang dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste/_nga'i yul du sus kyang chom rkun mi bya'o/_/gang zhig byed na de 
[\[127b.6\]]gsad pa'i gyod la bskrin cing skyin pa ni nga nyid kyi mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin par bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang /_de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa dang /_yul ko sa la'i chom rkun pa gang yin pa de dag sa mtshams kyi bar du dong ste/_'khod nas yul ma ga d+hA nas don mthun 
[\[127b.7\]]'ong ba gang yin pa de yang 'joms par byed do/_/yul ko sa la nas don mthun 'ong ba gang yin pa de yang 'joms par byed do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na don mthun bsel ba dang bcas pa yul ma ga d+hA nas yul ko sa lar 'phags pa dang /_gang gi tshe sa mtshams 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\](]gyi [,]kyi [)]bar du phyin pa de'i tshe ded dpon des smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po gsal rgyal de ni gdug pa pha rol gnon pa yin pas bdag cag la skyin pa sbyin du 'jug nus pa yin na/_bdag cag gis ci'i phyir bsel ba la gla sbyin par bya/_'di dag 
[\[128a.2\]]nyid nas phyir bzlog go zhes de dag phyir bzlog ste don mthun de tshogs nyung ngur chas pa dang /_chom rkun de dag gis kyang bya ma rta btsugs te bsdad pa dang /_des de mthong nas shes ldan dag don mthun tshogs nyung ngus 'ongs na ci'i phyir btang snyoms su 'khod ces smras pa dang /_
[\[128a.3\]]de nas chom rkun pa de dag gis der tshong pa kha cig ni srog dang phral lo/_/kha cig ni zong bor te bros so/_/dgra bcom pa dag ni ma bsams par shes pa dang mthong ba mi 'jug pas dgra bcom pa don mthun de dang 'gro ba zhig kyang srog dang phral lo/_/de na don mthun gang dag bros pa 
[\[128a.4\]]de dag mgo dang lus rdul gyis yog ste klad pa'i skra yogs nas ku co 'don cing ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi drung du phyin nas thal mo sbyar te smras pa/_lha khyod kyi yul du bdag cag tshong bar mi rung bar rnam par bzhag go/_/ci zhig byas/_bdag cag chom rkun pa dag gis 
[\[128a.5\]]bcom mo/_/phyogs gang du/_ga ge mo zhig tu'o/_/rgyal pos dmag dpon 'phags skyes po la bsgo ba/_rkun rdzas dang chom rkun pa dag myur du khug shig_/des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bsgo nas phyir byung ba dang chom rkun pa de dag kyang go cha phud nas bag yangs 
[\[128a.6\]]su sA la'i dgon pa zhig na rkun rdzas bged cing 'khod pa las/_dmag dpon 'phags skyes pos de dag phyogs bzhir bskor nas dbus su dung dang /_rnga pa Ta ha'i sgra dag gis skrag par byas pa dang /_de rnams las kha cig ni rkun rdzas bor te bros so/_/kha cig ni bsad do/_/
[\[128a.7\]]drug bcu ni gson por bzung ste des rkun rdzas de yang khyer nas rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa/_lha chom rkun pa dag ni 'di dag lags so/_/rkun rdzas ni 'di dag lags so/_/de nas rgyal pos de rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed kyis rgyal pos dril bsgrags pa 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]byed du bcug ste/_nga'i yul du sus kyang chom rkun mi bya'o/_/gang zhig byed na de gsad pa'i gyod la bskrin cing skyin pa ni nga nyid kyi mdzod dang /_bang ba nas sbyin no zhes ma thos sam/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha thos so/_/'o na ci'i phyir tshong pa dag bcom/_lha 'tsho ba 
[\[128b.2\]]ma mchis so/_/ci'i phyir srog dang phral/_'jigs pa nye bar bstan pa'i slad du'o/_/khyod kyis 'jigs pa de 'dra ba nye bar bstan pa dang /_da sngon sus kyang ma mthong ba gang yin pa'i 'jigs pa de 'dra ba nye bar bstan par bya'o/_/de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo 
[\[128b.3\]]ba/_shes ldan dag deng la 'di dag thams cad sod cig_/de dag gis lam po che dang /_srang dang /_lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su rjes su sgrogs shing gsad par khrid pa na chom rkun pa zhig lam dog par bros te rgyal byed kyi tshal du dge slong gi gan du song ste smras 
[\[128b.4\]]pa/_'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/_/des de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so/_/chom rkun pa de dag kyang bsad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag rang gi rgud pa dang /_gzhan gyi rgud pa dang /_rang gi 'byor pa dang /_gzhan gyi 
[\[128b.5\]]'byor pa la yang dang yang du so sor rtogs shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag rang gi rgud pa dang /_gzhan gyi rgud pa ni kun du skyo bar 'gyur ba'i gnas yin la/_rang gi 'byor pa dang /_gzhan gyi 'byor ba yang kun du skyo bar 'gyur ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro/_/zhes 
[\[128b.6\]]gsungs pas ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge slong rnams dur khrod rgyur 'dong ba na dge slong de yang de rnams dang lhan cig dur khrod rgyur song ba las des chom rkun pa de dag bsad pa mthong nas mchi mas brnangs te 'dug par gyur pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 
[\[128b.7\]]'di gsar du rab tu byung ba yin yang bsam pa 'di 'dra bar bzang ngo /_/des skad phyung ste ngu bar brtsams pa dang dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod ci'i phyir cho nges 'debs/_des smras pa/_'di ni bdag gi pha'o/_/'di ni bdag gi phu nu'o/_/'di ni khu bo'o/_/'di 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]ni zhang po'o/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_'di rnams kyis dgra bcom pa srog dang phral lam/_des smras pa/_phral lo zhes zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[129a.2\]]dag gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa bsad pa yin te/_gang zag dgra bcom pa bsad pa ni chos 'dul ba 'di la mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas dge slong dag khyed kyis gang zag dgra bcom pa bsad pa chos 'dul ba 'di las bsnyil bar bya'o/_/'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung 
[\[129a.3\]]bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/_des de la dgra bcom pa bsad pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed/_bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_
[\[129a.4\]]btsun pa gang gis sngon rab tu phyung ba na de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phye ba de gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na/_rab tu dbyung bar bgyi 'am rab tu dbyung bar mi bgyi/_
[\[129a.5\]]nye ba 'khor rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/de lta bas na 'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu dbyung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/_des de la dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs 
[\[129a.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na/_
[\[129a.7\]]rab tu dbyung bar bgyi'am/_rab tu dbyung bar mi bgyi/_nye ba 'khor rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/de lta bas na 'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu dbyung bar 'dod pa 'ongs na/_des de la de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa sngon gang rab tu 'byung ba na pham par 'gyur ba bzhi las ltung ba gang yang rung ba byung ba de gal te legs par gsungs pa'i 
[\[129b.2\]]chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na/_rab tu dbyung bar bgyi'am/_rab tu dbyung bar mi bgyi/_nye ba 'khor rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/de lta bas na 'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dong ba 'ongs na/_
[\[129b.3\]]des de la pham par 'gyur ba bzhi las ltung ba gang yang rung ba byung ba ma yin nam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun 
[\[129b.4\]]dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gal te gang zag ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba babs pa zhig yang phyir 'ongs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ltung ba mthong gis bdag rab tu dbyung bar gsol zhes 
[\[129b.5\]]zer na de rab tu dbyung bar bya'o/_/rab tu phyung nas tshe dang ldan pa dag ltung ba bshags par byas/_bdag bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol zhes zer na bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o/_/ji ste bsnyen par rdzogs nas ltung ba ma mthong ngo zhes zer na/_gal te dge 'dun 
[\[129b.6\]]tshogs pa yod na yang ma mthong bas gnas nas dbyung bar bya'o/_/gal te tshogs pa med la ji ste bsnyen par rdzogs na legs par bsnyen par rdzogs pa yin te/_'di ltar gang zag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs 
[\[129b.7\]]pa dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba ji lta ba bzhin du phyir mi 'chos pas gnas nas phyung ba dang /_sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong bas gnas nas phyung ba yang de bzhin no//_//sdom la/_lag 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]rdum dag dang rkang rdum dang /_/lag sor zlum por 'jas pa dang /_/mchu med lus la rma mtshan can/_/rgan ches pa dang gzhon ches dang /_/theng po smad 'char zhar ba dang /_/lag sor rdum sgur mi'u thung dang /_/lba ba lkugs pa 'on pa dang /_/rten 
[\[130a.2\]]'phye dang ni rkang 'bam dang /_/bud med kyis dub khur gyis dub/_/mi gang lam gyis dub rnams dang /_/ya za ma lug gta' gam dang /_/de lta bu yi mi rnams ni/_/drang srong chen pos dgag pa mdzad/_/mdzes pa rab tu dbyung ba dang /_/yongs su dag pa bsnyen rdzogs 
[\[130a.3\]]par/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab mkhyen te/_/bden pa'i mtshan gyis bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde dag gi kun du spyod pa ni gang rab tu byung ba dang 
[\[130a.4\]]bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa des ji srid du 'di dag ni gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa dag yin no zhes bya bar mi shes pa de srid du de de dag dang lhan cig gnas par byed la/_gang gi tshe shes par gyur pa de'i tshe dge slong rang bzhin du gnas pa dag dang lhan cig gnas par byed de/_
[\[130a.5\]]ston pa'i bka' lung gis dus gsum du 'gro ba'i phyir blta ba 'ba' zhig byed do/_/de nas de dag gis gros bya bar brtsams pa/_dga' bo nye dga' lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag ni btsas 'phrog pa dang 'dra ste/_bdag cag gis rab tu phyung ba rnams 'di dag gis 'phrog 
[\[130a.6\]]par byed kyis/_da ni lhung bzed nag po can rnams kyis dbrog par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de 'dra ba rab tu dbyung bar bya'o zhes gros byas so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na nye dga' kun du 'khyam pas mi lag rdum zhig mthong nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci'i phyir rab tu mi 
[\[130a.7\]]'byung /_des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag lag pa ma tshang ba su zhig gis rab tu 'byin par bgyid/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la thugs rjes rab tu phye ba yin gyis/_kho bos khyod rab tu dbyung bar bya'o zhes des de rab tu phyung 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so/_/de nas zhag gnyis sam gsum zhig kun du spyod pa'i chos rnams bslabs nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mi sos/_mnyan yod rgya che la rang gi spyod yul dang yab kyi spyod yul yin pas bsod snyoms rgyus 
[\[130b.2\]]la 'tsho bar gyis shig_/des smras pa/_mkhan po ji ltar bsod snyoms rgyu bar bgyi/_des smras pa/_khyod kyis de tsam yang mi shes sam/_ngas khyod la bstan par bya'o zhes des de'i sham thabs ni srad bus bcings/_chos gos ni tsher mas gtur te bskon/_dpung 
[\[130b.3\]]pa g.yon par ni lhung bzed kyi snod bzhag_/dpung pa g.yas par ni khar gsil btags so/_/de nas de mnyan yod du spyod yul du zhugs pa dang bud med kyis brang brdungs nas smras pa/_'phags pa sus khyod rab tu byung ba'i lag pa gnyis bcad/_des smras pa/_sring mo 
[\[130b.4\]]khyim pa nas kho bo'i lag pa chad de/_rab tu byung nas chad pa ma yin no/_/sus rab tu phyung /_des smras pa/_mkhan po nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]so/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa de ma gtogs pas gzhan su zhig 'di lta bu rab tu 'byin par byed ces zer 
[\[130b.5\]]ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag lag rdum rab tu 'byin pa las gyur pa yin no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na dge 
[\[130b.6\]]slong gis lag rdum rab tu dbyung bar mi bya bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o/_/rab tu 'byin par byed/_bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/lag rdum ji lta ba de bzhin du rkang rdum dang /_lag sor zlum por 'jas pa dang /_mchu med pa dang /_lus 
[\[130b.7\]]la rma mtshan can dang /_rgan ches pa dag kyang de bzhin no/_/dge slong dag gzhon ches pa dag rab tu 'byin par byed nas de dag gis dge 'dun gyi gnas mal bshang gcis ma rung bar byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag kyang rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]theng po dag rab tu 'byin par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag kyang rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/smad 'chal dang /_zhar ba dang /_lag sor rdum po dang /_sgur po dang /_mi'u thung dang /_lba ba can dang /_lkugs pa dang /_
[\[131a.2\]]'on pa dang /_rten 'phye dang /_rkang 'bam dag rab tu 'byin par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bu dag kyang rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag bud med kyis dub pa dang /_khur 
[\[131a.3\]]gyis dub pa dang /_lam gyis dub pa dang /_ya za ma lug dang /_gta' gam ba dag rab tu 'byin par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bu dag kyang rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bsdu 
[\[131a.4\]]bar bya ba'i skabs so/_/rab tu 'byung ba'i gzhi rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//[{D1-2}]gso sbyong gi gzhi'i sdom la/_mu stegs can dang ka bi na/_/gnas dang rgyal po sbyar ba mang /_/sdom la/_mu stegs can dang gsol ba dang /_/gnang ba dang ni 'dug pa dang /_/bab 
[\[131a.5\]]col spong dang zhal ta dang /_/bya dang gso sbyong gnas rnams so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag nang par nang par zhing bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[131a.6\]]blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar brtson par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag 'di snyam du sems te/_da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyang nang du yang dag par 'jog par mdzad la/_dge slong yid du 'thad pa rnams kyang nang du yang 
[\[131a.7\]]dag 'jog par byed pas bdag cag re zhig bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dong ba sngas kyis/_bdag cag gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu dag gi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der dong ngo snyam mo de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag gzhan 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]mu stegs can kun du rgyu dag gi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu dag dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/
[\[131b.2\]]de nas mu stegs can zhig gis mu stegs can dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan dag bdag cag 'ba' zhig la 'dug pa dang bya ba dang gso sbyong yod dam/_'on te shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag la yang yod/_de nas mu stegs can zhig gis mu stegs can 
[\[131b.3\]]dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan dag bdag cag 'ba' zhig la 'dug pa dang bya ba dang gso sbyong yod kyi/_shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag la ni med do/_/de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu dag gis smras pa la 
[\[131b.4\]]mngon par bstod par yang mi byed/_phyir ldog par yang mi byed cing mngon par bstod pa yang ma byas/_phyir bzlog par yang ma byas par stan dag las langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos 
[\[131b.5\]]phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag gis gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu dag dang lhan cig bar skabs su gtam ci brjod pa de thams cad bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol nas 
[\[131b.6\]]'di skad ces kyang gsol to/_/kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag cag gi la yang mchis pa dang /_bgyi ba dang /_gso sbyong bca' bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag la cang mi gsung bas 
[\[131b.7\]]gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dge bsnyen rab tu mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba la mngon par bstod pa dang rjes su yi rang ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo /_/
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis deng phyin chad 'dug pa dang /_bya ba dang /_gso sbyong la tron bya bar rjes su gnang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis deng phyin 
[\[132a.2\]]chad 'dug pa dang /_bya ba dang /_gso sbyong la tron bya bar rjes su gnang ngo zhes bka' stsal nas/_de dag gis 'dug pa ci lta bu yin pa dang /_bya ba ci lta bu yin pa dang /_gso sbyong ci lta bu yin pa mi shes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams 
[\[132a.3\]]kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed tshur shog_/'dug pa ni rnal 'byor te/_lus 'di nyid rkang pa'i mthil yan chad klad pa'i skra man chad pags pa la thug gi bar du ji ltar gnas pa dang /_ci ltar byas pa 
[\[132a.4\]]bzhin du mi gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ste/_lus 'di la skra dang kha spu dang /_sen mo dang so dang /_rdul dang /_dri ma dang /_pags pa dang /_sha dang /_rus pa dang /_rgyus pa dang /_rtsa dang /_mkhal ma dang /_snying dang /_mchin pa dang /_glo ba dang /_rgyu 
[\[132a.5\]]ma dang /_gnye ma dang /_pho ba dang /_long ka dang /_lgang pa dang /_mtsher pa dang /_phyi sa dang /_mchi ma dang /_snabs dang /_zhag dang /_chu ser dang /_rkang dang /_tshil dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_rnag dang /_khrag dang /_klad pa dang /_klad rgyas dang /_
[\[132a.6\]]gcin dag yod do snyam du so sor rtogs shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong dag spyod yul du zhugs pa na yang rnal 'byor sgom par byed pa na de dag glang po che 'khrul pa dang /_rta 'khrul pa dang /_rkang thang pa 'khrul 
[\[132a.7\]]pa dang lhan cig phrad nas 'gyel ba dang bub par gyur nas ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag mi mthong ngam ci zhes co 'dri bar byed pa dang /_de dag rnal 'byor sgom mo zhes zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]stsal pa/_spyod yul du zhugs pas rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o/_/de dag sgo khang du rnal 'byor sgom par byed pa na yur nas ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag ci khyed 'du bar nyal ba'i brtul zhugs can yin nam zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge 
[\[132b.2\]]slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgo khang du rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o/_/de dag khyams su sgom par byed pa na nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyams su rnal 'byor bsgom par 
[\[132b.3\]]mi bya'o/_/de dag gnas khang du sgom par byed pa na bsam gtan dag gi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid kyang mi thob pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas khang du rnal 
[\[132b.4\]]'byor bsgom par mi bya'o/_/de dag dgon par dong ste sgom par byed pa na chom rkun pa rnams dang /_g.yon can rnams dang /_seng ge rnams dang /_stag rnams dang /_gung rnams dang /_gzig rnams kyis bgrod par gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge 
[\[132b.5\]]slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dgon par rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o/_/de dag grong dang nye bar lhags nas sgom par byed pa na ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag ci khyed cag 'ga' zhig shi ba dang ldan par ma gyur tam zhes 
[\[132b.6\]]co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyogs de yal ga dag gam/_seg dag dang /_re lde dag gis bskor bar bya'o/_/de dag gis phyogs yal ga dag gam/_seg 
[\[132b.7\]]dag gam/_re lde dag gis bskor ba dang ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag ci 'di rgyal mo ga gon gyi ra ba'am/_la phug gi ra ba'am zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]phyogs de rtsig pa dag gam/_'obs dag gis bskor bar bya'o/_/de dag gis phyogs de rtsig pa dag gam/_'obs dag gis bskor ba dang /_ma dad pa rnams 'phags pa dag ci 'di ma du lung ga'i ra ba'am/_'on te bal po se'u'i ra ba 
[\[133a.2\]]yin/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_rnal 'byor sgom pa'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na spong khang brtsig par gnang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis spong khang 
[\[133a.3\]]brtsig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_de dag gis spong khang rnam pa ji lta bu yin pa mi shes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_spong khang ni gnyis te/_chung ngu dang /_chen po'o/_/
[\[133a.4\]]chung ngu ni gnas khang gnyis kyi bar du srang btod pa'o/_/chen po ni gnas khang bcu'am/_bcu gnyis kyi bar du srang btod pa'o/_/dge slong dag gis gnas khang byas nas sbyang byed pa bzhin du sgo dod par mi byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgo 
[\[133a.5\]]gdod par bya'o/_/dge slong dag sgo glegs mi 'dzud nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgo glegs gzhug par bya'o/_/dbye dka' nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag zungs gdags par bya'o/_/yang mig sgra 'khrol nas bcom ldan 
[\[133a.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'og tu ko ba'i dum bu gzhug par bya'o/_/gcad dka' nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnam gzer dang /_'khor gtan dang /_phred gtan gzhug par bya'o/_/mun gnag par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[133a.7\]]stsal pa/_skar khung gdod par bya'o/_/dma' bar btod pa na chom rkun pa dang /_g.yon can dang /_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_gung rnams kyis bgrod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dma' bar gdod par mi bya'o/_/mthon po gdod pa na snang 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]ba mi gsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mthon por gdod par mi bya bar sum gnyis dor bar bya zhing sum gnyis dor nas sum char gdod par bya'o/_/de dag gong du sum gnyis bor te 'og gi sum char dod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[133b.2\]]'og tu sum gnyis bor te gong du sum cha bor bar gdod par bya'o/_/dge slong dag phyi yangs shing nang rub par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skar khung rgya mtsho'i rnam pa lta bur gdod par bya ste/_phyi rub la nang yangs par bya'o/_/khwa dang /_mchil 
[\[133b.3\]]pa dang /_phug ron dag 'jug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skar khung dra ba can du bya'o/_/sbrang bu tre ma bu ka dang /_tre la ta dag 'jug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgo glegs gzhug par bya'o/_/rlung gis 'byed nas bcom ldan 
[\[133b.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phred gtan gzhug par bya'o/_/gcad dka' nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnam gzer dang 'khor gtan gzhug par bya'o/_/dbye dka' nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dbyug gu skam ka byas te phred 
[\[133b.5\]]gtan dang /_gnam gzer dang /_'khor gtan dag gis ni gcad par bya'o/_/dbyug gu skam kas ni dbye bar bya'o/_/der stan dgos par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sa'i stegs bu dag bya'o/_/mkhrang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 
[\[133b.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khri'u bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khri'u bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_de dag gis khri'u ci 'dra ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kho ra khor yug tu khru bzhis 'khor ba'i khri'u bya zhing de thags mas bla bar 
[\[133b.7\]]bya'o/_/de dag gis thags ma du yod mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thags ma ni lnga ste/_mun dza'i dang /_sha na'i dang /_gres ma'i dang /_ras ma'i dang /_sba phra mo'i'o/_/de dag mkhrang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]stan nang tshangs can gding bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis stan nang tshangs can dag gding bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_de dag gis stan nang tshangs can ci 'dra ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_srid du khru bzhi pa zheng 
[\[134a.2\]]du khru do yod pa nyis ltab tu byas te drub par bya'o/_/de'i nang du shing bal gyis dgang bar bya'o/_/de dag gis shing bal du yod mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shing bal dag ni lnga ste/_arga'i shing bal dang /_ka shi ka'i shing bal dang /_er 
[\[134a.3\]]ka'i shing bal dang /_spra ba'i shing bal dang /_shal ma li'i shing bal dag yin no/_/gzhan yang lnga ste/_bal dang /_sha na'i shing bal dang /_ras bal dang /_ras ma dang /_lo ma'i tshogs dag gis bkang ba dag yin no/_/shing bal thams cad phyogs 
[\[134a.4\]]gcig tu 'chugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mdo mdor skud pas bya rog rkang gi gzungs gdab par bya'o/_/'khod pa na yur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gdos bu gdags par bya'o/_/ji ltar gdags mi shes nas bcom ldan 
[\[134a.5\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skud pa btags te rna ba la gdags par bya'o/_/'on kyang yur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dbyug gu gzugs par bya'o/_/dge slong dag dbyug gu smyig gu'i bcad 'phro lta bus 'dzugs pa na rma byung nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[134a.6\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_bre'i bcad 'phro lta bur bya'o/_/'on kyang snad nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ras ma dag gis dkris nas dal bus khad kyis khad kyis gzugs par bya'o/_/'on kyang yur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_pho long 
[\[134a.7\]]'phang bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis mun khung du 'phangs pa na de 'khyams nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thag gus btags te 'phang bar bya zhing de nas yang phyir drang bar bya'o/_/'on kyang yur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mdun du 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]mar me gzhag par bya'o/_/'on kyang yur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rkang pa gcig brkyang bar bya'o/_/'on kyang yur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rkang pa ya gcig kyang brkyang bar bya'o/_/'on kyang yur nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[134b.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_langs te bcag par bya'o/_/dge slong dag 'chag pa na 'thom nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phred dag la 'ju bar bya'o/_/lag pas chang rgyud byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sbu bu bskon la skud pas 
[\[134b.3\]]btags pa la 'jus te bcag par bya'o/_/mchil lham dang bcas pas 'chag par byed pa na sgra byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mchil lham can gyis bcag par mi bya'o/_/rdul gyis rkang pa gnyis ma rung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[134b.4\]]pa/_par thang gding bar bya'o/_/snums par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dgongs spong ba pa'i kun du spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong spong ba pas zhag gsum zhing gsum zhing rkang pa gnyis bsku bar bya'o/_/dge slong 
[\[134b.5\]]spong ba pas kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/de dag der mi shong nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_steng du rim khang gnyis pa bya'o/_/'dzeg dka' nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[134b.6\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_them skas bya'o/_/lhung bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kha khyer gyis bskor bar bya'o/_/de 'khrul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lcags kyi gzer bu dag gis gdab par bya'o/_/'on kyang mi shong 
[\[134b.7\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyi rol du spong khang chen po bya'o/_/de dag sgo sprod dag tu byed pa na de dag phan tshun dag tu snang nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgo snol mar gdod par bya'o/_/sgo khang bya'o/_/phug kyang bya'o/_/de dag de na yur 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgo drung du snam bu'am ras dpyangs te nyal bar bya zhing 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/de dag de nas song zhing yang phyis 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa bsko 
[\[135a.2\]]bar bya'o/_/dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la/_bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /_spong ba 
[\[135a.3\]]la tron byas pa dang ma byas pa mi shes pa ste/_dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la/_bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya'o/_/dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/_bskos 
[\[135a.4\]]pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_spong ba la tron byas pa dang ma byas pa shes pa ste/_dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa chos lnga po de dag dang 
[\[135a.5\]]ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la/_bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/'di ltar bsko bar bya ste/_je dang por spro bar bya ste/_ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta byed par spro'am zhes dri bar bya'o/_/gal te spro na des spro zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 
[\[135a.6\]]'og tu des gnas mal bshams pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol pa byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du 
[\[135a.7\]]gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bsko ste/_
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par spro ste/_de'i slad du dge slong 
[\[135b.2\]]ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bsko zhing dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bsko zhing /_dge slong ming 'di 
[\[135b.3\]]zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bskos 
[\[135b.4\]]shing /_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid de/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge slong dag ngas dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa'i kun du spyod pa'i chos rnams bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pas 
[\[135b.5\]]spong khang du chag chag gdab par bya'o/_/phyag dar bya'o/_/lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bsku bar bya'o/_/stan bsham par bya'o/_/bshang ba'i sa dang gci ba'i sa byi dor bya'o/_/chag chag gdab par bya'o/_/phyag dar bya'o/_/lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bsku bar bya'o/_/lo ma'i 
[\[135b.6\]]chang bu gzhag par bya'o/_/bong rdog dang /_sa dang /_chu gzhag par bya'o/_/de dag re re'i gan du song ste 'bod par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_re re nas bod par mi bya bar gaN+DI brdung bar bya'o/_/des gaN+DI rgya cher brdungs pa dang ji tsam na spyod yul gyi grong mi rnams chom rkun pa ma 
[\[135b.7\]]'ongs sam zhes sngangs nas/_de rnams go bgos te lhags nas 'phags pa dag ci chom rkun pa dag mchis sam/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag chom rkun pa dag ma lhags te/_'di ltar spong ba la tron byed do/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa dag rnam par 'tshe ba la 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]tron mdzad kyi/_'di na spong ba ga la mchis zhes zer ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gaN+DI rgya cher brdung bar mi bya ste/_'di ltar gaN+DI de ni lnga ste/_dge 'dun bsdu ba'i gaN+DI dang /_
[\[136a.2\]]las kyi gaN+DI dang /_shi ba'i gaN+DI dang /_spong ba'i gaN+DI dang /_gnod pa byung ba'i gaN+DI 'o/_/de la dge 'dun bsdu ba'i gaN+DI de ni rgyud gsum dang tog gsum mo/_/las kyi gaN+DI de ni rgyud gcig dang tog gsum mo/_/shi ba'i gaN+DI de ni byi bo'o/_/spong ba'i gaN+DI de ni khar 
[\[136a.3\]]sil lo/_/gnod pa byung ba'i gaN+DI de ni ji tsam gyis chog pa'o/_/de dag dus rting la thug pa na ci bder byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rting la thug na ci bder mi bya bar dus shes par byas nas ci bder byas te/_dge 'dun las 'tshal ma thob pa gang dag yin 
[\[136a.4\]]pa de dag kyang khrus byas nas dge 'dun gyi nang du 'du khom pa dang /_bsod snyoms pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang rkang lag gnyis bkrus nas grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug khom par bya'o/_/de dag de kho na bzhin du ci bder byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de 
[\[136a.5\]]kho na bzhin du ci bder mi bya bar rgyud chags gsum pa gdon par bya'o/_/de dag ha cang mang du 'don par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ha cang mang du gdon par mi bya'o/_/de dag ha cang nyung ngur 'don par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ha 
[\[136a.6\]]cang nyung ngur gdon par mi bya ste/_'di ltar ran par gdon par bya'o/_/de dag yon bshad par mi byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yon bshad par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_de dag gis sus yon bshad 
[\[136a.7\]]par bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis yon bshad par bya'o/_/de dag yon bshad pa ha cang mang du byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yon bshad pa ha cang mang du mi bya'o/_/de dag yon bshad pa ha cang 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]nyung ngur byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yon bshad pa ha cang nyung ngur mi bya ste/_'di ltar yon bshad par ran par bya'o/_/dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa thams cad kyi mjug tu 'du zhing thams cad kyi mdun du dgyes par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[136b.2\]]stsal pa/_dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa thams cad kyi mjug tu dgyes par bya zhing thams cad kyi mdun du 'du bar bya'o/_/gal te rkyen de lta bu byung na des phyogs dben par lde mig sbas te/_tshe dang ldan pa kho bos phyogs ga ge mo zhig tu lde mig sbas kyis phye la zhugs shig 
[\[136b.3\]]ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pas kun du spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te mi 'jug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/de ni 'dug pa zhes bya'o/_/bya ba gang zhe na/_dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_
[\[136b.4\]]gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa de 'di ni bya ba zhes bya'o/_/gso sbyong gang zhe na/_dge slong dag ngas so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa ston pa gang yin pa ste/_de khyed kyis deng phyin chad zla ba phyed phyed cing gdon par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing so 
[\[136b.5\]]sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_de dag gis sus gdon par bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[136b.6\]]'das kyis dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong dag de'i gnas khang du 'du bar byed pa na de dag der mi shong ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa 
[\[136b.7\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas khang du gdon par mi bya'o/_/de dag khyams su gdon par byed pa na der yang mi shong nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong gi gnas la blo mthun par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]kyis dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong gi gnas la blo mthun par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_de dag gis gang la blo mthun par bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas thams cad grub pa'am/_byas pa'am/_zin pa nang mtshams dang 
[\[137a.2\]]phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa dge 'dun gso sbyong gi gnas su 'dod pa gang yin pa de la blo mthun par bya'o/_/'di ltar blo mthun par bya ste/_gnas mal bshams pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_
[\[137a.3\]]dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la/_dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gnas thams cad grub pa'am/_bgyis pa'am/_lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang 
[\[137a.4\]]dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong gi gnas su bzhed na/_gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad grub pa'am/_bgyis pa'am/_lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 
[\[137a.5\]]'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la/_dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyi'o/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gnas thams cad grub pa'am/_bgyis pa'am/_lags pa nang 
[\[137a.6\]]mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su bzhed de/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad grub pa'am/_bgyis pa'am/_lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la dge 'dun 
[\[137a.7\]]gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyi na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag gnas thams cad grub pa'am/_bgyis pa'am/_lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyi bar bzod pa 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyi gnas thams cad grub pa'am/_bgyis pa'am/_lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di la dge 
[\[137b.2\]]'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par bgyis lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/gang du dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su blo mthun par byas pa der dge slong rnams kyis 'dug la gso sbyong dang /_dgag dbye dang /_gsol ba dang /_
[\[137b.3\]]gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o/_/mi mthun par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bcu gnyis pa/_sdom la/_ka pi na dang chos gos dang /_/dgrol dang mtshams chung mtshams chen dang /_/
[\[137b.4\]]gnang dang bskyung bskyed dgrol ba dang /_/gcad dang mi 'bral ma gcad dang /_/grong dgon las dang dgon pa yi/_/sde tshan yang dag bsdus pa yin/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe 
[\[137b.5\]]na tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na rgyal po'i khab na sde can ma'i phug na gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas dge 'dun dang mthun par 'jug go/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe gso sbyong gi gnas su 'dug cing mthun par gyur nas/_
[\[137b.6\]]shas cher tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na la sdod cing 'khod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na 'di snyam du sems te/_deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa yin la bdag dge slong ka pi na'i gso sbyong yang [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa yin na/_ci dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su 
[\[137b.7\]]'gro bar bya'am/_'on te dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su 'gro bar mi bya/_ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong bar bya'am/_'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong bar mi bya/_ci dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]bar bya'am/_'on te dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang /_dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar mi bya/_ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su myong bar bya'am/_'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi 
[\[138a.2\]]bya ba dag dang /_dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su myong bar mi bya/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /_rtag tu dag pa snying po ste/_/rtag tu dag pa gso sbyong yin/_/gtsang ma'i las ni dag gyur pa/_/de yi brtul zhugs 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bka' stsal 
[\[138a.3\]]pas bdag ni dag cing mchog tu dag pa dang ldan no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs su chud nas 'od ma'i tshal nas mi snang bar mdzad de sde can ma'i phug tu tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na'i mdun 
[\[138a.4\]]du bzhugs te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ka pi na khyod gcig pu dben par song ste nang du yang dag 'jog pa na 'di snyam du deng dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa yin la bdag dge slong ka pi na'i gso sbyong yang [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa yin na/_ci dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas 
[\[138a.5\]]su 'gro bar bya'am/_'on te dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su 'gro bar mi bya/_ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong bar bya'am/_'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong bar mi bya/_ci dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang /_dge 'dun 
[\[138a.6\]]gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar bya'am/_'on te dge 'dun gyi bya ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu 'gro bar mi bya/_ci dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang /_dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su myong bar bya'am/_'on te dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi 
[\[138a.7\]]bya ba dag dang /_dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su myong bar mi bya/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /_rtag tu dag pa snying po ste/_/rtag tu dag pa gso sbyong yin/_/gtsang ma'i las ni dag gyur pa/_/de yi brtul zhugs 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bka' stsal pas bdag 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]ni dag cing mchog tu dag pa dang ldan no snyam du sems la sems kyi yongs su rtog pa ma byung ngam/_btsun pa byung ngo /_/ka pi na khyod re zhig dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su mi 'gro na gzhan su zhig 'gro bar 'gyur/_khyod dge 'dun dang lhan cig gso sbyong nyams su myong 
[\[138b.2\]]bar mi byed na/_gzhan su zhig nyams su myong bar byed/_khyod dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang /_dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu mi 'gro na gzhan su zhig 'gro bar 'gyur/_khyod dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang /_dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su myong bar mi byed/_
[\[138b.3\]]na gzhan su zhig nyams su myong bar byed/_ka pi na de lta bas na khyod dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong gi gnas su mi 'gro bar ma byed par song shig_/ka pi na khyod dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong nyams su mi myong bar ma byed par nyams su myong bar byos shig_/ka pi na khyod dge 'dun gyi bya ba 
[\[138b.4\]]dag dang /_dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag tu mi 'gro bar ma byed par song shig_/ka pi na khyod dge 'dun dang lhan cig dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag dang /_dge 'dun gyi byed pa dag nyams su mi myong bar ma byed par nyams su myong bar gyis shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe 
[\[138b.5\]]dang ldan pa bram ze ka pi na khrid nas gso sbyong gi gnas ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas 
[\[138b.6\]]na dge slong dag gis gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po gcad pa rjes su gnang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po gcad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar gcad 
[\[138b.7\]]par bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_je dang por dge slong gnas pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/_rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ka ba'i 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]mtshan ma'am/_shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/_bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/_lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/_khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o/_/lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs 
[\[139a.2\]]su yang pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/_rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/_shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/_bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/_lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/_khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o/_/
[\[139a.3\]]de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gnas pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs 
[\[139a.4\]]bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/_rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/_shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/_bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/_lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/_khron pa la sogs 
[\[139a.5\]]pa'i mtshan ma brtan por brjod par bya'o/_/lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs su yang pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/_rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/_shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/_bya skyibs kyi mtshan 
[\[139a.6\]]ma'am/_lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/_khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan por brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste/_gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang /_gnyug 
[\[139a.7\]]mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/_rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/_shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_nub phyogs su ni 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/_bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/_byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/_khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun 
[\[139b.2\]]gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du dge 'dun gyis grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /_gnas 
[\[139b.3\]]mal la thug gi bar du mtshams chen po gcod do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste/_gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs 
[\[139b.4\]]bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/_rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/_shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/_bya skyibs kyi mtshan 
[\[139b.5\]]ma brtan po lags/_byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/_khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge 
[\[139b.6\]]slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /_gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po gcod na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas 
[\[139b.7\]]kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /_gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po gcad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par 
[\[140a.2\]]gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /_gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po bcad pa der dge 
[\[140a.3\]]slong rnams kyis 'dug ste/_gso sbyong bya zhing dgag dbye dang /_gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o/_/mi mthun par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rnams chos gos gsum thogs te nyin mo spyod du 'dong ba na skyo 
[\[140a.4\]]bar gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyis chos gos dag dang mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o/_/'di ltar sbyin par bya ste/_gnas mal 
[\[140a.5\]]bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol pa byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste/_
[\[140a.6\]]gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad pa las/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba 
[\[140a.7\]]la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyis chos gos dag dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste/_gnas 'dir 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad de/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos 
[\[140b.2\]]gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams la bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur 
[\[140b.3\]]ba'i gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal 
[\[140b.4\]]lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong rnams kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin pa der dge slong rnams stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas pas 
[\[140b.5\]]'dong bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/dge slong dag la bzhi'i tshogs kyis las bya ba dag byung zhing lnga'i tshogs kyis las bya ba dag dang /_bcu'i tshogs kyis las bya ba dag byung nas/_de dag dge 'dun thams cad sdud par byed pa na/_dge slong rnams kyi dge 
[\[140b.6\]]ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams par gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mtshams bu chung gcad cing dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par bya'o/_/'di ltar gcad par bya ste/_je dang 
[\[140b.7\]]por mtshams chen po dgrol bar bya'o/_/'di ltar dgrol bar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham par byas nas/_gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]gis gsol ba byas te/_las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste/_gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad pa gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod 
[\[141a.2\]]na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol bar mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso 
[\[141a.3\]]sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad de/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol bar mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshams chen po gzhig cing dgrol bar mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang 
[\[141a.4\]]dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po bshig cing bkrol lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 
[\[141a.5\]]'dzin to/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/_srad bu bres pa'am/_rdo bzhag pa'am/_srol btod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 
[\[141a.6\]]brtan po gzugs par bya'o/_/lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs su yang seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/_srad bu bres pa'am/_rdo bzhag pa'am/_srol btod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham 
[\[141a.7\]]pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la/_dge slong gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/_srad bu bres pa'am/_rdo bzhag pa'am/_srol btod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o/_/lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs su yang seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/_srad bu bres pa'am/_
[\[141b.2\]]rdo bzhag pa'am/_srol btod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang /_gnyug mar 
[\[141b.3\]]gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa lags/_lho phyogs su ni srad bu bres pa lags/_nub phyogs su ni rdo bzhag pa lags/_byang phyogs su ni srol btod pa brtan po 
[\[141b.4\]]lags na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams bu chung 
[\[141b.5\]]gcod cing dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i 
[\[141b.6\]]mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa lags/_lho phyogs su ni srad bu bres pa lags/_nub phyogs su ni rdo bzhag pa lags/_byang phyogs su ni srol btod pa brtan po lags te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di 
[\[141b.7\]]rnams kyi nang du 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod 
[\[142a.2\]]cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 'di ltar gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams la bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams bu chung bcad cing dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par mdzad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin 
[\[142a.3\]]du 'dzin to/_/de'i 'og tu mtshams chen po gcad par bya'o/_/'di ltar gcad par bya ste/_je dang por dge slong gnas pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/_rtsig 
[\[142a.4\]]pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/_shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/_bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/_lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/_khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o/_/lho phyogs dang /_nub 
[\[142a.5\]]phyogs dang /_byang phyogs su yang pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/_rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/_shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/_bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/_lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/_khron pa la sogs 
[\[142a.6\]]pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gnas pa dang /_gnyug mar 
[\[142a.7\]]gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/_rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/_shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/_bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/_lam 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]po che'i mtshan ma'am/_khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o/_/lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs su yang pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/_rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/_shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/_
[\[142b.2\]]ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/_bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/_lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/_khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_
[\[142b.3\]]'di lta ste/_gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/_rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan 
[\[142b.4\]]ma'am/_shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/_bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/_byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/_khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags na/_gal te dge 
[\[142b.5\]]'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyi mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong 
[\[142b.6\]]dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /_gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po gcod do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas 
[\[142b.7\]]pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/_rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/_shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/_bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/_byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/_khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du 
[\[143a.2\]]gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /_gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po gcod na/_tshe 
[\[143a.3\]]dang ldan pa gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /_gnas mal 
[\[143a.4\]]la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po gcad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_
[\[143a.5\]]gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /_gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin 
[\[143a.6\]]du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun gyis gang du mtshams chen po bcad pa der dge slong rnams kyis 'dug ste gso sbyong bya zhing dgag dbye dang /_gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o/_/mi mthun par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur 
[\[143a.7\]]ro/_/de'i 'og tu mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyis chos gos dag dang mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya'o/_/'di ltar sbyin par bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad pa 
[\[143b.2\]]las/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos 
[\[143b.3\]]gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po 
[\[143b.4\]]bcad de/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsol na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag 'di 
[\[143b.5\]]lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa 
[\[143b.6\]]de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong thams cad kyi chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba stsal lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge 'dun gyis 
[\[143b.7\]]gang du mtshams chen po'i nang du dge slong rnams kyis chos gos dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnang ba byin pa der dge slong rnams kyi stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pas 'dong bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa las bgyid pa gcig gis gsol ba gcig dang las brjod pa gcig gis mtshams kyi sgo nang dang /_slad rol dang bcas pa bskyung ba dang bskyed par rung ngam/_nye ba 'khor rung ste/_de la bskyung ba ni 
[\[144a.2\]]'di yin te chung ngu'o/_/de la bskyed pa ni 'di yin te chen po'o/_/'di ltar bya ste/_je dang por mtshams chen po dgrol bar bya zhing mtshams bu chung yang dgrol bar bya ste/_dkyil 'khor ba gzhig par bya'o/_/'di ltar dgrol bar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham 
[\[144a.3\]]pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na mtshams gnyi gar dge 'dun bkod de/_dge slong las byed pas mtshams gnyi gar shing ngam/_dbyug pa'am/_
[\[144a.4\]]seg gam/_re ldes mnan nas gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad cing mtshams bu chung bcad de dkyil 'khor 
[\[144a.5\]]bar blo mthun par bgyis pa las/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing mtshams bu chung yang gzhig ste/_dkyil 'khor ba dgrol bar mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol 
[\[144a.6\]]ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas mtshams chen po bcad cing mtshams bu chung yang bcad de/_dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par bgyis pa 
[\[144a.7\]]de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing mtshams bu chung yang gzhig ste/_dkyil 'khor ba dgrol bar mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag mtshams chen po gzhig cing mtshams bu chung yang gzhig ste/_dkyil 'khor ba dgrol bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshams chen po gzhig cing mtshams bu chung yang bshig nas dkyil 
[\[144b.2\]]'khor ba bkrol lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gnas pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni pha bong gis mtshan ma'am/_rtsig pa'i 
[\[144b.3\]]mtshan ma'am/_ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/_shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/_bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/_lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/_khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o/_/lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs 
[\[144b.4\]]dang /_byang phyogs su yang pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/_rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/_shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/_bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/_lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/_khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan 
[\[144b.5\]]ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o/_/mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/_srad bu bres pa'am/_rdo bzhag pa'am/_srol btod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o/_/
[\[144b.6\]]lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs su yang seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/_srad bu bres pa'am/_rdo bzhag pa'am/_srol btod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po gzugs par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs 
[\[144b.7\]]te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa la dge slong gnas pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/_
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/_shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/_bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/_lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/_khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o/_/lho phyogs dang /_
[\[145a.2\]]nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs su yang pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/_rtsig pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/_shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma'am/_ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/_bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma'am/_lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/_khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan 
[\[145a.3\]]ma brtan po brjod par bya'o/_/mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/_srad bu bres pa'am/_rdo bzhag pa'am/_srol btod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o/_/lho phyogs dang /_
[\[145a.4\]]nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs su yang seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa'am/_srad bu bres pa'am/_rdo bzhag pa'am/_srol btod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu mtshams gnyi gar dge 'dun bkod de dge slong las byed pas mtshams 
[\[145a.5\]]gnyi gar shing ngam/_dbyug pa'am/_seg gam/_re ldes mnan nas gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i 
[\[145a.6\]]mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/_rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/_shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/_bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma 
[\[145a.7\]]brtan po lags/_byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/_khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa lags/_lho phyogs su ni srad bu bres pa 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]lags/_nub phyogs su ni rdo bzhag pa lags/_byang phyogs su ni srol btod pa brtan po lags na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i 
[\[145b.2\]]gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /_gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad cing mtshams bu 
[\[145b.3\]]chung yang bcad de/_dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par mdzad de/_'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_'di lta ste gnas 'di na dge slong gnas pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis mtshams 
[\[145b.4\]]chen po'i phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni pha bong gi mtshan ma'am/_rtsig pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_lho phyogs su ni ka ba'i mtshan ma'am/_shing ljon pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_nub phyogs su ni ra ba'i mtshan ma'am/_
[\[145b.5\]]bya skyibs kyi mtshan ma brtan po lags/_byang phyogs su ni lam po che'i mtshan ma'am/_khron pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brtan po lags/_mtshams bu chung gi phyogs bzhi'i mtshan ma brtan po brjod pa shar phyogs su ni seng ldeng gi phur pa btab pa lags/_lho phyogs 
[\[145b.6\]]su ni srad bu bres pa lags/_nub phyogs su ni rdo bzhag pa lags/_byang phyogs su ni srol btod pa brtan po lags te/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong 
[\[145b.7\]]rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /_gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad cing mtshams bu chung yang bcad de dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par mdzad na tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]gang dag mtshan ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /_gnas 
[\[146a.2\]]mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams chen po bcad cing mtshams bu chung yang bcad de/_dkyil 'khor bar blo mthun par mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis mtshan 
[\[146a.3\]]ma 'di rnams kyi nang du gso sbyong gcig pa'i gnas kyi sdom pas 'di lta ste/_gnas bsdu ba dang /_dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du grong dang grong gi nye 'khor ma gtogs par dgon pa la thug pa dang /_gnas mal la thug pa'i bar du mtshams
