[\[191b.6\]]kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso 
[\[191b.7\]]sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun 
[\[192a.2\]]gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de ma langs shing dge slong dag ma dong bar de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 
[\[192a.3\]]gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa 
[\[192a.4\]]dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor 
[\[192a.5\]]de langs shing dge slong kha cig ni dong /_kha cig ni ma dong bar de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag 
[\[192a.6\]]la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 
[\[192a.7\]]'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de langs shing dge slong dag dong nas de'i 'og tu dge 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong 
[\[192b.2\]]gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor 
[\[192b.3\]]thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal 
[\[192b.4\]]tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 
[\[192b.5\]]'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de ma langs shing dge slong dag ma dong bar de'i 'og 
[\[192b.6\]]tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la 
[\[192b.7\]]dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de langs shing dge slong kha cig ni dong /_kha cig ni ma dong bar de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa 
[\[193a.2\]]ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas 
[\[193a.3\]]pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo 
[\[193a.4\]]gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de langs shing dge slong dag dong nas de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing 
[\[193a.5\]]so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du 
[\[193a.6\]]dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_
[\[193a.7\]]gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing 
[\[193b.2\]]so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de ma langs shing dge slong dag ma dong bar de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_
[\[193b.3\]]de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing 
[\[193b.4\]]mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 
[\[193b.5\]]'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de langs shing dge slong kha cig ni dong /_kha cig ni ma dong bar de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas 
[\[193b.6\]]te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 
[\[193b.7\]]'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de langs shing dge slong dag dong nas de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon 
[\[194a.2\]]pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa 
[\[194a.3\]]dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de 
[\[194a.4\]]dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing 
[\[194a.5\]]mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun 
[\[194a.6\]]gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de ma langs shing dge slong dag ma dong bar de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 
[\[194a.7\]]gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de 
[\[194b.2\]]langs shing dge slong kha cig ni dong /_kha cig ni ma dong bar de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 
[\[194b.3\]]'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos 
[\[194b.4\]]kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de langs shing dge slong dag dong nas de'i 
[\[194b.5\]]'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid 
[\[194b.6\]]la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong 
[\[194b.7\]]byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_
[\[195a.2\]]chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de ma langs shing dge slong dag ma dong bar de'i 
[\[195a.3\]]'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de 
[\[195a.4\]]nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed 
[\[195a.5\]]cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de langs shing dge slong kha cig ni dong /_kha cig ni ma dong bar de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags 
[\[195a.6\]]na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug 
[\[195a.7\]]cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de langs shing dge slong dag dong nas de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 
[\[195b.2\]]gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag 
[\[195b.3\]]yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag 
[\[195b.4\]]lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa 
[\[195b.5\]]dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed 
[\[195b.6\]]na/_dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de ma langs shing dge slong dag ma dong bar de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso 
[\[195b.7\]]sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton 
[\[196a.2\]]cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de langs shing dge slong kha cig ni dong /_kha cig ni ma dong bar de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i 
[\[196a.3\]]mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags 
[\[196a.4\]]pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de 
[\[196a.5\]]langs shing dge slong dag dong nas de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 
[\[196a.6\]]'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems 
[\[196a.7\]]shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am 
[\[196b.2\]]lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 
[\[196b.3\]]'don par byed na/_dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de ma langs shing dge slong dag ma dong bar de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te 
[\[196b.4\]]gso sbyong bya zhing /_so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun 
[\[196b.5\]]par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun gyis 
[\[196b.6\]]so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de langs shing dge slong kha cig ni dong /_kha cig ni ma dong bar de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya 
[\[196b.7\]]zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 
[\[197a.2\]]'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de langs shing dge slong dag dong nas de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor 
[\[197a.3\]]thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de 
[\[197a.4\]]dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug 
[\[197a.5\]]mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo 
[\[197a.6\]]bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas 
[\[197a.7\]]te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de ma langs shing dge slong dag ma dong bar de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa 
[\[197b.2\]]bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i 
[\[197b.3\]]mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de langs shing dge slong kha cig ni dong /_kha cig ni ma dong bar de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba 
[\[197b.4\]]byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing 
[\[197b.5\]]mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun 
[\[197b.6\]]gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de langs shing dge slong dag dong nas de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya 
[\[197b.7\]]ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag 
[\[198a.2\]]lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar 
[\[198a.3\]]gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i 
[\[198a.4\]]mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de ma langs shing dge slong dag ma dong bar de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong 
[\[198a.5\]]bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur 
[\[198a.6\]]pa na/_de dag 'di snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun gyis so 
[\[198a.7\]]sor thar pa bton cing gso sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de langs shing dge slong kha cig ni dong /_kha cig ni ma dong bar de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 'di 
[\[198b.2\]]snyam du dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod do snyam du mi sems shing /_chos kyi 'du shes can mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 'dun gyis so sor thar pa bton cing gso 
[\[198b.3\]]sbyong byas pa yin no/_/'khor de langs shing dge slong dag dong nas de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing /_so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la 
[\[198b.4\]]yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro//_//bar sdom la/_gsol ba dang ni ma dong dang /_/kha cig dong dang thams cad dong /_/dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag gi ni tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga yin la/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches nyung ba dag gi ni tshes bcu 
[\[198b.5\]]bzhi'am tshes gcig yin na/_glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gis gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag gi rjes su 'jug par bya'o/_/dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag gi ni tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga yin la/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa mnyam pa dag gi ni tshes bcu bzhi'am 
[\[198b.6\]]tshes gcig yin na/_glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gis ni gnyug mar gnas pa mnyam pa dag gi rjes su 'jug par bya'o/_/dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches nyung ba dag gi ni tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga yin la/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag gi ni tshes bcu bzhi'am 
[\[198b.7\]]tshes gcig yin na/_gnyug mar gnas pa dag gis glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag gi rjes su 'jug par bya'o/_/dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gi ni tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga yin la/_dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches nyung ba dag gi tshes bcu bzhi'am tshes gcig 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]yin na/_gnyug mar gnas pa dag gis glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag gi rjes su 'jug par bya'o/_/dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gi ni tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga yin la/_dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa mnyam pa dag gi ni tshes bcu bzhi'am tshes gcig 
[\[199a.2\]]yin na/_glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gis gnyug mar gnas pa mnyam pa dag gi rjes su 'jug par bya'o/_/dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gi ni tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga yin la/_dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag gi ni tshes bcu bzhi'am tshes gcig yin na/_glo bur 
[\[199a.3\]]du 'ongs pa dag gis gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag gi rjes su 'jug par bya'o/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_
[\[199a.4\]]glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gzhan gyi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_'bru mar snod dang /_zhwa dang /_lham sgro gu can dang /_mchil lham dag 
[\[199a.5\]]mthong na/_de dag 'di snyam du sems shing /_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med kyang rung /_de nyid du 'dug kyang rung /_so sor 'dug kyang rung /_thag ring por gyur kyang rung snyam nas dbyen gyis don du gnyer 
[\[199a.6\]]ba dbyen gyi yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches nyung ba dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo 
[\[199a.7\]]gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni dbyen gyi nyer bsdogs las nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gzhan gyi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_'bru mar snod dang /_zhwa dang /_lham sgro gu can 
[\[199b.2\]]dang /_mchil lham dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing /_so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du rung ngam 
[\[199b.3\]]'on te de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing /_so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung snyam nas/_yid gnyis kyis don du gnyer ba yid gnyis kyi yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo 
[\[199b.4\]]gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches nyung ba dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni yid gnyis kyi nyer bsdogs las 
[\[199b.5\]]'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur 
[\[199b.6\]]du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gzhan gyi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_'bru mar snod dang /_zhwa dang /_lham sgro gu can dang /_mchil lham dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[199b.7\]]dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing /_so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung snyam nas/_chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes can mi mthun pa'i 'du 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches nyung ba dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar 
[\[200a.2\]]pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni mi mthun pa'i nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 
[\[200a.3\]]gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gzhan gyi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_'bru mar snod dang /_zhwa dang /_
[\[200a.4\]]lham sgro gu can dang /_mchil lham dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon 
[\[200a.5\]]pa gdon du rung ngo snyam nas rtog pas don du gnyer ba rtog pa'i yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing /_so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches nyung ba dag lhags na/_
[\[200a.6\]]de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni rtog pa'i nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am 
[\[200a.7\]]lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gzhan gyi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]blugs dang /_'bru mar snod dang /_zhwa dang /_lham sgro gu can dang /_mchil lham dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong 
[\[200b.2\]]bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas btsal te ma rnyed nas de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur 
[\[200b.3\]]du 'ongs pa ches nyung ba dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug 
[\[200b.4\]]mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gzhan gyi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba 
[\[200b.5\]]dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_'bru mar snod dang /_zhwa dang /_lham sgro gu can dang /_mchil lham dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med 
[\[200b.6\]]par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas btsal te rnyed na/_de dag gis de dag dang lhan cig 'khod de gsol ba byas nas gso sbyong byed cing so 
[\[200b.7\]]sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gzhan gyi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_'bru mar snod dang /_
[\[201a.2\]]zhwa dang /_lham sgro gu can dang /_mchil lham dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med kyang rung /_de nyid du 'dug kyang rung /_so sor 'dug kyang rung /_thag ring 
[\[201a.3\]]por gyur kyang rung snyam nas dbyen gyis don du gnyer ba dbyen gyi yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa mnyam pa dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol 
[\[201a.4\]]ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni dbyen gyi nyer bsdogs las nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing 
[\[201a.5\]]mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gzhan gyi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_
[\[201a.6\]]'bru mar snod dang /_zhwa dang /_lham sgro gu can dang /_mchil lham dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar 
[\[201a.7\]]pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du rung ngam/_'on te de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung snyam nas/_yid gnyis kyis don du gnyer ba yid gnyis kyi yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa mnyam pa dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag 
[\[201b.2\]]la ni yid gnyis kyis nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 
[\[201b.3\]]'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gzhan gyi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_'bru mar snod dang /_zhwa dang /_lham sgro gu can dang /_mchil lham dag mthong na de 
[\[201b.4\]]dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes can/_
[\[201b.5\]]mi mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa mnyam pa dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i 
[\[201b.6\]]mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni mi mthun pa'i nyer bsdogs las nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de 
[\[201b.7\]]dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gzhan gyi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_'bru mar snod dang /_
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]zhwa dang /_lham sgro gu can dang /_mchil lham dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems shing /_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so 
[\[202a.2\]]sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_rtog pas don du gnyer ba rtog pa'i yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa mnyam pa dag lhags 
[\[202a.3\]]na/_de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni rtog pa'i nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas 
[\[202a.4\]]pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gzhan gyi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_gtur 
[\[202a.5\]]bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_'bru mar snod dang /_zhwa dang /_lham sgro gu can dang /_mchil lham dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis 
[\[202a.6\]]gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas btsal te ma rnyed nas/_de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_
[\[202a.7\]]de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa mnyam pa dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gzhan gyi lhung bzed dang /_
[\[202b.2\]]chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_'bru mar snod dang /_zhwa dang /_lham sgro gu can dang /_mchil lham dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag 
[\[202b.3\]]ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas btsal te rnyed nas/_de dag gis de dag dang lhan cig 'khod de gsol ba byas nas gso 
[\[202b.4\]]sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 
[\[202b.5\]]gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gzhan gyi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_'bru mar snod dang /_zhwa 
[\[202b.6\]]dang /_lham sgro gu can dang /_mchil lham dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med kyang rung /_de nyid du 'dug kyang rung /_so sor gyur kyang rung /_thag ring 
[\[202b.7\]]por gyur kyang rung snyam nas/_dbyen gyis don du gnyer ba dbyen gyi yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni dbyen gyi nyer bsdogs las nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug 
[\[203a.2\]]mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gzhan gyi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar 
[\[203a.3\]]ba dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_'bru mar snod dang /_zhwa dang /_lham sgro gu can dang /_mchil lham dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par 
[\[203a.4\]]bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du rung ngam/_'on te de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung snyam nas/_yid gnyis kyis don 
[\[203a.5\]]du gnyer ba yid gnyis kyi yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya 
[\[203a.6\]]zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni yid gnyis kyi nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun 
[\[203a.7\]]par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gzhan gyi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]'bru mar snod dang /_zhwa dang /_lham sgro gu can dang /_mchil lham dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong 
[\[203b.2\]]bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes can mi mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong 
[\[203b.3\]]glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni mi mthun pa'i nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste 
[\[203b.4\]]gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gzhan gyi lhung 
[\[203b.5\]]bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_'bru mar snod dang /_zhwa dang /_lham sgro gu can dang /_mchil lham dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong 
[\[203b.6\]]gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du rung ngo snyam nas/_rtog pas don du gnyer ba rtog pa'i yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo 
[\[203b.7\]]gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du lhags pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni rtog pa'i nyer bsdogs las 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags 
[\[204a.2\]]dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gzhan gyi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_'bru mar snod dang /_zhwa dang /_lham sgro gu can dang /_mchil lham dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[204a.3\]]dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas btsal te ma rnyed 
[\[204a.4\]]na/_de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon 
[\[204a.5\]]pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam 
[\[204a.6\]]pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gzhan gyi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_khar ba dang /_gtur bu dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_'bru mar snod dang /_zhwa dang /_lham sgro gu can dang /_
[\[204a.7\]]mchil lham dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas btsal te rnyed na/_de dag gis de dag dang lhan cig 'khod de gsol ba byas nas gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 
[\[204b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i 
[\[204b.3\]]mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa 
[\[204b.4\]]de dag med kyang rung /_de nyid du 'dug kyang rung /_so sor gyur kyang rung /_thag ring por gyur kyang rung snyam nas/_dbyen gyis don du gnyer ba dbyen gyi yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa 
[\[204b.5\]]las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches nyung ba dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni dbyen gyi nyer bsdogs las nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[204b.6\]]'di lta ste/_gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_
[\[204b.7\]]dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du rung ngam/_'on te de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung snyam nas/_yid gnyis 
[\[205a.2\]]kyis don du gnyer ba yid gnyis kyi yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches nyung ba dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong 
[\[205a.3\]]bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni yid gnyis kyi nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug 
[\[205a.4\]]cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa de dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel 
[\[205a.5\]]ba'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon 
[\[205a.6\]]du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes can mi mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches nyung ba dag 
[\[205a.7\]]lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni mi mthun pa'i nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gi khar 
[\[205b.2\]]ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor 
[\[205b.3\]]thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du rung ngo snyam nas/_rtog pas don du gnyer ba rtog pa'i yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag 
[\[205b.4\]]lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni rtog pa'i nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug 
[\[205b.5\]]mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa de dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_
[\[205b.6\]]rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar 
[\[205b.7\]]pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas btsal te ma rnyed nas/_de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]nyung ba dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug 
[\[206a.2\]]mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting 
[\[206a.3\]]sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing /_so sor thar pa'i mdo 
[\[206a.4\]]gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas btsal te rnyed na de dag gis de dag dang lhan cig 'khod de gsol ba byas nas gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 
[\[206a.5\]]'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bcu bdun pa/_'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i 
[\[206a.6\]]rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge 
[\[206a.7\]]slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med kyang rung /_de nyid du 'dug kyang rung /_so sor gyur kyang rung /_thag ring por gyur kyang rung snyam nas/_dbyen gyis don du gnyer ba dbyen gyi yo byad can de dag gis gsol 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa mnyam pa dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong 
[\[206b.2\]]snga ma dag la ni dbyen gyi nyer bsdogs las nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 
[\[206b.3\]]'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod 
[\[206b.4\]]na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du rung ngam/_'on te de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 
[\[206b.5\]]gdon du mi rung snyam nas/_yid gnyis kyis don du gnyer ba yid gnyis kyi yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa mnyam pa dag lhags na/_de dag 
[\[206b.6\]]gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni yid gnyis kyi nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa 
[\[206b.7\]]bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon 
[\[207a.2\]]pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes can mi mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa mnyam pa dag lhags 
[\[207a.3\]]na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni mi mthun pa'i nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas 
[\[207a.4\]]pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i 
[\[207a.5\]]sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du rung ngo snyam nas/_
[\[207a.6\]]rtog pas don du gnyer ba rtog pa'i yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa mnyam pa dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so 
[\[207a.7\]]sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni rtog pa'i nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na de dag 'di snyam du sems 
[\[207b.2\]]te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas btsal te ma 
[\[207b.3\]]rnyed na de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa mnyam pa dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par 
[\[207b.4\]]bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 
[\[207b.5\]]'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge 
[\[207b.6\]]slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhags pa'i bsam pas btsal te rnyed na/_de dag gis de dag dang lhan cig 'khod de gsol ba byas 
[\[207b.7\]]nas gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge slong snga ma dag la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na de dag 
[\[208a.2\]]'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med kyang rung /_de nyid du 'dug kyang rung /_so sor gyur kyang rung /_thag ring por gyur kyang rung snyam nas/_dbyen gyis don du gnyer ba dbyen gyi yo byad 
[\[208a.3\]]can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par 
[\[208a.4\]]bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni dbyen gyi nyer bsdogs las nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_
[\[208a.5\]]glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_
[\[208a.6\]]dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngam/_'on te de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing /_so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du rung 
[\[208a.7\]]snyam nas/_yid gnyis kyis don du gnyer ba yid gnyis kyi yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni yid gnyis kyi nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 
[\[208b.2\]]'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_gtang rag 
[\[208b.3\]]dag thos na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_chos ma yin pa'i 
[\[208b.4\]]'du shes can mi mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing 
[\[208b.5\]]so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni mi mthun pa'i nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa 
[\[208b.6\]]na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na de dag 
[\[208b.7\]]'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du rung ngo snyam nas/_rtog pas don du gnyer ba rtog 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]pa'i yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so 
[\[209a.2\]]sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni rtog pa'i nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_
[\[209a.3\]]de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na de dag 'di 
[\[209a.4\]]snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing /_so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhag pa'i 
[\[209a.5\]]bsam pas btsal te ma rnyed nas/_de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar 
[\[209a.6\]]pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnam pa 
[\[209a.7\]]dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rtags dang /_glo bur du 'ongs pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas btsal te rnyed na/_de dag gis de dag dang lhan cig 'khod 
[\[209b.2\]]de gsol ba byas nas gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge slong snga ma dag la 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur 
[\[209b.3\]]pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gtsug lag khang chag chag btab pa dang /_phyag dar byas pa dang /_lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byugs pa dang /_gnas 
[\[209b.4\]]mal bshams pa dang /_'bru mar gyi mar me bus pa dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med kyang rung /_de nyid du 'dug kyang rung /_so sor gyur kyang rung /_thag ring por gyur kyang rung snyam 
[\[209b.5\]]nas/_dbyen gyis don du gnyer ba dbyen gyi yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa ches nyung ba dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so 
[\[209b.6\]]sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni dbyen gyi nyer bsdogs las nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug 
[\[209b.7\]]mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gtsug lag khang chag chag btab pa dang /_phyag dar byas pa dang /_lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byugs pa dang /_gnas mal bshams pa dang /_'bru mar gyi mar me bus 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]pa dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du rung ngam/_'on te de dag med 
[\[210a.2\]]par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung snyam nas/_yid gnyis kyis don du gnyer ba yid gnyis kyi yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa 
[\[210a.3\]]las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches nyung ba dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni yid gnyis kyi nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[210a.4\]]'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_
[\[210a.5\]]gtsug lag khang chag chag btab pa dang /_phyag dar byas pa dang /_lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byugs pa dang /_gnas mal bshams pa dang /_'bru mar gyi mar me bus pa dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag 
[\[210a.6\]]yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes can mi mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te 
[\[210a.7\]]gso sbyong byed cing /_so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches nyung ba dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing /_so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni mi mthun pa'i nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug 
[\[210b.2\]]mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gtsug lag khang chag chag btab pa dang /_phyag dar byas pa dang /_lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byugs pa dang /_gnas mal bshams 
[\[210b.3\]]pa dang /_'bru mar gyi mar me bus pa dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing /_so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon 
[\[210b.4\]]pa gdon du rung ngo snyam nas/_rtog pas don du gnyer ba rtog pa'i yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing /_so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches nyung ba dag lhags 
[\[210b.5\]]na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing /_so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni rtog pa'i nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge 
[\[210b.6\]]slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gtsug lag khang chag 
[\[210b.7\]]chag btab pa dang /_phyag dar byas pa dang /_lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byugs pa dang /_gnas mal bshams pa dang /_'bru mar gyi mar me bus pa dag mthong na/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing /_so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas btsal te ma rnyed 
[\[211a.2\]]nas/_de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing /_so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches nyung ba dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing /_so 
[\[211a.3\]]sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis 
[\[211a.4\]]de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gtsug lag khang chag chag btab pa dang /_phyag dar byas pa dang /_lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byugs pa dang /_gnas 
[\[211a.5\]]mal bshams pa dang /_'bru mar gyi mar me bus pa dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing /_so 
[\[211a.6\]]sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas btsal te rnyed na/_de dag gis de dag dang lhan cig 'khod de gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 
[\[211a.7\]]slong snga ma dag la 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gtsug lag khang chag chag btab pa dang /_phyag dar byas pa dang /_lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byugs pa dang /_gnas mal bshams pa dang /_'bru mar gyi mar me bus pa dag mthong na de dag 
[\[211b.2\]]'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med kyang rung /_de nyid du 'dug kyang rung /_so sor gyur kyang rung /_thag ring por gyur kyang rung snyam nas/_dbyen gyis don du gnyer ba dbyen 
[\[211b.3\]]gyi yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa mnyam pa dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing /_so sor thar pa'i

[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa mnyam pa dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni yid gnyis kyi nyer bsdogs

[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du rung ngo snyam nas/_rtog pas don du gnyer ba rtog pa'i yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor 
[\[212b.2\]]thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa mnyam pa dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni rtog pa'i nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 
[\[212b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gtsug lag khang chag chag 
[\[212b.4\]]btab pa dang /_phyag dar byas pa dang /_lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byugs pa dang /_gnas mal bshams pa dang /_'bru mar gyi mar me bus pa dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol 
[\[212b.5\]]ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing /_so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas btsal te ma rnyed nas/_de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing /_so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed

[\[213a.3\]]cig 'khod de gsol ba byas nas gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa na/_dge slong snga ma dag la 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug

[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gtsug lag khang chag chag btab pa dang /_phyag dar 
[\[213b.2\]]byas pa dang /_lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byugs pa dang /_gnas mal bshams pa dang /_'bru mar gyi mar me bus pa dag mthong na/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag 
[\[213b.3\]]med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du rung ngam/_'on te de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung snyam nas/_yid gnyis kyis

[\[213b.5\]]bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni yid gnyis kyi nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par

[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes can mi mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas
