[\[214a.3\]]la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gtsug lag khang chag chag btab pa 
[\[214a.4\]]dang /_phyag dar byas pa dang /_lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byugs pa dang /_gnas mal bshams pa dang /_'bru mar gyi mar me bus pa dag mthong na/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med

[\[214a.7\]]lta ste gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gtsug 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]lag khang chag chag btab pa dang /_phyag dar byas pa dang /_lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byugs pa dang /_gnas mal bshams pa dang /_'bru mar gyi mar me bus pa dag mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong

[\[214b.3\]]so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni 'gal 
[\[214b.4\]]tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar 
[\[214b.5\]]gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_gtsug lag khang chag chag btab pa dang /_phyag dar byas pa dang /_lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byugs pa dang /_gnas mal bshams pa dang /_'bru mar gyi mar me bus pa dag mthong na/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[214b.6\]]dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas btsal te 
[\[214b.7\]]rnyed na/_de dag gis de dag dang lhan cig 'khod de gsol ba byas nas gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge slong snga ma dag la 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag gi 
[\[215a.2\]]khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_lde mig gi sgra dang /_lde mig kyog po'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med 
[\[215a.3\]]kyang rung /_de nyid du 'dug kyang rung /_so sor gyur kyang rung /_thag ring por gyur kyang rung snyam nas/_dbyen gyis don du gnyer ba dbyen gyi yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_
[\[215a.4\]]de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches nyung ba dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni dbyen gyi nyer bsdogs las nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[215a.5\]]'di lta ste/_gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan 
[\[215a.6\]]ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_lde mig gi sgra dang /_lde mig kyog po'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa 
[\[215a.7\]]dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du rung ngam/_'on te de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung snyam nas/_yid gnyis kyis don du gnyer ba yid gnyis kyi yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches nyung ba 
[\[215b.2\]]dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni yid gnyis kyi nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge 
[\[215b.3\]]slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag 
[\[215b.4\]]gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_lde mig gi sgra dang /_lde mig kyog po'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag 
[\[215b.5\]]med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes can mi mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don 
[\[215b.6\]]par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches nyung ba dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni mi mthun pa'i nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs 
[\[215b.7\]]can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_lde mig gi sgra dang /_lde mig kyog po'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong 
[\[216a.2\]]gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du rung ngo snyam nas/_rtog pas don du gnyer ba rtog pa'i yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas 
[\[216a.3\]]te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches nyung ba dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te/_gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga 
[\[216a.4\]]ma dag la ni rtog pa'i nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug 
[\[216a.5\]]mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_lde mig gi sgra dang /_lde mig kyog po'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na/_de dag 
[\[216a.6\]]'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhag pa'i 
[\[216a.7\]]bsam pas btsal te ma rnyed na/_de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches nyung ba dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis yang de na gnyug 
[\[216b.2\]]mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_lde mig gi sgra dang /_lde mig kyog po'i sgra dang /_
[\[216b.3\]]gtang rag dag thos na/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de dag 
[\[216b.4\]]gis de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas btsal te rnyed na/_de dag gis de dag dang lhan cig 'khod de gsol ba byas nas gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong bco 
[\[216b.5\]]lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong gnyug mar gnas 
[\[216b.6\]]pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_lde mig gi sgra dang /_lde mig kyog po'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag 
[\[216b.7\]]med kyang rung /_de nyid du 'dug kyang rung /_so sor gyur kyang rung /_thag ring por gyur kyang rung snyam nas/_dbyen gyis don du gnyer ba dbyen gyi yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]gnyug mar gnas pa mnyam pa dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te/_gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni dbyen gyi nyer bsdogs las nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso 
[\[217a.2\]]sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong gnyug 
[\[217a.3\]]mar gnas pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_lde mig gi sgra dang /_lde mig kyog po'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags 
[\[217a.4\]]pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du rung ngam/_'on te de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung snyam nas yid gnyis kyis don du 
[\[217a.5\]]gnyer ba yid gnyis kyi yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa mnyam pa dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor 
[\[217a.6\]]thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni yid gnyis kyi nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag 
[\[217a.7\]]gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_lde mig gi sgra dang /_lde mig 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]kyog po'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi 
[\[217b.2\]]rung ngo snyam nas/_chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes can mi mthun pa'i 'du shes can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa mnyam pa dag lhags na/_de dag gis 
[\[217b.3\]]yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni mi mthun pa'i nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag 
[\[217b.4\]]pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel 
[\[217b.5\]]ba'i sgra dang /_lde mig gi sgra dang /_lde mig kyog po'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing 
[\[217b.6\]]so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du rung ngo snyam nas rtog pas don du gnyer ba rtog pa'i yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa mnyam pa dag lhags na/_de dag 
[\[217b.7\]]gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni rtog pa'i nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_
[\[218a.2\]]skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_lde mig gi sgra dang /_lde mig kyog po'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 
[\[218a.3\]]gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas btsal te ma rnyed na/_de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa mnyam pa dag lhags 
[\[218a.4\]]na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te/_gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 
[\[218a.5\]]'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel 
[\[218a.6\]]ba'i sgra dang /_lde mig gi sgra dang /_lde mig kyog po'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas 
[\[218a.7\]]te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas btsal te rnyed na de dag gis de dag dang lhan cig 'khod de gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]slong snga ma dag la 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_'di lta ste gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug 
[\[218b.2\]]mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_lde mig gi sgra dang /_lde mig kyog po'i sgra dang /_
[\[218b.3\]]gtang rag dag thos na/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med kyang rung /_de nyid du 'dug kyang rung /_so sor gyur kyang rung /_thag ring por gyur kyang rung snyam nas/_dbyen gyis 
[\[218b.4\]]don du gnyer ba dbyen gyi yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te/_gso 
[\[218b.5\]]sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni dbyen gyi nyer bsdogs las nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de 
[\[218b.6\]]dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_lde mig gi sgra dang /_lde mig 
[\[218b.7\]]kyog po'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du rung 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]ngam/_'on te de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung snyam nas/_yid gnyis kyis don du gnyer ba yid gnyis kyi yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing 
[\[219a.2\]]so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni yid 
[\[219a.3\]]gnyis kyi nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i 
[\[219a.4\]]rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_lde mig gi sgra dang /_lde mig kyog po'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na/_de dag 'di snyam du sems 
[\[219a.5\]]te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_chos ma yin pa'i 'du shes can mi mthun pa'i 'du shes 
[\[219a.6\]]can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 
[\[219a.7\]]gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni mi mthun pa'i nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_lde mig gi sgra dang /_lde mig kyog 
[\[219b.2\]]po'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon 
[\[219b.3\]]du rung ngo snyam nas/_rtog pas don du gnyer ba rtog pa'i yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na de dag gis yang gsol 
[\[219b.4\]]ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni rtog pa'i nyer bsdogs las 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing 
[\[219b.5\]]mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_lde mig gi sgra dang /_lde 
[\[219b.6\]]mig kyog po'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung 
[\[219b.7\]]snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas btsal te ma rnyed nas/_de dag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed pa las/_de'i 'og tu dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa ches mang po dag lhags na/_de dag 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]gis yang gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon par bya ste/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa bzhi'am lhag pa dag 'dug 
[\[220a.2\]]cing mthun par gyur pa na/_de dag gis de na gnyug mar gnas pa'i rnam pa dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i rtags dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'di lta ste/_dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa dag gi khar ba'i sgra dang /_rting sgra dang /_skad sel ba'i sgra dang /_
[\[220a.3\]]lde mig gi sgra dang /_lde mig kyog po'i sgra dang /_gtang rag dag thos na/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa dag yod na/_dge slong gang dag ma lhags pa de dag med par bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te gso sbyong bya zhing so sor 
[\[220a.4\]]thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon du mi rung ngo snyam nas/_de dag gis de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas btsal te rnyed na de dag gis de dag dang lhan cig 'khod de gsol ba byas nas gso sbyong byed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par byed na/_dge slong snga ma dag la ni 'gal 
[\[220a.5\]]tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro//_//bar sdom la/_dbyen dang yid gnyis mi mthun dang /_/rtog dang ma rnyed rnyed pa'o/_/dge slong gis gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas nas dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas gang na/_dge slong yongs su 
[\[220a.6\]]dag pa lta ba mthun pa dag 'khod par 'gro bar bya'o/_/dge slong gis gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas nas dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas gang na/_dge slong 'thab krol byed pa/_mtshang 'dru bar byed pa/_'thab mo byed pa/_'thab 
[\[220a.7\]]par byed pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi byed pa dag 'khod par gnod pa byung ba dang /_dge 'dun thams cad der 'gro ba ma gtogs par 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong gis gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas nas dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas dang /_
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]gnas ma yin pa gang na dge slong yongs su dag pa lta ba mthun pa dag 'khod par 'gro bar bya'o/_/dge slong gis gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas nas dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa gang na dge slong 'thab krol 
[\[220b.2\]]byed pa/_mtshang 'dru bar byed pa/_'thab mo byed pa/_'thab par byed pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi byed pa dag 'khod par gnod pa byung ba dang /_dge 'dun thams cad der 'gro ba ma gtogs par 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong gis gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la 
[\[220b.3\]]dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa nas dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa gang na dge slong yongs su dag pa lta ba mthun pa dag 'khod par 'gro bar bya'o/_/dge slong gis gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong dang bcas pa'i 
[\[220b.4\]]gnas dang gnas ma yin pa nas dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa gang na dge slong 'thab krol byed pa/_mtshang 'dru bar byed pa/_'thab mo byed pa/_'thab par byed pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi byed pa dag 'khod par gnod pa byung ba dang /_dge 'dun 
[\[220b.5\]]thams cad der 'gro ba ma gtogs par 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong gis gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas dang /_dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas ma yin pa dang /_dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa nas dge slong 
[\[220b.6\]]med pa'i gnas gang du song na/_lus sam sems reg par 'gyur ba der 'gro bar bya'o/_/dge slong gis gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas dang /_dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas ma yin pa dang /_dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas dang 
[\[220b.7\]]gnas ma yin pa nas dge slong med pa'i gnas su gnod pa byung ba dang /_dge 'dun thams cad der 'gro ba ma gtogs par 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong gis gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas dang /_dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas ma 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]yin pa dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang /_dge slong med pa'i gnas nas dge slong med pa'i gnas gang du song na/_lus sam sems reg par 'gyur ba der 'gro bar bya'o/_/dge slong gis gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge 
[\[221a.2\]]slong dang bcas pa'i gnas dang /_dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas ma yin pa dang /_dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang /_dge slong med pa'i gnas nas dge slong med pa'i gnas su gnod pa byung ba dang /_dge 'dun thams cad der 'gro ba 
[\[221a.3\]]ma gtogs par 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong gis gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas dang /_dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas ma yin pa dang /_dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang /_dge slong med pa'i gnas dang /_
[\[221a.4\]]dge slong med pa'i gnas ma yin pa nas dge slong med pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa gang du song na/_lus sam sems reg par 'gyur ba der 'gro bar bya'o/_/dge slong gis gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas dang /_dge slong dang bcas 
[\[221a.5\]]pa'i gnas ma yin pa dang /_dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang /_dge slong med pa'i gnas dang /_dge slong med pa'i gnas ma yin pa nas dge slong med pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin par gnod pa byung ba dang /_dge 'dun thams cad der 
[\[221a.6\]]'gro ba ma gtogs par 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas gang zhe na/_gang na las thams cad snang ba'o/_/dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas ma yin pa gang zhe na/_gang na las thams cad mi snang ba'o/_/dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas dang gnas 
[\[221a.7\]]ma yin pa gang zhe na/_gang na las kha cig ni snang la/_kha cig ni mi snang ba'o/_/dge slong med pa'i gnas gang zhe na/_dge slong ma'i gnas so/_/dge slong med pa'i gnas ma yin pa gang zhe na/_mu stegs can gyi gnas so/_/dge slong med pa'i gnas dang gnas ma 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]yin pa gang zhe na/_bkar ba'i gnas so/_/dge slong rnams kyis ni khyim pa dag dang 'dus shing 'khod nas gso sbyong dang dgag dbye dang /_gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mi bya/_dge sbyong du khas 'che ba rnams dang ma 
[\[221b.2\]]yin/_za ma rnams dang ma yin/_ma ning rnams dang ma yin/_dge slong ma sun phyung ba rnams dang ma yin/_pha bsad pa rnams dang ma yin/_ma bsad pa rnams dang ma yin/_dgra bcom pa bsad pa rnams dang ma yin/_dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa rnams dang ma 
[\[221b.3\]]yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa rnams dang ma yin/_mu stegs can rnams dang ma yin/_mu stegs can zhugs pa rnams dang ma yin/_rku thabs su gnas pa rnams dang ma yin/_tha dad du gnas pa rnams dang ma yin te/_gnas 
[\[221b.4\]]par mi bya ba rnams dang 'dus shing 'khod nas gso sbyong dang /_dgag dbye dang /_gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mi bya'i/_thams cad yongs su dag pa dang /_lta ba mthun pa dag 'dus shing 'khod nas gso sbyong dang /_
[\[221b.5\]]dgag dbye dang /_gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya'o/_/las mi mthun pa dag byas na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gso sbyong gi gzhi rdzogs so//_//[{D1-3}]dgag dbye'i gzhi'i bsdus pa'i sdom la/_dgag dbye 
[\[221b.6\]]chos min dge slong dang /_/zlos dang dbyar dang phyi ma'o/_/sdom la/_dgag dbye rjes su gnang ba dang /_/dgag dbye byed pa bsgo ba dang /_/chos dang chos min gtogs pa dang /_/nad pa gso ba'i las rnams so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na 
[\[221b.7\]]rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar dbyar bzhugs par dam bzhes so/_/de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag ljongs shig tu khrims su bca' ba 'di lta bu dag byas nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gi nang 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]na dge slong gang gis kyang dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong la tshul khrims nyams she'am/_lta ba nyams she'am/_spyod pa nyams she'am/_'tsho ba nyams zhes gleng bar mi bya dran par mi bya'o/_/bdag cag gi nang na gang gis chu ra'i bum pa 'am/_
[\[222a.2\]]khrus kyi bum pa stong pa skam po chu med par mthong na/_gal te gcig pus nus par gyur na gcig pu des bkang la gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag par bya'o/_/gal te gcig pus mi nus par gyur na dge slong cig shos la lag brda'i sgra byas te lag rub kyis gnas 
[\[222a.3\]]ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas gcig la gcig mi smra bar kha rog ste 'gro bar bya'o zhes de lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba dag byas nas ljongs su dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/_chos 
[\[222a.4\]]gos zin pa dang ldan nas lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_phan tshun mi smra bar mnyan yod ga la ba de logs su rgyu zhing dong ste/_rim gyis rgyu zhing dong ba dang /_mnyan yod du phyin to/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang pos lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab ste/_
[\[222a.5\]]rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong rnams la so sor 
[\[222a.6\]]yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so sor yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/_dge slong dag khyed gang nas 'dir 'ongs/_khyed gang du dbyar gnas par dam bcas zhes bya ba ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis glo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong rnams la dge slong 
[\[222a.7\]]dag khyed gang nas 'dir 'ongs/_khyed gang du dbyar gnas par dam bcas zhes so sor yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa dang /_btsun pa bdag cag ljongs shig nas da gzod 'dir mchis te/_bdag cag ljongs shig tu dbyar gnas par dam bcas lags so/_/
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]dge slong dag khyed cag ljongs su bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas par dam bcas sam/_khyed cag bsod snyoms kyis brel bar ma gyur mod/_btsun pa med de/_bdag cag ljongs shig tu bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/_bdag cag bsod 
[\[222b.2\]]snyoms kyis kyang brel ba ma mchis lags so/_/dge slong dag khyed cag ji lta bu zhig tu ljongs su bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas par dam bcas/_bsod snyoms kyis kyang brel bar ma gyur/_btsun pa 'di la bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang pos ljongs shig 
[\[222b.3\]]tu khrims su bca' ba 'di lta bu dag bgyis nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gis nang na dge slong gang gis kyang dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong la tshul khrims nyams she'am/_lta ba nyams she'am/_spyod pa nyams she'am/_
[\[222b.4\]]'tsho ba nyams zhes gleng bar mi bya/_dran par mi bya'o/_/bdag cag gi nang na gang gis chu ra'i bum pa'am/_khrus kyi bum pa stong pa skam po chu med par mthong na/_gal te gcig pus nus par gyur na gcig pu des bkang la gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag par 
[\[222b.5\]]bya'o/_/gal te gcig pus mi nus par gyur na dge slong cig shos la lag brda'i sgra byas te/_lag rub kyis gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas gcig la gcig mi smra bar kha rog ste 'gro bar bya'o zhes btsun pa bdag cag gis khrims su bca' ba de lta bu dag 
[\[222b.6\]]bgyis nas ljongs shig tu dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/_btsun pa de ltar na bdag cag ljongs shig tu bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas par dam bcas shing bsod snyoms kyis kyang brel bar ma gyur lags so/_/skyes bu gti mug khyed cag gnas mal na dgra 
[\[222b.7\]]dang lhan cig gnas pas bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas par dam bcas snyam sems sam/_skyes bu gti mug dag 'di lta ste mi smra ba ni mu stegs can gyi rgyal mtshan yin no/_/de lta bas na dge slong gis mi smra bar dam bca' bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong gis mi 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]smra bar dam 'cha' na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun la mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyis dgag dbye bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar gnas par dam 
[\[223a.2\]]bcas pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun la mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyis dgag dbye bya'o zhes gsungs pa dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye ji ltar bya ba ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyi ma bdun nam brgyad na 
[\[223a.3\]]dgag dbye byed par 'gyur na nyi ma 'di snyed cig na dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye mdzad par 'gyur ro zhes spyod yul gyi grong khyer du go bar bya'o/_/gnas 'cha' ba'i dge slong rnams kyis mchod rten dang mchod rten gyi 'khor sa rnams su mchod par bya ba'i las la lhag par 
[\[223a.4\]]brtson par bya ste/_dri gtsang khang byi dor bya/_brgyan par bya'o/_/gnas pa dang gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis gtsug lag khang phyag dar bya/_chag chag bya/_ba lang gi lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byug par bya'o/_/dge 'dun la rnyed pa snum bag 
[\[223a.5\]]can dag dbul bar bya'o/_/dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa rnams kyis mtshan mo thog thag chos bshad par bya'o/_/gal te skya rengs ma shar bar dgag dbye bya mi nus par shes na dus shes par bya ste ci bder bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[223a.6\]]dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_mang po bsko bar bya ste/_chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong dgag dbye byed par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 
[\[223a.7\]]'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /_dgag dbye dang dgag dbye ma yin pa mi shes pa ste/_chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong dgag dbye byed par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o/_/chos lnga 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni dgag dbye byed par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_dgag 
[\[223b.2\]]dbye dang dgag dbye ma yin pa shes pa ste/_chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni dgag dbye byed par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas la gaN+DI brdungs te/_dge slong rnams 
[\[223b.3\]]la dris pa'i tshig gis yang dag par bsgo la/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa dang /_re zhig dang por spro bar bya ste/_ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye byed par spro'am/_des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 
[\[223b.4\]]'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid par spro na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun 
[\[223b.5\]]gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dgag dbye bgyid par bskos te/_dgag dbye bgyid pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/
[\[223b.6\]]las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid par spro ste/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dgag dbye bgyid par bsko na/_dge slong 
[\[223b.7\]]ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid par bsko bar tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la dgag dbye bgyid par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ngas dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong gis 
[\[224a.2\]]dge 'dun gyi ched du 'jag ma dag nye bar gzhag par bya ste/_de'i 'og tu brim par bya'o/_/gal te gcig pu zhig yin na/_des rgan rims kyi mtha' nas bzung ste gzhon rims kyi mtha'i bar du brim par bya'o/_/ji ste gnyis yod na gcig gis rgan rims kyi 
[\[224a.3\]]mtha' nas brim par bya'o/_/cig shos kyis ni gzhon rims kyi mtha' nas so/_/'on te mang po zhig yod na gcig gis ni rgan rims kyi mtha' nas brim par bya'o/_/gcig gis ni dbus nas so/_/gcig gis ni gzhon rims kyi mtha' nas so/_/de'i 'og tu 
[\[224a.4\]]dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gis las bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags te/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/_dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_
[\[224a.5\]]deng dge 'dun gyis dgag dbye mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de nas dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi mdun du 'greng bar bya ste/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis 'di skad ces/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_
[\[224a.6\]]deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags te/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye yang bco lnga pa lags na/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun btsun pa rnams la mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyis dgag 
[\[224a.7\]]dbye bgyid kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rnams kyis bdag la gdams su gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa rnams kyis bdag la rjes su bstan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa rnams kyis bdag rjes su gzung du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/_bdag 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]la thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol/_ltung ba shes shing mthong na chos bzhin 'dul ba bzhin slar bgyi'o zhes de ltar lan gnyis/_de ltar lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/_/de bzhin du dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar gyis dgag dbye bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dgag dbye byed 
[\[224b.2\]]pa'i dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye bya ste/_gal te dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong gnyis yod na gcig la gcig dgag dbye bya'o/_/ji ste gcig pu zhig yin na dge slong zhig gi mdun du dgag dbye bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong ma rnams dang /_dge slob ma 
[\[224b.3\]]rnams dang /_dge tshul pha dang /_dge tshul ma rnams dgag dbye byed du gzhug go/_/de'i 'og tu dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong gis rgan rims kyi mdun du 'dug ste/_dge 'dun gyis dgag dbye mdzad lags so zhes brjod par bya'o/_/thams cad kyis dgag dbye 
[\[224b.4\]]legs par mdzad zin to/_/dgag dbye shin tu legs par mdzad zin to zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te de skad ces smras na legs/_ji ste de skad ma smras na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong gis khab bam/_gri yang 
[\[224b.5\]]rung khyer la rgan rims kyi mdun du 'dug ste/_btsun pa dag dngos po 'di tsam gyis kyang dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye mdzad par chud do zhes brjod par bya'o/_/thams cad kyis legs par chud do/_/shin tu legs par chud do zhes brjod par 
[\[224b.6\]]bya'o/_/de na gang cung zad ci rnyed pa ni dge 'dun ril gyis bgo bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa dgag dbye'i las du mchis/_nye ba 'khor bzhi yod de/_chos ma yin pas mi mthun par dgag dbye 
[\[224b.7\]]byed pa dang /_chos ma yin pas mthun pa dang /_chos kyis mi mthun pa dang /_chos kyis mthun pa'o/_/nye ba 'khor de la dgag dbye'i las chos dang mthun pa ni gcig yin te/_'di lta ste chos kyis mthun par dgag dbye byed pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nam nangs su nye'i dgag dbye gyis shig_/de nas dge 
[\[225a.2\]]slong gzhan zhig stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa gnas zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba/_sdug bsngal ba/_bro 
[\[225a.3\]]tshabs che ba zhig mchis na de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dgag dbye blang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgag dbye blang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye ji ltar blang ba ma shes nas/_
[\[225a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gcig gis gcig gi'am/_gcig gis gnyis kyi'am mang po'i yang rung ji tsam ming sgrogs nus kyi bar du blang bar bya'o/_/ngas dgag dbye 'bul ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_dgag dbye 
[\[225a.5\]]'bul ba'i dge slong gis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas mchil lham phud de/_rgan rims bzhin du 'dud pa dang bcas pas tsog pur 'dug ste thal mo sbyor la tshig 'di skad ces/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dgongs su gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa 
[\[225a.6\]]lags na/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags te/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun btsun pa rnams la mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyis dgag dbye brjod do/_/brjod pa yang rig par 
[\[225a.7\]]bgyid do zhes de ltar lan gnyis/_de ltar lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/_/dgag dbye 'bul ba'i dge slong gis gal te lus kyi rnam par rig byed kyis dgag dbye phul na dgag dbye phul ba zhes bya'o/_/ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyis 'bul na dgag dbye phul ba 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]zhes bya'o/_/lus kyi rnam par rig byed dang /_ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyis 'bul mi nus na dge 'dun thams cad der dong bar bya'o/_/yang na dge slong de dge 'dun gyis nang du blang bar bya'o/_/dge 'dun thams cad der ma dong ngam/_dge slong de dge 'dun gyis 
[\[225b.2\]]nang du ma blangs te/_ma tshogs par dgag dbye byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dgag dbye 'bul bas kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/ngas dgag dbye 
[\[225b.3\]]len pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_dgag dbye len pa'i dge slong gis dgag dbye blangs nas brgyug par mi bya/_mgyogs par mi bya/_mchong bar mi bya/_phyi rol du mchong bar mi bya/_'obs la mchong bar mi bya/_bang rim la mchong bar 
[\[225b.4\]]mi bya/_steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug par mi bya/_mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro bar mi bya/_gom pa gcig gis skas kyi gdang bu gnyis la 'dzeg par mi bya/_gom pa gcig gis skas kyi rim pa gnyis la gzeg par mi bya/_gnyid log par mi bya/_snyoms par 
[\[225b.5\]]'jug par mi bya'o/_/gnyid log gam/_snyoms par zhugs na rgyu gnyis kyis smad par 'gyur te/_ngo tsha med pa gang yin pa dang /_khyad du bsad pa gang yin pa'o/_/gang gi tshe dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis tshe dang ldan pa dag ma lhags pa rnams kyi 'dun pa dang yongs 
[\[225b.6\]]su dag pa brjod cig_/brjod pa yang rig par gyis shig ces smras pa na/_des dge slong drung na 'dug pa'i 'dun du 'dug ste/_tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_gnas ga ge mo zhig na dge slong bro 'tshal ba/_sdug bsngal ba/_bro tshabs che ba zhig gnas te/_deng 
[\[225b.7\]]dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags la/_dge slong de'i yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa lags te/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de dge 'dun btsun pa rnams la mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyis dgag dbye bgyid de/_dgag dbye brjod 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]do/_/brjod pa yang rig par bgyid do zhes smros shig_/dgag dbye len pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[226a.2\]]la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa re zhig dgag dbye len pa'i dge slong gis dgag dbye blangs nas de nyid du gum na dgag dbye blangs pa zhes bgyi'am/_ma blangs pa zhes bgyi/_nye ba 'khor ma blangs pa zhes bya ste/_yang blang bar bya'o/_/
[\[226a.3\]]khyim pa nyid du dbyar gyis 'che 'am/_dge sbyong nyid du g.yar gyis 'che 'am/_ma ning nyid dam/_za ma nyid dam/_dge slong ma sun phyung ba nyid dam/_ma bsad pa nyid dam/_pha bsad pa nyid dam/_dgra bcom pa bsad pa nyid dam/_dge 'dun gyi 
[\[226a.4\]]dbyen byas pa nyid dam/_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa nyid dam/_mu stegs can nyid dam/_mu stegs can zhugs pa nyid dam/_rku thabs su gnas pa nyid dam/_tha dad du gnas pa nyid dam/_gnas par mi bgyi ba nyid du g.yar gyis 
[\[226a.5\]]'che bas dgag dbye blangs pa zhes bgyi'am/_ma blangs pa zhes bgyi/_nye ba 'khor ma blangs pa zhes bya ste/_yang blang bar bya'o/_/shul kar gum na dgag dbye blangs pa zhes bgyi'am/_ma blangs pa zhes bgyi/_nye ba 'khor ma blangs pa zhes bya bas yang blang 
[\[226a.6\]]bar bya ste/_sngar gso sbyong gi gzhi las ji skad 'byung ba de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa gnas gang zhig na dge slong gcig pu zhig gnas pa des dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid 
[\[226a.7\]]la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_nye ba 'khor dge slong des dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la gtsug lag khang phyag dar bya/_chag chag bya/_ba'i lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byug par bya'o/_/seng ge'i khri bsham par bya'o/_/stan dag gding bar bya'o/_/ji tsam nus kyi 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]bar du chos bsgrag par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu sa phyogs mthon po zhig tu 'dug la phyogs bzhir blta bar bya'o/_/der gal te dge slong yongs su dag pa lta ba mthun pa dag cig 'ong na/_de dag la tshe dang ldan pa dag myur ba myur bar tshur spyon/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye 
[\[226b.2\]]bco lnga pa lags kyis khyed dang lhan cig 'khod la dgag dbye bya'o zhes smros shig_/gal te de ltar grub na legs/_ci ste de ltar ma grub na dge slong des rang gi stan la 'dug la sems 'di ltar bskyed cing tshig tu brjod de/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa 
[\[226b.3\]]lags la/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye yang bco lnga pa lags na/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dgag dbye byin gyis brlab bo/_/gang gi tshe dge 'dun tshogs pa rnyed pa de'i tshe dge 'dun tshogs pa dang lhan cig dgag dbye bgyi'o zhes lan 
[\[226b.4\]]gnyis lan gsum du byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/gang na dge slong gnyis gnas pa der yang [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ni 'di nyid kyis gcig la gcig brjod par bya'o/_/gang na dge slong gsum gnas pa der yang [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ni 'di nyid kyis phan tshun brjod par bya'o/_/gang na dge 
[\[226b.5\]]slong bzhi gnas par ni de dag gis gsol ba byas la dgag dbye bya'o/_/dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong ni bsko bar mi bya'o/_/gang na dge slong lnga gnas par ni de dag gis gsol ba byas la dgag dbye bya'o/_/dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya'o/_/nad 
[\[226b.6\]]pa'i dgag dbye ni blang bar mi bya'o/_/gang na dge slong drug gam lhag pa dag gnas par ni de dag gis gsol ba byas la dgag dbye bya'o/_/dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya'o/_/nad pa'i dgag dbye yang blang bar bya'o//_//bar sdom la/_gnas par dam ni 
[\[226b.7\]]bca' ba la/_/chos ma yin pa gzhag pa dang /_/tshig gcig pa yi dgag dbye dang /_/gang phyir tshig gcig bya ba'o/_/dgag dbye gzhag pa chos dang mthun pa gcig dang chos dang mi mthun pa gcig dang /_dgag dbye gzhag pa chos dang mthun pa gsum dang /_
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]chos dang mi mthun pa gcig dang /_dgag dbye gzhag pa chos dang mthun pa lnga dang chos dang mi mthun pa gcig go/_/dgag dbye gzhag pa chos dang mthun pa gcig dang chos dang mi mthun pa gcig gang zhe na/_dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa la

[\[227a.3\]]no/_/dgag dbye gzhag pa chos dang mthun pa gsum dang chos dang mi mthun pa'i gcig gang zhe na/_dgag dbye lan gnyis bzlas pa la bzlas pa dang po brjod pa ma rdzogs par dgag dbye 'jog pa ni dgag dbye 'jog pa chos dang mthun pa yin no/_/brjod pa

[\[227a.6\]]dang po brjod pa ma rdzogs par dgag dbye 'jog pa ni dgag dbye 'jog pa chos dang mthun pa yin no/_/brjod pa rdzogs nas dgag dbye 'jog pa yang dgag dbye 'jog pa chos dang mthun pa yin no/_/bzlas pa gnyis pa brjod pa ma rdzogs par dgag dbye 'jog pa yang 
[\[227a.7\]]dgag dbye 'jog pa chos dang mthun pa yin no/_/brjod pa rdzogs nas dgag dbye 'jog pa yang dgag dbye 'jog pa chos dang mthun pa yin no/_/bzlas pa gsum pa brjod pa ma rdzogs par dgag dbye 'jog pa yang dgag dbye 'jog pa chos dang mthun pa yin no/_/
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]brjod pa rdzogs nas dgag dbye 'jog pa ni dgag dbye 'jog pa chos dang mi mthun pa ste/_de ltar na dgag dbye gzhag pa chos dang mthun pa lnga dang chos dang mi mthun pa gcig yin no/_/dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa yod/_dgag dbye lan gnyis bzlas pa

[\[227b.3\]]gtogs pa/_/yang dag bsdus pa'i tshogs yin no/_/'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gzhang 'brum gyis thebs pa rab tu mang po 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa dang /_de la dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_deng dge 
[\[227b.4\]]'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin la/_dge slong rab tu mang po 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa 'di dag kyang gzhang 'brum gyis thebs pa yin te/_gal te bdag gis dgag dbye lan gsum bzlas pas dgag dbye byas na/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag reg par mi gnas 
[\[227b.5\]]par 'gyur bas ma la bdag gis dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye bya'o snyam nas/_de dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye byed na don de la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa yin no/_/don gzhan la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa ni 'di ltar 
[\[227b.6\]]yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la bla gab med par gnas mal rab tu mang po bkram la char pa bab pa'am/_'bab du dogs pa dang /_de la dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin la/_gnas mal rab tu 
[\[227b.7\]]mang po zhig ni bla gab med par bkram ste/_char pa 'bab pa'am/_'bab tu dogs la/_gal te bdag gis dgag dbye lan gsum bzlas pas dgag dbye byas na bdag gis gnas mal rnams ma gsher bar brtul mi nus pas ma la bdag gis dgag dbye 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye bya'o snyam nas/_de dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye byed na/_don de la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa yin no/_/don gzhan la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa ni 'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de 
[\[228a.2\]]nyid la rgyal po dang /_btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_khrom gyi ru pa dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi dag dang thabs cig tu kun dga' ra bar lhags la/_der rgyal pos kyang dge 'dun la gos dang zang zing gi rnyed pa mang du phul/_btsun mo dang /_
[\[228a.3\]]gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_khrom gyi ru pa dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi dag gis kyang dge 'dun la gos dang zang zing gi rnyed pa mang du phul la/_sgrogs par byed pa'i dge slong gis kyang bsgrags pas nam ring zhig zad par gyur pa la/_de la dgag dbye byed pa'i 
[\[228a.4\]]dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin la/_rgyal po 'di yang btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_khrom gyi ru pa dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi dag dang thabs cig tu kun dga' ra bar lhags la/_'dir rgyal 
[\[228a.5\]]pos kyang dge 'dun la gos dang zang zing gi rnyed pa mang du phul/_btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_khrom gyi ru pa dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi rnams kyis kyang dge 'dun la gos dang zang zing gi rnyed pa mang du phul te/_sgrogs par byed pa'i dge slong gis 
[\[228a.6\]]kyang bsgrags pas mtshan ring zhig zad pas/_gal te bdag gis dgag dbye lan gsum bzlas pas dgag dbye byas na bdag gis skya rengs ma shar bar dgag dbye bya mi nus pas/_ma la bdag gis dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye bya'o snyam nas/_de 
[\[228a.7\]]dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye byed na/_don de la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa yin no/_/don gzhan la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa ni 'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la snyan pa snyan par smra ba'i dge slong dag gis chos snyan dgu bton pas 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]mtshan ring zhig zad la/_de la dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin la/_snyan pa snyan par smra ba'i dge slong 'di dag gis chos snyan dgu bton pas mtshan ring zhig zad de/_gal te bdag gis 
[\[228b.2\]]dgag dbye lan gsum bzlas pas dgag dbye byas na bdag gis skya rengs ma shar bar dgag dbye bya mi nus pas/_ma la bdag gis dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye bya'o snyam nas/_de dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye byed 
[\[228b.3\]]na/_don de la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa yin no/_/don gzhan la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa ni 'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa dag gis chos rnam par 
[\[228b.4\]]gtan la 'bebs pa'i gtam gyis mtshan ring zhig zad par gyur te/_de la dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin la/_dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa 
[\[228b.5\]]'di dag gis chos rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa'i gtam gyis mtshan ring zhig zad de/_gal te bdag gis dgag dbye lan gsum bzlas pas dgag dbye byas na bdag gis skya rengs ma shar bar dgag dbye bya mi nus pas ma la bdag gis dgag dbye lan gcig 
[\[228b.6\]]bzlas pas dgag dbye bya'o snyam nas/_de dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye byed na/_don de la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa yin no/_/don gzhan la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa ni 'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la dge 'dun 
[\[228b.7\]]gyis nang du rtsod pa'i chos bzhi las rtsod pa gang yang rung ba zhig byung bar gyur la/_de nas dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa dag gis rtsod pa de rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos bdun gyis rtsod pa rnams dul bar byed/_zhi bar byed 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]nye bar zhi bar byed pas nam ring zhig zad de/_de la dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin la/_dge 'dun gyi nang du rtsod pa'i chos bzhi las rtsod pa gang yang rung ba zhig byung bar gyur te/_dge 
[\[229a.2\]]slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa 'di dag gis rtsod pa de rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos bdun gyis dul bar byed/_zhi bar byed/_nye bar zhi bar byed pas mtshan ring zhig zad pas/_gal te bdag gis dgag dbye lan gsum bzlas 
[\[229a.3\]]pas dgag dbye byas na bdag gis skya rengs ma shar bar dgag dbye bya mi nus pas/_ma la bdag gis dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye bya'o snyam nas/_de dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye byed na/_don de la dgag dbye lan gcig 
[\[229a.4\]]bzlas pa yin no/_/don gzhan la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa ni 'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi 
[\[229a.5\]]tshogs dang /_kun dga' ra ba'i sgo'i bar du lhags te/_spar thabs su skur pa sgrogs shing /_shes ldan dag shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams zung shig_/sod cig_/chings shig_/spyugs shig_/nga'i glang po che 'tsho ba dang /_rta rdzi dang /_shing rta srung ba 
[\[229a.6\]]dang /_so phag skyed pa dang /_rgyal mtshan thogs pa dang /_'phan [{]rings [,]ring [}]'dzin pa so sor rgyal po'i bya ba dang /_rgyal po'i byed pa rnams byed par 'gyur ro/_/zhes zer la/_de la dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye 
[\[229a.7\]]bco lnga pa yin la/_rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs dang /_kun dga' ra ba'i sgo'i bar du lhags te spar thabs su skur pa sgrogs shing /_khyed kyis 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams zung shig_/sod cig_/chings shig_/spyugs shig_/bdag cag gi glang po che 'tsho ba dang /_rta rdzi dang /_shing rta srung ba dang /_so phag skyed pa dang /_rgyal mtshan thogs pa dang /_'phan [{]rings [,]ring [}]'dzin pa so sor rgyal po'i bya ba 
[\[229b.2\]]dang /_rgyal po'i byed pa rnams byed par 'gyur ro zhes zer bas/_gal te bdag gis dgag dbye lan gsum bzlas pas dgag dbye byas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur bas 
[\[229b.3\]]ma la bdag gis dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas/_dgag dbye bya'o snyam nas/_de dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye byed na/_don de la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa yin no/_/don gzhan la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa ni 'di ltar 
[\[229b.4\]]yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la chom rkun pa dag grong bcom pa'am/_grong khyer bcom pa'am/_yul bcom ste/_kun dga' ra ba'i sgor lhags nas ba lang ngam/_ma he'am/_ra dag bsad de/_khrag gis yan lag dag byugs nas/_dge slong 
[\[229b.5\]]dag la pho nya btang ste/_'phags pa rnams byung shig_/'dir bdag cag 'khod dgos so zhes zer la/_de la dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin la/_chom rkun pa 'di dag kyang grong bcom 
[\[229b.6\]]pa'am/_grong khyer bcom pa'am/_yul bcom ste/_kun dga' ra ba'i sgor lhags nas ba lang ngam/_ma he'am/_ra dag bsad de khrag gis yan lag dag byugs nas/_dge slong rnams la pho nya dag btang ste/_'phags pa rnams byung shig_/'dir bdag 
[\[229b.7\]]cag rnams 'khod dgos so zhes zer te/_gal te bdag gis dgag dbye lan gsum bzlas pas dgag dbye byas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur bas/_ma la bdag gis dgag 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye bya'o snyam nas/_de dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye byed na/_don de la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa yin no/_/don gzhan la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa ni 'di ltar yang dgag 
[\[230a.2\]]dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la rgan zhugs mi shes pa/_rmongs pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas pa gzhan zhig gis spyod yul lam/_spyod yul gyi lam kar rigs kyi bud med dam/_rigs kyi na chung la gshes sam/_kha ngan smras sam/_reg pas mi rnams 
[\[230a.3\]]khros te/_kun dga' ra ba'i sgor lhags nas spar thabs su skur pa sgrogs shing /_shes ldan dag shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams zung shig_/sod cig_/chings shig_/spyugs shig_/rgyal po'i glang po che 'tsho ba dang /_rta rdzi dang /_shing rta srung ba dang /_so phag 
[\[230a.4\]]skyed pa dang /_rgyal mtshan thogs pa dang /_'phan [{]rings [,]ring [}]'dzin pa so sor rgyal po'i bya ba dang /_rgyal po'i byed pa rnams byed par 'gyur ro zhes zer la/_de la dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin la/_
[\[230a.5\]]rgan zhugs mi shes pa/_rmongs pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas pa gzhan zhig gis spyod yul lam/_spyod yul gyi lam kar rigs kyi bud med dam/_rigs kyi na chung la gshes sam/_kha ngan smras sam/_reg pas mi rnams khros te kun dga' ra ba'i sgor 
[\[230a.6\]]lhags nas spar thabs su skur pa sgrogs shing /_shes ldan dag shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams zung shig_/sod cig_/chings shig_/spyugs shig_/rgyal po'i glang po che 'tsho ba dang /_rta rdzi dang /_shing rta srung ba dang /_so phag skyed pa dang /_rgyal mtshan thogs 
[\[230a.7\]]pa dang /_'phan [{]rings [,]ring [}]'dzin pa so sor rgyal po'i bya ba dang /_rgyal po'i byed pa rnams byed par 'gyur ro zhes zer te/_gal te bdag gis dgag dbye lan gsum bzlas pas dgag dbye byas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]chad dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur bas/_ma la bdag gis dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye bya'o snyam nas/_de dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye byed na/_don de la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa yin no/_/don 
[\[230b.2\]]gzhan la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa ni 'di ltar yang mi ma yin pa gnas pa'i phyogs shig tu gtsug lag khang brtsigs la/_rgan zhugs mi shes pa/_rmongs pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas pa gzhan zhig gis mi rung ba'i sa phyogs su bshang ba dang /_
[\[230b.3\]]gci ba dang /_mchil ma dang /_snabs dang /_skyugs pa dang /_'khru ba bor ba dang /_mi gtsang bas sbags pa'i gnas mal bzhag pas mi ma yin pa rnams khros nas spyod yul dang /_spyod yul gyi lam ka dang /_'chag sa dang /_khyams dang /_sgo 
[\[230b.4\]]khang rnams su 'dug nas kyang dge slong rnams la 'bab par byed do/_/de la dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin la/_gtsug lag khang 'di yang mi ma yin pa rnams gnas pa'i phyogs shig tu brtsigs 
[\[230b.5\]]la/_rgan zhugs mi shes pa/_rmongs pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas pa gzhan zhig gis mi rung ba'i sa phyogs su bshang ba dang /_gci ba dang /_mchil ma dang /_snabs dang /_skyugs pa dang /_'khru ba bor ba dang /_mi gtsang bas sbags pa'i gnas 
[\[230b.6\]]mal bzhag pas mi ma yin pa rnams khros nas spyod yul lam/_spyod yul gyi lam mam/_'chag sa 'am/_khyams sam/_sgo khang rnams su 'dug ste dge slong dag la 'bab par byed kyis/_ji ste bdag gis dgag dbye lan gsum bzlas pas dgag dbye 
[\[230b.7\]]byas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye bya'o snyam nas/_de lan gcig bzlas pa'i dgag dbyes 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]dgag dbye byed na/_don de la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa yin no/_/don gzhan la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa ni 'di ltar yang gdug pa gnas pa'i phyogs shig tu gtsug lag khang brtsigs la/_de na rgan zhugs mi shes pa/_rmongs 
[\[231a.2\]]pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas pa gzhan zhig gis mi rung ba'i phyogs su bshang ba dang /_gci ba dang /_mchil ma dang /_snabs dang /_skyugs pa dang /_'khru ba dag bor zhing mi gtsang bas sbags pa'i gnas mal bzhag pas gdug pa khros te spyod 
[\[231a.3\]]yul lam/_spyod yul gyi lam mam/_'chag sa'am/_khyams sam/_sgo khang rnams su 'dug nas kyang dge slong rnams la 'bab par byed/_nyal khri dag kyang sgyur bar byed do/_/de na dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_deng dge 'dun 
[\[231a.4\]]gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin na/_gtsug lag khang 'di yang gdug pa gnas pa'i phyogs shig tu brtsigs la/_rgan zhugs mi shes pa/_rmongs pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas pa gzhan zhig gis mi rung ba'i phyogs su bshang ba dang /_gci ba dang /_mchil 
[\[231a.5\]]ma dang /_snabs dang /_skyugs pa dang /_'khru ba dag bor zhing mi gtsang bas sbags pa'i gnas mal bzhag pas gdug pa khros nas spyod yul lam spyod yul gyi lam mam/_'chag sa'am/_khyams sam/_sgo khang rnams su 'dug nas dge slong dag 
[\[231a.6\]]la 'bab par byed/_nyal khri dag sgyur bar byed kyis/_gal te bdag gis dgag dbye lan gsum bzlas pas dgag dbye byas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma 
[\[231a.7\]]la bdag gis dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye bya'o snyam nas de dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye byed na/_don de la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa yin no/_/don gzhan la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa ni 'di ltar yang klu gnas 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]pa'i phyogs shig tu gtsug lag khang brtsigs la/_de na rgan zhugs mi shes pa/_rmongs pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas pa gzhan zhig gis mi rung ba'i phyogs su bshang ba dang /_gci ba dang /_mchil ma dang /_snabs dang /_skyugs pa dang /_
[\[231b.2\]]'khru ba dag bor zhing mi gtsang bas sbags pa'i gnas mal bzhag pas klu khros te spyod yul lam/_spyod yul gyi lam mam/_'chag sa 'am/_khyams sam/_sgo khang dag tu 'dug nas dge slong rnams la 'bab par byed/_nyal khri dag kyang sgyur bar 
[\[231b.3\]]byed do/_/de na dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin na/_gtsug lag khang 'di yang klu gnas pa'i phyogs gcig tu brtsigs la/_rgan zhugs mi shes pa/_rmongs pa/_mi gsal ba/_
[\[231b.4\]]mi mkhas pa gzhan zhig gis mi rung ba'i phyogs su bshang ba dang /_gci ba dang /_mchil ma dang /_snabs dang /_skyugs pa dang /_'khru ba dag bor la mi gtsang bas sbags pa'i gnas mal bzhag pas klu khros te spyod yul lam/_spyod yul gyi 
[\[231b.5\]]lam mam/_'chag sa'am/_khyams sam/_sgo khang rnams su 'dug nas/_dge slong rnams la 'bab par byed/_nyal khri dag kyang sgyur bar byed de/_gal te bdag gis dgag dbye lan gsum bzlas pas dgag dbye byas na gzhi des bdag gi 
[\[231b.6\]]srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye bya'o snyam nas/_de dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye byed na/_don de 
[\[231b.7\]]la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa yin no/_/don gzhan la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa ni 'di ltar yang nags khrod zhig tu gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa dang /_me shor bas grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams kyang sreg cing 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]'ong ste spyod yul dang /_spyod yul gyi lam ka yang tshig_/'chag sa dang /_khyams sam/_sgo khang yang tshig_/gtsug lag khang dang /_gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor yang tshig la thug nas/_de na dge slong dgag dbye byed pa 'di snyam du 
[\[232a.2\]]sems te/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin na/_gtsug lag khang 'di yang nags khrod zhig tu brtsigs te me shor bas grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams kyang sreg cing 'ong ste spyod yul dang /_spyod yul gyi lam ka yang tshig_/
[\[232a.3\]]'chag sa dang /_khyams dang /_sgo khang rnams kyang tshig_/gtsug lag khang dang /_gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor yang tshig la thug pas/_gal te bdag gis dgag dbye lan gsum bzlas pas dgag dbye byas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_
[\[232a.4\]]dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye bya'o snyam nas/_de dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye byed na/_don de la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa 
[\[232a.5\]]yin no//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po bcu dgu pa/_don gzhan la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pa ni 'di ltar yang gshong zhig tu gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa dang /_ri gzar po'i khar char mo che bab pas grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul 
[\[232a.6\]]'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor yang ded cing 'ong ste/_spyod yul dang /_spyod yul gyi lam dang /_'chag sa dang /_khyams dang /_sgo khang yang ded la thug_/gtsug lag khang yang gsher bar gyur pa dang /_de na dgag dbye byed pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems 
[\[232a.7\]]te/_deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin na/_gtsug lag khang 'di yang gshong zhig tu brtsigs te/_ri gzar po'i khar char mo che bab pas grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor yang ded cing 'ong ste/_spyod yul dang 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]spyod yul gyi lam dang /_'chag sa dang /_khyams dang /_sgo khang yang ded la thug_/gtsug lag khang yang gsher bar gyur pas/_gal te bdag gis dgag dbye lan gsum bzlas pas dgag dbye byas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge 
[\[232b.2\]]sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye bya'o snyam nas/_de dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas pas dgag dbye byed na/_don de la dgag dbye lan gcig bzlas 
[\[232b.3\]]pa yin no/_/don gang gi phyir dgag dbye lan gnyis bzlas pa yin zhe na/_gang la dgag dbye lan gsum bzlas pa'i skabs med par gyur na/_don de la dgag dbye lan gnyis bzlas pa yin no/_/don gang la dgag dbye lan gsum bzlas pa yin zhe na/_rnal 
[\[232b.4\]]du gnas pa'i gnas skabs na'o/_/don gang la tshogs kyi dgag dbye bya zhe na/_'di ltar yang dgon pa 'khrugs pa'i dmag gi 'jigs pa byung nas/_yul mi rnams kyang de dang de dag tu bros so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyang gtur bu dag tu chos gos rnams thum po byas 
[\[232b.5\]]te thogs nas phan tshun bltas te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin mod kyi/_gang gi tshe dge 'dun mthun pa rnyed pa de'i tshe dgag dbye bya'o zhes brjod nas 'dod par bya ste/_don de la tshogs kyi dgag dbye zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[232b.6\]]ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa 'di ltar yang dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba dag bgyis nas dbyar gnas te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gi nang na su yang rung dbyar gyi nang logs su nye du dag 'ongs na dgag 
[\[232b.7\]]dbye sbyin par bya'o zhes mchi na/_btsun pa dgag dbye stsal bar bgyi 'am/_mi stsal bar bgyi/_nye ba 'khor byin cig_/ci ste dngos po bzhag la gang zag ma lags na dgag dbye stsal bar bgyi'am/_mi stsal bar bgyi/_nye ba 'khor ma sbyin par de la tshig 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]'di skad ces/_tshe dang ldan pa bdag cag don 'di la 'dus shing mthun par gyur pa ni ma yin na/_tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyir dngos po bzhag ste gang zag ma yin/_'on kyang bdag nyid shin tu rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir dgag dbye byos shig ces bcom 
[\[233a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal gyis/_gal te 'dod na ni 'dug la dgag dbye bya'o zhes smros shig_/gal te gang zag bzhag la dngos po ma lags na/_dgag dbye stsal bar bgyi'am/_mi stsal bar bgyi/_nye ba 'khor ma sbyin par de la tshig 'di skad ces/_
[\[233a.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa bdag cag don 'di la 'dus shing mthun par gyur pa ni ma yin na/_tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyir gang zag bzhag ste dngos po ma yin/_'on kyang bdag nyid shin tu rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir dgag dbye byos shig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[233a.4\]]gyis/_gal te 'dod na ni 'dug la dgag dbye bya'o zhes smros shig_/gal te dngos po dang gang zag bzhag na dgag dbye stsal bar bgyi'am/_mi stsal bar bgyi/_nye ba 'khor ma sbyin par tshe dang ldan pa bdag cag don 'di la 'dus shing mthun par gyur pa 
[\[233a.5\]]ni ma yin na/_tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyir gang zag dang dngos po bzhag ste ma yin/_'on kyang bdag nyid shin tu rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir dgag dbye byos shig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal gyis/_gal te 'dod na 'dug la dgag dbye bya'o zhes 
[\[233a.6\]]smros shig_/gal te dngos po dang gang zag ma bzhag na dgag dbye stsal bar bgyi'am/_mi stsal bar bgyi/_nye ba 'khor byin cig/_//sdom la/_rgyal pos dge slong bzung ba dang /_/dran par bya ba bcu po dang /_/ltung bas bdun po bya ba dang /_/gleng 
[\[233a.7\]]ba yis ni bdun po'o/_/'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong rgyal po 'am/_chom rkun nam/_g.yon can nam/_gsod pa'am/_phyir rgol ba'am/_phas kyi dgra bos bzung bar gyur na/_de la dge slong dag gis pho nya gtang bar bya 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]ste/_dge slong 'di bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyis 'di thong shig ces spring shig_/gal te btang na legs/_ci ste ma btang na pho nya gnyis pa gtang bar bya ste/_dge slong 'di bdag cag rnams dang lhan cig tu bgyi ba cung zhig mchis kyis 
[\[233b.2\]]'di thong shig ces spring shig_/gal te btang na legs/_ci ste ma btang na dge slong rnams dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs la dgag dbye bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu phyi de nyin par nas dge slong de thar bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o/_/gal te brtson par byas na legs/_
[\[233b.3\]]ci ste brtson par ma byas na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gis ltung ba dran na/_dge slong des ltung ba de dge slong gi mdun du chos bzhin du gyis la de'i 'og tu dgag dbye bya'o/_/dgag dbye ni 'di ltar bya ste/_
[\[233b.4\]]ngas dgag dbye'i bar chad du 'gyur ba mi smras zhes bya ba sngar gso sbyong gi gzhir ji skad bstan pa bzhin bcu tshan rgyas par bya'o/_/'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gis ltung ba shes la ci ste phas pham pa byung bar shes na bskrad la dgag dbye bya'o/_/
[\[233b.5\]]gal te dge 'dun lhag ma byung bar shes na byin gyis brlabs nas dgag dbye bya'o/_/gal te ltung byed dang /_so sor bshags pa dang /_nyes byas dag byung bar shes na bshags nas dgag dbye bya'o/_/'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la dngos po ma nges 
[\[233b.6\]]par gyur nas/_kha cig ni lhag ma med par 'du shes la/_kha cig ni lhag ma dang bcas par 'du shes na de la gang dag lhag ma med par 'du shes pa de dag gis ni bskrad nas dgag dbye bya'o/_/gang dag lhag ma dang bcas par 'du shes pa de dag gis ni byin gyis rlob tu 
[\[233b.7\]]bcug nas dgag dbye bya'o/_/'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la ltung ba ma nges te/_de la kha cig ni bshags par bya'o zhes zer/_kha cig ni bsdam par bya'o zhes zer na/_de la gang dag bshags par bya'o zhes zer ba de dag gis ni 'chags su bcug nas 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]dgag dbye bya'o/_/gang dag bsdam par bya'o zhes zer ba de dag gis ni bsdam pa byed du bcug nas dgag dbye bya'o/_/'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la dge slong gis dge slong la gleng bar byed la/_gal te gleng ba po lus dang ngag ma bsdams 
[\[234a.2\]]par gyur na/_de lta bu'i gleng ba po la bsgo zhing rab tu bsgo nas dgag dbye bya'o/_/gal te gleng ba po lus kyis bsdams la ngag gis ma yin par gyur na/_de lta bu'i gleng ba po la yang bsgo zhing rab tu bsgo nas dgag dbye bya'o/_/gal te gleng ba po ngag gis bsdams 
[\[234a.3\]]la lus kyis ma yin par gyur na/_de lta bu'i gleng ba po la yang bsgo zhing rab tu bsgo nas dgag dbye bya'o/_/gal te gleng ba po lus dang ngag gis bsdams par gyur la mdo sde mi 'dzin/_'dul ba mi 'dzin/_ma mo mi 'dzin pa yin na/_de lta bu'i gleng ba po la brda 
[\[234a.4\]]sprad cing yang dag par brda sprad nas dgag dbye bya'o/_/gal te gleng ba po lus dang ngag gis bsdams la mdo sde 'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_ma mo 'dzin par gyur la/_mdo sde la gsal ba ma yin/_'dul ba la gsal ba ma yin/_ma mo la gsal ba ma yin 
[\[234a.5\]]na/_de lta bu'i gleng ba po la yang brda sprad cing yang dag par brda sprad nas dgag dbye bya'o/_/gal te gleng ba po lus dang ngag gis bsdams shing mdo sde 'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_ma mo 'dzin pa/_mdo sde la gsal ba/_'dul ba la gsal ba/_ma mo la 
[\[234a.6\]]gsal ba yin la/_mdo sde la mi gzo/_'dul ba la mi gzo/_ma mo la mi gzo ba yin na/_de lta bu'i gleng ba po la yang brda sprad cing yang dag par brda sprad nas dgag dbye bya'o/_/gal te gleng ba po lus dang ngag gis bsdams shing mdo sde 'dzin pa/_'dul ba 
[\[234a.7\]]'dzin pa/_ma mo 'dzin pa/_mdo sde la gsal ba/_'dul ba la gsal ba/_ma mo la gsal ba/_mdo sde la gzo ba/_'dul ba la gzo ba/_ma mo la gzo ba yin la/_mdo sde la mi mkhas pa/_'dul ba la mi mkhas pa/_ma mo la mi mkhas pa yin na/_de lta 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]bu'i gleng ba po la yang brda sprad cing yang dag par brda sprad nas dgag dbye bya'o/_/gal te gleng ba po lus dang ngag gis bsdams shing mdo sde 'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_ma mo 'dzin pa/_mdo sde la gsal ba/_'dul ba la gsal ba/_ma mo la gsal 
[\[234b.2\]]ba/_mdo sde la gzo ba/_'dul ba la gzo ba/_ma mo la gzo ba/_mdo sde la mkhas pa/_'dul ba la mkhas pa/_ma mo la mkhas pa yin na/_gal te ched du bsams te dge 'dun gyi nang du chos ma yin pa la chos dang /_chos la chos ma yin pa dang /_'dul 
[\[234b.3\]]ba ma yin pa la 'dul ba dang /_'dul ba la 'dul ba ma yin par ston pa yin na/_de lta bu'i gleng ba po la yang brda sprad cing yang dag par brda sprad nas dgag dbye bya'o/_/gal te gleng ba po lus dang ngag gis bsdams pa yin la mdo sde 'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_
[\[234b.4\]]ma mo 'dzin pa/_mdo sde la gsal ba/_'dul ba la gsal ba/_ma mo la gsal ba/_mdo sde la gzo ba/_'dul ba la gzo ba/_ma mo la gzo ba/_mdo sde la mkhas pa/_'dul ba la mkhas pa/_ma mo la mkhas pa yin na/_gal te ched du bsams pa 
[\[234b.5\]]ma yin par dge 'dun gyi nang du chos ma yin pa la chos dang /_chos la chos ma yin pa dang /_'dul ba ma yin pa la 'dul ba dang /_'dul ba la 'dul ba ma yin no zhes ston pa de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/_tshe dang ldan pa gleng ba po gang gis smra/_phas pham pas sam/_
[\[234b.6\]]dge 'dun gyi lhag mas sam/_ltung byed kyis sam/_so sor bshags pas sam/_nyes byas kyis sam/_mtshan mo byas pas sam/_nyin mo byas pas sam/_lam du byas pas sam/_lam gol bar byas pas sam/_'gro ba'i 'am/_'greng ba'i 'am/_'dug 
[\[234b.7\]]pa'i 'am/_nyal ba'i 'am/_gal te phas pham pas yin gyi/_dge 'dun lhag mas ma yin/_ltung byed kyis ma yin/_so sor bshags pas ma yin/_nyes byas kyis ma yin nam/_gal te dge 'dun lhag mas yin gyi/_phas pham pas ma yin/_ltung byed 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]kyis ma yin/_so sor bshags pas ma yin/_nyes byas kyis ma yin nam/_gal te ltung byed kyis yin gyi/_phas pham pas ma yin/_dge 'dun lhag mas ma yin/_so sor bshags pas ma yin/_nyes byas kyis ma yin nam/_gal 
[\[235a.2\]]te so sor bshags pas yin gyi/_phas pham pas ma yin/_dge 'dun lhag mas ma yin/_ltung byed kyis ma yin/_nyes byas kyis ma yin nam/_gal te nyes byas kyis yin gyi/_phas pham pas ma yin/_dge 'dun lhag mas ma yin/_ltung byed kyis 
[\[235a.3\]]ma yin/_so sor bshags pas ma yin nam/_gal te phas pham pa dang pos yin gyi/_gnyis pas ma yin/_gsum pas ma yin/_bzhi pas ma yin nam/_gal te gnyis pas yin gyi/_dang pos ma yin/_gsum pas ma yin/_bzhi pas ma yin 
[\[235a.4\]]nam/_gal te gsum pas yin gyi/_dang pos ma yin/_gnyis pas ma yin/_bzhi pas ma yin nam/_gal te bzhi pas yin gyi/_dang pos ma yin/_gnyis pas ma yin/_gsum pas ma yin nam/_gal te dge 'dun lhag ma dang pos yin gyi/_
[\[235a.5\]]gnyis pas ma yin zhes bya ba nas bcu gsum pa'i bar gyis ma yin nam/_gal te bcu gsum pa'i bar gyis yin gyi dang pos ma yin/_gnyis pas ma yin/_gsum pas ma yin pa nas bcu gnyis pa'i bar gyis ma yin pa'am/_gal te ltung byed dang pos yin gyi/_
[\[235a.6\]]gnyis pas ma yin/_gsum pas ma yin pa nas dgu bcu pa'i bar gyis ma yin pa'am/_gal te dgu bcu pas yin gyi/_dang pos ma yin/_gnyis pas ma yin pa nas brgyad bcu rtsa dgu'i bar gyis ma yin pa'am/_gal te so sor bshags pa dang pos yin gyi/_
[\[235a.7\]]gnyis pas ma yin/_gsum pas ma yin/_bzhi pas ma yin nam/_gal te gnyis pas yin gyi/_dang pos ma yin/_gsum pas ma yin/_bzhi pas ma yin nam/_gal te gsum pas yin gyi/_dang pos ma yin/_gnyis pas ma yin/_bzhi pas ma 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]yin nam/_gal te bzhi pas yin gyi/_dang pos ma yin/_gnyis pas ma yin/_gsum pas ma yin nam/_gal te nyes byas dang pos yin gyi/_gnyis pas ma yin/_gsum pas ma yin/_tha ma'i bar gyis ma yin nam/_gal te tha mas yin gyi/_dang pos 
[\[235b.2\]]ma yin/_gnyis pas ma yin pa'am/_tha ltag gi bar gyis ma yin pa'am/_gal te nub mo byas pas yin gyi/_nyin par byas pas ma yin nam/_gal te nyin par byas pas yin gyi/_mtshan mo byas pas ma yin nam/_gal te lam gol ba na byas pas yin gyi/_
[\[235b.3\]]lam du byas pas ma yin nam/_gal te lam du byas pas yin gyi/_lam gol bar byas pas ma yin nam/_gal te 'gro ba'i yin gyi/_'dug pa'i ma yin/_'greng ba'i ma yin/_nyal ba'i ma yin nam/_gal te 'dug pa'i yin gyi/_'gro ba'i ma yin/_
[\[235b.4\]]'greng ba'i ma yin/_nyal ba'i ma yin nam/_gal te nyal ba'i yin gyi/_'gro ba'i ma yin/_'greng ba'i ma yin/_'dug pa'i ma yin nam/_gal te 'greng ba'i yin gyi/_nyal ba'i ma yin/_'dug pa'i ma yin zhes gal te gleng ba po la de ltar legs par shin tu yang dag par 
[\[235b.5\]]smras/_yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par brtags pa na gnas nas gnas su sbed pa ni gleng ba po ma yin/_glengs pas ma yin no/_/gal te gleng ba po de ltar legs par shin tu yang dag par smras/_yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par brtags pas na 
[\[235b.6\]]gnas nas gnas su sbed par mi byed na/_de ni gleng ba po yin/_glengs pa yin no/_/gal te gleng ba po gnas nas gnas su mi sbed na/_glengs pa yin pas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/_tshe dang ldan pa de'i tshe lus kyi 'du byed dang /_ngag gi 'du byed dang /_yid kyi 
[\[235b.7\]]'du byed gang dag yin pa smros shig_/gal te phas pham pa yin par shes na bskrad la dgag dbye bya'o/_/gal te dge 'dun gyi lhag ma yin par shes na byin gyis brlabs la dgag dbye bya'o/_/gal te ltung byed dang /_so sor bshags pa dang /_nyes byas yin 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]par shes na bshags la dgag dbye bya'o//_//sdom la/_mang po bsgre dang bzhag pa dang /_/bya dang rnam pa lnga pa dang /_/'dong bas rnam gnas bya ba dang /_/yongs su dag la dgag dbye bya'o/_/'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid 
[\[236a.2\]]la gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong lnga'am lhag pa dag 'dug cing mthun par gyur la/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong ma 'ongs pa dag yod de/_de dag ma 'ongs te med kyang bdag cag gis gsol ba byas te dgag dbye byar rung ngo snyam nas/_rtog pas don du 
[\[236a.3\]]gnyer ba rtog pa'i yo byad can de dag gis gsol ba byas te dgag dbye byed na/_de'i 'og tu gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong nyung zad cig 'ongs na/_de dag gis kyang gsol ba byas te dgag dbye bya'o/_/dge slong snga ma rtog pa'i nyer bsdogs can dag la ni 'gal 
[\[236a.4\]]tshabs can du 'gyur te/_sngar gso sbyong gi gzhi las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa las ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/khyad par gcig yod pa ni der gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong bzhi'am lhag pa zhig 'dug cing mthun par gyur la zhes smos pa 
[\[236a.5\]]'dir ni lnga'am lhag par brjod par bya ba yin no//_//sdom la/_dbyar gnas par ni dam bcas pa'i/_/'thab krol dge slong shes nas kyang /_/bshes pa'i tshig gis bsu bya dang /_/nges pa'i zla ba bzhi po dang /_/nad pa dang ni dngos po ste/_/yang dag bsdoms
