[\[236a.6\]]pa'i tshogs yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa 'di ltar yang dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/_mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/_rtsod par bgyid pa/_'gyed 
[\[236a.7\]]par bgyid pa/_rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa dag mchi'o zhes thos te/_de dag ngo tsha ma mchis pas tho btsam pa nyid du bdag cag la gleng bar bgyid/_dran par bgyid do snyam na/_de rnams kyis de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_nye ba 'khor dge slong de rnams kyis gso sbyong 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]gi las gnyis sam/_gsum 'das par byas nas dgag dbye bya'o/_/gal te de ltar grub na legs/_gal te ma grub na dge slong de rnams kyis gnod pa'i ched kyi dkyil 'khor gnyis sam/_gsum khas blang bar bya'o/_/gal te de ltar grub na legs/_
[\[236b.2\]]gal te ma grub na dge slong de rnams kyis bshes pa'i tshig gis bsu bar bya/_lhung bzed dang chos gos blang bar bya ste/_lhung bzed dang chos gos dag gis mgu zhing rab tu mgu bar byas la dgag dbye bya'o/_/gal te de ltar grub na legs/_gal te de ltar ma 
[\[236b.3\]]grub na khrus bya ste/_khrus bya bas mgu zhing rab tu mgu bar byas la dgag dbye bya'o/_/gal te de ltar grub na legs/_gal te ma grub na chos bsgrag par bya ste/_chos bsgrags pas mgu zhing rab tu mgu bar byas la dgag dbye bya'o/_/gal te de ltar grub 
[\[236b.4\]]na legs/_gal te ma grub na nye ba 'khor dge slong de dag dkyil 'khor gyi nang du dong la gso sbyong bya'o/_/gal te de dag 'di skad ces/_tshe dang ldan pa dag deng dge 'dun gyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin na/_khyed cag ci'i phyir gso sbyong byed ces zer na/_de dag 
[\[236b.5\]]la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/_tshe dang ldan pa khyed cag ni glo bur du 'ongs pa yin la/_don 'di ni gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyi'o zhes smros shig_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag ni nges par zla ba bzhi pa'i dgag dbye byed do 
[\[236b.6\]]snyam du sems pa dang /_de'i 'og tu 'jigs pa dang bral zhing phas kyi rgol ba dang bral nas slar yang dgag dbye bya'o/_/'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la nad pas mi na ba'i dgag dbye 'jog na nad pa la 'di skad ces/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod ni nad pa ste 
[\[236b.7\]]sbyor mi bzod kyis 'dug shig ces brjod par bya'o/_/'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la mi na bas nad pa'i dgag dbye 'jog na mi na ba la 'di skad ces/_tshe dang ldan pa de ni nad pa ste/_sbyor mi bzod kyis khyod tshur zhes brjod par bya'o/_/'di ltar 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la nad pas mi na ba'i dgag dbye pho nya btang ste 'jog na pho nya la 'di skad ces/_tshe dang ldan pa de ni na bas sbyor mi bzod kyis khyod 'dug shig ces brjod par bya'o/_/'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la mi na 
[\[237a.2\]]bas nad pa'i dgag dbye pho nya btang ste 'jog na pho nya la 'di skad ces/_tshe dang ldan pa de ni na bas sbyor mi bzod kyis khyod tshur zhes brjod par bya'o/_/'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la dngos po shes la gang zag ma yin pa dang /_gang zag shes la 
[\[237a.3\]]dngos po ma yin pa dang /_gang zag dang dngos po shes pa dang /_gang zag dang dngos po mi shes pa ste/_dngos po shes la gang zag ma yin pa ji lta bu zhe na/_'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la rgan zhugs mi shes pa/_rmongs pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi 
[\[237a.4\]]mkhas pa gzhan zhig gis spyod yul lam/_spyod yul gyi lam kar rigs kyi bud med dam/_rigs kyi na chung la khros sam/_tshig ngan smras sam/_reg par gyur pas mi rnams khros te/_kun dga' ra ba'i sgor 'ongs nas 'di skad ces/_'phags pa 'di dag 
[\[237a.5\]]ni mi mdzes pa/_ma brtags pa yin te/_'phags pa dag gis nyes pa 'di dang 'di dag byas so zhes smras kyi/_che ge mo zhig gis zhes de skad du ma smras pa ste/_de lta bu ni dngos po shes la gang zag ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/gang zag shes la dngos po ma yin pa ji lta 
[\[237a.6\]]bu zhe na/_'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la zhes bya ba nas/_kun dga' ra ba'i sgor 'ongs nas 'di skad ces/_'phags pa 'di dag ni mi mdzes pa/_ma brtags pa zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te/_'di ltar 'phags pa che ge mo zhes bya bas nyes pa 
[\[237a.7\]]byas zhes smos kyi/_'di skad du 'di dang 'di dag byas so zhes ni ma smos pa ste/_de lta bu ni gang zag shes la dngos po ma yin pa'o/_/gang zag dang dngos po shes pa ji lta bu zhe na/_'di ltar yang dgag dbye bco lnga pa de nyid la zhes bya ba nas/_kun dga' ra 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]ba'i sgor 'ongs nas 'di skad ces 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te/_'phags pa che ge mo zhes bya bas nyes pa 'di dang 'di dag byas so zhes smos pa ste/_'di lta bu ni gang zag dang dngos po shes pa yin no/_/gang zag dang dngos po mi shes pa ji lta bu zhe na/_
[\[237b.2\]]rnam pa 'di dag ma gtogs pa'o/_/dgag dbye'i gzhi rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//[{D1-4}]dbyar gnas kyi gzhi'i bsdus pa'i sdom la/_dbyar gnas pa dang zas dang ni/_/dbyar ral ba dang lnga po dang /_/smig dang lo ma rtswa mchil lham/_/dbyar dang ko lpags bzhi dag go/_/
[\[237b.3\]]sdom la/_dbyar gnas rjes su gnang ba dang /_/'char kar 'gro ba dag dang ni/_/bya ba la ni zhag bdun dang /_/'gro bya ci zhig bya ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar dbyar 
[\[237b.4\]]bzhugs par zhal gyis bzhes so/_/de'i tshe dge slong dag dbyar gyi nang logs su ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo /_/de dag dbyar gyi nang logs su ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dag mi sbed cing ma bsrungs la ma sbas par gyur pa dag la mu stegs can rnams shes ldan dag shAkya'i 
[\[237b.5\]]bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni srog gcod pa yin te/_srog gcod pa las ma log_/rnam par ma log_/phyir ma log pa 'di dag dbyar gyi nang logs su ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ste/_dbyar gyi nang logs su ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na srog chags phra mo dang shin tu phra mo mang 
[\[237b.6\]]po'i tshogs rnams brdzis nas srog dang bral bar byas so/_/re zhig bye'u khug rta yang dbyar zla ba bzhi rang gi tshang na zhum zhum por byas/_kun tu zhum zhum por byas nas bskums shing bskums nas 'dug na/_dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag ni khas len pa tsam yang 
[\[237b.7\]]mi shes na/_dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang de la bya bar sems pa lta su zhig yod ces smod par byed/_'phya bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_dge slong gis dbyar gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dbyar gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar gnas par dam bca' 
[\[238a.2\]]ba ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de nyid kyi dbyar zla 'bring po tshes bco lnga la gtsug lag khang chag chag bya'o/_/phyag dar bya'o/_/ba'i lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byug par bya'o/_/gnas mal thams cad gcig tu bsag par bya ste/_
[\[238a.3\]]chung ngu na rkang pa bkru ba'i chol zangs kyang mi sba'o/_/de'i 'og tu gnas mal stobs pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya ste/_chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong gnas mal stobs par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'dun 
[\[238a.4\]]pas 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /_gnas mal bstabs pa dang ma bstabs pa mi shes pa ste/_chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong gnas mal stobs par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[238a.5\]]bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o/_/chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong gnas mal stobs par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis mi 'gro ba 
[\[238a.6\]]dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_gnas mal bstabs pa dang ma bstabs pa shes pa ste/_chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong gnas mal stobs par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o/_/bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o/_/bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/_gnas mal 
[\[238a.7\]]bsham pa byas la gaN+DI brdungs te/_dge slong rnams la dris pa'i lan gyis yang dag par bsgo la/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa dang re zhig dang por spro bar bya ste/_ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun la dbyar gyi gnas mal stobs par spro 'am/_
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gnas mal stobs pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la dbyar gyi gnas mal stobs par spro na gal te dge 
[\[238b.2\]]'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/_dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la gnas mal stobs par bsko ste/_gnas mal stobs pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la dbyar gyi gnas mal stobs so/_/
[\[238b.3\]]'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gnas mal stobs pa dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la dbyar gyi gnas mal stobs par spro nas/_ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la gnas mal 
[\[238b.4\]]stobs par bsko ste/_gnas mal stobs pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la dbyar gyi gnas mal stobs par bgyid kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa dag las gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba gnas mal stobs par bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang 
[\[238b.5\]]dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la gnas mal stobs par bsko ste/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ngas gnas mal stobs pa'i dge 
[\[238b.6\]]slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_gnas mal stobs pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi ched du tshul shing rnams yon po ma yin pa dang /_'khyor po ma yin pa dang /_kyar khyor ma yin pa dang /_dri zhim po dang /_reg na bde bar 'gyur bar bstar bar bya'o/_/de'i 
[\[238b.7\]]'og tu nang par sngar langs te gnas mal bsham pa byas la gaN+DI brdungs nas dge slong rnams la dris pa'i lan gyis yang dag par bsgo la/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa dang dge slong gnas mal stobs pas tshul shing dri zhim pos bskus te/_sprog ma'i 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]nang du ras dkar po bting ba'i steng du bzhag nas rgan rims kyi mthar gzhag par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu khrims su bca' ba dag brjod par bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_gnas 'dir khrims su bca' ba 'di dang 'di dag mchis 
[\[239a.2\]]kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa khyed cag las gang khrims su bca' ba 'di dang 'dis dbyar gnas par dam bca' bar spro ba de ni tshul shing long shig_/khyed cag las dge slong sus kyang dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong la gleng bar mi bya/_dran par mi bya'o/_/khyed 
[\[239a.3\]]cag las su yang rung 'ga' zhig cung zad shes na de da smros shig_/phyis dbyar gyi nang logs su ma gleng shig_/khyed cag las sus dbyar gyi nang logs su gleng bar gyur na/_de dge 'dun gyis phyis brtag par dgongs so/_/de'i 'og tu gnas mal stobs 
[\[239a.4\]]pa'i dge slong gis tshul shing brim par bya ste/_je thog mar ston pa'i tshul shing blang bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis stan gyi steng nas spags te/_tshul shing blangs la dal gyis gzhag par bya ste/_dge 'dun gsar bu rnams kyi bar du 
[\[239a.5\]]yang de bzhin du bya'o/_/dge tshul rnams kyi tshul shing ni slob dpon nam/_mkhan pos blang bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu gnas srung rnams kyis yang blang bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu bgrangs te gnas 'dir dge slong 'di snyed cig gis tshul shing blangs so zhes smros 
[\[239a.6\]]shig_/de'i 'og tu gnas mal stobs pa'i dge slong gis lde mig dang /_lde mig kyog po dag blangs la dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi mdun du 'dug ste/_gnas brtan gnas khang che ge mo ni rnyed pa dang bcas pa/_gos dang bcas pa lags kyis bzhes shig 
[\[239a.7\]]ces brjod par bya'o/_/gal te blangs na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gnas khang gang yin pa de gnas brtan gnyis pa la sbyin par bya'o/_/gnas brtan gnyis pa'i gnas khang gang yin pa de gnas brtan gsum pa la sbyin par bya ste/_dge 'dun gsar bu'i 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]par du yang de bzhin du bya'o/_/gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis ma blangs na gnas brtan gnyis pa la sbyin par bya'o/_/gal te gnas brtan gnyis pas ma blangs na gnas brtan gsum pa la sbyin par bya'o/_/gal te gnas brtan gsum pas blangs pa 
[\[239b.2\]]la dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan slong na tshig dang po la sbyin par mi bya'o/_/tshig gnyis pa la yang sbyin par mi bya'o/_/tshig gsum pa la sbyin par bya ste/_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o/_/dge 'dun 
[\[239b.3\]]gsar bu'i bar du de bzhin du blangs pa la/_gal te dge 'dun gsar bu gsum pa slong na tshig dang po la sbyin par mi bya'o/_/tshig gnyis pa la yang sbyin par mi bya'o/_/tshig gsum pa la sbyin par bya ste/_dge 'dun gsar bu gsum pas kyang 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i 
[\[239b.4\]]nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis gnas khang thams cad bgos pa dang glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong rnams phongs par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir ma bgos pa'i 
[\[239b.5\]]gnas gcig gzhag par bya'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis sgo khang yang bgos pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgo khang bgo bar mi bya'o/_/khyams rnams bgos pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyams bgo bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[239b.6\]]khyams stong pa rnams su khwa dang /_bye'u dang /_phug ron dag gis tshang bcas pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skrod pa'i dge slong dag bsko bar bya ste/_des so sor blta bar bya'o/_/gal te sgo nga dag ma lhags par gyur na bskrad par bya'o/_/de ste 
[\[239b.7\]]lhags na ni gzhag par bya'o/_/srin bu trai bu ka dang /_trai la ta'i tshang bcas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_so sor brtag par bya ste/_gal te sgo nga ma lhags par gyur na bskrad par bya'o/_/gal te lhags par gyur na skyed pas bcings na 'phel 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas gnas mal bgo bar bya ste/_'di ltar re zhig dngos po nyung ngu zhig yin na re re sbyin par bya'o/_/'on te mang po zhig yin na gnyis gnyis gsum gsum sbyin par bya'o/_/dngos po kha cig chen por gyur pas dge slong rgan rabs 
[\[240a.2\]]rgan rabs dag byi dor byed pas dub cing ngal bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gnas 'cha' ba rnams la sbyin par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu gnas mal stobs pa'i dge slong gis khrims su bca' ba dag brjod par bya ste/_dge slong sus 
[\[240a.3\]]kyang dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la gding ba med par longs spyod par mi bya ste/_ming thogs kyi gding bas ma yin/_gding ba dri ma can gyis ma yin/_seng bas ma yin no/_/stug po yin na rim pa gcig gis so/_/seng ba yin na rim pa gnyis so/_/khyed las 
[\[240a.4\]]gang gis dge 'dun gyi gnas mal longs spyod par bya ba ma yin par longs spyod pa na de la dge 'dun gyis phyis brtag par bya bar dgongs so/_/gnas mal stobs pa'i dge slong gis zla ba phyed phyed cing gnas mal la so sor brtag par bya'o/_/'di ltar re zhig 
[\[240a.5\]]rgan po dag gis gnas mal longs spyad par bya ba ma yin par longs spyad pa mthong na dge 'dun la gsol nas sba bar bya'o/_/'on te gsar bu zhig gis mthong na mkhan po'am slob dpon la brjod de sba bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu tshogs nas sbyin bdag che ge mo zhes 
[\[240a.6\]]bgyi ba dang /_zhal ta bgyid pa che ge mo zhes bgyi ba dang /_spyod yul gyi grong ga ge mo zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun dbyar gnas par dam bca' ba mdzad do zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong rnams kyis gnas dang spyod yul bltas nas skyabs yod par zhugs te 
[\[240a.7\]]dbyar gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o/_/gnas ji ltar brtag par bya zhe na/_ji ga bdag la gnas 'dir tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa dag gis gang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba ma skyes pa mi skyed par 'gyur zhing /_skyes pa yang myur ba kho nar so sor zhi 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]par byed par 'gyur la/_gang bde ba dang yid bde ba ma skyes pa skyed par 'gyur zhing /_skyes pa yang legs par rab tu rjes su srung bar sems pa dang bdag na bar gyur na nad g.yog byed par 'gyur ba lta yod dam zhes de ltar gnas la brtag par bya'o/_/spyod yul 
[\[240b.2\]]la ji ltar brtag par bya zhe na/_ji ga spyod yul gyi grong 'di na bsod snyoms ster ba dang /_na bar gyur na nad g.yog dang /_sman sbyin par 'gyur ba lta yod dam zhes de ltar spyod yul la brtag par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu skyabs yod par zhugs la/_dge slong rgan 
[\[240b.3\]]rims ji lta ba bzhin gyi mdun du 'dud pa dang bcas pas tsog tsog por 'dug la thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces/_tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_deng dge 'dun gyi dbyar nye bar sgrub pa dbyar zla 'bring po tshes bcu drug lags la/_bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i 
[\[240b.4\]]dbyar nye bar sgrub pa yang dbyar zla 'bring po tshes bcu drug lags te/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nang mtshams dang bcas pa'i gnas 'dir gnas ral ba dang 'drums pa bcos pa'i slad du sbyin bdag che ge mo zhes bgyi ba dang /_zhal ta bgyid pa che ge mo zhes bgyi ba dang /_spyod 
[\[240b.5\]]yul gyi grong khyer che ge mo zhes bgyi bar dbyar snga ma zla ba gsum gnas par dam 'cha'o/_/bdag dbyar 'di na mchis shing dbyar gyi gnas ni 'di lags so/_/zhes de skad lan gnyis de skad lan gsum du bzlas te/_de ltar dge slong rnams kyis dbyar gnas par dam 
[\[240b.6\]]bca' bar bya'o/_/dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gis mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/gal te song na der gnas par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gis mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[240b.7\]]gal te song na der gnas par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang glang po che skyong ba zhes bya ba'i grong na khyim bdag 'char ka zhes bya ba gnas te/_de'i khyim na rang gi 'ching ba bag ma blangs nas des gos kyi rnyed pa dang zas kyi rnyed pa mang du sta gon byas te/_des dge slong rnams la pho 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]nya btang nas 'phags pa dag longs spyad pa dag 'bul gyis tshur spyon ces spring ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis dri bar brtsams te/_glang po che skyong ba'i grong du ji srid yod/_der ni dpag tshad gsum lhag tsam mchis so/_/bdag cag gis 
[\[241a.2\]]deng nyid dong la slar 'khor bar nus sam mi nus snyam pa las/_de dag gis bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gis mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/gal te song na der gnas par mi bya'o zhes gsungs so 
[\[241a.3\]]snyam nas de rnams ma song ngo /_/de na glang po che skyong ba'i grong gi nye 'khor du dge slong gang dag dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa de dag la des gos kyi rnyed pa dang zas kyi rnyed pa mang du phul lo/_/de dag dbyar zla ba gsum 'das te chos gos byas pa dang ldan/_chos 
[\[241a.4\]]gos zin pa dang ldan nas lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing dong nas rim gyis rgyu zhing dong ba na mnyan yod du phyin to/_/de dag dge slong rnams kyis rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so/_/'ongs 
[\[241a.5\]]pa legs so zhes ngal sor bcug nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed gang nas da 'dir 'ongs/_gang du dbyar gnas par dam bcas/_tshe dang ldan pa bdag cag ni glang po che skyong ba'i grong nas da gzod 'dir 'ongs te/_glang po che skyong ba'i grong du dbyar gnas 
[\[241a.6\]]par dam bcas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag ji ga khyed cag glang po che skyong ba'i grong du bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas par dam bcas sam/_de na khyed bsod snyoms kyis brel bar ma gyur mod/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bden te/_bdag cag glang po che skyong ba'i grong du bde ba la 
[\[241a.7\]]reg par dbyar gnas par dam bcas shing bsod snyoms kyis kyang brel bar ma gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag ji lta ba zhig tu khyed cag glang po che skyong ba'i grong du bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas par dam bcas shing bsod snyoms kyis kyang ma brel/_tshe dang ldan pa dag glang 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]po che skyong ba'i grong de na khyim bdag 'char ka zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/_de'i khyim na rang gi 'ching ba bag ma blangs nas/_bdag cag la des gos kyi rnyed pa dang zas kyi rnyed pa mang du phul te/_de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag glang po che skyong ba'i grong du bde ba la 
[\[241b.2\]]reg par dbyar gnas par dam bcas te bsod snyoms kyis kyang brel bar ma gyur to/_/de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag la yang khyim bdag des pho nya btang nas 'phags pa dag longs spyad pa dag 'bul gyis 'dir spyon cig ces spring ba las/_
[\[241b.3\]]de la bdag cag gis glang po che skyong ba'i grong du ji srid yod ces smras na/_der dpag tshad gsum lhag tsam yod do zhes zer nas bdag cag gis blo skyes pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gis mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[241b.4\]]gal te song na der gnas par mi bya'o zhes gsungs so snyam nas bdag cag ma dong ngo /_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_kye ma nga'i nyan thos rnams ni gos kyi rnyed pa dang zas kyi rnyed pa dag 'dod 
[\[241b.5\]]kyis/_ma la ngas dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /_sbyin bdag gis byin pa'i chos yongs su spyad par bya ba'i phyir zhag bdun rjes su gnang bar bya ste/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste bya ba'i phyir zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la 'gro bar 
[\[241b.6\]]bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bya ba'i phyir zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs te 'gro bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dge slong dag gis gang gi bya ba'i phyir ma shes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[241b.7\]]pa/_dge bsnyen gyi bya ba dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i bya ba dang /_dge slong gi dang /_dge slong ma'i dang /_dge tshul gyi dang /_dge tshul ma'i bya ba'i phyir ro/_/dge bsnyen gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_'di ltar yang dge bsnyen gyi khyim du rang gi 'ching ba bag ma blangs te/_
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]des der gos kyi rnyed pa dang zas kyi rnyed pa mang du sta gon byas nas des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/_'phags pa dag longs spyad pa dag 'bul gyis tshur spyon cig ces spring na/_zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs nas dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i phyir dge 
[\[242a.2\]]slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yin no/_/gzhan yang dge bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge bsnyen gyis phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig par 'dod nas/_des der gos kyi rnyed pa dang zas kyi rnyed pa mang 
[\[242a.3\]]du sta gon byas te/_des dge slong dag la pho nya btang nas/_'phags pa dag longs spyad pa dag 'bul gyis tshur spyon cig ces spring na/_zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yin no/_/
[\[242a.4\]]gzhan yang dge bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge bsnyen gyis gtsug lag khang de nyid du gnas mal dbul bar 'dod par gyur nas/_des der gos kyi rnyed pa dang zas kyi rnyed pa mang du sta gon byas te/_des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang nas/_'phags pa dag 
[\[242a.5\]]longs spyad pa dag dbul gyis tshur spyon cig ces spring na/_zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yin no/_/gzhan yang dge bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge bsnyen gyis gtsug lag 
[\[242a.6\]]khang de nyid du mthun pa'i mchod sbyin brtan po bca' bar 'dod nas/_des der gos kyi rnyed pa dang zas kyi rnyed pa mang du sta gon byas te/_des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang nas/_'phags pa dag longs spyod pa dag dbul gyis tshur spyon cig ces spring na/_zhag bdun byin 
[\[242a.7\]]gyis brlabs la dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yin no/_/gzhan yang dge bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge bsnyen gyis gtsug lag khang de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis mchod rten brtsig par 'dod 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]nas/_des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/_'phags pa dag tshur spyon cig chos kyi grogs mdzod cig ces spring na/_zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yin no/_/gzhan yang 
[\[242b.2\]]dge bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge bsnyen gyis mchod rten de nyid la srog shing gzugs pa dang /_gdugs gdags pa dang /_rgyal mtshan gzugs pa dang /_'phan gdags pa dang /_dri sna tshogs kyi byug pa dang /_tsan dan gyi bsku ba dang /_gur kum gyi 
[\[242b.3\]]byug pa dag dbul bar 'dod nas/_des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/_'phags pa dag tshur spyon cig_/bdag gi chos kyi grogs mdzod cig ces spring na/_zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge bsnyen 
[\[242b.4\]]gyi bya ba yin no/_/gzhan yang dge bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge bsnyen gyis mdo sde ris bzhi las mdo sde'i ris gang yang rung ba zhig rgyas par bklags sam bton par gyur nas/_des der gos kyi rnyed pa dang zas kyi rnyed pa mang du sta gon byas te/_dge slong dag la pho nya 
[\[242b.5\]]btang nas 'phags pa dag longs spyad pa dag dbul gyis tshur spyon cig ces spring na/_zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yin no/_/gzhan yang dge bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge bsnyen zhig 
[\[242b.6\]]'gyod par gyur nas des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/_'phags pa dag 'gyod pa skyes pa so sor bsal gyis tshur spyon cig ces spring na/_zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yin no/_/
[\[242b.7\]]gzhan yang dge bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge bsnyen zhig sdig pa can gyi lta bar song ba skyes par gyur nas/_des dge slong dag la pho nya btang ste/_'phags pa dag sdig pa can gyi lta bar song ba skyes pa de so sor bsal gyis tshur spyon cig ces 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]spring na/_zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yin no/_/gzhan yang dge bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge 'dun gyis dge bsnyen la lhung bzed khas dbub par 'dod par gyur 
[\[243a.2\]]pa dang /_des dge slong dag la pho nya btang ste/_'phags pa dag chos dang mthun pa'i phyogs sten par bgyid kyis tshur spyon cig ces spring na/_zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yin no/_/
[\[243a.3\]]gzhan yang dge bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge 'dun gyis dge bsnyen la lhung bzed khas bub par gyur pa dang /_des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/_'phags pa dag lhung bzed khas bub pa btang bar gsol/_tshur spyon cig ces spring na zhag bdun byin gyis 
[\[243a.4\]]brlabs la dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yin no/_/gzhan yang dge bsnyen gyi bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge bsnyen na ba sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che bar gyur nas des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/_'phags pa dag 
[\[243a.5\]]tshur spyon cig_/'ga' stsol cig ces spring na zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge bsnyen gyi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge bsnyen gyi bya ba yin no/_/dge bsnyen ma'i bya ba gang zhe na/_de dag thams cad dge bsnyen ma'i bya ba yin te/_rang gi 
[\[243a.6\]]'ching ba bag ma len pa ni ma gtogs so/_/dge slong gi bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge slong zhig gis phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la kun dga' ra ba dbul bar 'dod nas/_des der gos kyi rnyed pa dang zas kyi rnyed pa mang du sta gon byas nas des dge slong 
[\[243a.7\]]rnams la pho nya btang ste/_tshe dang ldan pa dag longs spyad pa dag 'bul gyis tshur spyon cig ces spring na/_zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge slong gi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge slong gi bya ba yin no/_/gzhan yang dge slong gi bya ba 'di lta ste/_
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]dge slong gis kun dga' ra ba de nyid du gtsug lag khang dang /_gnas mal dang /_'tsho ba brtan po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi mchod rten la dri sna tshogs kyis byug pa dang /_tsan dan gyis byug pa dang /_srog shing gzugs pa dang /_rgyal 
[\[243b.2\]]mtshan gzugs pa dang /_mdo sde'i ris bzhi las mdo sde'i ris gang yang rung ba dang /_'gyod pa dang /_sdig pa'i lta bar song ba skyes nas des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/_tshe dang ldan pa dag sdig pa'i lta bar song ba skyes pa so sor bsal gyis tshur spyon 
[\[243b.3\]]cig ces spring na/_zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge slong gi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge slong gi bya ba yin te/_thams cad gong ma bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/gzhan yang dge slong gi bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong 
[\[243b.4\]]zhig la chad pa'i las 'di lta ste/_bsdigs pa'i las sam/_smad pa'i las sam/_bskrad pa'am/_phyir 'gyed pa dang /_mi snang bar gnas nas dbyung ba'am/_phyir mi 'chos pa gnas nas dbyung ba'am/_sdig pa'i lta bar song ba ma btang ba gnas nas dbyung 
[\[243b.5\]]ba'i las de lta bu bya bar 'dod par gyur pa dang /_des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/_tshe dang ldan pa dag chos dang mthun pa'i phyogs dang mthun par bgyid par 'gyur gyis tshur spyon cig ces spring na/_zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge slong gi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro 
[\[243b.6\]]bar bya ste/_'di ni dge slong gi bya ba yin no/_/gzhan yang dge slong gi bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge 'dun gyis dge slong gi chad pa'i las 'di lta ste/_bsdigs pa'i las sam/_smad pa'i las sam/_bskrad pa'i las sam/_phyir 'gyed pa'i las sam/_mi snang bar 
[\[243b.7\]]gnas nas dbyung ba'am/_phyir mi 'chos pa gnas nas dbyung ba'am/_sdig pa'i lta bar song ba gnas nas dbyung ba'i las de lta bu byas pa dang /_des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'byin par 'gyur gyis/_tshur spyon cig ces spring na/_
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge slong gi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge slong gi bya ba yin no/_/gzhan yang dge slong gi bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge slong zhig la dge 'dun gyis lhag ma'i ltung ba byung bar gyur nas/_des dge slong 
[\[244a.2\]]rnams la pho nya btang ste/_tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur spyon/_spo ba stsal du gsol zhes spring na zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge slong gi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge slong gi bya ba yin no/_/gzhan yang dge slong gi bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge slong gis 
[\[244a.3\]]spo ba rdzogs nas des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/_tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur spyon/_mgu bar bgyi ba stsal du gsol zhes spring na/_zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs te dge slong gi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge slong gi bya ba yin no/_/gzhan 
[\[244a.4\]]yang dge slong gi bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge slong gis mgu bar bya ba spyad nas des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/_tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur spyon dbyung ba bgyir gsol zhes spring na/_zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs te dge slong gi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni 
[\[244a.5\]]dge slong gi bya ba yin no/_/gzhan yang dge slong gi bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge slong na ba sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che ba zhig gis dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/_tshe dang ldan pa dag tshur spyon cig_/'ga' stsol cig ces spring na zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge 
[\[244a.6\]]slong gi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge slong gi bya ba yin no/_/dge slong ma'i bya ba gang zhe na/_de dag thams cad dge slong ma'i bya ba yin te/_chad pa'i las ni ma gtogs so/_/gzhan yang dge slong ma'i bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge slong ma 
[\[244a.7\]]zhig la lci ba'i chos kyi ltung ba byung bar gyur nas des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/_'phags pa dag tshur spyon/_zla ba phyed kyi bar du mgu bar bgyi ba stsal du gsol zhes spring na/_zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge slong ma'i bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]'di ni dge slong ma'i bya ba yin no/_/dge slob ma'i bya ba gang zhe na/_de dag thams cad dge slob ma'i bya ba yin no/_/gzhan yang dge slob ma'i bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge slob mas lo gnyis kyi bar du bslab pa'i chos drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos drug bslabs nas des 
[\[244b.2\]]dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/_'phags pa dag bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/_tshur spyon cig ces spring na/_zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge slob ma'i bya ba'i phyir/_dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge slob ma'i bya ba yin no/_/dge tshul 
[\[244b.3\]]gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_de dag thams cad dge tshul gyi bya ba yin no/_/gzhan yang dge tshul gyi bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge tshul lo nyi shu lon par gyur nas des dge slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/_'phags pa dag bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol tshur spyon 
[\[244b.4\]]cig ces spring na/_zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge tshul gyi bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge tshul gyi bya ba yin no/_/dge tshul ma'i bya ba gang zhe na/_de dag thams cad dge tshul ma'i bya ba yin no/_/gzhan yang dge tshul ma'i bya ba 'di lta ste/_dge 
[\[244b.5\]]tshul ma khyim so bzung ba lo bcu gnyis lon pa'am/_gzhon nu ma lo [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad lon nas des dge slong dag la pho nya btang ste/_'phags pa dag lo gnyis kyi bar du chos drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos drug gi bslab pa stsal du gsol tshur spyon cig ces spring na/_zhag bdun 
[\[244b.6\]]byin gyis brlabs la dge tshul ma'i bya ba'i phyir dge slong 'gro bar bya ste/_'di ni dge tshul ma'i bya ba yin no//_//sdom la/_kha zas sman dang g.yog dang ni/_/bud med skyes pa ma ning dang /_/mtshan ma gter dang gnyen dag dang /_/bar chad kyis ni 'gro bya ba'o/_/'di 
[\[244b.7\]]ltar yang dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas par dam bcas na bdag la bsod snyoms ster ba ni 'ga' yang med de/_bdag gis bsod snyoms ma rnyed pas bdag nyon mongs pa'am shi na bdag gi ma thob pa 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]thob par bya ba dang /_ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang /_mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba de'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na 
[\[245a.2\]]ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas par dam bcas na bdag nad kyis thebs na na ba la nad kyi sman sbyin pa ni 'ga' yang med de/_bdag gis sman ma rnyed pas nyon mongs 
[\[245a.3\]]pa'am shi na bdag gi ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang /_ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang /_mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba de'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas song ba 
[\[245a.4\]]las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas par dam bcas na bdag nad kyis thebs na nad g.yog byed pa 'ga' yang med do/_/bdag la nad g.yog byed pa med 
[\[245a.5\]]pas nyon mongs pa'am shi na bdag gi ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang /_ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang /_mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba de'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas 
[\[245a.6\]]song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po nyi shu pa/_'di ltar yang dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gi drung du bud med dag 'ongs te mi 'tsham pa'i gsol bas gsol ba 'debs te/_'phags pa bzhugs 
[\[245a.7\]]shig_/'phags pa dgyes par mdzod cig_/khyod la bdag gis bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/_/khyod la bu mo dbul lo/_/khyod la mna' ma dang /_khyod la bran mo dang /_las bgyid pa 'bul lo/_/de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]sems te/_gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas par dam bcas na bud med 'di bdag gi drung du 'ongs nas mi 'tsham pa'i gsol bas gsol ba 'debs te/_'phags pa bzhugs shig_/'phags pa dgyes par mdzod cig_/khyod la bdag bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/_/
[\[245b.2\]]khyod la bu mo 'bul lo/_/khyod la mna' ma dang /_khyod la bran mo dang /_las bgyid pa 'bul lo/_/zhes zer te/_gal te gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /_tshangs par spyod 
[\[245b.3\]]pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam ste/_des de lta bus rkyen byas nas gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gi drung du skyes pa zhig 'ongs nas mi 'tsham 
[\[245b.4\]]pa'i gsol bas gsol ba 'debs te/_'phags pa bzhugs shig_/'phags pa dgyes par mdzod cig_/khyod la bdag bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/_/khyod la bu mo 'bul lo/_/khyod la mna' ma dang /_khyod la bran mo dang /_las byed pa 'bul lo/_/de 
[\[245b.5\]]na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas par dam bcas na bdag gi drung du skyes pa 'di 'ongs nas mi 'tsham pa'i gsol bas gsol ba 'debs te/_'phags pa bzhugs shig_/'phags pa dgyes 
[\[245b.6\]]par mdzod cig_/khyod la bdag bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/_/khyod la bu mo 'bul lo/_/mna' ma dang /_bran mo dang /_las bgyid pa 'bul lo zhes zer na/_gal te gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 
[\[245b.7\]]bar chad dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gi drung du ma 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]ning zhig 'ongs nas mi 'tsham pa'i gsol bas gsol ba 'debs te/_'phags pa bzhugs shig_/'phags pa dgyes par mdzod cig_/khyod la bdag bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/_/khyod la bran mo dang /_las bgyid pa 'bul lo/_/de na 
[\[246a.2\]]dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas par dam bcas na bdag gi drung du ma ning 'di 'ongs nas mi 'tsham pa'i gsol bas gsol ba 'debs te/_'phags pa bzhugs shig_/'phags pa dgyes 
[\[246a.3\]]par mdzod cig_/khyod la bdag bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/_/khyod la bran mo dang /_khyod la las bgyid pa 'bul lo zhes zer te/_gal te gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /_tshangs 
[\[246a.4\]]par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gis bud med gzhon nu mdog 
[\[246a.5\]]mdzes pa chags par 'os pa zhig mthong nas tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa'i mtshan ma bzung bar gyur to/_/de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas par dam bcas na bud med gzhon nu 
[\[246a.6\]]mdzes pa chags par 'os pa zhig mthong nas tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i mtshan ma bzung bas gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur 
[\[246a.7\]]gyis/_ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gis nor gyi gter zhig mthong ngo /_/de na dbyar gnas par 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas par dam bcas na bdag gis 'dir nor gyi gter zhig mthong bas/_gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad 
[\[246b.2\]]dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gi drung du gnyen 
[\[246b.3\]]dag 'ongs nas mi 'tsham pa'i gsol bas gsol ba 'debs te/_'phags pa khyod ci'i phyir mgo bregs shing lhung bzed lag tu thogs te/_rigs kyi grong nas grong du rgyu zhing gos ngur smrig grang mo 'dis kyang lus gdung bar bgyi/_'phags pa khyod tshur spyon/_
[\[246b.4\]]'dod pa la yongs su spyod cig_/sbyin pa dag stsol cig_/bsod nams dag gyis shig_/de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gnas 'dir dbyar gnas par dam bcas pas bdag gi drung du gnyen dag 'ongs nas mi 
[\[246b.5\]]'tsham pa'i gsol bas gsol ba 'debs te/_'phags pa khyod ci'i phyir mgo bregs shing lhung bzed lag tu thogs te/_rigs kyi grong nas grong du rgyu zhing gos ngur smrig grang mo 'dis kyang lus gdung bar bgyi/_'phags pa khyod tshur spyon/_'dod pa la 
[\[246b.6\]]yongs su spyod cig_/sbyin pa dag stsol cig_/bsod nams dag gyis shig ces zer te/_gal te gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis 
[\[246b.7\]]ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs can kun dga' ra ba'i sgo'i bar du lhags nas spar thabs su skur pa sgrogs shing /_shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag zung shig ces bya ba nas/_gong du gso sbyong gi gzhir ji skad bstan pa de bzhin rgyas 
[\[247a.2\]]par rdzogs par brjod par bya ste/_de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas par dam bcas na rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs can zhes bya 
[\[247a.3\]]ba gong ma bzhin te/_gal te gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/_des de lta bus rkyen 
[\[247a.4\]]byas te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang dge slong gis skyes pa 'am/_bud med dam/_ma ning gang la brten nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur pa de rgyal pos bzung ngam/_btson du bzung ngam/_bsad dam/_
[\[247a.5\]]de'i nor 'phrogs sam/_rgyal po'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan nam/_yul gzhan du bros sam shi bar gyur la/_de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_ma ning gang la brten 
[\[247a.6\]]nas 'dir dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa de rgyal pos bzung ngam/_btson du bzung ngam/_bsad dam/_de'i nor 'phrogs sam/_rgyal po'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan nam/_yul gzhan du bros sam shi bar gyur pas/_gal te bdag gnas 
[\[247a.7\]]'dir dbyar gnas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang chom rkun pa dag gis grong bcom mam/_grong khyer bcom mam/_yul ljongs bcom nas kun dga' ra ba'i sgor lhags te/_ba lang bsad dam/_ma he 'am/_ra bsad pa'i khrag gis yan lag byugs nas dge 
[\[247b.2\]]slong rnams la pho nya btang ste/_'phags pa dag phyir byung shig_/bdag cag 'dir gnas so zhes spring la/_de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gnas 'dir dbyar gnas par dam bcas na chom rkun pa 'di dag 
[\[247b.3\]]grong bcom mam zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang dge slong gis bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_ma ning gang la brten nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur 
[\[247b.4\]]pa de chom rkun pas bzung ngam/_btson du bzung ngam/_bsad dam/_de'i nor 'phrogs sam/_chom rkun pa'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan nam/_yul gzhan du bros sam shi bar gyur la/_de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du 
[\[247b.5\]]sems te/_bdag bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_ma ning gang la brten te dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa de chom rkun pa dag gis bzung ngam/_btson du bzung ngam/_bsad dam/_de'i nor 'phrogs sam/_chom rkun pa'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan 
[\[247b.6\]]nam/_yul gzhan du bros sam shi bar gyur pas/_gal te bdag gnas 'dir dbyar gnas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o 
[\[247b.7\]]snyam nas/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang rgan zhugs mi shes pa/_rmongs pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas pa gzhan zhig gis spyod yul lam/_spyod yul gyi lam kar rigs kyi bud 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]med dam/_rigs kyi na chung la gshes sam/_kha ngan smras sam/_reg pas mi rnams khros te/_kun dga' ra ba'i sgor lhags nas spar thabs su skur pa sgrogs shing zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te/_gnas 
[\[248a.2\]]de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang dge slong gis bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_ma ning gang la brten nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur pa de mi rnams kyis bzung ngam/_btson du bzung ngam/_bsad dam/_de'i nor 
[\[248a.3\]]'phrogs sam/_mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pas yul gzhan nam/_yul gzhan du bros sam shi bar gyur la/_de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_ma ning gang la brten te gnas 'dir 
[\[248a.4\]]dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa de mi rnams kyis bzung ngam/_btson du bzung ngam/_bsad dam/_de'i nor 'phrogs sam/_mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan nam/_yul gzhan du bros sam shi bar gyur pas/_gal te bdag gnas 'dir 
[\[248a.5\]]dbyar gnas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba 
[\[248a.6\]]med do/_/'di ltar yang mi ma yin pa gnas pa'i phyogs shig tu gtsug lag khang brtsigs la/_de na rgan zhugs mi shes pa/_rmongs pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas pa gzhan zhig gis mi rung ba'i phyogs shig tu bshang ba dang gci ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma 
[\[248a.7\]]bzhin te/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang dge slong gis bud med dam/_skyes pa 'am/_ma ning gang la brten nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur pa de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis bzung ngam/_
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]btson du bzung ngam/_bsad dam/_de'i nor 'phrogs sam/_mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan nam/_yul gzhan du bros sam shi bar gyur la/_de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag bud med dam/_
[\[248b.2\]]skyes pa'am/_ma ning gang la brten nas 'dir dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa de mi ma yin pas bzung ngam/_btson du bzung ngam/_bsad dam/_de'i nor 'phrogs sam/_mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan nam/_yul gzhan du bros sam 
[\[248b.3\]]shi bar gyur pas/_gal te bdag gnas 'dir dbyar gnas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/_des de lta bus rkyen 
[\[248b.4\]]byas te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang gdug pa gnas pa'i phyogs shig tu gtsug lag khang brtsigs la/_de na rgan zhugs mi shes pa/_rmongs pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas pa gzhan zhig gis mi rung ba'i phyogs 
[\[248b.5\]]shig tu bshang ba dang /_gci ba dang /_mchil ma dang /_snabs dang /_skyugs pa dang /_'khru ba dag bor zhing mi gtsang bas sbags pa'i gnas mal bzhag par gyur nas gdug pa khros te spyod yul lam/_spyod yul gyi lam ka'am/_'chag sa'am/_khyams 
[\[248b.6\]]sam/_sgo khang rnams su 'dug nas dge slong rnams la 'bab par byed de/_de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin te/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/
[\[248b.7\]]'di ltar yang dge slong gis bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_ma ning gang la brten nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur pa de gtum po dag gis bzung ngam/_btson du bzung ngam/_bsad dam/_gtum po'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan nam/_
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]yul gzhan du bros sam shi bar gyur la/_de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_ma ning gang la brten te 'dir dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa de gtum po rnams kyis bzung 
[\[249a.2\]]ngam/_btson du bzung ngam/_de'i nor 'phrogs sam/_gtum po'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan nam/_yul gzhan du bros sam shi bar gyur pas/_gal te bdag gnas 'dir dbyar gnas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi 
[\[249a.3\]]tshul gyi bar chad dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang klu gnas pa'i phyogs shig tu gtsug lag 
[\[249a.4\]]khang brtsigs te zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang dge slong gis bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_ma ning gang la brten nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas par 
[\[249a.5\]]gyur pa de klu rnams kyis bzung ngam/_btson du bzung ngam/_bsad dam/_de'i nor 'phrogs sam/_klu'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan nam/_yul gzhan du bros sam shi bar gyur la/_de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam 
[\[249a.6\]]du sems te/_bdag bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_ma ning gang la brten nas 'dir dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa de klu rnams kyis bzung ngam/_btson du bzung ngam/_bsad dam/_de'i nor 'phrogs sam/_klu'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor 
[\[249a.7\]]gzhan nam/_yul gzhan du bros sam shi bar gyur pas/_gal te gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gnas 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang nags khrod cig tu gtsug lag khang brtsigs la zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas song ba las 
[\[249b.2\]]dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang dge slong gis bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_ma ning gang la brten nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur pa de mes tshig gam/_de'i nor mes tshig gam/_me'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan nam/_yul 
[\[249b.3\]]gzhan du bros sam shi bar gyur la/_de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_ma ning gang la brten te 'dir dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa de mes tshig gam/_de'i nor mes tshig gam/_
[\[249b.4\]]me'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan nam/_yul gzhan du bros sam shi bar gyur pas/_gal te gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_
[\[249b.5\]]ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang gshong zhig gi dbus su gtsug lag khang brtsigs la zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/_des de lta bus rkyen byas 
[\[249b.6\]]te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang dge slong gis bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_ma ning gang la brten te dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur pa de chus khyer ram/_de'i nor chus khyer ram/_chu'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor 
[\[249b.7\]]gzhan nam/_yul gzhan du bros sam shi bar gyur la/_de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_ma ning gang la brten nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa de chus khyer ram/_de'i nor chus 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]khyer ram/_chu'i 'jigs pas yul 'khor gzhan nam/_yul gzhan du bros sam shi bar gyur pas/_gal te bdag gnas 'dir dbyar gnas na gzhi des bdag gi srog gi bar chad dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i 
[\[250a.2\]]bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do//_//sdom la/_dbyar ral ltung ba med pa dang /_/gnas par dam ni 'cha' ba dag_/snga ma yi ni bcu 
[\[250a.3\]]gnyis dang /_/phyi ma yi ni bcu gnyis so/_/'di ltar yang dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gis dge slong zhig dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya bar rtsol zhing de lta de lta bur dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug 
[\[250a.4\]]par byed cing /_gang yang gnas 'dir dbyar gyi nang logs nyid du dge 'dun bye bar 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod par mthong nas/_de na dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/_gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas par dam bcas na/_
[\[250a.5\]]dge slong 'di dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya bar rtsol zhing de lta de lta bur dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug par byed cing gang yang gnas 'dir dbyar gyi nang logs nyid du dge 'dun bye bar 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod de/_
[\[250a.6\]]gal te gnas 'dir bdag dbyar gnas na gang yang mi mthun pa'i sems skyes sam/_ma brtags pa'i tshig byung na bdag gi ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang /_ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang /_mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i bar chad du 'gyur 
[\[250a.7\]]ba'i gnas 'di yod pas/_ma la bdag gnas 'di nas 'gro'o snyam nas/_des de lta bus rkyen byas te gnas de nas song ba las dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gis gnas ga ge mo zhig tu dge slong 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]zhig gis dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya bar rtsol zhing de lta de lta bur dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug par byed cing /_gang yang gnas der dbyar gyi nang logs nyid du dge 'dun bye bar 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod par 
[\[250b.2\]]thos la/_dge slong de dang ni bdag tu gtam 'dres pa/_phebs par smra ba/_smos 'drin pa/_'grogs bshes pa yin gyis/_gal te bdag der song na bdag gis ji ltar gnas der dbyar gyi nang logs su dge 'dun bye bar mi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bya nus so snyam 
[\[250b.3\]]na/_dge slong gis zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge 'dun gyi bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya ste/_gal te der song na legs/_ma song na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gal te dge 'dun gyi bya ba'i phyir der song ba las zhag bdun 'das te dbyar ral na ltung ba 
[\[250b.4\]]med do/_/'di ltar yang dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i dge slong gis gnas ga ge mo zhig tu dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyi dbyen bya bar rtsol zhing de lta de lta bur dge slong rnams la go bar byed/_kun tu go bar byed/_slob par byed/_'dzin du 'jug par byed 
[\[250b.5\]]cing /_gang yang gnas der dbyar gyi nang logs nyid du dge 'dun bye bar 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod par thos la/_dge slong de dang bdag tu ni gtam 'dres pa dang /_phebs par smra ba dang /_smos 'drin pa dang /_'grogs bshes pa ma yin mod kyi/_'on kyang 
[\[250b.6\]]dge slong de gang dang gtam 'dris pa/_phebs par smra ba/_smos 'drin pa/_'grogs bshes pa'i dge slong de dang bdag tu gtam 'dres pa/_phebs par smra ba/_smos 'drin pa/_'grogs bshes pa yin gyis/_bdag der song la bdag gis ji ltar gnas 
[\[250b.7\]]der dbyar gyi nang logs su dge 'dun bye bar mi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bya nus so snyam nas/_dge slong gis zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la dge 'dun gyi bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya ste/_gal te song na legs/_ma song na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gal te 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]dge 'dun gyi bya ba'i phyir der song ba las zhag bdun 'das te dbyar ral na ltung ba med do/_/'di ltar yang dge slong gis gnas ga ge mo zhig tu dbyar snga ma zla ba gsum gnas par dam bcas pa las gnas de gnyis na rnyed pa ni thun mong /_gso sbyin ni tha dad 
[\[251a.2\]]pa dang de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag 'dir gnas kyang rnyed pa ni der zad/_bdag der gnas kyang rnyed pa ni der zad do snyam nas/_de dam bcas par ma song na de'i gnas der snga ma'i zla ba gsum yang ma yin la/_dam bcas pas nyes byas su yang 'gyur ro/_/
[\[251a.3\]]'di ltar yang dge slong gis gnas ga ge mo zhig tu snga ma'i zla ba gsum gnas par dam bcas te/_de dam bcas par song nas tshul shing ma blangs la bya ba'i phyir de song na de'i gnas der snga ma'i zla ba gsum yang ma yin la/_dam bcas pas nyes byas su yang 
[\[251a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/'di ltar yang dge slong gis gnas ga ge mo zhig tu snga ma'i zla ba gsum gnas par dam bcas te/_de dam bcas par song nas tshul shing ni blangs kyis gnas mal ni ma blangs la bya ba'i phyir de song na de'i gnas der snga ma'i zla ba gsum yang ma yin la/_
[\[251a.5\]]dam bcas pas nyes byas su yang 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar yang dge slong gis gnas ga ge mo zhig tu snga ma'i zla ba gsum gnas so zhes dam bcas te/_de dam bcas par song nas tshul shing yang blangs gnas mal yang blangs kyi/_dbyar gnas par dam bcas 
[\[251a.6\]]la/_bya ba'i phyir de song na de'i gnas der snga ma'i zla ba gsum yang ma yin la/_dam bcas pas nyes byas su yang 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar yang dge slong gis gnas ga ge mo zhig tu snga ma'i zla ba gsum gnas par dam bcas te/_de dam bcas par song nas tshul 
[\[251a.7\]]shing yang blangs/_gnas mal yang blangs/_dbyar gnas par dam bcas la/_bya ba'i phyir byin gyis ma brlabs par zhag bdun mtshams kyi phyi rol du de song na de'i gnas der snga ma'i zla ba gsum yang ma yin la/_dam bcas pas nyes byas su yang 'gyur ro/_/
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]'di ltar yang dge slong gis gnas ga ge mo zhig tu snga ma'i zla ba gsum gnas so zhes dam bcas la/_de dam bcas par song nas tshul shing yang blangs/_gnas mal yang blangs/_dbyar gnas par dam yang bcas nas bya ba'i phyir zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs la 
[\[251b.2\]]mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba na de'i gnas der snga ma'i zla ba gsum yang yin la/_dam bcas pa la nyes byas su yang mi 'gyur te/_gal te bya ba de nyid kyi phyir de'i zhag bdun 'das pa la dbyar ral ba'i ltung ba med do/_/bya ba'i phyir drug po ji lta ba de bzhin du bya ba ma 
[\[251b.3\]]yin pa yang drug go/_/snga ma zla ba gsum ji lta ba de bzhin phyi ma yang zla ba gsum mo/_/dbyar gyi gzhi rdzogs so//_//[{D1-5}]ko lpags kyi gzhi'i sdom la/_lngas ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang /_/gnas mal che dang be'u dang ni/_/bzhon pa khrus dang ba lang 'jug_/
[\[251b.4\]]shing lham ri mo can min no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe rdo can zhes bya ba'i yul gyi mtha' na gnas pa zhes bya ba'i grong na khyim bdag stobs kyi sde zhes bya ba phyug pa/_
[\[251b.5\]]nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig 'dug ste/_des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_
[\[251b.6\]]dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed kyang bu pho yang med/_bu mo yang med nas/_lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing bdag la bu pho yang med/_bu mo yang med pas nor rdzas 'di rnyed bdag gis 
[\[251b.7\]]khyim du bsags kyang /_bdag shi nas bdog pa thams cad bdag la bu med do zhes nas rgyal pos dbang byas par 'gyur ro snyam du sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de'i mdza' bshes dang nye du dang gnyen rnams kyis smras pa/_khyod ci'i phyir sems khong du chud 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]lha la gsol ba byos shig_/khyod la bu yod par 'gyur ro/_/des bsams pa/_legs pa zhig smras kyis/_ma la bdag gis bu'i phyir lha rnams la gsol ba bya'o snyam nas bu med pa de bu mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir zhi ba dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan 
[\[252a.2\]]dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams la yang gsol ba byed de/_'di lta ste kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang /_nags tshal gyi lha dang /_bzhi mdo'i lha dang /_sum mdo'i lha dang /_gtor ma len pa'i lha dang /_lhan cig skyes pa dang /_chos mthun pa dang /_
[\[252a.3\]]rtag par rjes su 'brang ba'i lha la yang gsol ba 'debs so/_/'jig rten na gang dag gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las bu pho dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ba'i gtam de lta bu grag ste/_de ni de lta ma yin te/_gal te de ltar 'gyur du zin na re re la yang 'di lta ste/_dper na 'khor 
[\[252a.4\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang gnas gsum po dag mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/_gnas gsum gang zhe na/_'di ltar pha dang ma gnyis chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang /_ma yang rung zhing zla mtshan dang 
[\[252a.5\]]ldan pa dang /_dri za nye bar gnas pa ste/_gnas gsum po de dag mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa lhur len cing 'dug pa las srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can spyod pa tshol ba/_thar pa'i snying po bzung ba/_mya ngan 
[\[252a.6\]]las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs pa/_'khor ba las phyir phyogs pa/_srid pa pa'i 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho dang skye ba don du mi gnyer ba/_lus tha ma 'dzin pa zhig lha'i ris shig nas shi 'phos nas de'i chung ma'i rum du zhugs so/_/bud med mkhas 
[\[252a.7\]]pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod do/_/lnga gang zhe na/_skyes pa chags pa shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang /_dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang /_mngal du zhugs pa shes pa dang /_gang las mngal du zhugs pa de 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]yang shes pa dang /_bu pho shes shing bu mo shes pa'o/_/gal te khye'ur 'gyur na dku g.yas par rten cing gnas so/_/gal te bu mor 'gyur na dku g.yon par rten cing gnas so/_/de yid dga' zhing mgu nas khyim thab la smras pa/_rje'i sras dgyes pa bskyed du 
[\[252b.2\]]gsol/_bdag la sems can zhugs pa ni 'di ltar bdag gi dku g.yas par rten cing gnas pa las na gdon mi za bar khye'ur 'gyur ro/_/de yang dga' zhing mgu bas ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/_'di ltar bdag gis yun ring mo zhig nas mngon par 
[\[252b.3\]]'dod pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'gyur gyis/_bdag dang mthun par skye zhing mi mthun par mi skye ba dang /_bdag gi bya ba dag byed pa dang /_gsos pas phyir gso ba dang /_bgo skal la spyod pa dang /_bdag gi rigs kyi rgyud yun ring du gnas par sgrub pa dang /_
[\[252b.4\]]bdag cag shi zhing dus la bab pa na nyung ngu'am mang po yang rung sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas 'di de gnyis gang du skyes pa der 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bar gyur cig ces bdag cag gnyis kyi ming nas brjod cing yon sngo ba byed par 'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/
[\[252b.5\]]de la sems can zhugs par shes nas gang yang mngal na gnas pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dang /_dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dang /_sman pas bcas pa'i zas ha cang mi kha ba dang /_ha cang mi skyur ba dang /_ha 
[\[252b.6\]]cang lan tshwa mi che ba dang /_ha cang mi mngar ba dang /_ha cang mi tsha ba dang /_ha cang mi bska ba dang /_kha ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_mngar ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba rnams spangs pa'i zas dang /_se mo do dang /_do shal dag gis brgyan pa'i lus lha'i bu mo dga' tshal 
[\[252b.7\]]na rnam par spyod pa bzhin du khri nas khri dang /_khri'u nas khri'ur rgyu zhing shod kyis gzhir mi 'bab ste/_sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi grag par byas so/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_pags pa'i 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]mdog gser 'dra ba/_mgo gdugs lta bu lag pa ring ba/_dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/_smin ma 'jar ba/_sna'i gzangs mtho ba/_rin po ches spras pa'i rna cha rna ba la btags pa'i khye'u zhig btsas so/_/gnas pa zhes bya ba'i grong na rin po che dpyod pa 
[\[253a.2\]]ji snyed cig gnas pa de thams cad khyim bdag stobs kyi sdes rin po che brtag pa'i phyir bkug nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag rin po che rin thang chod cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_rin po che'i rin thang gcad par mi nus so/_/chos nyid kyis rin thang gcad par mi 
[\[253a.3\]]nus pa'i rin po che gang yin pa de ni bye ba ri ba yin pas/_de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag rin po che 'di ni bye ba ri'o/_/de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas ming 'dogs par byed de/_shes 
[\[253a.4\]]ldan dag khye'u'i ming cir gdags/_gnyen dag gis smras pa/_khye'u 'di rin po che bye ba ri bas spras pa'i rna cha rna ba la btags shing rgyu skar gro bzhin la btsas pas khye'u'i ming gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba rir gdags so zhes de'i ming gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba rir btags 
[\[253a.5\]]so/_/gang gi nyi ma la gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri btsas pa de'i nyi ma la khyim bdag stobs kyi sde'i mngag gzhug pa'i khye'u gnyis btsas te/_des gcig gi ming ni bran zhes bya bar btags so/_/gcig gi ming ni skyong ba zhes bya bar btags so/_/gro bzhin 
[\[253a.6\]]skyes rna ba bye ba ri ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de/_pang na mtsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis te/_ma ma brgyad kyis de 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar sar pa dang /_zhun mar 
[\[253a.7\]]dang /_mar gyi snying khu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/_skyed par byed de/_rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do/_/de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /_rtsis dang /_grangs dang /_lag 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]rtsis dang /_dbyung ba dang /_gzhug pa dang /_gzhag pa dang /_len pa dang /_gzhi brtag pa dang /_ras brtag pa dang /_rin po che brtag pa dang /_glang po che brtag pa dang /_rta brtag pa dang /_bud med brtag pa dang /_skyes pa brtag pa dang /_
[\[253b.2\]]shing brtag pa la nye bar zhugs te/_de brtag pa brgyad rnams la byang zhing 'byed pa dang /_klog pa la g.yer por gyur to/_/de'i phas 'dug pa'i khang pa gsum po dgun gyi dang /_dpyid kyi dang /_dbyar gyi brtsigs so/_/skyed mos tshal gsum 
[\[253b.3\]]po dgun gyi dang /_dpyid kyi dang /_dbyar gyi btsugs nas chung ma gsum po chen ma dang /_bar ma dang /_chun ma nye bar bzhag nas/_de steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi la skyes pa med par rol mos rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur 
[\[253b.4\]]spyod par byed do/_/khyim bdag stobs kyi sde ni rtag tu zhing las kyi mtha' la 'bad do/_/des pha de rtag par zhing las kyi mtha' la 'bad pa mthong nas de la smras pa/_yab khyod ci'i phyir rtag tu zhing las kyi mtha' la 'bad/_des smras pa/_bu khyod 
[\[253b.5\]]ji ltar steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi na skyes pa med par rol mos rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de bzhin du ngas kyang rtsed mo byas/_dga' bar byas/_dga' mgur spyad na ring por mi thogs par bdag cag gi longs spyod 
[\[253b.6\]]'gribs shing yongs su zad pa dang gtugs par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_yab gal te de lta na bdag zong thogs te yul gyi mthar mchi'o/_/bu re zhig nga la rin po che'i rigs gal te khyod kyis til dang /_'bras dang /_rgya shug dang /_mon 
[\[253b.7\]]sran bzhin du rin po che yongs su spyad kyang rin po che dag yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ba nga la yod do/_/des yang dang yang du smras pa/_yab bdag ni zong thogs la yul gyi mthar mchi'o/_/des de nges par gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas gnang ngo /_/
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]khyim bdag stobs kyi sdes gnas pa'i grong du dril bsgrags nas/_gnas pa'i grong na gnas pa'i shes ldan tshong pa dag nyon cig_/gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par 'gyur gyis/_shes ldan khyed las gang zhig gro 
[\[254a.2\]]bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri dang lhan cig sho gam med pa dang /_bsel ba'i rngan pa mi dgos pa dang /_gru btsas mi dgos par rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par spro ba de dag rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i zong sdogs shig_/tshong pa lnga brgyas rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa'i zong 
[\[254a.3\]]sta gon byas so/_/khyim bdag stobs kyi sdes tshong pa lnga brgya po rang gi khyim du mgron du bos te zas byin nas smras pa/_shes ldan tshong pa dag nyon cig_/gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri ji ltar bdag gi bu yin pa de bzhin du khyed kyi yang yin gyis 'di la 
[\[254a.4\]]khyed rnams kyis gnod pa spang bar bya zhing phan pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/dpon po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshong pa rnams kyis khyim bdag stobs kyi sde'i ltar mnyan to/_/de nas khyim bdag stobs kyi sdes gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[254a.5\]]bu khyod kyis ji ltar nga las tshig mnyan par bya zhing bsgrub par bya bar sems pa de bzhin du tshong pa lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyi yang mnyan par bya zhing bsgrub par soms shig_/khyim bdag stobs kyi sdes bsams pa/_gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri bzhon pa ci 
[\[254a.6\]]'dra ba zhig gis gtang snyam mo/_/des bsams pa/_gal te glang po che'i bzhon pas 'gro na ni de shin tu bskyang dka' zhing dgang dka'o/_/rta yang bskyang dka' la dgang dka'o/_/bong bu ni gso sla zhing dran pa dang ldan pas bong bu'i bzhon pas btang ngo /_/
[\[254a.7\]]snyam nas des de la smras pa/_bu grogs kyi thog ma dang tha ma nas ma 'gro zhig_/gal te chom rkun pa mthu dang ldan par gyur na ni 'gron pa'i thog ma nas 'joms so/_/gal te mthu chung bar gyur na ni tha ma nas 'joms kyis khyod tshong pa'i dbus nas 'gro 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]bar bya ste/_ded dpon bcom pas ni tshong pa rnams bcom zhes bya'o/_/bran dang /_skyong ba la smras pa/_khyed gnyis kyis rnam grangs gang gis kyang gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri gtang bar mi bya'o/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri dge 
[\[254b.2\]]mtshan dang /_bkra shis dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba dag byas nas ma'i gan du song ste/_yum bdag mchi phyag 'tshal lo/_/des ngu bar brtsams pa dang /_des smras pa/_yum ci'i phyir bshums/_bu khyod gson por kho mo dang nam zhig phrad 
[\[254b.3\]]snyam mod/_des bsams pa/_bdag bkra shis par byas te/_chas pa la 'di 'dra ba'i bkra mi shis pa smra'o snyam nas de mi bzod pa skyes te smras pa/_ngan song la ci'i phyir mi gzigs/_des smras pa/_bu khyod kyis ngag gi las rtsub po byung gis 
[\[254b.4\]]nyes pa la nyes par shogs shig dang /_des na las de nyid bsrabs pa dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_gtugs par 'gyur ro/_/des de la nyes pa la nyes par bzod par gsol te/_de nas gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri dge mtshan dang /_bkra shis 
[\[254b.5\]]dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba byas nas shing rta dang /_khur dang /_pang tshad dang /_gzeb rnams dang /_rnga mo rnams dang /_ba lang dang /_bong bu rnams la zong mang po bkal nas rgya mtsho chen por chas te/_de dag rim gyis grong dang /_grong khyer 
[\[254b.6\]]dang /_grong 'dab dang /_tshong dus rnams rgyu zhing rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du phyin nas/_rgya mtsho'i gru bo che phun sum tshogs pa zhig bsgrubs te/_nor bsgrub pa'i phyir rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang /_de rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gis bdas te rin po che'i 
[\[254b.7\]]gling du phyin to/_/des der brtags brtags nas rin po che rnams kyis gru bo che dper na til lam/_'bras sam/_rgya shug gam/_mon sran bzhin du bkang nas de rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gis bdas te gru bo che nye zho med par 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin nas tshong pa de dag rgya mtsho'i 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]'gram de nyid du 'brang btab bo/_/des kyang bran dang skyong ba khrid de/_phyogs gcig tu dong nas 'du ba dang 'god pa'i rtsis bya bar brtsams so/_/phyi zhig nas des bran la smras pa/_bran tshong pa rnams ci dag byed ltos shig_/de der song na 
[\[255a.2\]]ci tsam na tshong pa rnams gnyid log pa mthong nas/_de yang de nyid du nyal lo/_/bran ring zhig thogs nas des skyong ba la smras pa/_skyong ba tshong pa rnams ci dag byed pa ltos shig_/des der song na ji tsam na tshong pa rnams khal 'gel ba mthong nas des kyang 
[\[255a.3\]]khal dgal bar brtsams so/_/bran gyis bsams pa/_skyong bas ded dpon sbran grang snyam mo/_/skyong bas bsams pa/_bran gyis ded dpon sbran grang snyam mo/_/tshong pa de dag ni khal bkal nas dong ngo /_/gro bzhin skyes rna ba bya ba ri 
[\[255a.4\]]ba ni gnyid kyis myos nas nyal lo/_/tshong pa de rnams dong ba las ci tsam na nam nangs nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag ded dpon ga re/_ded dpon sngar song ngo /_/sngon du song nas ded dpon ga re zhes dris pa dang mjug nas 'ong ngo /_/
[\[255a.5\]]mjug tu song ste ded dpon ga re zhes dris pa dang bar nas song ngo /_/bar du song ste dris pa las gang na yang mi snang nas/_bran gyis smras pa/_bdag gi blo skyes pa skyong bas ded dpon sbran grang snyam mo/_/skyong bas smras pa/_bdag 
[\[255a.6\]]gi blo skyes pa/_bran gyis ded dpon sbran grang snyam mo/_/shes ldan dag gang yang bdag cag gis ded dpon bor nas dong bas ni bzang po ma yin gyis phyir 'dong gis tshur sheg_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te bdag cag phyir 
[\[255a.7\]]log na thams cad tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur gyis tshur sheg_/re zhig nang khrims shig bca' bar bya ste/_gang yang bdag cag gi rdzas rnams ma brubs kyi bar du re zhig sus kyang gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri'i pha ma la gtam bsnyad par 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]mi bya'o zhes de rnams kyis nang khrims su bca' ba dag byas nas dong ngo /_/gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri ba'i pha mas gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri 'ongs so zhes thos nas de gnyis bsur dong nas/_ded dpon ga re sngar song ngo /_/de gnyis sngon du song nas ded dpon 
[\[255b.2\]]ga re zhes dris pa dang mjug nas 'ong ngo /_/mjug tu dong nas ded dpon ga re zhes dris pa dang bar nas song ngo zhes rdzas rnams brubs kyi bar du mgo rmongs su bcug nas/_de'i 'og tu smras pa/_yab yum bdag cag gis ded dpon brjed do/_/de 
[\[255b.3\]]gnyis kyi drung du gcig cig 'ongs nas yab yum gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri mchis so zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis de la rngan pa byin nas bsur dong nas ma mthong ngo /_/yang gzhan zhig 'ongs nas yab yum gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri mchis so zhes 
[\[255b.4\]]smras pa dang /_de dag gis de la rngan pa byin nas bsur dong na cang ma mthong ste/_de ltar su la yang yid mi ches so/_/de gnyis kyis skyed mos tshal dang /_lha khang dang /_'dun khang rnams su gdugs dang /_dril bu dang /_rnga yab rnams phul nas 
[\[255b.5\]]gal te gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri gson par gyur na myur du 'ong ba dang /_la gor 'ong bar gyur cig_/gal te dus las 'das te shi 'phos par gyur na 'gro ba'i gnas gnas khyad par can du skye bar gyur cig ces yi ger bris so/_/de gnyis ni mya ngan dang 
[\[255b.6\]]ngud mos long bar gyur to/_/de yang nyi ma 'char ka'i tshe nyi ma'i zer gyis phog nas sang na de na bong bu gnyis 'dug pa ma gtogs par tshong pa gang yang ma mthong ngo /_/des de gnyis sbrel te ded de song ba na rlung langs pas lam bye mas yog pa bong bu dran pa dang 
[\[255b.7\]]ldan pas lam snas snom zhing dal gyis song ba dang /_des lcag gzer bu can gyis gzhus shing ded pa las de gnyis kyi dran pa 'khrugs nas shing sA la'i dgon pa zhig tu phyin to/_/de gnyis skom pas sro shi zhing lce phyung ste phan tshun 'thom pa des mthong nas 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]snying rje skyes te/_des bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis ma bzhag na 'di dang lhan cig tu tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro snyam nas des de gnyis bor te rkang pas song ba las/_des ji tsam na lcags kyi grong khyer mtho zhing rgya che ba de'i 
[\[256a.2\]]sgo na skyes bu gnag la che ba/_mig dmar ba/_byin snying rlo ba lag na dbyug pa thogs pa zhig 'dug pa mthong nas/_de de'i drung du song ste/_kye nang rje 'di na chu yod dam/_de yang cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/des yang dris pa/_kye nang rje 'di na chu yod dam/_
[\[256a.3\]]'on kyang de yang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/des der zhugs te chu chu zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lus sdong dum tshig pa 'dra ba/_rus gong bsgreng ba lta bu rang gi spu dang skras yog pa/_lto ri sul ltar 'dug pa/_khab kyi mig tsam gyi kha yod pa brgya stong 
[\[256a.4\]]du mas yongs su bskor nas gro bzhin skyes snying rje dang ldan pa khyod kyis bdag cag skom pa la chu lud cig_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag kyang chu slong na bdag gis chu blud du ga la yod/_de dag gis smras pa/_gro bzhin skyes [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi grong 
[\[256a.5\]]khyer 'di na chu ga la yod/_bdag cag gis lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du chu chu zhes bya ba'i ming deng thos so/_/shes ldan dag khyed cag su zhig las gang gis 'dir skyes/_gro bzhin skyes 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka' bas yid mi 
[\[256a.6\]]ches so/_/shes ldan dag bdag gis mngon sum du mthong na ji ltar yid mi ches par 'gyur/_de dag gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bdag cag ngag rtsub khro ldan zhing /_/bdag cag ser sna 'jungs pa can/_/sbyin pa cung zad ma btang des/_/bdag 
[\[256a.7\]]cag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'jig rten lhags/_/gro bzhin skyes khyod bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan gyis song shig_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi grong khyer du zhugs pa la gson por 'gro ba 'ga' yang khyod kyis mthong ba yod dam/_de song ba dang /_ji tsam na skyes bu 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]de mthong nas des de la smras pa/_e ma'o bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyis kho bo la 'di lta ste/_'di ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi grong khyer yin no/_/zhes smras pa dang /_kho bo der mi 'jug pa zhig_/des smras pa/_gro bzhin skyes khyod bsod nams kyi mthu 
[\[256b.2\]]chen po dang ldan gyis song shing /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi grong khyer du zhugs pa la gson por 'gro ba 'ga' yang khyod kyis mthong ba yod dam/_des song ba las ji tsam na lcags kyi grong khyer mtho zhing rgya che ba zhig gi sgo na skyes bu gnag la che ba/_mig 
[\[256b.3\]]dmar ba/_byin snying rlo ba/_lag na dbyig pa thogs pa zhig 'dug pa mthong nas/_de de'i drung du song ste/_kye nang rje 'di na chu yod dam/_de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /_de la yang kye nang rje 'di na chu yod dam/_de 'on kyang cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/
[\[256b.4\]]des der zhugs te chu chu zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sdong dum tshig pa 'dra ba rus gong bsgreng ba lta bu rang gi skra dang spus yog pa/_lto ri sul ltar 'dug pa/_khab kyi mig tsam gyi kha yod pa brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor nas gro bzhin skyes snying 
[\[256b.5\]]rje dang ldan pa khyod kyis bdag cag skom pa rnams la chu lud cig_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag nyid kyang chu slong na bdag gis chu blud du ga la yod/_de dag gis smras pa/_gro bzhin skyes [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi grong khyer 'di na chu ga la yod/_bdag cag 
[\[256b.6\]]gis lo bcu gnyis lon na chu chu zhes bya ba'i sgra khyod las deng thos so/_/shes ldan dag khyed cag su zhig_/las gang gis 'dir skyes/_de dag gis smras pa/_gro bzhin skyes 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka' bas yid mi ches so/_/
[\[256b.7\]]shes ldan dag bdag gis mngon sum du mthong na ji ltar yid mi ches par 'gyur/_de dag gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_nad med rgyags pas myos pa dang /_/lang tsho longs spyod dregs myos te/_/sbyin pa ci yang ma btang bas/_/bdag cag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]'jig rten lhags/_/gro bzhin skyes khyod bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pas song shig_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi grong khyer du zhugs pa la gson por 'gro ba 'ga' yang khyod kyis mthong ba yod dam/_de song ba dang ci tsam na skyes bu de mthong nas 
[\[257a.2\]]des de la smras pa/_e ma'o bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyis kho bo la 'di lta ste/_'di ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi grong khyer yin no zhes smras pa dang /_kho bo der mi 'jug pa zhig_/des smras pa/_gro bzhin skyes khyod bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pas song shig_/
[\[257a.3\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi grong khyer du zhugs pa la gson por 'gro ba 'ga' yang khyod kyis mthong ba yod dam/_de song ba dang /_ci tsam na nyi ma nub ka'i dus su gzhal med khang zhig mthong ste/_de na lha mo gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa bzhi dang /_skyes 
[\[257a.4\]]bu gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa dpung rgyan dang /_rna cha gdub kor dang /_byug pa dang /_phreng ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa gcig dang de dag tu lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de 
[\[257a.5\]]dag gis de rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong nas/_de dag gis so so nas smra bar brtsams pa/_gro bzhin skyes 'ongs pa legs so/_/mi skom mam/_mi bkres sam/_des bsams pa/_gdon mi za bar lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin zhig yin 
[\[257a.6\]]no snyam nas bdag skom mo/_/bdag bkres so/_/de dag gis khrus byas nas zan byin te gzhal med khang de nyid du ji tsam nyi ma ma shar gyi bar du 'dug pa dang /_de la de dag gis smras pa/_gro bzhin skyes 'dir nyes dmigs dag 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[257a.7\]]gyis byung shig_/de byung nas mtha' gcig tu song ste gnas so/_/de nas phyi zhig na nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe gzhal med khang de yang mi snang /_lha'i bu mo yang mi snang bar gyur te/_khyi sre bo bzhi zhig byung nas de dag gis skyes pa de khas bub tu bsnyal 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]te rgyab kyi sha lpags kham tshad kham tshad du bcad de/_ji tsam nyi ma nub kyi bar du zos so/_/de'i 'og tu yang gzhal med khang yang slar byung /_lha'i bu mo yang byung bar gyur te/_skyes pa gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_dpung rgyan 
[\[257b.2\]]dang /_rna cha gdub kor dang /_byug pa dang /_phreng ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa de dang de dag tu lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de dag gi drung du song nas shes ldan dag khyed cag su zhig_/las gang 
[\[257b.3\]]gis 'dir skyes/_gro bzhin skyes 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka' bas yid mi ches so/_/shes ldan dag bdag gis mngon sum du mthong na ji ltar yid mi ches par 'gyur/_gro bzhin skyes bdag gnas pa'i grong gi shen par 
[\[257b.4\]]gyur pa na lug bsad de bsad pa'i sha btsongs pas 'tsho bar byed pa las 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos bdag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir byon nas/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]las 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba yin gyis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos
