[\[257b.5\]]sdig pa spong shig ces gsungs na/_des gsungs pa bzhin du bdag gis ma spangs pa dang /_des bdag la spong du gzhug pa'i phyir yang dang yang du bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]las 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba yin gyis dam pa 
[\[257b.6\]]ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa spong shig ces gsungs na/_'on kyang bdag gis ma spangs nas des bdag la smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod ci lug nyin par ram/_nub mo gsod/_bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa nyin par ro/_/des ci'i 
[\[257b.7\]]phyir nub mo tshul khrims yang dag par mnod pa mi gzung zhes gsungs nas/_de las bdag gis nub mo tshul khrims yang dag par mnos te bzung ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bus nub mo 'di lta bu'i bde ba nyams su myong ngo /_/gang yang nyin 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]par lug bsad pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nyin par 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ngo /_/tshigs su bcad de/_yang smras pa/_nyin par gzhan gyi srog gcod cing /_/nub mo tshul khrims yon tan ldan/_/las de'i 
[\[258a.2\]]'bras bu bzang po dang /_/sdig to 'di ni myong ba yin/_/gro bzhin skyes khyod gnas pa'i grong du 'gro'am/_de na bdag gi bu shen pa bgyid pa de la khyod kyi pha ngas mthong ste/_de na re las 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba yin 
[\[258a.3\]]gyis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa spong shig ces zer ro zhes gsung shig_/kye nang rje khyod kyis kho bo la 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka'o zhes smras pas yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/_/gro bzhin skyes gal te yid mi ches na 
[\[258a.4\]]de la khyod kyi pha de na re ral gris bsad pa'i sa'i 'og na gser phye bum pa gang bzhag gis de phyung ste/_bdag nyid la yun du bde bas tshim par bya ba dang /_dus dus su 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la bsod snyoms phul la bdag cag gi ming nas 
[\[258a.5\]]phyung ste yon bsngo ba byos shig dang /_de na las de bsrabs pa dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_gtugs par 'gyur ro zhes gsung shig_/de song ba las ji tsam na nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su gzhal med khang gzhan zhig mthong ste/_de na lha mo gzugs 
[\[258a.6\]]bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa gcig dang /_skyes pa gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_dpung rgyan dang /_rna cha gdub kor dang /_byug pa dang /_phreng ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa gcig dang 
[\[258a.7\]]der lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de de dag gis rgyang ring po nas mthong nas so so nas smra bar brtsams pa/_gro bzhin skyes 'ongs pa legs so/_/mi skom mam/_mi bkres sam/_des 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]bsams pa/_gdon mi za bar lha'am/_klu 'am/_gnod sbyin zhig yin no snyam nas bdag skom mo/_/bdag bkres so/_/de dag gis de khrus byas nas zan byin te/_de gzhal med khang du ji tsam nyi ma nub kyi bar du 'dug pa dang /_de la de dag 
[\[258b.2\]]gis smras pa/_gro bzhin skyes 'dir nyes dmigs dag 'byung bar 'gyur gyis byung shig_/des nyes dmigs dag mthong bas byung ste mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/de'i 'og tu nyi ma nub ka'i dus kyi tshe de na gzhal med khang yang mi snang /_lha mo de yang mi 
[\[258b.3\]]snang gi/_srin gyi med chen po zhig byung ste/_des skyes pa de'i lus la lus kyis lan bdun du dkris nas steng du byung ste/_des nam nyi ma shar ba'i bar du klad rgyas za bar byed do//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po nyi shu gcig pa/_de 
[\[258b.4\]]nas de'i 'og tu gzhal med khang yang slar byung /_lha mo de yang slar byung nas skyes pa gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_dpung rgyan dang /_rna cha gdub kor dang /_byug pa dang /_phreng ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa de dang der lhan cig rtse bar byed/_
[\[258b.5\]]dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de de dag gi drung du song ste song nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed cag su zhig_/las gang gis 'dir skyes/_gro bzhin skyes 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka' bas yid mi ches so/_/
[\[258b.6\]]bdag gis mngon sum du mthong na ji ltar yid mi ches par 'gyur/_des smras pa/_gnas pa'i grong na bdag bram zer gyur te/_byi bo byed pa las 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos bdag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir byon nas gsungs pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]las 
[\[258b.7\]]'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba yin gyis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa spong shig ces gsungs na/_de gsungs pa bzhin du bdag gis ma spangs pa dang /_des bdag la spong du gzhug pa'i phyir yang dang yang du bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]las 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba yin gyis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa spong shig ces gsungs na 'on kyang bdag gis de ma spangs so/_/des bdag la smras pa bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod nyin par byi bo la 'gro'am nub mo/_
[\[259a.2\]]bdag gis de la smras pa/_'phags pa nub mo'o/_/des bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci'i phyir nyin par tshul khrims yang dag par mnos te mi gzung des na las de bsrabs pa dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro/_/zhes gsungs 
[\[259a.3\]]nas/_de las bdag gis nyin par tshul khrims yang dag par mnos te bzung ngo /_/gang yang nyin par tshul khrims yang dag par mnos te bzung ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nyin par bde ba 'di lta bu nyams su myong ngo /_/gang yang mtshan mo 
[\[259a.4\]]byi bo byed du song ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas mtshan mo sdug bsngal 'di lta bu nyams su myong bar gyur to/_/tshigs su bcad de yang smras pa/_mtshan mo byi bo byed la chags/_/nyin par tshul khrims yon tan ldan/_/las de'i 'bras bu bzang 
[\[259a.5\]]po dang /_/sdig to 'di ni myong ba yin/_/gro bzhin skyes khyod gnas pa'i grong du 'gro 'am/_de na bdag gi bu bram ze byi bo byed pa la khyod kyi pha ngas mthong ste/_de na re las 'di'i rnam par smin pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba yin gyis/_dam pa ma 
[\[259a.6\]]yin pa'i chos sdig pa spong shig ces zer ro/_/zhes gsung shig_/des smras pa/_kye nang rje khyod na re 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka'o zhes smras pas yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/_/gro bzhin skyes gal te yid mi ches na de 
[\[259a.7\]]la khyod kyi pha na re me thab kyi 'og na gser phye bum pa gang bzhag gis de phyung ste/_bdag nyid la yun du bde bas tshim par bya ba dang /_dus dus su 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la bsod snyoms phul la bdag cag gi ming nas phyung ste yon bsngo ba gyis 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]shig dang /_des na las de bsrabs pa dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_gtugs par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro zhes gsung shig_/de song ba dang ji tsam na gzhal med khang gzhan zhig mthong ste/_de na bud med gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa 
[\[259b.2\]]dpung rgyan dang /_rna cha gdub kor dang /_byug pa dang /_phreng ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa zhig 'dug pa de'i khri'i rkang pa bzhi la [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]bzhi btags shing 'dug go/_/de des rgyang ring po nas mthong nas smras pa/_gro bzhin skyes 'ongs pa legs 
[\[259b.3\]]so/_/'ongs pa legs so/_mi skom mam/_mi bkres sam/_des bsams pa/_gdon mi za bar lha mo'am/_klu mo'am/_gnod sbyin mo zhig yin no snyam nas/_des smras pa/_bdag skom mo/_/bdag bkres so/_/des de khrus 
[\[259b.4\]]byas nas zan byin te de la smras pa/_gro bzhin skyes gal te khyod la 'di dag [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]slong na ma sbyin cig ces smras nas/_sems can de rnams kyi las bdag gir bya ba mngon sum du bya bar 'dod nas gzhal med khang gi nang du zhugs te 'dug go/_/de 
[\[259b.5\]]dag gis bslang bar brtsams te/_gro bzhin skyes snying rje dang ldan pa khyod kyis bdag cag bkres pas nyen pa la byin cig_/des gcig la kham gcig byin pa dang phub mar gyur to/_/yang gcig la kham gcig byin pa dang lcags kyi thu lum za bar 
[\[259b.6\]]gyur to/_/yang gcig la kham gcig byin pa dang de rang gi sha la za bar gyur to/_/yang gcig la kham gcig byin pa dang rnag khrag tu gyur to/_/de dri tshor nas byung ste/_gro bzhin skyes khyod la kho mos ma zlog gam/_ci'i phyir 'di dag la sbyin ci kho 
[\[259b.7\]]mo'i snying rje las khyod kyi snying rje lhag gam/_des smras pa/_sring mo 'di dag khyod kyi cir 'ong /_des smras pa/_'di ni kho mo'i khyim thab yin/_'di ni bu yin/_'di ni mna' ma yin/_'di ni kho mo'i bran mo yin no/_/khyed cag su dag cig_/
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]las gang gis 'dir skyes/_gro bzhin skyes 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka' bas yid mi ches so/_/sring mo bdag gis mngon sum du mthong na ji ltar yid mi ches par 'gyur/_des smras pa/_gro bzhin skyes 
[\[260a.2\]]kho mo gnas pa zhes bya ba'i grong gi bram ze mor gyur pa na rgyu skar la bab pa'i nub mo kha zas bsod pa dag sta gon byas pa dang /_'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po kho mo la thugs brtse ba'i phyir gnas pa'i grong du bsod snyoms la gshegs te rim gyis kho 
[\[260a.3\]]mo'i khyim du byon pa dang /_kho mos de'i sku 'dzes shing thugs dang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang kho mo mngon par dad par gyur te/_de la kho mo dad pa skyes nas bsod snyoms phul te kho mo'i blo skyes pa/_de la khyim thab rjes su yi rang ba 'bul du 
[\[260a.4\]]bcug na rab tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ro snyam pa las des khrus byas te 'ongs pa dang /_de la kho mos smras pa/_rje'i sras 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la kho mos bsod snyoms phul gyis rjes su yi rang ba phul cig_/de khros nas smras pa/_ji srid bram ze rnams 
[\[260a.5\]]la ma phul/_gnyen bshes rnams la gnyen gyi sri zhu ma byas par je khyod kyis dge sbyong mgo reg de la bsod snyoms kyi phud sbyin nam zhes de mi bzod pa skyes nas dge sbyong mgo reg de ci'i phyir phub ma mi 'gam zhes smras pas/_de las de'i rnam par smin 
[\[260a.6\]]pas phub ma 'gam par gyur to/_/kho mo'i blo skyes pa/_khyim thab kyis rjes su yi rang ba ma phul gyis/_re zhig bu rjes su yi rang ba 'bul du bcug na dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ro snyam nas kho mos de la yang smras pa/_bu 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen 
[\[260a.7\]]po la kho mos bsod snyoms phul gyis rjes su yi rang ba phul cig_/de yang khros te smras pa/_ji srid bram ze rnams la ma byin par je khyod kyis dge sbyong mgo reg de la bsod snyoms kyi phud byin nam zhes de mi bzod pa skyes nas dge sbyong mgo reg 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]de ci'i phyir lcags kyi thu lum mi za zhes smras pa/_de las de'i rnam par smin pas lcags kyi thu lum za bar gyur to/_/gro bzhin skyes rgyu skar la bab pa'i nub mo gnyen dag gis kho mo la g.yar gzigs shig bskur ba de kho mos mna' ma la 
[\[260b.2\]]gtad na/_des g.yar gzigs bsod pa bsod pa dag ni zos la/_ngan pa dag kho mo la byin no/_/kho mos gnyen de dag la khyed cag lo nyes sam ci/_'di lta bu g.yar gzigs ngan pa bskur/_de rnams kyis kho mo la bdag cag gis g.yar 
[\[260b.3\]]gzigs ngan pa ni ma bskur te/_de lta mod kyi g.yar gzigs bsod pa zhig bskur ro zhes spring ba 'ongs nas kho mos mna' ma la smras pa/_bag sar khyod kyis g.yar gzigs bsod pa dag ni zos la ngan pa dag kho mo la ma byin grang des smras pa/_
[\[260b.4\]]khyod kyi g.yar gzigs zan bdag rang gi sha ci'i phyir mi za zhes smras pa/_de las de'i rnam par smin pas rang gi sha za bar gyur to/_/rgyu skar la bab pa'i nub mo kho mos bran mo g.yar gzigs bsod pa dag cig lag tu bskur te gnyen bshes 
[\[260b.5\]]kyi gan du btang ba las/_des lam kar g.yar gzigs bsod pa dag zos nas de dag la ngan pa dag byin pa dang /_de dag gis kho mo la khyod lo nyes sam ci/_bdag cag la g.yar gzigs ngan pa dag bskur zhes spring ba 'ongs na/_kho 
[\[260b.6\]]mos de dag la kho mos khyed cag la g.yar gzigs ngan pa ni ma bskur te/_de lta mod kyi g.yar gzigs bsod pa zhig bskur ro zhes spring ngo /_/kho mos bran mo la dris pa/_bran mo g.yar gzigs bsod pa dag khyod kyis zos la de dag la 
[\[260b.7\]]ngan pa dag ma byin grang /_des smras pa/_khyod kyi g.yar gzigs za na rnag khrag ci'i phyir mi 'thung zhes smras pas/_de las de'i rnam par smin pas rnag khrag 'thung bar gyur to/_/bdag gi blo skyes pa gang du sems can 'di dag rang rang gi las kyi 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]'bras bu nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams sbyor zhing lta bar gyur cig snyam mo/_/kho mos gang yang 'phags pa ka t+yA ya na chen po la bsod snyoms phul bas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas bzang por skye bar 'gyur 
[\[261a.2\]]ba las bdag gis smon lam log par btab pas/_da ltar [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mthu chen po zhig tu skyes so/_/gro bzhin skyes yang gnas pa zhes bya ba'i grong du 'gro na de na kho mo'i bu mo smad 'tshong byed pa de la/_khyod kyi pha dang /_ma dang /_ming 
[\[261a.3\]]po dang /_mna' ma dang /_bran mo dag ngas mthong ste/_de dag na re las 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba yin gyis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa spong shig ces zer ro/_/zhes gsung shig_/sring mo khyed nyid 
[\[261a.4\]]na re 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka'o zhes smras pas yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_gro bzhin skyes gal te yid mi ches na khyod kyi pha'i sngon gyi khang pa na lcags zangs gser gyis gang ba zung bzhi dang /_dbus 
[\[261a.5\]]na gser gyi khar ba dang /_ril ba spyi blugs shig yod kyis de dag phyung ste/_bdag nyid la yun du bde bas tshim par bya ba dang /_dus dus su 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la bsod snyoms dbul zhing bdag cag gi ming nas phyung ste yon bsngo ba 
[\[261a.6\]]byos shig dang /_des na las de bsrabs pa dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_gtugs par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro zhes gsung shig_/des de las khas blangs te/_de de ltar 'khyam pa la lo bcu gnyis 'das so/_/des de la smras pa/_gro bzhin 
[\[261a.7\]]skyes khyod gnas pa'i grong du 'gro 'am/_sring mo 'gro'o zhes de gzhal med khang du zhugs pa dang des [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag deng la gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri nyal bzhin du gnas pa'i grong gi pha'i skyed mos tshal du zhog 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]la slar gshegs shig_/de dag gis de gnas pa'i grong du pha'i skyed mos tshal du bzhag go/_/de gnyid sad pa dang ji tsam na dril bu dang /_gdugs dang /_bsil yab rnams phul nas gal te gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri gson po zhig na la gor 
[\[261b.2\]]'ong zhing myur du 'ong bar shog shig_/'on te dus las 'das te shi 'phos par gyur na 'gro ba'i gnas gnas khyad par can du skye bar gyur cig ces yi ge bris pa mthong nas/_des bsams pa/_'di ltar bdag pha dang mas shi ba'i khongs su brtsis na 
[\[261b.3\]]ci'i phyir slar khyim du 'jug_/bdag song la 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i drung du rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po gang na ba der song ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos gro 
[\[261b.4\]]bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gro bzhin skyes tshur shog_/gro bzhin skyes khyod 'ongs pa legs so/_/gro bzhin skyes khyod kyis 'jig rten 'di dang 
[\[261b.5\]]'jig rten pha rol mthong ngam/_btsun pa kA t+yA ya na chen po mthong ngo /_/btsun pa kA t+yA ya na chen po bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/_btsun pa kA t+yA ya na 
[\[261b.6\]]chen po bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa la spyad par 'tshal lo/_/gro bzhin skyes re zhig sngon gyi dam bcas pa dran par byos la tha na ji skad spring zhing bzung ba chub par skyol cig_/de shen pa de'i drung du song nas bzhin 
[\[261b.7\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyi pha ngas mthong ste/_de na re las 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba yin gyis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa spong shig ces zer ro/_/des smras pa/_kye nang rje bdag gi pha ni shi nas deng du lo bcu gnyis lon na/_
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]khyod kyis 'jig rten pha rol nas slar 'ongs pa 'ga' mthong ba yod dam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag der son to/_/de yid ma ches pa dang bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci ste yid mi ches na de na re khyod kyi pha'i ral gris bsad pa'i 'og na gser phye ma bum 
[\[262a.2\]]pa gang bzhag gis de phyung la bdag nyid la yun du bde bas tshim par bya ba dang /_dus dus su 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la bsod snyoms phul la/_bdag cag gi ming nas phyung ste yon bsngo ba byos shig dang /_des na las de bsrabs pa dang /_
[\[262a.3\]]yongs su zad pa dang /_gtugs par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/des bsams pa/_bdag gis sngon chad ni de lta bu lan 'ga' yang ma thos na re zhig bltas te gal te byung bar gyur na zer ba de thams cad bden no snyam nas/_des song ste brkos nas ji 
[\[262a.4\]]tsam na mthong ba dang de thams cad de kho na bzhin du gyur te/_des yid ches par gyur to/_/de'i 'og tu byi bo byed pa de'i drung du song ste son nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyi pha ngas mthong ste/_de na re las 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni yid du mi 'ong 
[\[262a.5\]]ba yin gyis dam pa yin pa'i chos sdig pa spong shig ces zer ro des smras pa/_kye nang rje bdag gi pha shi nas deng du lo bcu gnyis lon na khyod kyis 'jig rten pha rol nas 'ongs pa 'ga' mthong ba yod dam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag der son to/_/de yid ma 
[\[262a.6\]]ches te des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gal te yid mi ches na pha na re khyod kyi pha'i me thab kyi 'og na gser phye bum pa gang bzhag gis de phyung la bdag nyid yun du bde bas tshim par bya ba dang /_dus dus su 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la bsod snyoms 
[\[262a.7\]]phul la bdag cag gi ming nas phyung ste yon bsngo ba byos shig dang /_des na las de bsrabs pa dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_gtugs par 'gyur ro zhes de skad zer ro/_/des bsams pa/_bdag gis de skad sngon chad ni lan 'ga' yang ma thos 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]na gal te byung bar gyur na zer ba de thams cad bden no snyam nas/_des song ste brkos nas ji tsam na mthong ba dang de thams cad de kho na bzhin du gyur te des yid ches par gyur to/_/de'i 'og tu gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri smad 'tshong ma de'i drung du song ste 
[\[262b.2\]]smras pa/_sring mo khyod kyi pha dang /_ma dang /_ming po dang /_mna' ma dang /_bran mo dag ngas mthong ste/_de dag na re las 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba yin gyis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa spong shig ces zer ro/_/
[\[262b.3\]]des smras pa/_kye skyes bu bdag gi pha dang ma dag shi nas deng du lo bcu gnyis lon na khyod kyis 'jig rten pha rol nas 'ongs pa 'ga' mthong ba yod dam/_des smras pa/_bdag der son to/_/de yid ma ches pa dang /_des smras pa/_sring mo gal te yid 
[\[262b.4\]]mi ches na de dag na re khyod kyi pha'i sngon gyi khang pa rnying pa na lcags zangs gser phyes gang ba zung bzhi dang /_dbus na gser gyi khar ba dang /_ril ba spyi blugs yod kyis de dag phyung la bdag la yun du bde bas tshim par bya ba dang /_dus dus su 'phags pa 
[\[262b.5\]]kA t+yA ya na chen po la bsod snyoms phul la/_bdag cag gi ming nas phyung ste yon bsngo ba byos shig dang /_des na las de bsrabs pa dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_gtugs par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/des bsams pa/_bdag gis sngon cad 
[\[262b.6\]]ni de lta bu lan 'ga' yang ma thos na blta bar bya ste/_gal te byung bar gyur na zer ba de thams cad bden no snyam nas/_des song ste brkos nas ji tsam na mthong ba dang de thams cad de kho na bzhin du gyur te yid ches par gyur to/_/gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ris bsams 
[\[262b.7\]]pa/_'jig rten 'di dag thams cad ni gser gyis yid ches kyis/_bdag la ni 'ga' yang yid ches par ma gyur to snyam nas des 'dzum phyung ba dang /_de byis pa na mche ba gser gyis brgyan pa de des ngo shes par gyur nas dpon po gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri yin 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]nam/_sring mo bdag ni skye bo dag gis de ltar shes so/_/de song nas de'i pha ma la yab yum gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri mchis so zhes sbran pa nas du ma zhig gis sbran na yang de dag yid ma ches nas/_ji tsam na de rang nyid 'ongs te yab yum 
[\[263a.2\]]phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang /_de dbyig gi nga ro can zhig pas de gnyis kyis skad las ngo shes nas de gnyis kyis de'i mgul nas 'jus te ngu bar brtsams pa dang /_de gnyis mchi ma byung bas mig gi ling tog byid nas blta bar brtsams so/_/des 
[\[263a.3\]]smras pa/_yab yum bdag yang dag par khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung gis gnang bar mdzod cig_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_bu khyod kyi mya ngan dang ngud mos bdag cag mig ldongs par gyur pa las/_da khyod nyid 'ongs nas bdag cag gi mig 
[\[263a.4\]]sor chud kyis/_bdag ji srid gson pa de srid du rab tu ma 'byung bar nam shi bar gyur pa de'i tshe rab tu byung shig_/des tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i drung du chos mnyan pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/pha dang ma gnyis kyang 
[\[263a.5\]]skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bkod do/_/lung bzhin rtogs par byas te lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/pha dang ma gnyis kyang bden pa rnams la bkod do/_/dus gzhan zhig na de'i pha dang ma shi nas des 
[\[263a.6\]]nor de dag phongs pa dang /_mgon med pa dang /_bkren pa dang /_nyam thag pa rnams la byin te/_bkren pa phal mo che zhig dbul bor nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la 
[\[263a.7\]]mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ris tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs te dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos de rab tu phyung ngo /_/des rab tu phyung nas ma mo rtogs par byas te/_phyir 
[\[263b.2\]]mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/rdo can zhes bya ba'i yul gyi mtha' na dge slong gi tshogs nyung ste grangs bcur bskang ba dka' nas/_des de zla ba gsum du dge tshul du bzhag go/_/chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[263b.3\]]kyi nyan thos rnams kyi 'dus pa ni gnyis su 'gyur te/_'dus pa chen po ni dbyar zla 'bring po'i dbyar nye bar sgrub pa la gang yin pa dang /_ston zla 'bring po'i nya la gang yin pa'o/_/de la gang dag dbyar zla 'bring po'i dbyar nye bar sgrub pa la 'dus pa de 
[\[263b.4\]]dag ni yid la byed pa'i khyad par de dang de dag bzung nas chub par byas te grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dang de rnams su dbyar gnas par dam 'cha'o/_/gang dag ston zla 'bring po'i nya 
[\[263b.5\]]la 'dus pa de dag ni ji ltar rtogs pa dag smras nas gong ma dag 'dri bar byed de/_nyan thos chen po rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas kyi dge slong dag gis yid la byed pa'i 
[\[263b.6\]]khyad par de dang de dag bzung nas chub par byas te grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dang de rnams su dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/_/de dag gis dbyar zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos 
[\[263b.7\]]gos byas pa dang ldan chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]nas de dag gis ji ltar rtogs pa dag smras te/_gong ma dag kyang 'dri'o/_/tshogs kyi grangs kyang bcur bskangs nas des de bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so/_/des sde snod gsum rtogs par byas nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs 
[\[264a.2\]]shing dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te dgra bcom par gyur nas khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba gyo mo dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa'i sems can dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/_rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i 
[\[264a.3\]]sbubs dral ba/_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti las phyir phyogs pa/_dbang po nye dbang po'i lha dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod par bya 
[\[264a.4\]]ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas kyi dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la bsnyen bkur byas nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na 
[\[264a.5\]]chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mkhan po ni bdag cag gis mthong ste/_bsnyen bkur yang bgyis lags kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la bdag cag rnams bsnyen bkur bgyid du mchi'o/_/bu dag de bzhin du gyis shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[264a.6\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni bsnyen bkur bya ba kho na yin no/_/de'i tshe gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri 'khor de nyid kyi nang du tshogs shing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri stan las langs nas 
[\[264a.7\]]bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag gis mkhan po yang mthong /_bcom ldan 'das kyang chos kyi skur ni mthong na/_gzugs kyi 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]sku ma mthong bas/_mkhan po bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs kyi sku ltar mchi'o/_/bu de bzhin du gyis shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba ni rnyed par dka' ste/_dper na me tog u dum bA ra dang 
[\[264b.2\]]mtshungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byos la/_bdag gi tshig 'dis reg par spyod dam zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_zhu ba lnga po 'di dag kyang zhus shig_/btsun pa rdo can zhes bgyi ba'i yul gyi mtha' na dge slong nyung bas grangs 
[\[264b.3\]]bcur bskang ba dka' na de la ji ltar bdag gis bsgrub par bgyi/_btsun pa ba lang gi rjes kyis sa rtsub por gyur pa dang /_rdo can zhes bgyi ba'i yul gyi mtha' na 'di lta bu'i gding ba dang /_dgab pa 'di lta ste/_lug gi pags pa dang /_ba'i ko ba 
[\[264b.4\]]dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi pags pa dang /_ra'i pags pa las bgyid do/_/ji ltar yul gzhan dag na 'di lta bu'i gding ba dang /_dgab pa 'di lta ste/_bal stan dang /_shing shun gyi stan dang /_srin bal gyi stan dang /_ras bal gyi stan dag mchis pa de 
[\[264b.5\]]bzhin du rdo can zhes bgyi ba'i yul gyi mtha' na 'di lta bu'i gding ba dang /_dgab pa 'di lta ste/_lug gi pags pa dang zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin no/_/chus 'dag par 'tshal ba'i mi rnams rtag par khrus la spyod pa dang /_dge slong gis dge slong la 
[\[264b.6\]]chos gos bskur ba tshu rol nas ni spags la der ni ma mchis na/_de gang la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhes zhus shig_/tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ris cang mi smra bas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po las mnyan to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro 
[\[264b.7\]]bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ris tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro'i dus su sham thabs bgos 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas gnas pa zhes bya ba'i grong du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/_ji tsam na rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab nas rkang 
[\[265a.2\]]pa gnyis bkrus te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[265a.3\]]dga' bo song la de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri gtsug lag khang gcig tu khri shoms shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[265a.4\]]dang gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri gtsug lag khang gcig tu khri bshams nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri gtsug lag 
[\[265a.5\]]khang gcig tu khri bshams lags te/_bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab pa lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dang gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri gtsug lag khang gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/_gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du zhabs 
[\[265a.6\]]gnyis bkrus te gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas dgongs pa mngon du bzhag ste bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri yang gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te skyil mo krung bcas lus 
[\[265a.7\]]bsrang nas dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas 'dug ste/_bcom ldan 'das dang tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri 'phags pa'i mi smra bas de'i mtshan mo 'das par mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam nangs su nye ba na tshe dang ldan pa gro 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri la bka' stsal pa/_gro bzhin skyes chos gang la bdag gis mngon par shes te mngon par sangs rgyas nas gsungs pa la khyod spobs par gyis shig_/de nas gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang rdo can 
[\[265b.2\]]zhes bya ba'i mtha'i dbyangs kyi nga ros ched du brjod pa dang /_pha rol 'gro byed dang /_bden pa mthong ba dang /_ri gnas kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang /_thub pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang /_gnas brtan gyi tshigs su bcad pa dang /_gnas brtan ma'i tshigs 
[\[265b.3\]]su bcad pa dang /_don gyi tshoms kyi mdo sde dag gsang bstod de bton to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ris brjod pa rdzogs par mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gro bzhin skyes 
[\[265b.4\]]khyod kyis gang la bdag gis mngon par shes te mngon par sangs rgyas nas gsungs pa'i chos gya nom pa dang snyan par bsgrags pa legs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri 'di snyam du sems te/_da bcom ldan 'das la bdag gi mkhan 
[\[265b.5\]]pos phrin gsol ba smra ba'i dus la bab po snyam du rig nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa rdo can zhes 
[\[265b.6\]]bgyi ba'i yul gyi mtha' gnas pa zhes bgyi ba'i grong na/_btsun pa kA t+yA ya na chen po mchis pa de bdag gi mkhan po lags te/_de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang 
[\[265b.7\]]ngam/_'tsho 'am/_stobs dang bde ba dang nyam nga ba ma mchis pas bde ba la reg par spyod dam zhes snyun gsol lags so/_/gro bzhin skyes dge slong kA t+yA ya na bde bar gyur cig_/zhu ba lnga po dag kyang rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]kyis gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gro bzhin skyes re zhig ngas zhu ba 'di lung bstan pa'i dus la ma bab kyis dge 'dun gyi nang du zhu ba zhus shig dang der khyod kyi zhu ba lung bstan pa'i dus la bab bo/_/de nas 
[\[266a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das nang par sngar bzhengs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes zhes bya ba nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ris 
[\[266a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa rdo can zhes bgyi ba'i yul gyi mtha' na gnas pa zhes bgyi ba'i grong na btsun pa kA t+yA ya na chen po mchis pa de bdag gi mkhan po lags te/_de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la zhes 
[\[266a.4\]]bya ba nas bde ba la reg par spyod dam zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/zhu ba lnga po gong du ji skad du spang ba'i ltung byed kyi bar brjod pa yang rgyas par gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/_yul mtha' 'khob rnams 
[\[266a.5\]]su 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang lnga'i tshogs kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang /_rtag tu khrus byas pa dang /_mchil lham rim gcig pa bcang bar bya ste/_rim gnyis pa ma yin/_rim gsum pa ma yin no/_/gal te zad par gyur na lhan bas btab ste 
[\[266a.6\]]bcang bar bya'o/_/ko ba bcang bar bya'o/_/dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos bskur ba tshu rol nas ni spangs la der ma phyin na gang la yang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa 
[\[266a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis yul mtha' 'khob rnams su 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang lnga'i tshogs kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa de la dbus ni gang lags/_mtha' 'khob ni gang lags/_nye ba 'khor shar phyogs na li kha ra shing 'phel 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]zhes bya ba'i grong yod pa de'i shar phyogs na li kha ra tshang tshing zhes bya ba'i tshal yod de de ni dbus so/_/de phan chad ni mtha' 'khob bo/_/lho phyogs na 'dam bu can zhes bya ba'i grong yod pa de'i pha rol na 'dam bu can zhes bya ba'i chu bo yod pa de ni 
[\[266b.2\]]dbus so/_/de phan chad ni mtha' 'khob bo/_/nub phyogs na bram ze'i grong ka ba dang nye ba'i ka ba dag yod de de ni dbus so/_/de phan chad ni mtha' 'khob bo/_/byang phyogs na u shi ri'i ri zhes bya ba yod de de ni dbus so/_/de phan chad ni mtha' 
[\[266b.3\]]'khob bo/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ris las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che 
[\[266b.4\]]ba'i rigs dang rin po ches spras pa'i rna cha rna ba la thogs shing btsas la/_ngan song mthong zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[266b.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su zhes bya ba nas/_lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa 
[\[266b.6\]]na bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba'i bar 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/bA rA Na sI'i grong na khyo shug gnyis shig 
[\[266b.7\]]yod pa de gnyis kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos so/_/gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas phung po'i lhag 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang rgyal po kr-i kIs de'i mchod rten rin po che sna bzhi las kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gang tsam la 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa zhig byed du bcug nas/_de zhig cing 
[\[267a.2\]]gogs pa slar bcos pa'i phyir grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dpya 'du ba gang yin pa de dag des mchod rten de la phul lo/_/gang gi tshe rgyal po kr-i kI shi nas de'i bu legs skyes zhes bya ba de rgyal srid la bzhag pa dang de'i blon po dag gis dpya nyung 
[\[267a.3\]]shas shig phul lo/_/des blon po rnams la smras pa/_ci'i phyir khyed kyis nga la dpya nyung ngu zhig phul/_nga'i yul nas dpya mi 'du 'am zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_lha dpya de las 'du ba gang la mchis/_lha grong khyer gyi shar 
[\[267a.4\]]phyogs kyi sgo nas dpya 'du ba gang lags pa de dag ni rgyal po yab kyi mchod rten zhig cing gogs pa slar bcos pa'i rgyur gzhag go/_/gal te lhas gnang na dpya de bdag cag gis dgum mo/_/des smras pa/_shes ldan nga'i yab kyis gang mdzad pa de ni 
[\[267a.5\]]tshangs pas byas pa'o/_/de ni brgya byin gyis byas pa'o/_/de dag gis bsams pa/_gal te lhas gnang na bdag cag gis ci nas dpya de dag rang 'du bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o snyam nas/_de dag gis sgo bcad de bzhag pas phyin chad dpya 'du ba chad do/_/
[\[267a.6\]]mchod rten de yang zhig cing gogs par gyur pa dang /_khyo shug de gnyis rgas par gyur pa nas mchod rten de nyid la byi dor byed cing 'dug go/_/byang phyogs nas ded dpon zhig zong thogs te bA rA Na sI'i grong du phyin pa dang /_des mchod rten zhig cing 
[\[267a.7\]]gogs par gyur pa de mthong ngo /_/des mthong nas yab yum mchod rten 'di su'i lags zhes dris so/_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi yin no/_/sus bgyis pa/_rgyal po kr-i kIs so/_/rgyal po kr-i kI 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]des mchod rten de zhig pa dang gogs pa slar bcos pa'i phyir phul ba cung zad med dam/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_phul ba yod de grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dpya 'du ba gang dag mchod rten de zhig pa dang gogs pa bcos pa'i phyir phul ba las rgyal 
[\[267b.2\]]po kr-i kI nongs nas de'i sras legs skyes zhes bya ba de rgyal srid la bzhag nas des dpya 'du ba de bcad pas mchod rten de zhig cing gogs par gyur to/_/des rin po ches spras pa'i rna cha rna ba las bkrol nas des de gnyis la byin te smras pa/_yab yum 
[\[267b.3\]]rin po che'i rna cha 'dis mchod rten 'di zhig cing gogs pa rnams chos shig_/bdag nam zong rnams 'gyur te 'ongs nas phyis kyang sbyin no/_/de gnyis kyis de btsongs nas des mchod rten de zhig pa dang gogs pa slar bcos te kha cig ni lhag go/_/de 
[\[267b.4\]]nas dus phyi zhig na ded dpon gyis zong bsgyur nas spogs khyer te 'ongs so/_/des mchod rten de lta bas mi ngoms pa zhig tu mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de phyir zhing rab tu dga' ba dang /_dang ba skyes te dris pa/_yab yum khyed kyis skyin po cung zad 
[\[267b.5\]]ma byas sam/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_bu bdag cag gis skyin po cung zad kyang ma byas te/_'on kyang lhag pa yang yod do/_/de rab tu dang ba skyes nas de la ci lhag pa dang gzhan yang phul nas mchod pa dang bkur sti cher byas te dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 
[\[267b.6\]]bdag phyug pa dang /_nor mang ba dang /_longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye ba dang /_chos 'di lta bu thob pa dang /_ston pa 'di lta bu kho na mnyes par byed kyi/_mi mnyes par mi byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_
[\[267b.7\]]ded dpon gang yin pa de ni gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri 'di nyid yin te/_'dis gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bya ba byas te smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug pa dang /_nor mang ba dang /_longs spyod 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]che ba'i rigs dang /_rin po ches spras pa'i rna cha rna ba la thogs bzhin du btsas shing nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 
[\[268a.2\]]dang shugs mnyam pa/_stobs mnyam pa/_brtson pa mnyam pa/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa brnyes pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas kyi ma mnyes par ni ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig 
[\[268a.3\]]tu gnag pa yin/_gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni dkar ba yin/_'dren ma rnams kyi 'dren ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/_las gcig tu dkar ba kho na la brtsal bar bya ste/_
[\[268a.4\]]dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/_/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ris las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la ngan song dag mthong ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[268a.5\]]'dis ma la ngag gi las rtsub mo smras pa de'i las de'i rnam par smin pas mthong ba'i chos nyid la ngan song dag mthong ngo //_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[268a.6\]]pa nye dga' dge 'dun gyi gsar bu yin pas de gral rims kyis khri ldeg pa zhig thob pa dang /_de zhig gis dogs pas bla 'og ma bsgyur bar nyal lo/_/des bsams pa/_bdag nye dga' yin na khri la yang chags sam/_gal te mal 
[\[268a.7\]]cha'am khri ma rjes na nye dga' zhes bya ba'i ming yang mi 'dogs so snyam nas/_de nang par sngar langs te yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi drung du song ba dang des de la smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' byon pa legs so/_/byon pa legs so/_/ji ga btsun 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]pa nye dga' bde bar gzims sam/_des smras pa/_gsus po che khyod ji snyam du sems/_ji ltar bdag mal stan rim pa brgyad la nyal ba bzhin nye dga' yang de bzhin snyam mam/_kho bo dge 'dun gyi gsar bu yin pas kho bo gral rims kyis khri ldeg 
[\[268b.2\]]pa zhig thob ste/_de zhig gis dogs nas kho bo bla 'og kyang mi sgyur bar nyal lo/_/btsun pa nye dga' mal stan rim pa brgyad po 'di 'dra ba brtags lags sam/_legs par brtags pa'o/_/shin tu brtags pa'o/_/gang du bkag sus 
[\[268b.3\]]bkag_/gal te brtags pa lags na dbul gyis snoms la bzhud cig_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_gsus po che ko sa la'i yul rnams kho bo dbang ngam ci/_gtsug lag khang du skyol la byin cig_/des de la mi brgyad byin te/_de la bzhis 
[\[268b.4\]]ni mal stan rnams khyer/_bzhis khri khyer nas de dag srang gi dbus nas 'dong ba bram ze dang /_khyim bdag de dag gis mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dris pa/_shes ldan dag deng lha'i gzims mal gang du byed/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras 
[\[268b.5\]]pa/_nyid kyi pho brang du'o/_/gzims mal 'di gang du khyer/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_'di dag ni bdag gis thob bo/_/shes ldan dag dge sbyong nye dga' ni/_'dod pa'i yon tan gyis g.yen spyo 'am ci/_zhes de dag smod par byed/_
[\[268b.6\]]gzhogs 'phyas byed/_kha zer bar byed do/_/de gtsug lag khang du song nas gtsug lag khang chag chag btab/_phyag dar byas nas ba'i lci ba sar pa'i byug pas byugs te/_gnas mal bshams nas nyal bar bsams pa dang /_bcom 
[\[268b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis kyang phyogs der byon to/_/de dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gis gnas mal ci 'dra ba mchis gzigs su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]dag thog ma nyid du rul pa sbed pa ni skyes bu gti mug nye dga' yin par rig par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag khri stan mthon po dang khri stan chen po la nyal ba yin no/_/de lta bas na dge slong 
[\[269a.2\]]gis khri stan mthon po dang khri stan chen po la 'dug par mi bya'o/_/'dug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis khri stan mthon po dang stan chen po la 'dug par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis sangs rgyas la 
[\[269a.3\]]sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du spyan drangs te/_des khri stan mthon po dag bshams par brtsams so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo sngon rol nyid du son pa dang /_des stan mthon po dag shom pa de mthong nas des de la smras pa/_khyim bdag stan 'di dag 
[\[269a.4\]]ni dge slong dang 'tsham pa ma yin gyis sdus shig_/des de dag bsdu bar brtsams pa na bcom ldan 'das kyang der gshegs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 
[\[269a.5\]]la rmas pa/_kun dga' bo 'di ci zhig byed/_bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag 'dis chen po la 'os pa'i gdan dag shom nas bdag gis khyim bdag stan 'di dag ni dge slong dang 'tsham pa ma yin gyis 'di dag sdus shig ces bsgo ba dang de dag sdud pa lags 
[\[269a.6\]]so/_/kun dga' bo thams cad la 'byor pa yod pa ma yin gyis/_kun dga' bo khyim bdag stan shom pa ma zlog shig_/de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_khyim du khri stan mthon po la 'dug par bya'i der nyal bar mi bya'o/_/gtsug lag khang du ni 'dug par mi 
[\[269a.7\]]bya'o/_/nyal bar yang mi bya ste/_'dug gam nyal na yang 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/lho phyogs nas dge slong chos gos gsum pa gzhan zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mnyan yod du 'ongs pa dang /_de'i pags pa'i gding ba bzang po de 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]mthong nas des de la smras pa/_bsod snyoms pa pags pa kho bo la byin cig_/kho bo bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' 'gro yang rung mi 'gro yang rung /_bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 
[\[269b.2\]]'tshal du 'dir 'ongs so/_/bsod snyoms pa khyod ji snyam du sems/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]'o na 'di 'dra ba'i pags pa rnyed par mi nus snyam mam/_nga'i rnyed pa la ltos shig_/btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis gang gi phyir de nus pa de'i phyir kho bo mi 'bul lo/_/yul ko sa la'i rgyal 
[\[269b.3\]]po gsal rgyal gyi ba lang gi spyan byed pa chen po zhes bya ba dang tshe dang ldan pa nye dgar bshes pas de de'i gan du song ba na/_/ji tsam na sos ka'i dus su be'u bkra zhing bkra ba dag byung ngo /_/des be'u gcig gi rgyab tu byugs pa dang /_chen pos smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' 
[\[269b.4\]]khyod be'u 'di'i ma'i 'o ma gsol bar bzhed dam ci/_des smras pa/_de yang 'dod mod kyi/_'di 'dra ba'i pags pa dge slong gang la yod pa ni sems las chung ngus bde bar dge ba'i phyogs la rab tu brtson par 'gyur ro/_/chen pos smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' bka' 
[\[269b.5\]]stsal pas mjal gyis bzhud cig_/de song ba dang chen pos phyugs rdzi la bsgo ba/_be'u 'di sod la khyod kyis pags pa khyer te btsun pa nye dga' la phul cig_/des be'u de bsad nas pags pa khyer te song ba dang /_ba de be'u de la gdung bas skad 'byin cing rjes bzhin du 
[\[269b.6\]]song ba las de rgyal byed kyi tshal du zhugs pa dang /_ba de rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na skad 'byin cing 'dug go/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas 
[\[269b.7\]]pa/_kun dga' bo rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na ba 'di ci'i phyir skad 'byin cing 'dug_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das btsun pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]be'u de'i pags pa 'tshal ba'i slad du 'gums su stsal bas des na ba de rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]sgo na skad 'byin lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag ko lpags 'chang ba yin gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong gis ko lpags bcang bar mi bya'o/_/bcangs na 'gal tshabs can du 
[\[270a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis ko lpags bcang bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs na khyim bdag des gdan gzhan bsham du 
[\[270a.3\]]med nas/_des ko lpags kyi gdan dag bsham par brtsams so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang /_des khyim bdag de ko lpags kyi gdan dag shom pa mthong nas smras pa/_khyim bdag stan 'di 
[\[270a.4\]]dag ni dge slong dang 'tsham pa ma yin gyis 'di dag sdus shig_/des bsdu bar brtsams pa na bcom ldan 'das kyang der gshegs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang 
[\[270a.5\]]ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/_kun dga' bo 'di ci zhig byed/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/_khyim bdag 'dis gdan gzhan bsham du ma 'byor nas de na ko lpags kyi gdan dag bshams pa dang /_bdag gis khyim bdag gdan 'di dag ni dge slong 
[\[270a.6\]]dang 'tsham pa ma yin gyis 'di dag sdus shig ces bsgo nas/_de stan 'di dag sdud pa lags so/_/kun dga' bo thams cad la 'byor pa med pas kun dga' bo khyim bdag stan shom pa ma zlog shig_/de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_khyim du ko lpags kyi 
[\[270a.7\]]stan bshams pa la 'dug par bya'i nyal bar ni mi bya'o/_/gtsug lag khang du ni 'dug par mi bya nyal bar mi bya ste 'dug gam nyal na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu rab tu byung tshun chad nas rtag tu nad bu can nyid du gyur to/_/gnyen dag de'i drung du song ste son pa dang /_des de dag la chos bshad do/_/de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu la chos mnyan nas bud med kyi gan du 'ongs te smras pa/_'phags pa 
[\[270b.2\]]pi lin da'i bus sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bur chos snyan dgu zhig bshad do/_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyed cag gis tshe dang ldan pa de las chos mnyan pa ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no/_/khyed cag kyang nyan 'dod cing bdag cag der mchi bar ngo tsha'o/_/gal te 
[\[270b.3\]]'phags pa bdag cag gi 'dir gshegs te chos bshad pa na bdag cag gis kyang de bzhin du mnyan no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag 'phags pa pi lin da'i bu'i thad du song la zhu bar bya'o/_/zhes de dag tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas 
[\[270b.4\]]smras pa/_'phags pa pi lin da'i bu bud med dag chos thos par 'tshal lo/_/des smras pa/_kho bos bkag gam ci nyon cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa bud med de dag mchir ngo tsha lags so/_/gal te 'phags pa pi lin da'i bu de nyid du gshegs te/_/
[\[270b.5\]]chos bshad na de dag nyan par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bo na bas rkang pas ni 'gro mi nus so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa bzhon pas gshegs/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo /_/skabs de bcom 
[\[270b.6\]]ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_bzhon pas 'gro bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhon pas 'gro bar bya'o zhes gsungs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu bzhon pa 
[\[270b.7\]]la zhon nas lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing dong ba drug sde rnams kyis mthong nas de dag gis dris pa/_shes ldan dag 'gro ba pha bi su zhig_/de dag gis smras pa/_mkhan po yin no ci bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhon pa rjes su gnang ngam/_
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]rjes su gnang ngo /_/drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa ni shAkya rnams shin tu gzhon pas rkang pas 'gro mi nus te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhon pa rjes su gnang ngo snyam nas de rnams kyis gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya 
[\[271a.2\]]dang /_shel gyis khra bor byas shing pad ma bzhin du byi dor byas pa'i bzhon pa dag nye bar bzhag ste/_de dag bzhon pa la zhon nas srang gi dbus nas lag pa bsgreng ste/_bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la nad med par gyur cig ces zer zhing dong ngo /_/de dag gis smras pa/_
[\[271a.3\]]'phags pa dag ci 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ngam/_rjes su gnang ngo /_/de dag gis 'phags pa dge sbyong khyed cag ni 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis g.yen spyo ba yin no zhes smras pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[271a.4\]]'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag bzhon pas 'gro ba yin te/_de lta bas na dge slong gis bzhon pas 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/de nyid nyes dmigs su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bzhon pas 'gro bar bya ba ni gnyis te/_
[\[271a.5\]]rgas 'khogs nas nyam chung ba dang /_na ste sbyor mi bzod pa'o/_/dge slong rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las de dag gis chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te chu rgal ba na dbus su phyin nas 'gro ma nus pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_
[\[271a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_dge slong gis rkyal bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rkyal bslab par bya'o/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis chu bo a dzir ba ti la phar yang rkyal tshur yang rkyal ba dang /_ji tsam na 
[\[271a.7\]]phyugs rdzi bud med dag 'ongs pa de dag gis mthong nas smras pa/_sring mo tshur shog_/khyed cag bdag cag gis bsgral lo/_/de dag gis de dag bsgral bar brtsams pa na de dag gis de dag gi yan lag dang nying lag dag la reg cing de dag gis de dag bsgral nas smras pa/_sring 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]mo dag yang tshur sheg_/kho bo cag gis phyir yang bsgral lo/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag cag gi yan lag dang nying lag dag la khyim thab kyis kyang ma reg na khyed cag gis reg par byas pas bdag cag slar ga la mchi zhes de dag smod par byed/_'phya bar 
[\[271b.2\]]byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag bud med la reg par byed pa yin gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong gis bud med la reg par mi bya'o/_/
[\[271b.3\]]reg na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis bud med la reg par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_grong khyer gyi mi rnams skyed mos tshal la dga' bas de rnams skyed mos tshal du dong ba dang /_bud med cig chu chur song ba las de gred de chus khyer ro/_/
[\[271b.4\]]de tshol du song ba'i mi des dge slong dag mthong nas 'phags pa bdag gi bud med chus khyer ba zhig gzigs sam/_mthong ste chus khyer ba pha bi yin no/_/pha bi de da ltar shi la thug na nyin thog thag tu chu la lta zhing 'khod dam zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong 
[\[271b.5\]]rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dbyung bar bya'o/_/gzhan dag na re thong shig ces zer na/_gal te mthu yod pa yin na gtang bar bya'o/_/gzhan dag g.yo ba med par gyur te de dag bye ma spungs pa la khas bub tu bzhag nas bor 
[\[271b.6\]]te dong ba dang was zos so/_/de bor te 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/de dag chags pa skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyogs gzhan zhig na 'dug la gang dag kha ton zlos pa de dag gi ni kha ton byos shig_/bsam gtan pa gang dag yin pa de dag gis ni yid la 
[\[271b.7\]]byos shig_/dro yol du dogs na de na ba lang rdzi dang phyugs rdzi gang dag 'khod pa de dag la gtad nas 'gro bar bya'o/_/drug sde dag gis khyim bdag gzhan zhig gi ba'i mjug ma la bzung nas/_ba'i 'o ma zad zad du phar rkyal tshur rkyal lo/_/des phyugs rdzi la dris pa/_de 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]ring ci'i phyir 'o ma med/_des smras pa/_'phags pa drug sde dag gis zhes bya ba nas de smod par byed/_'phya bar byed/_kha zer bar byed ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis ba'i mjug 
[\[272a.2\]]ma las bzung ste rkyal par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis ba'i mjug ma las bzung ste rkyal par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong chu rgal ba dag cig glang po che'i mjug ma nas bzung ste 'gro bar 'dod pa phongs par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[272a.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_mjug ma can lnga'i mjug ma las bzung ste 'gro bar bya ste/_glang po cang shes pa dang /_rta cang shes dang /_khyu mchog dang /_ma he dang /_g.yag gi'o/_/'on kyang rkyal pas rkyal bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rkyal pas rkyal bar bya'o zhes 
[\[272a.4\]]gsungs pa dang /_drug sde dag gis rkyal pa bud med dang skyes pa nyal po byed pa ri mor bris shing pad ma ltar byi dor byas pa dag byas pa dang /_de dag bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa 'di ci lags/_de dag gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[272a.5\]]'das kyis rkyal pa rjes su gnang ngo /_/'phags pa dge sbyong khyed cag ni 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan gyis g.yen spyo 'am ci zhes de dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge sbyong gis rkyal 
[\[272a.6\]]pa bud med dang skyes pa nyal po byed pa'i ri mor bris shing pad ma ltar byi dor byas pa dag bcang bar mi bya'o/_/'on kyang rkyal pa gnyis bcang bar bya ste/_rtsis bskus pa dang /_rkyal skya'o/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'khor gyi khyams shig brtsigs pa dang /_
[\[272a.7\]]chos mnyan par dge slong shing gi mchil lham gon pa dag lhags nas/_de dag gis shing gi mchil lham gyis sa gzhi bstar ba brud cing rlog par gyur to/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin nang par sngar langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa des 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]mthong ngo /_/mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa 'dir ma dang sum rgyal po gsal rgyal dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang dgongs btab bam/_de dag gis smras pa/_rgyal po ni ma yin mod kyi dge slong shing gi mchil lham gon pa dag cig 'ongs te/_de dag gis 
[\[272b.2\]]'di ma rung bar byas so/_/de smod par byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag shing gi mchil lham 'chang ba yin gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong 
[\[272b.3\]]gis shing gi mchil lham bcang bar mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis shing gi mchil lham bcang bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_khyim du dge slong rnams dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/_de dag gis mchil lham 'dam gyis rlan par gyur 
[\[272b.4\]]pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis khyim gyi nang du shing gi mchil lham bcang bar bya'o/_/dge slong gis dge 'dun rnams la bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis 
[\[272b.5\]]shing gi mchil lham dag phul ba dang dge slong rnams kyis ma blangs so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe mu stegs can rnams sbyin gnas su gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[272b.6\]]stsal pa/_blang bar bya ste/_blangs nas dge 'dun gyi snam phyis 'am/_chab khung sar gzhag par bya'o//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/_sdom la/_smyug ma'i lo ma gro bzhin dang /_/rjes su gnang dang bsrungs phyir dang /_/de bzhin bsegs 
[\[272b.7\]]su bcing ba dang /_/rtse mo rting ba sbu gu can/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis shing gi mchil lham bcang bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs nas de dag smyug lo'i mchil lham 'chang ba dang /_de nyid nyes dmigs su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]smyug lo'i mchil lham bcang bar mi bya'o/_/de dag rtswa mun dza'i mchil lham 'chang ba dang /_de nyid nyes dmigs su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rtswa mun dza'i mchil lham bcang bar mi bya'o/_/de dag srad bu'i mchil 
[\[273a.2\]]lham 'chang ba dang /_de nyid nyes dmigs su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_srad bu'i mchil lham bcang bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong dag dreg gis btab ste/_de dag shu ba byung bas ko ba'i mchil lham rlan par gyur pa'i skabs de bcom 
[\[273a.3\]]ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dreg gis thebs pa gang yin pa des srad bu'i mchil lham bcang bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa rab tu byung ba de'i tshe de'i rkang mthil la gser gyi kha dog 'dra 
[\[273a.4\]]ba'i spu sor bzhi tsam yod pa de drug sde dag gis mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' re zhig mar sar gyi gong bu 'dra ba 'di gcig tu brtson pas bstan pa la rab tu byung nas ci zhig byed ces smras pa des thos so/_/des thos nas nga 
[\[273a.5\]]rgyal skyes te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i drung du song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dris pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis gcig tu brtson pas bstan pa la ting nge 'dzin yun ring du gnas par gsungs pa gang lags/_tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin 
[\[273a.6\]]skyes 'chag pas thob pa yin no/_/de bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du song nas 'chag sa bcas so/_/de 'chag pa na spu gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba sor bzhi tsam po dag kyang zad do/_/de'i 'og tu pags pa rdol/_de'i 'og tu khrag byung ste/_de ji srid 'chag sa'i mgo 
[\[273a.7\]]gcig nas cig shos su song gi bar du de'i 'chag sa'i mgo gcig na yang khwa dag khrag 'thung la gnyis pa na yang 'thung ngo /_/chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa ni dus dus su chu bor rgyu ba spyod do/_/zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]par bya ste/_skabs 'dir ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du rgyu zhing gshegs pa yin pas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa'i gtsug lag khang gang na ba der gshegs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa'i 'chag sa gzigs 
[\[273b.2\]]so/_/gzigs nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas mkhyen bzhin du rmed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/_kun dga' bo gcig tu brtson pa'i 'chag sa 'di dge slong gang gi yin/_
[\[273b.3\]]gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa'i lags so/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas rim pa gcig pa'i mchil lham bcang bar bya'o/_/rim gnyis pa ma yin/_rim gsum pa ma yin no/_/gal te rdol bar gyur na lhan pas btab ste 
[\[273b.4\]]bcang bar bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa gang na ba der song ste son nas/_tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shes par gyis shig ston pas khyod la mchil lham rim gcig 
[\[273b.5\]]pa rjes su gnang ste/_rim gnyis pa ma yin/_rim gsum pa ma yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo ci dge 'dun thams cad la'am/_'on te bdag 'ba' zhig la/_khyod 'ba' zhig la'o/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo ston pa'i bka' ni mi 
[\[273b.6\]]gcog na/_gal te bdag gis bcangs na gzhi des bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag e ma'o gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa rab tu byung nas ltog po zhig rnyed do/_/gang yang yul tsam pa thun mong ma yin pa dang glang po che bdun gyi tshogs spangs te rab tu byung la/_deng 
[\[273b.7\]]mchil lham the gi ba tsam la chags pa lta zhes gleng bar 'gyur te/_de lta mod kyi gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bltos te dge 'dun thams cad la rjes su gnang na bdag gis de bzhin du bcang bar bya'o zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyas 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa la bltos nas dge 'dun thams cad kyis rim gcig pa'i mchil lham bcang bar bya ste/_rim gnyis pa ma yin zhes rgyas par sbyar 
[\[274a.2\]]ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na rgan zhugs mchil lham can gzhan zhig 'chag par byed pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong phar song nga'i spyan snga na ma 'dug cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 
[\[274a.3\]]slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag re zhig 'jig rten thams cad kyi zang zing dang 'dres pa'i ston pa gang yin pa/_ston pa de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'di ltar myur ba myur bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i brtul zhugs mi spyod na/_nga 'jig rten thams cad kyi zang zing dang bral 
[\[274a.4\]]bar gnas pa'i lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag mchil lham 'chang pa yin te/_de lta bas na dge slong gis mchil lham bcang bar mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis mchil lham 
[\[274a.5\]]bcang bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_gar mkhan gzhan zhig rab tu byung ba de'i chu snod chag nas de rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas su rkang pa bkrus nas kha'i nang chus bkang ste/_rma bya'i 'gros su song ba de drug sde rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[274a.6\]]dag rol mo'i sgra med par dge slong gar byed kyis rol mo'i sgra bya'o zhes de rnams kyis khas rol mo'i sgra bya bar brtsams so/_/de rnams la dge slong dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ci ma grangs pa byed dam/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_'di la ma grangs su ci 
[\[274a.7\]]zhig yod khyed kyis rol mo'i sgra med par dge slong gar byed pa mthong ngam zhes bya ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen du rmed pa yin pas mkhyen bzhin du rmed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]kyis dge slong de la rmas pa/_dge slong khyod kyis bsam pa ci zhig gis de lta bu byas/_btsun pa gnas mal bsrung ba'i slad du'o/_/dge slong 'di gnas mal bsrung ba'i phyir de lta bu byed pa la ltung ba med de/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_gnas mal bsrung 
[\[274b.2\]]ba'i phyir rim gcig pa'i mchil lham bcang bar bya'o/_/rim gnyis pa ma yin/_rim gsum pa ma yin/_gal te rdol bar gyur na lhan pas btab ste bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rim gcig pa'i mchil lham bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_
[\[274b.3\]]bsod snyoms pa gzhan zhig la khyim bdag cig dad par gyur to/_/de nang par sngar langs te mchil lham med par mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/de mchil lham med pa khyim bdag des mthong ngo /_/mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa la mchil lham 
[\[274b.4\]]ma mchis sam/_tshur spyon lham mkhan gyi drung du bzhud/_mchil lham cig 'bul du stsal to/_/de lham mkhan gyi drung du song nas des lham mkhan la smras pa/_kye nang rje 'phags pa 'di la mchil lham cig phul cig ces bsgo nas song ngo /_/de'i tshe dge slong rnams 
[\[274b.5\]]dang /_shi ba rnams dang gnyis kyi phyir mchil lham rim gcig pa dag byas so/_/dge slong de yang yang du lham mkhan gyi drung du song yang ma byin no/_/dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag des yang dge slong mchil lham med pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang smras pa/_'phags 
[\[274b.6\]]pa khyod la lham mkhan gyis mchil lham ma phul lam/_khyim bdag lham mkhan la bden par smra ba dkon par khyod kyis ma thos sam/_yang dang yang song yang ma byin no/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa tshur spyon khyim du bzhud/_des khyim du khrid nas kha zas bsod 
[\[274b.7\]]pas tshim par byas te rim pa mang po can gyi mchil lham zhig byin no/_/dge slong gis smras pa/_khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo /_/des 'phags pa snoms te bzhud la rim gcig pa'i mchil lham mdzod la gsol cig_/des de khyer te gnas 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]khang du son nas des de dang gri blangs te shing drung du 'dug nas dral bar brtsams so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der byon nas dge slong ci byed/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rim pa mang po can gyi mchil lham bkag na bdag la rim pa mang po can 'di 
[\[275a.2\]]lta bu grub ste/_rim pa gcig par bgyis la bcang bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du e ma'o nga'i nyan thos rnams la bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis rim pa mang po'i mchil lham ster ba lta snyam du dgongs nas/_de lta bas na rjes 
[\[275a.3\]]su gnang ste/_mchil lham rim pa mang po can khyim pa'i dman ma yin phan chad bcang bar bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus te zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mchil lham rim pa mang po can khyim pa'i dman ma yin phan chad bcang 
[\[275a.4\]]bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/_btsun pa ji tsam gyis na khyim pa'i dman ma lags par brjod par bgyi/_nye ba 'khor tha na gom pa bdun nam brgyad bgos par gyur na yang yin no/_/gleng gzhi ni yangs pa can na'o/_/de'i tshe yangs pa can na 'di lta bu'i mchil 
[\[275a.5\]]lham dag byed de/_'di lta ste/_thrig thrig_/tshig tshig chem chem zhes zer ba lug ru'am/_byang chub kyi shing gi lo ma lta bu khra bo kAr ShA pa Na lnga ri ba dag byed do/_/drug sde dag gis mchil lham gon pa zhig mthong nas de dag gi rting pa rkang pa'i mthe bos mnan 
[\[275a.6\]]nas ltag pa nas phul te khyod kyis sbyin pa 'di phul bas sems kyi rgyan dang /_sems kyi yo byad dang /_rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang /_don gyi mchog sangs rgyas nyid thob par gyur cig ces byas nas blangs pa dang /_phyogs kun du 'phags pa dag ni lham de lta bu 'phrog go/_/
[\[275a.7\]]zhes sgra grags so/_/rgan mo zhig gi mag pa zhig 'ongs pa dang /_de la des mchil lham zhig byin nas 'phags pa dag mchil lham 'phrog gis ji nas kyang 'phrog par mi 'gyur bar bag yod par gyis shig ces bsgo'o/_/phyis bsod snyoms pa zhig bsod snyoms kyi phyir 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]zhugs pa des mthong nas de khyim zhig tu zhugs so/_/de yang de nyid du zhugs pa dang /_khyim de nas byung nas khyim gzhan zhig tu zhugs so/_/bsod snyoms pas kyang de nyid du zhugs pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod don ci'i phyir kho bo'i rjes bzhin du 
[\[275b.2\]]'brang ba ci mchil lham 'di dbrog par bzhed mod/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyi mchil lham kho bo mi 'phrog ste/_'on kyang kho bo bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa 'phrog kyang rung mi 'phrog kyang rung ste/_'on kyang phyogs kun tu 'phags pa 
[\[275b.3\]]khyed cag mchil lham 'phrog go zhes sgra grags pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag mchil lham thrig thrig ces bya ba nas de lta 
[\[275b.4\]]bas na dge slong gis mchil lham thrig thrig zer ba bcang bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar rgyas par sbyar ro/_/de lta bu bcang bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong gis de lta bu'i mchil lham bcangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe dge 
[\[275b.5\]]slong rnams mchil lham gyis rkang pa'i bol rma byung ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas/_khyed cag gi zhabs kyi bol ji zhig gis rma byung bar gyur/_mchil lham gyis so/_/ci khyed cag gis bsegs su bcings nas ma bcangs sam/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[275b.6\]]kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_bsegs su bcings nas bcang bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 
[\[275b.7\]]'dzeg pa na rkang pa'i mthe bor rma byung ngo /_/de dag bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas smras pa/[ (]khyad [,]khyed [)]cag gi zhabs mthe bo la ci zhig gis rma byung /_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzeg pa na'o/_/ci khyed cag gis mchil lham gyi rtse mo sbu bu can ma bcangs sam/_
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_dge slong gis mchil lham rtse mo sbu bu bcang bar 
[\[276a.2\]]bya'o/_/dge slong rnams bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las babs pa na rkang pa'i rting pa rma byung ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa khyed cag rnams kyi zhabs kyi rting pa ci zhig gis rma byung /_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las babs pa na'o/_/ci khyed 
[\[276a.3\]]cag gis mchil lham gyi rting pa sbu bu can ma bcangs sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_dge 
[\[276a.4\]]slong gis mchil lham gyi rting pa sbu bu can bcang bar bya'o//_//sdom la/_mgul chad dang ni yu'u thung lham/_/kha khrod dag tu sgro gu can/_/dom gyi pags pa gnang ba dang /_/smyung bu 'breng bu chu gri'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/dge slong 
[\[276a.5\]]rnams rtswa'i myu gus rkang pa rma byung ba dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed cag gi zhabs ci zhig gis rma byung /_rtswa'i myu gus so/_/ci khyed cag gis lham mgul chad ma bcangs sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[276a.6\]]rjes su ma gnang ngo zhes bya ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_lham mgul chad bcang bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe rtswa'i myu gu dag cher skyes pa de'i tshe dge slong 
[\[276a.7\]]rnams kyi rkang ba de bas kyang rma cher byung ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/_khyed cag gi zhabs ci zhig gis rma byung /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_rtswa'i myu gu dag cher skyes pas bdag cag gi rkang pa de bas kyang rma cher byung ngo /_/'phags pa rnams ci 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]khyed cag gis lham yu'u thung ma bcangs sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_lham yu'u thung bcang bar 
[\[276b.2\]]bya'o/_/gang gi tshe skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kha btag pa na/_de dag las kha cig nub phyogs su dong ba nas/_kha cig bal yul gyi bar du dong ngo /_/mnyan yod pa'i don mthun dag zong thogs te bal yul du lhags pa dang /_
[\[276b.3\]]de dag gis de rnams mthong nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed cag gang nas da 'dir lhags/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_mnyan yod nas so/_/bdag cag gi gnyen 'phags pa kun dga' bo yod na lan 'ga' yang 'phags pa kun dga' bo 'dir 'ongs te bdag 
[\[276b.4\]]cag la gtam ma dris so/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_bdag cag gi 'phags pa kun dga' bo'i drung du song la sbran par bgyi'o/_/de rnams kyis zong rnams bsgyur ba'i zong dag khyer te mnyan yod du lhags nas de rnams kyis 'phags pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/_
[\[276b.5\]]'phags pa kun dga' bo khyod kyi gnyen bal yul na mchis te de dag khyod mthong bar 'tshal lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni gnyen la gdung ba yin pas de gnyen dag la blta ba'i phyir bal yul du song ba las/_de lhags pas lag pa dang rkang pa ser ga byung ba 
[\[276b.6\]]dang /_de la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo pad ma'i 'dab ma ral ba bzhin du khyod kyi lag pa dang rkang pa ci zhig gis ser ga byung bar gyur/_des smras pa/_lhags pas so/_/khyod kyi gnyen dag ni lham sgro gu can ci ste 'chang /_khyod ni ci'i 
[\[276b.7\]]phyir mi 'chang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_yul kha ba can rnams su lham sgro gu can bcang bar bya'o/_/
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yul kha ba can rnams su lham sgro gu can bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa ji tsam gyis yul kha ba can du brjod par 
[\[277a.2\]]bgyi/_/nye ba 'khor gang na snod du chu 'khyag pa yin no/_/dge slong gzhan zhig la rngon pa zhig dad par gyur nas/_rngon pa des dom lpags shig rnyed pa dge slong de la phul ba dang des ma blangs so/_/des dge slong de'i phyi bzhin 'brang zhing smras pa/_'phags pa 
[\[277a.3\]]bdag gis dom lpags rnyed pa khyod la 'bul gyis bzhes shig_/dge slong des ma blangs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas mkhyen bzhin du rmed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[277a.4\]]'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong 'o ni'i phyi bzhin du rngon pa pha bi ci ste 'brang /_btsun pa rngon pa des dom lpags shig rnyed nas/_des dge slong 'o ni la stsal pa las/_dge slong gis de ma blangs pa dang rngon pa de dge slong 'o ni'i phyi bzhin 'brang 
[\[277a.5\]]zhing mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rngon pa dad pa can ni dkon te/_gal te brgya'am stong zhig dang phrad na thams cad gsod pa yin pas/_de bas na gal te rngon pas dom lpags byin na blang bar bya'o/_/blangs nas dri gtsang 
[\[277a.6\]]khang gi sgo'am/_rkang pa'i 'og tu gding bar bya ste/_dom lpags thams cad ni mig la phan no/_/dge slong gzhan zhig mchil lham ral nas de lham mkhan gyi drung du song ste son nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag gi mchil lham ral ba rgyus te bdag la byin 
[\[277a.7\]]cig_/lham mkhan gyis bsams pa/_shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams ni rngan pa med par 'tshol gyis yun ring du bsgyangs pa dang /_rang gi blo slar ldog par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_'phags pa bdag brel gyis sang spyon cig_/dge slong de yang dang yang du 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]lham mkhan de'i drung du song yang des bsgyangs pa dang /_de mdza' bshes dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa ci de na khyed kyi zas sbyor ba'i khyim yod dam/_'on te gnyen gyi khyim yod/_des smras pa/_de na bdag gi zas sbyor ba'i khyim yang med/_
[\[277b.2\]]gnyen gyi khyim yang med mod kyi bdag gi mchil lham ral nas bdag gis de la rgyus te byin cig ces smras na des bsgyangs so/_/des smras pa/_lham mkhan la bden par smra ba dkon par khyod kyis ma thos sam/_'on kyang bdag shes kyis gal te bcom ldan 'das 
[\[277b.3\]]kyis rjes su gnang na bdag gis brgyus te khyod la sbyin no zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gang zhig shes pa yod na des gang du gzhan gyis mthong na mi dad par mi 'gyur ba dben 
[\[277b.4\]]pa'i phyogs su 'dug ste brgyu bar bya'o/_/de de'i drung du song ste smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang gis rgyus shig_/des smras pa/_ci 'di de bzhin du brgyur rung snyam mam/_de la re zhig smyung bu dang /_dra gri dang /_'breng bu yang dgos so zhes pa'i skabs de 
[\[277b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gang zhig shes pa yod na des smyung bu dang /_'breng bu ni bcang bar bya'o/_/dra gri ni bcang bar mi bya'o/_/ko lpags kyi gzhi rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[277b.6\]{D1-6}]sman gyi gzhi'i bsdus pa'i sdom la/_sman dag dang ni bde chen dang /_/rgyal po'i khab dang 'od ma'i tshal/_/shing mkhan yid tsa nang ga la/_/kam bi la dang sngon rgyal po'o/_/gzhon nu 'phel dang nad pa dang /_/gtam du gyur dang sder bsdus so/_/sdom la/_sman ni 
[\[277b.7\]]rjes su gnang ba dang /_/tshil dang g.yan pa mig sman dang /_/smyon pa dang ni bi lin da/_/nam gru dang ni skyur khu'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe dge slong 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]rnams ston ka'i nad kyis thebs te/_de rnams ston ka'i nad kyis btab pas skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_na bas nyam dmas par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa ste/_
[\[278a.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/_kun dga' bo ci'i phyir da ltar dge slong 'di rnams skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_na bas nyam dmas par gyur tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/_btsun pa 
[\[278a.3\]]dge slong 'di rnams ston ka'i bro nad kyis btab ste/_'di rnams ston ka'i bro nad kyis btab pas skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_bro 'tshal bas nyam dmas par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de lta 
[\[278a.4\]]bas na rjes su gnang ste/_dge slong gis sman so sor bsten par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sman so sor bsten par bya'o/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_de rnams dus su za ba yin pas dus su sten par byed kyis/_dus las yol bar sten par mi byed 
[\[278a.5\]]pas de rnams skye bo bseng bseng por gyur cing rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_na bas nyam dmas par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/_kun 
[\[278a.6\]]dga' bo ngas dge slong gis sman so sor bsten par bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/_'on kyang da ltar dge slong 'di rnams skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_na bas nyam dmas par gyur tam/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[278a.7\]]'das kyis dge slong gis sman so sor bsten par bya'o zhes gsungs pa 'di dag dus su 'tshal ba lags pas dus su sten par bgyid kyi dus las yol bar mi sten te/_de'i slad du skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_bro 'tshal bas nyam dmas 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]par gyur lags so/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_dge slong rnams kyis sman rnam pa bzhi po dus su rung ba dang /_thun tshod du rung ba dang /_zhag bdun pa dang /_'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba so sor bsten par bya'o/_/de la dus su rung ba ni 'de gu dang /_
[\[278b.2\]]'bras chan dang /_zan dron dang /_sha dang /_snum khur ro/_/thun tshod du rung ba ni btung ba rnam pa brgyad po shing thog tso tsa'i btung ba dang /_chu shing gi 'bras bu'i btung ba dang /_rgya shug gi btung ba dang /_a shwat+tha'i btung ba dang /_u dum bA ra'i btung ba dang /_
[\[278b.3\]]pa ru sha ka'i btung ba dang /_rgun 'bru'i btung ba dang /_'bra go'i btung ba'o//_//bar sdom la/_tso tsa chu shing rgya shug dang /_/a shwad u dum bA ra dang /_/ba ru sha ka rgun 'bru dang /_/brgyad pa yang ni 'bra go yin/_/zhag bdun pa ni mar dkar dang /_/til mar 
[\[278b.4\]]dang /_bu ram gyi dbu ba dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_sha kha ra'o/_/'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba ni rtsa ba'i sman dang /_sdong bu'i sman dang /_lo ma'i sman dang /_me tog gi sman dang /_'bras bu'i sman dang /_trang chu lnga dang /_thal ba lnga dang /_lan tshwa lnga dang /_bska ba 
[\[278b.5\]]lnga'o/_/de la rtsa ba'i sman ni gla sgang dang /_shu dag dang /_yung dang /_sge'u gsher dang /_bong nga dkar po dang /_gzhan yang rtsa ba'i sman gyi nang du gtogs pa zas kyi don du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/_/sdong bu'i sman ni tsan dan dang /_dbyi mo dang /_shug 
[\[278b.6\]]pa dang /_thang shing dang /_sle tres dang /_skyer pa dang /_gzhan yang sdong bu'i sman gyi nang du gtogs pa zas kyi don du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/_/lo ma'i sman ni pa to la'i lo ma dang /_ba sha ka'i lo ma dang /_nim pa'i lo ma dang /_ko sha ta ga'i lo ma dang /_sap+ta 
[\[278b.7\]]par+Na'i lo ma dang /_gzhan yang lo ma'i sman gyi nang du gtogs pa'i zas kyi don du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/_/me tog gi sman ni me tog lnga po ba sha ka'i me tog dang /_nim pa'i me tog dang /_d+ha ka'i me tog dang /_sha ta'i me tog dang /_pad ma ke sa ra'i me tog 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]dang /_gzhan yang me tog gi sman gyi nang du gtogs pa zas kyi don du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/_/'bras bu'i sman ni a ru ra dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_ba ru ra dang /_na le sham dang /_pi pi ling dang /_gzhan yang 'bras bu'i sman gyi nang du 
[\[279a.2\]]gtogs pa zas kyi don du mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/_/trang chu lnga ni shing kun dang /_sra rtsi dang /_rgya skegs dang /_spra tshil dang /_drod sman no/_/de la shing kun ni shing kun gyi trang chu'o/_/sra rtsi ni shing sa la'i trang chu'o/_/rgya skegs ni rgya skegs so/_/spra 
[\[279a.3\]]tshil ni spra tshil lo/_/drod sman ni de dag las gzhan pa'i shing rnams kyi trang chu'o/_/thal ba lnga gang zhe na/_nas kyi thal ba dang /_nas kyi phub ma'i thal ba dang /_shing sardzi ka'i thal ba dang /_til gyi thal ba dang /_shing 'ba' shig ka'i thal ba'o/_/lan
