[\[279a.4\]]tshwa lnga gang zhe na/_rgyam tshwa dang /_lan tshwa smug po dang /_kha ru tshwa dang /_lan tshwa dang /_rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa'o/_/bska pa lnga gang zhe na/_a mra'i bska ba dang /_nim pa'i bska ba dang /_'dzam bu'i bska ba dang /_sha ri sha'i bska ba dang /_ko sham pa'i bska ba'o/_/de 
[\[279a.5\]]la dus su rung ba gang yin pa dang /_thun tshod du rung ba gang yin pa dang /_zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang /_'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de dus su rung ba dang 'dres par gyur na dus su spyad par bya'i dus ma yin par longs spyad par mi bya'o/_/dus su rung ba 
[\[279a.6\]]gang yin pa dang /_thun tshod du rung ba gang yin pa dang /_zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang /_'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de gal te thun tshod du rung ba dang 'dres par gyur na thun tshod la yongs su spyad par bya'i thun tshod las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o/_/zhag bdun pa 
[\[279a.7\]]gang yin pa dang /_'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de zhag bdun pa dang 'dres par gyur na zhag bdun spyad par bya'i zhag bdun las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o/_/'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba ni 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang bar byin gyis brlabs nas yongs su spyad 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]par bya'o/_/byin gyis brlab pa ni 'di ltar bya ste/_zan ma zos pa'i mdun du lag pa gnyis bkrus nas byin len byas te/_dge slong zhig gi mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_bdag cag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i 
[\[279b.2\]]sman ni bdag dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi don du 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang bar byin gyis brlab bo/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod do/_/'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba byin gyis brlab pa ji lta ba de bzhin du thun tshod du rung ba dang /_zhag bdun pa yang byin 
[\[279b.3\]]gyis brlab par bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de nas dge slong gzhan zhig rlung nad kyis thebs nas des sman pa'i drung du song ste/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis btab na sman ston cig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa tshil sten cig dang khyod sos 
[\[279b.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci kho bo 'dre yin nam/_sman pas smras pa/_dge slong khyod kyi sman 'di yin te gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[279b.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_gal te sman pa na re dge slong khyod kyi sman 'di yin te gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so zhes smra na tshil bsten par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis ma shes nas sman pa la dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa khyed cag gi ston pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin 
[\[279b.6\]]gyis/_de kho na'i drung du bzhud la zhus shig_/skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshil lnga so sor bsten par bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_nya tshil dang /_sbal pa dkar po'i tshil dang /_
[\[279b.7\]]chu srin byis pa gsod kyi tshil dang /_dom tshil dang /_phag gi tshil lo/_/tshil 'di lnga dus ma yin par btsos pa dang /_dus ma yin par btsags pa dang /_dus ma yin par byin len byas pa dang /_dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs na longs spyad par mi bya'o/_/dus su 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]btsos la dus ma yin par btsags/_dus ma yin par byin len byas/_dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs na longs spyad par mi bya'o/_/dus su btsos dus su btsags dus ma yin par byin len byas/_dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs na spyad par 
[\[280a.2\]]mi bya'o/_/dus su btsos/_dus su btsags/_dus su byin len byas la dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs na spyad par mi bya'o/_/dus su btsos dus su btsags/_dus su byin len byas/_dus su byin gyis brlabs na til mar la spyod pa bzhin du zhag bdun du spyad 
[\[280a.3\]]par bya'o/_/de nas dge slong des tshil longs spyad nas sos par gyur to/_/de sos par gyur pa dang /_des tshil gyi lhag ma dag bor ro/_/ji tsam na dge slong gzhan zhig de 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs nas de yang sman pa'i drung du song nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo la 
[\[280a.4\]]'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis btab kyis sman ston cig_/des de la yang tshil bstan pa dang /_de dge slong de'i drung du song nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis tshil spyad pa kho bo la yang sman pas bstan na tshil lhag pa lta cung zad yod dam/_des smras pa/_bdog bdog pa 
[\[280a.5\]]las bdag gis de bor ro/_/ma legs pa zhig byas so/_/zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis tshil longs spyad pa'i lhag ma bor bar mi bya ste/_'on kyang bcang 
[\[280a.6\]]bar bya'o/_/ngas dge slong tshil 'chang ba'i kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_tshil 'chang ba'i dge slong gis tshil spyad pa'i lhag ma dge slong gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/_/gal te ma byin na sman khang du gzhag par bya ste/_su 'dod pa des blang bar bya'o/_/tshil 
[\[280a.7\]]'chang ba'i dge slong gis kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas par yang dag par blangs nas 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe dge slong gzhan zhig g.yan pa'i nad kyis thebs nas/_des 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]sman pa'i drung du song ste/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo g.yan pa'i nad kyis btab kyis sman ston cig des smras pa/_'phags pa bska ba sten cig dang khyod sos par 'gyur ro/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci kho bo 'dod pa la spyod pa yin nam/_des smras pa/_dge slong khyod kyi 
[\[280b.2\]]sman 'di yin te gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_khyod kyi ston pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin pas/_de kho nas mkhyen par 'gyur zhes pa'i skabs de bcom 
[\[280b.3\]]ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bska ba ni lnga ste a mra'i bska ba zhes bya ba nas gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dge slong des bska ba dag 'de gur byas te lus la byugs pa las rma mched nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[280b.4\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_phye ma bya'o dge slong dag gis rlon pa la btags pas ri lur gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bskam par bya'o/_/de dag gis nyi ma la bskams pa dang /_mthu nyams par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[280b.5\]]pa/_nyi ma la bskam par mi bya'o/_/de dag gis grib ma la bskams pa dang 'on kyang rul bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyi ma'i grib mas bskam par bya'o/_/dge slong gis bska bas lus byugs nas bkrus te bska ba'i bya ba mi byed do/_/bcom 
[\[280b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag pas ji tsam chog gi bar du dril nas khrus bya'o/_/bkrus nas slar yang bska bas bskus nas bkrus na bska ba'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong des bska bas bskus pa dang nad zhi bar gyur to des bska ba'i lhag ma bor 
[\[280b.7\]]ro/_/ji tsam na dge slong gzhan zhig de 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs nas de yang sman pa'i drung du song ste zhes bya ba nas gong ma bzhin du ste/_kho bos de ni bor ro/_/ma legs pa zhig byas so zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngas bska ba 'chang ba'i dge slong gi kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_bska ba 'chang ba'i dge slong gis bska ba spyad pa'i lhag ma dge slong su slong ba de la sbyin par bya'o/_/gal te ma byin na sman khang du gzhag 
[\[281a.2\]]par bya'o/_/bska ba bcang ba'i dge slong gis kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe dge slong gzhan zhig mig nad kyis thebs nas de sman pa'i drung du 
[\[281a.3\]]song ste bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo mig nad kyis thebs par gyur na kho bo la sman ston cig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa mig sman so sor sten cig dang khyed sos par 'gyur ro/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci kho bo 'dod pa la spyod dam 'phags pa khyod kyi sman 'di yin te gzhan gyis ni 
[\[281a.4\]]sos par mi nus so zhes bya ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te sman pa na re sman 'di yin te gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so zhes zer na mig sman bsten par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis 
[\[281a.5\]]mig sman gang bsten par bya ba ma shes nas de dag gis sman pa la dris pa dang des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod nyid kyi ston pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin gyis zhes bya ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[281a.6\]]stsal pa/_mig sman ni lnga ste/_me tog gi mig sman dang /_khu ba'i mig sman dang /_phye ma'i mig sman dang /_ri lu'i mig sman dang /_btsag yug snam gyi mig sman no/_/de nas dge slong des mig sman de bsten nas sos par gyur to/_/des mig sman gyi lhag ma 
[\[281a.7\]]gar bab bab tu bzhag pa las de chud zos par gyur to/_/ji tsam na dge slong gzhan zhig mig nad kyis thebs nas des kyang sman pa la dris pa dang /_des de la yang mig sman de nyid bstan to/_/de dge slong de'i drung du song nas tshe dang ldan pa kho bo yang mig nad kyis 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]btab par gyur na khyod la mig sman gyi lhag ma cung zad yod dam/_des btsal bar brtsams pa las ma rnyed nas des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa mig sman de bdog bdog ste bzhag pa las der stor to zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa 
[\[281b.2\]]dang /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gis mig sman gar bab bab tu gzhag par mi bya'o/_/ngas mig sman 'chang ba'i dge slong gi kun du spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_mig sman 'chang ba'i dge slong gis mig sman rnams so sor phye la 
[\[281b.3\]]gzhag par bya ste/_me tog gi mig sman ni snod kyi nang du'o/_/khu ba'i mig sman ni gab tse'i nang du'o/_/phye ma'i mig sman ni dong bu'i nang du'o/_/ri lu'i mig sman dang btsag yug snam gyi mig sman ni sgye'u 'am/_thum por skud pas bcings la zung nga la 
[\[281b.4\]]gdags par bya'o/_/mig sman 'chang ba'i dge slong gis kun du spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs nas 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa bye ma skyes sems 
[\[281b.5\]]'khrugs te smyos par gyur nas de de dang de dag tu 'phyan pa/_ji tsam na bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong ste de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di su'i bu zhig yin/_gzhan dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi'o/_/de dag gis smras 
[\[281b.6\]]pa shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong mgon med pa rnams kyi nang du rab tu ma byung na 'di gnyen rnams kyis gsos par 'gyur ba zhig ces pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas 
[\[281b.7\]]na dge slong bye ma skyes kyi dpyad sman pa la dris la byos shig_/sman pa'i drung du dong nas bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge slong zhig 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs kyis de'i sman ston cig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa dag sha rjen 'tshal du stsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro/_/bzhin 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de ci 'dre yin nam/_'phags pa de'i sman 'di lags te gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te sman pa na 
[\[282a.2\]]re de'i sman 'di yin te gzhan gyis ni sos par mi nus so zhes zer na sha rjen pa sbyin par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis de bzhin du byin pa dang /_de zar ma btub bo bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mig ras kyis bkab la sbyin par bya'o/_/de dag gis 
[\[282a.3\]]byin te byin ma thag tu ras phye ba dang des lag pa la reg pa mthong nas zhe ba log pas skyugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mod la ras dbye bar mi bya ste de lta mod kyi bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag mdun du bzhag nas gang gi tshe de'i 
[\[282a.4\]]lag pa bkrus pa de'i tshe de dbye bar bya'o/_/de sos par gyur pa dang de de nyid la sred par gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang gi tshe sos par gyur pa de'i tshe bslab pa ji ltar 
[\[282a.5\]]bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par bya'o/_/longs spyod na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu gang gi tshe rab tu byung ba de tshun chad rtag tu na ba dang zug gzer mang por gyur ba dang /_de la dge slong 
[\[282a.6\]]dag gis smras pa/_gnas brtan khyod kyi snyun gyi zo ji lta des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag rgyun du na ba dang zug gzer mang bas the ge ba'i skabs med do/_/gnas brtan khyod sngon ci zhig 'chang bar byed/_des smras pa/_sman gyi mchan khug go/_/da 
[\[282a.7\]]ci'i phyir mi bcang bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste dge slong gis sman gyi mchan khug bcang bar 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis rtsa ba dang /_me tog dang sdong bu dang /_'bras bu'i sman rags pa dag de'i nang du bcug pa dang de dag rul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag sbam pa'am bam por byas te zung nga la gdags par bya'o/_/de dag rul nas 
[\[282b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dus dus su bskam par bya'o/_/de dag gis nyi ma la bskams pa dang de dag mthu chung bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nyi ma la bskam par mi bya'o/_/de dag gis grib ma la bskams pa dang 'on kyang rul bar 
[\[282b.3\]]gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grib ma la bskam par mi bya'o/_/de dag gis bting nas dong ba dang /_char pa dang rlung byung ste ma bsdus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bsdu bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdu bar bya'o zhes 
[\[282b.4\]]gsungs pa dang de dag gis sus bsdu ba ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim pas so/_/khyim pa med na dge sbyong gis so/_/dge sbyong med na dge slong nyid kyis bsdu bar bya'o/_/dge slong gis bsdus pa dang 'dres par gyur nas 'dres so zhes ma 
[\[282b.5\]]zos pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_so sor phye nas longs spyad par bya ste/_de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/ngas na ba dag la rjes su gnang ba gang yin pa de tha mal pa'i gnas skabs na spyad par mi bya'o/_/spyod na 'gal tshabs can du 
[\[282b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa nam gru gar yang som nyi za bas de'i ming nam gru som nyi can nam gru som nyi can zhes bya bar grags so/_/de snga dro sham thabs bgos chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs 
[\[282b.7\]]te de rim gyis bu ram byed pa'i grong du phyin pa dang /_ji tsam na 'bras phye dang bu ram sbru bar byed pa mthong nas des smras pa/_shes ldan dag bu ram 'bras phye dang ma sbru shig_/'phags pa spyi bar bgyid pa gzhan 'ga' mkhyen nam/_kho bos spyi ba gzhan 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]yang mi shes mod kyi bdag cag dus ma yin par longs spyod dgos so/_/'phags pa dus su 'am dus ma yin par gsol ba yang rung ste/_de'i spyi ba ni 'di lags te gzhan gyis ni mi 'brus so ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge 'dun gyis bca' 
[\[283a.2\]]ba bu ram dag rnyed na des ma zos so/_/de'i lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas dag gis smras pa slob dpon dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram zhig brnyes kyis longs spyad du gsol/_des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zas dang 'dres so de dag gis kyang longs ma spyad pa dang de 
[\[283a.3\]]rnams la dge slong gzhan dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram zhig brnyes na ci ste longs mi spyad de dag gis smras pa mkhan po'i zhal nas 'di zas dang 'dres so zhes gsungs so de rnams kyis kyang longs ma spyad do 'khor phal po che de dang dge 
[\[283a.4\]]'dun ril las kyang phal cher longs mi spyad pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zas kyis zas kyi bya ba mi byed pa ni mi rnyed pas 'byung khung yongs su dag pas longs spyad par bya ste/_'di la 
[\[283a.5\]]'gyod par mi bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa nam gru snga dro sham thabs bgos chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/rim gyis srang zhig tu phyin pa dang des spos 'tshong zhig phye la reg nas bu ram la reg 
[\[283a.6\]]par byed pa mthong nas des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]phye la reg nas bu ram la reg par ma byed/_dus ma yin par yang bdag cag gis longs spyad dgos so des smras pa/_'phags pa dag la yang dang yang du sug chab gtong ba su zhig mchis/_dus gzhan 
[\[283a.7\]]zhig na dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram zhig rnyed pa dang des longs ma spyad do/_/lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas dag gis smras pa slob dpon dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram dag brnyes na ci ste mi gsol des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di zas dang 'dres so/_/de rnams 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]kyis kyang longs ma spyad pa dang de rnams la dge slong dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram zhig brnyes na ci ste mi za de rnams kyis smras pa/_mkhan po'i zhal nas 'di zas dang 'dres so zhes gsung ngo /_/de dag gis kyang longs ma spyad 
[\[283b.2\]]do/_/'khor phal po che de dang dge 'dun ril las kyang phal ches longs ma spyad pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_zas kyis zas kyi bya ba mi byed pas mi rnyed kyis khyim pas yongs 
[\[283b.3\]]su dag pas longs spyad par bya ste/_de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rlung nad kyis thebs nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bdag rang gi blos rim gro ni lan mang du byas 
[\[283b.4\]]mod kyi lan 'ga' yang sman pa la ma dris kyis/_ma la da ni sman pa la dri'o snyam nas de sman pa'i drung du song ste/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs par gyur na de'i sman ston cig des smras pa/_'phags pa skyur khu'i nang du lan tshwa 
[\[283b.5\]]stsol la gsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro/_/des skyur khu ni rnyed na lan tshwa med nas de lan tshwa btsal bar brtsams pa dang tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu kho bo la lan tshwa rwa gang 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang bar byin gyis brlabs pa zhig 
[\[283b.6\]]yod kyis/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na sbyin no zhes smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus thos nas des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po kho bo 'di snyam du sems te/_'tsho ba'i bar du bcangs pa dus su rung ba dang 'dres pa longs spyad par mi dbang 
[\[283b.7\]]ngo snyam mo zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu mi dbang ste/_dus su rung ba gang yin pa dang /_thun tshod du rung ba gang yin pa dang /_zhag bdun pa gang 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]yin pa dang 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de gal te dus su rung ba dang 'dres par gyur la/_gal te byin gyis kyang ma brlabs na dus su rung ba dang 'dres pas dus su spyad par bya'i dus las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o/_/thun tshod du rung ba gang 
[\[284a.2\]]yin pa dang /_zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang /_'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de gal te thun tshod du rung ba dang 'dres par gyur la/_gal te byin gyis ma brlabs na thun tshod du rung ba dang 'dres pas thun tshod du spyad par bya'i thun tshod las 'das par spyad par mi 
[\[284a.3\]]bya'o/_/zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang /_'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de zhag bdun pa dang 'dres par gyur na zhag bdun pa dang 'dres pas zhag bdun du spyad par bya'i zhag bdun las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o/_/'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de ni ji 
[\[284a.4\]]srid 'tsho'i bar du spyad par bya ste gzhan du spyod na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//sdom la/_sde chen sha dang gzhang 'brum dang /_/rlung nad can dang gang po dang /_/mes byin dang ni be'i ra to/_/sprin can bya rog rnams yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[284a.5\]]'das yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na bA rA Na sIr byon nas/_bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs so/_/bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag sde chen zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba zhig gnas so/_/de'i chung ma ni sde chen ma zhes 
[\[284a.6\]]bya'o/_/de chung ma dang bcas te dad pa bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can yin te/_des bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi zhes bya ba nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na bA rA Na sIr byon nas/_bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos 
[\[284a.7\]]nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi khyim du lan mang du spyan drangs te zhal zas ni gsol na yo byad thams cad kyis ma bstabs kyis/_ma la bdag gis da bcom ldan 'das la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs par bya'o snyam 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag sde chen la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag 
[\[284b.2\]]par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/
[\[284b.3\]]yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag sde chen bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rangs nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom 
[\[284b.4\]]ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la dgung zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen 
[\[284b.5\]]sman dang /_yo byad rnams 'bul na bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag sde chen la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag sde chen bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rangs nas/_
[\[284b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu khyim bdag sde chen gyis zla ba gsum du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad 
[\[284b.7\]]kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur kho na byas so/_/khyim bdag sde chen gyi kun du spyod pa ni nang par sngar langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te dge slong rnams la lta bar byed pa las dge slong na ba nad tshabs che ba sdug bsngal ba'i nad pa 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]gzhan zhig yod pa de la sman pas sha khu 'thung shig ces bstan to/_/de nas khyim bdag sde chen dge slong de gang na ba der song ste phyin nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te dris pa/_'phags pa sman pas ci bstan/_des smras pa/_sha khu 'thung 
[\[285a.2\]]shig lo/_/de nas khyim bdag sde chen rang gi khyim du song ste chung ma la smras pa/_slob dpon che ge mo zhes bya ba la sman pas sha khu 'thung shig ces bstan gyis sbyor la skur cig_/des bu mo zhig la rin bskur nas tshong dus su btang ba las/_de'i nyin mo rgyal po'i sras 
[\[285a.3\]]bltam nas/_des dril sgrogs su bcug pa/_sus kyang srog gcad par mi bya'o/_/gang zhig srog bcad na chad pas chod par bcad do zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas rin gyis kyang tshong dus su sha ma rnyed nas/_de nas bu mo des de ltar gyur pa dag khyim bdag sde chen la rgyas par brjod 
[\[285a.4\]]pa dang /_khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung mas bsams pa/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bdag cag gi yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs na/_gal te dge slong zhig sman med pas shi bar gyur na ma legs so zhes de snyam du dpyad nas/_gri rnon po 
[\[285a.5\]]blangs te khyim du zhugs nas brla'i sha las bcad de bu mo la byin nas bu sha 'di khu bar byos la 'phags pa che ge mo zhes bya ba'i drung du khyer cig_/des de khyer nas dge slong gi longs spyad pa las sos par gyur to//_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po nyi shu 
[\[285a.6\]]gsum pa/_dge slong des 'di ltar bdag la khyim bdag gi chung ma 'dis rang gi shas bsnyen bkur byas par rig nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag dad pas byin pa longs spyad nas glos phab ste 'dug pa ni rigs pa ma yin gyi/_ma la bdag gis ma thob pa thob par bya 
[\[285a.7\]]ba dang /_ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang /_mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o snyam nas/_de brtson 'grus brtsam par brtsams te/_des brtson pa dang /_'bad pa dang /_brtsal ba byas pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga po 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]g.yo ba dang /_mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang /_ltung ba dang /_rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid du zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas dgra 
[\[285b.2\]]bcom par gyur te/_khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa'i sems ste'u dang tsan dan du mnyam pa/_rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral cing rig pa dang /_mngon par shes 
[\[285b.3\]]pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang /_bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/skabs 
[\[285b.4\]]de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_thugs su mi chud pa'am/_rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang /_chos gos bsnams nas dge 
[\[285b.5\]]slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te khyim bdag sde chen gyi khyim gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[285b.6\]]khyim bdag sde chen la bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag khyim bdag gi chung ma sde chen ma mi snang na ga re/_bcom ldan 'das spyod lam rngo mi thog pas phugs na mchis so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba'i bdag nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin 
[\[285b.7\]]pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis na rma de mdog 'dra ba dang /_pags pa 'dra ba dang /_ba spu 'dra bar gyur pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung ma dad pa skyes te sgor byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so/_/
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ci khyim bdag gi chung ma 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sbungs nyams su myong bar byed dam/_des tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_bsgrim mi dgos par 'khor ba na/_/lus ni shin tu rnyed par sla'i/_/bskal 
[\[286a.2\]]pa bye ba stong rnams su/_/sbyin gnas shin tu rnyed par dka'/_/de nas khyim bdag sde chen gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rnams rang gi lag gis stobs shing tshim par byed 
[\[286a.3\]]do/_/rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag gis bstabs shing tshim par byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te/_lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[286a.4\]]'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag sde chen la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang 
[\[286a.5\]]dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/
[\[286a.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sha rnams kyi nang nas ni 'di lta 
[\[286a.7\]]ste/_mi'i sha tha chad yin no/_/de lta bas na dge slong gis mi'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong gis mi sha zos na ltung ba sbom por 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang ngas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/_dge 'dun 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]gyi gnas brtan gyi dge slong gis sha 'drim par byed na 'di ci'i sha zhes dri bar bya'o/_/gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis ma spobs na gnas brtan gnyis pas dri bar bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis kun du spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang 
[\[286b.2\]]dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong thams cad the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa khyim bdag sde chen gyi mchis 'brang gis rang gi shas dge slong 'di la bsnyen 
[\[286b.3\]]bkur bgyis la/_dge slong 'dis kyang sde chen ma la brten nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi/_ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i 
[\[286b.4\]]dus na yang dge slong 'di la rang gi shas bsnyen bkur byas te 'dis kyang de la brten nas mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas pa de shin tu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI'i grong na khyim bdag sde chen zhes bya 
[\[286b.5\]]ba zhig yod de/_de'i chung ma sde chen ma zhes bya'o/_/ji tsam na bram ze tshogs 'don du 'jug pa gzhan zhig bram ze'i bu lnga brgya tsam la bram ze'i gsang tshig 'don du 'jug go/_/de la khyim bdag sde chen dad pa skyes te/_des de 'khor dang bcas pa la yo byad 
[\[286b.6\]]thams cad kyis bstabs te/_khyim bdag sde chen gyis bram ze de 'khor dang bcas pa la bkur sti kho na byas so/_/khyim bdag de'i kun tu spyod pa ni nang par sngar langs te nad pa rnams la lta bar byed pas ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u gzhan zhig na ba sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che 
[\[286b.7\]]bar gyur nas de la sman pas sha khu 'thung shig ces bstan to/_/de nas khyim bdag sde chen bram ze'i khye'u gang na ba der song ste son nas phyag byas te dris pa/_bram ze'i khye'u khyod la sman pas ci bstan/_des smras pa/_sha khu 'thung shig lo/_/de nas khyim bdag 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]sde chen khyim dag tu song nas chung ma la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u che ge mo zhes bya ba la sha khu 'thung shig ces sman pas bstan gyis de sbyor la skur cig_/des bu mo zhig la rin bskur te tshong dus su btang ngo /_/de nyid kyi nyin mo rgyal po'i bu btsas nas des 
[\[287a.2\]]dril sgrogs su bcug ste/_sus kyang srog gcad par mi bya'o/_/gang gis srog bcad par gyur na de chad pas chod par bcad do zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas tshong dus su rin gyis kyang sha ma rnyed do/_/de nas bu mo des de ltar gyur pa dag khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung ma la 
[\[287a.3\]]rgyas par smras pa dang /_khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung mas bsams pa/_bram ze 'khor dang bcas pa 'di dag bdag cag gis yo byad thams cad bstabs na/_gal te bram ze'i khye'u zhig sman med pas dus byas par gyur na ma legs so zhes de snyam du dpyad na/_gri 
[\[287a.4\]]rnon po blangs te khyim gyi nang du zhugs nas brla'i sha las bcad de bu mo la byin nas/_bu sha 'di khu bar byos la bram ze'i khye'u che ge mo zhes bya ba'i drung du khyer cig_/des khyer nas bram ze'i khye'u des longs spyad nas sos par gyur to/_/bram ze'i khye'u des 'di ltar 
[\[287a.5\]]bdag la khyim bdag gi chung ma des rang gi shas bsnyen bkur byas par rig nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag dad pas byin pa yongs su longs spyad nas bdag glos phab ste 'dug pa ni rigs pa ma yin gyis/_ma la bdag gis ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang /_ma rtogs 
[\[287a.6\]]pa rtogs par bya ba dang /_mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bdag gis 'bad par bya'o snyam nas/_de nas de zhi ba'i phyogs su song ste mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag 
[\[287a.7\]]sde chen zhes bya ba'i chung ma gang yin pa de ni khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung ma 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni dge slong 'di nyid yin te de'i tshe yang 'dis dge slong de la rang gi shas bsnyen bkur byas te/_'dis kyang de la brten nas mngon par 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/_/da ltar yang 'dis dge slong 'di la rang gi shas bsnyen bkur byas so/_/dge slong 'dis kyang 'di la brten nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag 
[\[287b.2\]]pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin/_/'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na da phyin chad las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma ni spangs la/_las 
[\[287b.3\]]gcig tu dkar ba la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi glang po che tsho dgu kha dag go/_/mu ge'i dus byung bas bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams 
[\[287b.4\]]kyis glang po che'i sha bza' bar brtsams so/_/drug sde'i dge slong dag snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/ji tsam na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis glang po che'i sha phru bar bcug ste 'tshed cing 'dug 
[\[287b.5\]]pa'i khyim der de dag zhugs pa dang /_/khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/_'phags pa dbul du cung zad kyang ma mchis kyis bzhud cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_phru ba 'di'i nang na 'tshed cing 'dug na/_'phags pa 'di ni glang po che'i sha lags na ci khyed cag 
[\[287b.6\]]kyang glang po che'i sha gsol lam/_kho bo cag ni 'tsho ba khyed cag la rag las pa yin pas gal te khyed za na kho bo cag la yang byin cig_/de dag la phul nas de dag gis lhung bzed kyi snod bkang ste phyir byung ba dge slong gzhan dag cig bsod snyoms la rgyus pa de dag gis 
[\[287b.7\]]mthong ngo /_/mthong nas dris pa/_e ma'o drug sde lhung bzed kyi snod khengs na ci yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_glang po che'i sha cung zhig rnyed do/_/ci khyed cag glang po che'i sha yang za'am/_tshe dang ldan pa dag mu ge'i dus byung ba la gal te gzhan ma rnyed na ci kho bo cag 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]ltogs te 'chi'am zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rgyal po'i glang po che tsho dgu kha dag la/_gal te khyed kyis glang po che'i sha zos pa rgyal 
[\[288a.2\]]pos thos na/_khyed la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa gzhan dag kyang yod pas 'phags pa dag glang po che'i sha za ste/_des na bdag gi glang po che tsho dgu kha dag go zhes sems par mi 'gyur ram/_dge slong dag gis glang 
[\[288a.3\]]po che'i sha longs spyad par mi bya'o/_/longs spyad na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/glang po che'i sha ji lta ba bzhin du rta'i sha yang de dang 'dra'o//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul tsam pa na drang srong gar ga'i rdzing 'gram na bzhugs so/_/yul tsam pa'i 
[\[288a.4\]]klu dad pa bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can de tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la gnas nas byung ste yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas blangs nas gnas snang bar lus chen por byas te lus btang nas 'dug cing /_'jig rten na sems can gnas pa dag la cung zad kyang 
[\[288a.5\]]gnod pa'am skrag par mi byed do/_/mu ge'i dus byung bas las la mi lta ba'i mi phyugs rdzi rnams dang /_lug rdzi rnams dang /_rtswa thun rnams dang /_shing thun rnams dang /_lam gyis 'tsho ba rnams dang /_lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis klu'i sha la dum bu dum bur bcad nas 
[\[288a.6\]]longs spyad par brtsams so/_/drug sde'i dge slong dag snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/_ji tsam na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis klu'i sha phru bar bcug ste 'tshed cing 'dug pa'i khyim der de dag zhugs so/_/
[\[288a.7\]]khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa/_'phags pa dbul du cung zad kyang ma mchis kyis bzhud cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_phru ba 'di'i nang na 'tshed cing 'dug na/_'phags pa 'di ni klu'i sha lags na ci khyed cag kyang klu'i sha gsol lam/_kho bo cag ni 'tsho 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]ba khyed la rag las pa yin pas gal te khyed cag za na kho bo cag la yang byin cig_/de dag la phul nas 'phags pa rnams kyang longs spyod do zhes phal mo ches spyad par brtsams so/_/de nas tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma 'di snyam du sems te/_'phags pa 'di dag 
[\[288b.2\]]kyang klu'i sha la longs spyod pas skye bo'i tshogs phal mo ches longs spyad na bdag gi khyim thab kyis yun ji srid cig sdug bsngal mnags dgos/_bdag gis 'di'i phyir 'di kho na bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma de'i mtshan mo 'das nas kha dog 
[\[288b.3\]]'phags pas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de'i tshe tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma'i kha dog gi mthus drang srong gar ga'i rdzing gi nyen kor thams cad snang ba rgya chen 
[\[288b.4\]]pos khyab par byas so/_/tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gi sdum thab dad pa bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can des tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la gnas nas byung ste yan lag brgyad dang ldan 
[\[288b.5\]]pa'i bsnyen gnas blangs nas lus btang ste mchis la/_'jig rten na sems can dag gnas pa la gnod pa dang skrag pa cung zad kyang mi bgyid pa mu ge'i dus byung bas las la mi lta ba'i mi phyugs rdzi rnams dang /_lug rdzi rnams dang /_rtswa thun rnams dang /_shing 
[\[288b.6\]]thun rnams dang /_lam gyis 'tsho ba rnams dang /_lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis klu'i sha dum bu dum bur bkum nas 'tshal ba 'phags pa dag gis gzigs nas 'phags pa rnams kyis gsol bar brtsams so/_/'phags pa rnams kyis gsol la de 
[\[288b.7\]]dag gis kyang cher bkum zhing 'tshal bar brtsams nas bdag gi sdum thab kyis yun ji srid cig sdug bsngal mnags 'tshal/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/_gang gi phyir 'phags pa dag klu'i sha mi gsol bar dgongs pa'i rgyu chung zhig 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]bca' bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 
[\[289a.2\]]byas te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[289a.3\]]mdang sum nga'i spyan sngar tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma mtshan mo 'das nas kha dog 'phags pas gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de'i tshe tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma'i kha dog gi mthus drang srong gar ga'i rdzing gi 
[\[289a.4\]]nyen kor thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par byas so/_/tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas nga la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gi sdum thab dad pa bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can de tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la rang gi gnas nas byung ste yan 
[\[289a.5\]]lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas blangs nas lus btang ste mchis la/_'jig rten na sems can dag gnas pa la gnod pa dang skrag pa cung zad kyang mi bgyid pa mu ge'i dus byung bas las la mi lta ba'i mi phyugs rdzi rnams dang /_lug rdzi rnams dang /_rtswa thun rnams 
[\[289a.6\]]dang /_shing thun rnams dang /_lam gyis 'tsho ba rnams dang /_lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis klu'i sha dum bu dum bur bkum nas 'tshal lo/_/de dag gis 'tshal ba dang /_'phags pa dag gis kyang gsol bar brtsams so/_/'phags pa rnams kyang 
[\[289a.7\]]gsol to zhes de dag gis cher bkum zhing 'tshal bar brtsams na/_bdag gi sdum thab kyis yun ji srid cig sdug bsngal mnags 'tshal/_kye bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste gang gi phyir 'phags pa dag klu'i sha mi gsol bar dgongs 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]pa'i rgyu cung zhig bca' bar gsol zhes zer nas ngas tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas tsam pa'i klu'i chung mas nga cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas nga'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/gang 
[\[289b.2\]]la da ltar lha dag kyang shAkya'i sras kyi dge slong rnams ni dge ba'i chos rnams las nyams so zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa 'di ni bzang po ma yin/_rigs pa ma yin te/_dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong dag gis klu'i sha bza' 
[\[289b.3\]]bar mi bya'o/_/za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas/_rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs 
[\[289b.4\]]can snying pos bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/_rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang yang 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lan mang du spyan drangs te zhal 
[\[289b.5\]]zas gsol nas lan 'ga' yang zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis ma bstabs kyis/_ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs shing sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyang dbul lo snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po'i 'byor 
[\[289b.6\]]pa dang /_rgyal po'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs 
[\[289b.7\]]gzugs can snying po la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po stan las 
[\[290a.2\]]langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la 
[\[290a.3\]]dgung zla gsum du bsod snyoms dang /_na bza' chos gos dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams dang /_sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed dbul na bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs 
[\[290a.4\]]can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas song ngo /_/bcom 
[\[290a.5\]]ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos zla ba gsum du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad thams cad dang /_sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis 
[\[290a.6\]]rim gro kho na byas so/_/yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos yo byad thams cad dang /_sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed bstabs so zhes thos so/_/
[\[290a.7\]]thos nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_de yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yin/_bdag kyang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yin la/_de'i sman pa'i rgyal po ni 'tsho byed yin la/_bdag gi sman pa'i rgyal po ni rgyun shes [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]bu yin gyis 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du byon pa de'i tshe bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la yo byad thams cad dang /_sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu bstab par bya'o snyam mo/_/ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar bzhugs 
[\[290b.2\]]nas dbyar gyi zla ba gsum 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/_chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/_dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun gyis bltas nas mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing 
[\[290b.3\]]gshegs te/_rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/_mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das yul ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan 
[\[290b.4\]]yod du byon nas mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang mnyan yod nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 
[\[290b.5\]]byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs 
[\[290b.6\]]stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de 
[\[290b.7\]]nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la dgung zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun sman gyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams dang /_sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu dbul na bdag la gnang 
[\[291a.2\]]bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis 
[\[291a.3\]]la mgo bos phyag byas nas song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad dang /_sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bus rim gro kho na byas so/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi kun 
[\[291a.4\]]du spyod pa ni nang par sngar langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas dge slong nad pa la lta ba yin no/_/ji tsam na dge slong gzhan zhig gzhang 'brum gyis thebs nas de skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_na bas nyam 
[\[291a.5\]]dmas par gyur pa de ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa khyod ci'i phyir skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_na bas nyam dmas par gyur/_lha bdag gzhang 'brum gyis thebs so/_/de nas rgyal 
[\[291a.6\]]pos sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu la bsgo ba/_dge slong 'di'i dpyad byos shig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal/_de ma dad pas des ma byas so/_/ji tsam na rgyal pos yang dge slong de mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa khyod rgyun shes kyi bus dpyad ma bgyis sam/_
[\[291a.7\]]lha ma bgyis so/_/de nas rgyal po khros te rgyun shes kyi bu pho nyas bkug nas bsgo ba/_gal te khyod kyis dge slong 'di'i dpyad byas na de lta na legs/_gal te ma byas na khyod kyi dbang thang gcad do/_/de rang bzhin gyis ma dad pa zhig pas cher 'khrugs nas/_dge 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]sbyong mgo reg 'di'i phyir lhas bdag gi dbang thang gcod par 'gyur ro zhes des dge slong de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgor bzo bcos byas nas de dang de nas mtshon gyi las bya bar brtsams so/_/de nas dge slong de nyam nga ba dang /_dog pa dang /_gnod pa thob cing sdug bsngal 
[\[291b.2\]]rtsub pa mi bzad pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong nas bsams pa/_bdag nyam nga ba dog pa gnod pa thob pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis ma dgongs pa lta zhig_/skabs de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_
[\[291b.3\]]thugs su mi chud pa'am/_rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos bskul nas phyogs der gshegs pa dang /_sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bus bcom ldan 'das phyogs der gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/
[\[291b.4\]]mthong nas kyang kun nas dkris pa drag pos bcom ldan 'das la smras pa/_dge sbyong bran mo'i bu tshur shog_/nyan thos kyi rkub phye ba la ltos/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid nas slar log ste gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/
[\[291b.5\]]bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni chos nyid yin te/_gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dag 'byung zhing kha cig ni 'og tu 
[\[291b.6\]]'gro'o/_/kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o/_/gang dag 'og tu song ba de dag ni yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_bsdus gzhom dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol ba dang /_so thams 
[\[291b.7\]]thams dang /_kyi hud zer ba dang /_a chu zer ba dang /_ut+pal ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen po rnams su yang song ste/_tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag la ni bsil bar 'bab bo/_grang ba'i sems can 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag la ni dro bar 'bab bo/_/des sems can de rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par dag so sor zhi bar byas so/_/de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_shes ldan dag ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos par gyur tam/_'on te 
[\[292a.2\]]gzhan du skyes par gyur snyam pa la/_de rnams dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa zhig btang ngo /_/de rnams kyis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_shes ldan dag bdag cag ni 'di nas shi 'phos pa med la/_gzhan du skyes pa med kyis 
[\[292a.3\]]kyang sngon ma mthong ba'i sems can 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rnams so sor zhi bar byas so zhes de rnams sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur pas dmyal ba myong bar gyur pa'i las de zad par byas nas gang du bden pa rnams mthong ba'i snod du 'gyur 
[\[292a.4\]]ba lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba bzung ngo /_/gang dag steng du song ba de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs 
[\[292a.5\]]pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs pa chen po dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_gya nom 
[\[292a.6\]]snang ba dang /_shin du mthong ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i dbyangs sgrog cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyang bsgrags so/_/brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[292a.7\]]bstan la 'jug par bya/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/_/gang zhig rab tu bag yod pas/_/chos 'dul 'di la brtson gyur na/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal tha mar byed par gyur/_/de nas 'od zer de dag 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rnams byul nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'gro'o/_/de la gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las rnams lung ston par bzhed na ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro/_/ma 
[\[292b.2\]]'ongs pa lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su nub par 'gyur ro/_/dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par nub par 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung ston par 
[\[292b.3\]]bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi pus mor nub par 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i 
[\[292b.4\]]rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams su lung ston par bzhed na ni sku'i lte bar nub par 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal gyi nang du nub par 'gyur ro/_/rang byang chub tu lung ston par 
[\[292b.5\]]bzhed na ni mdzod spur nub par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni dbu'i gtsug tu nub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil du nub 
[\[292b.6\]]bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar nas zhus pa/_kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi/_/tshogs rnams zhal gyi nang nas byung gyur pa/_/ji ltar gdugs ni shar bar gyur pa bzhin/_/de yis phyogs rnams kun du snang 
[\[292b.7\]]bar bgyis/_/yang tshigs su bcad pa dag gsol pa/_rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gro nang mchog gi rgyur gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis par/_/rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad/_/de slad brtan pa nyid 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]blos dus mkhyen nas/_/rgyal ba'i dbang po thub pa skyes kyi mchog_/nyan par 'tshal ba'i nyan pa po rnams kyi/_/the tshom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang /_/dam pa bzang po dag gis bsal du gsol/_/tshwa chu'i ri bo lta bur brtan pa'i mgon/_/
[\[293a.2\]]rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams blo bur 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan pa ci slad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/skye bo phal che 'di dag de nyan 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[293a.3\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi ston te/_kun dga' bo sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu nyams shing chud zos par gyur te/_des de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos bkur ba'i gdung rgyud nas bzung ste spyod 
[\[293a.4\]]pa skyon mi mnga' ba la bran mo'i bu zhes smras so/_/de deng nas zhag bdun nas khrag dron du skyugs te dus byed par 'gyur te/_lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na rgyun shes kyi bu'am/_rgyun shes kyi bu 'dra 
[\[293a.5\]]ba la bsnyen bkur byed du ma gzhug cig_/gzhang 'brum yang gcad par mi bya'o/_/'on kyang gzhang 'brum gyi dpyad ni rnam pa gnyis kyis bya ste/_gsang sngags dang /_sman gyis so/_/dge slong gis gzhang 'brum gcod dam/_rgyun shes kyi bu'am/_rgyun shes kyi bu 'dra 
[\[293a.6\]]ba la bsnyen bkur byed du 'jug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong de rgyun shes kyi bus ji ltar gnod pa de nyid kyis dus las 'das pa de lta de ltar byas so/_/de nas blon po dag gis rgyal po gsal rgyal la smras pa/_lha rgyun shes kyi bus ni bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[293a.7\]]yang bran mo'i bu zhes tshig tu smras la/_dge slong de yang ji ltar gnod pa de nyid kyis dus las 'das pa de lta de ltar bgyis so/_/de nas rgyal po che thang du khros nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag ngas sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu yongs su btang zin 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]kyis deng shig_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha gum lags pa de dgum ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi zhag bdun na khrag dron du skyugs nas dus byed par 'gyur te lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan lags 
[\[293b.2\]]so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te de ltar gyur na nga'i yul nas spyugs shig_/de dag gis de spyugs nas yul gnas bcas zhes bya bar phyin no/_/yul gnas bcas na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis skyes bu gti mug gang gi phyir khyod khams gsum gyi 
[\[293b.3\]]mgon po la bran mo'i bu'o zhes tshig tu smras pa/_khyod 'dir gnas su ga la rung zhes mang du spyos nas bskrad do/_/de nas bA rA Na sIr song ngo /_/de nas kyang bskrad nas yangs pa can du song ngo /_/de nas kyang bskrad nas yul tsam par song ngo /_/de nas kyang bskrad 
[\[293b.4\]]nas rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo /_/de nas kyang bskrad nas shing drung zhig na gnas so/_/de nas kyang shing la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis bskrad nas/_'bab chu dang /_mtsho dang /_mtshe'u dag gi 'gram shig tu song ba dang der yang skabs ma rnyed nas des bsam pa/_
[\[293b.5\]]'dzam bu'i gling 'di na re zhig wa dag gis kyang skabs rnyed na/_bdag gis skabs shing drung dang /_mtsho dang /_mtshe'u dag na yang med do snyam pa dang /_de la gang gis na khrag dron po skyugs nas dus las 'das pa de lta bu'i kun nas dkris pa skyes so/_/dus las 
[\[293b.6\]]'das ma thag tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su bcad pa dag gsungs pa/_mi zhig skyes par gyur pa yi/_/kha nas sta re'i tshig 'byung ste/_/nyes par smra ba smra tshig des/_/bdag nyid la ni 
[\[293b.7\]]gcod par byed/_/gang zhig smad 'os skye bo bsngags byed cing /_/bsngags 'os skye bo rnam par smod byed pa/_/de ni kha yi nyes pas gang gis na/_/bde ba thob mi 'gyur ba'i nyes pa sogs/_/'dir ni brgyan pos rang gi nor yal ba/_/'di ni phung ba cung zad tsam 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]yin te/_/bde gshegs rnams la yid kyis gdug bsam pa/_/gang yin de ni phung ba chen po yin/_/'phags la gnod byed lus dang ngag gis las/_/sdig to byas nas chu bur rdol rnams su/_/lo 'bum dag dang chu bur can du lo/_/bzhi khri 
[\[294a.2\]]chig stong gang yin dmyal der 'gro//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na grong rdal mtshams ma bcad pa gzhan zhig tu dgongs btab nas bzhugs so/_/de na bcom ldan 'das rlung nad [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]snyun gyis thebs par gyur to/_/de 
[\[294a.3\]]nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis rang gi blos ni rim gro lan mang du byas na sman pa la lan 'ga' yang ma dris kyis/_ma la bdag gis da ni sman pa la dri'o snyam ste/_de sman pa'i drung du song nas bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[294a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i snyun gyis thebs kyis sman ston cig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa gru sum chab mar mang po stsal pa sgrol la gsol cig dang snyun gdangs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rang nyid kyis byas te btsos nas 
[\[294a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'bul lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/_kun dga' bo 'di ci yin/_des gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag gis glo ba 
[\[294a.6\]]la bsams na/_bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis rang gi blos ni rim gro lan mang du bgyis na sman pa la lan 'ga' yang ma dris kyis/_ma la bdag gis da ni sman pa la dri'o snyam bgyis nas bdag gis sman pa la smras na de'i mchid nas/_gru sum chab mar mang 
[\[294a.7\]]pos stsal ba sgrol la gsol cig dang snyun gdangs par 'gyur ro zhes mchi nas/_de nas bdag gis bgyis te bsgral ba lags so/_/kun dga' bo gang du btsos/_mtshams kyi nang du'o/_/gang du gzhag_/mtshams kyi nang du'o/_/sus btsos/_bdag gis 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]mtshams kyi nang du'o/_/kun dga' bo mtshams [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]nang du btsos la mtshams kyi nang du zhag kyang lon pa longs spyad par mi bya'o/_/mtshams kyi nang du btsos la mtshams kyi phyi rol du zhag lon pa yang longs spyad par mi bya'o/_/mtshams kyi phyi rol du btsos la mtshams 
[\[294b.2\]]kyi nang du zhag lon pa yang longs spyad par mi bya'o/_/mtshams kyi phyi rol du btsos la mtshams kyi phyi rol du zhag lon na longs spyad par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo mtshams kyi nang yang rung mtshams kyi phyi rol yang rung ste dge slong gis btsos pa ni thams cad kyi thams cad 
[\[294b.3\]]du longs spyad par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis btsos pa thams cad kyi thams cad du longs spyad par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_mnyan yod na khyim bdag gzhan zhig yod pa de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom 
[\[294b.4\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag 
[\[294b.5\]]par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar zhes bya ba nas/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de nas khyim bdag de stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu 
[\[294b.6\]]gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol 
[\[294b.7\]]zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar te/_ji tsam na spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol ba/_btsun pa gdugs tshod lags na/_bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas dge slong gi dge 'dun snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]nas khyim bdag de'i khyim ga la ba der dong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das ni bsod snyoms bzhes nas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa'i khyim na bzhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod snyoms bzhes nas rgyu lngas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa'i 
[\[295a.2\]]khyim na bzhugs so/_/lnga gang zhe na/_nad pa la gzigs par bzhed pa dang /_gnas mal la gzigs par bzhed pa dang /_nang du yang dag 'jog la bzhugs par bzhed pa dang /_lha rnams la chos ston par bzhed pa dang /_nyan thos rnams 'dul ba 
[\[295a.3\]]la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa yin no/_/skabs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pas bsod snyoms bzhes nas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa'i khyim na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni 
[\[295a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod snyoms nod pa yin te/_ji tsam na der 'bras chan ma tshos pa zhig phog pa dang /_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das snyun gdangs nas ring po ma lon la 'bras chan 'di yang ma tshos pa zhig pas 
[\[295a.5\]]'di gal te longs spyad na snyun slar ldang bar 'gyur srid kyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang yang 'di nyid kyis rkyen byas nas gnang bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do snyam nas/_des chu snod blangs te chus btab nas ji srid tshos pa de srid du btsos so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[295a.6\]]ldan 'das la gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/_kun dga' bo ci dge 'dun thams cad kyi 'bras chan yang 'di 'dra'am/_btsun 
[\[295a.7\]]pa ma lags te/_'on kyang ma dral ba lags so/_/'o na 'di ga las 'ongs/_des skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo legs so legs so/_/ngas rjes su ma gnang ba gang 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]yin pa yang khyod kyis shes so/_/de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_dge slong gis mtshos pa byin len byos la btsos te longs spyad par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis ma tshos pa byin len byos la btsos te longs spyad par bya'o zhes gsungs pa 
[\[295b.2\]]dang /_drug sde rnams kyis 'bras skam byin len byas te btsos nas longs spyad par brtsams pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'bras chan sum cha tshos pa byin len byos 
[\[295b.3\]]la btsos te longs spyad par bya'o/_/tshod ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_nya dang /_sha dag ni kha dog gyur nas byin len byas te longs spyad par bya'o/_/'o ma la sogs pa'i rdzas kyi khu ba rnams gang gi tshe lan gnyis lan gsum du bskol bar gyur 
[\[295b.4\]]pa de'i tshe byin len byas te bskol nas spyad par bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/'di las gzhan du longs spyad na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na 
[\[295b.5\]]bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe grong khyer slo ma lta bu zhes bya ba na khyim bdag 'byor pa zhes bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas so/_/
[\[295b.6\]]des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la sems can zhugs par 
[\[295b.7\]]gyur to/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa zhig btsas nas/_de nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas ston rgya cher byas nas ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags/_nye du rnams 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]kyis smras pa/_khye'u 'di khyim bdag 'byor pa'i bu yin pas/_de lta bas na khye'u'i ming 'byor len zhes gdags so zhes khye'u de'i ming 'byor len zhes bya bar btags so/_/yang rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u 
[\[296a.2\]]zhig btsas te/_de'i ming ni 'byor skyob ces bya bar btags so/_/yang de'i khye'u zhig btsas te/_de'i ming ni 'byor dga' zhes bya bar btags so/_/ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag 'byor pa nad kyis btab par gyur nas de shin tu tshig rtsub mor smra ste/_
[\[296a.3\]]des na chung ma dang bus kyang yal bar bor ro/_/de'i mngag gzhug byed pa'i bu mo zhig yod pa des bsams pa/_bdag gi jo bos thabs brgya stong du mas longs spyod rnams bsags na/_de da nad kyis thebs par gyur pa dang chung ma dang bus kyang yal bar bor na/_
[\[296a.4\]]bdag gi rje bo yal bar dor ba ni bdag la rigs pa ma yin no snyam nas des sman pa'i drung du song ste/_jo bo khyod kyis khyim bdag 'byor pa mkhyen tam/_shes so/_/de ci bya/_de 'di 'dra ba'i bro nad cig gis thebs te/_de chung ma dang bus kyang yal bar bor 
[\[296a.5\]]na de'i sman ston cig_/des smras pa/_chung ma dang bu dag gis kyang yal bar bor ro zhes khyod nyid zer na/_'o na de la su zhig rim gro byed/_de'i rim gro bdag gis bgyi mod kyi khyod kyis ci nas sman rin chung ba zhig ston cig_/des de'i sman ni 'di yin no 
[\[296a.6\]]zhes bstan to/_/de nas des bdag rang gi rgyags las kyang cung zad sbyar/_khyim de nyid nas kyang cung zad brkus nas rim gro byas te de sos par gyur to/_/des bsams pa bdag ni chung ma dang bus kyang yal bar bor te 'di ltar bdag gson por gyur pa ni bu mo 'di'i 
[\[296a.7\]]mthu yin gyis/_'di la phan gdags par bya'o snyam nas des de la smras pa/_bu mo kho bo ni chung ma dang bus kyang yal bar bor ba las/_kho bo cung zad cig gson pa de thams cad ni khyod kyi drin yin na/_khyod mchog ci 'dod pa sbyin gyis smros shig_/gal te jo 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]bo bdag khyod kyi thugs su 'thad par gyur na bdag khyod dang lhan cig 'grogs par 'tshal lo/_/des smras pa/_nga dang khyod lhan cig 'grogs pas ci byas kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin la bran las dbyung bar bya'o/_/des smras pa/_jo bo bdag rgyangs bkum par mchis 
[\[296b.2\]]kyang bran mo kho na lags par bas kyis/_gal te rje'i sras khyod dang lhan cig 'grogs na de lta na [(]dran [,]bran [)]mor mi 'gyur lags so/_/des gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas smras pa/_bu mo gang gi tshe rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo la sbron cig_/des 
[\[296b.3\]]dus gzhan zhig na rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan par gyur nas des de la sbran to/_/de nas khyim bdag 'byor pa dang de gnyis lhan cig dga' mgur spyad pas de sems can dang ldan par gyur to/_/gang gi nyi ma la sems can zhugs par gyur pa'i nyi ma de kho na nas bzung 
[\[296b.4\]]nas khyim bdag 'byor pa'i nor thams cad dang /_las kyi mtha' thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_mdog gser 'dra ba/_mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/_
[\[296b.5\]]lag pa ring ba/_'phral ba'i dbyes che ba/_smin ma 'jar ba/_sna'i gzangs mtho ba/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/_/de btsas nas lhag par khyim bdag 'byor pa'i dgos pa thams cad dang /_las kyi mtha' thams cad 
[\[296b.6\]]yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/_/de nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas ming 'dogs par byed de zhes bya ba nas/_gang po zhes bya bar gdags so zhes de'i ming gang po zhes btags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/khye'u gang 
[\[296b.7\]]po ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de/_dri ma phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar te/_rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /_rtsis dang /_grangs dang /_lag rtsis dang /_
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]dbyung ba dang /_gzhug pa dang /_gzhag pa la nye bar zhugs shing brtag pa brgyad po gzhi brtag pa dang /_ras brtag pa dang /_rin po che brtag pa dang /_shing brtag pa dang /_glang po che brtag pa dang /_rta brtag pa dang /_gzhon 
[\[297a.2\]]nu brtag pa dang /_gzhon nu ma brtag pa la shin tu byang zhing /_brtag pa gzhan yang byed pa dang /_klog pa la mkhas pa dang /_spyod pa gsal bar gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag 'byor pas 'byor len la sogs pa bu rnams rim bzhin du khyim 
[\[297a.3\]]phub pa dang /_de dag chung ma la lhag par chags pas 'tsho nam yal bar bor te 'jo sgeg lhur len cing 'khod do/_/de nas khyim bdag 'byor pa lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa de bu rnams kyis mthong nas dris pa/_yab 
[\[297a.4\]]khyod ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad nas sems khong du chud cing bzhugs/_des smras pa/_bu dag nga ni ji srid gser 'bum ma rnyed pa de srid du khyim ma phub bo/_/khyed cag 'tsho nam yal bar bor nas chung ma la lhag par chags pas 'jo sgeg lhur len cing 
[\[297a.5\]]'khod de/_nga shi nas khyim mya ngan gyis gang bar 'gyur na ji ltar sems khong du chud par mi 'gyur/_'byor len gyis rin po che'i rna rgyan thogs pa bkrol nas shing gi rna rgyan gcig btags te bdag gis ji srid gser 'bum ma grub pa de srid du rin po 
[\[297a.6\]]che'i rna rgyan gdags par mi bya'o zhes dam bcas so/_/gcig gis ni rgya skegs kyi rna rgyan no/_/gcig gis ni zha nye'i rna rgyan no/_/de dag ming 'byor len dang /_'byor skyob dang /_'byor dga' zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dag nub par gyur nas 
[\[297a.7\]]shing gi rna rgyan can/_rgya skegs kyi rna rgyan can/_zha nye'i rna rgyan can zhes bya bar ming grags so/_/de rnams zong thogs te rgya mtsho chen por dong ba dang /_gang pos smras pa/_yab bdag kyang rgya mtsho chen por mchi'o/_/des smras pa/_bu khyod 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]bus pa yin gyis 'di nyid du 'dug la tshong khang gi bya ba dag byos shig ces de nyid du 'dug go/_/de rnams kyis kyang gru bo che grub nas lhags te lam gyis dub pa dag ngal bso nas smras pa/_yab bdag cag gi zong 'di brtsir gsol/_brtsis 
[\[297b.2\]]nas re res kyang gser 'bum 'bum rnyed par gyur to/_/gang pos kyang de nyid du chos dang mthun pas bsgyur bas gser 'bum lha gcig rnyed nas gang pos kyang pha'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/_yab bdag gi tshong khang nas bsgyur ba'i rdzas 
[\[297b.3\]]kyang brtsir gsol/_des smras pa/_bu khyod 'di nyid na 'dug 'dug na khyod la ci zhig brtsir yod/_des smras pa/_yab 'on kyang brtsir gsol/_mkhyen par 'gyur ro/_/brtsis na gang yang rigs pas bsgrubs pa gser bzhi po nyid ma gtogs pa 
[\[297b.4\]]gser 'bum lhag cig byung ngo /_/khyim bdag 'byor pa dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te bsams pa/_sems can 'di ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig lta ste/_'dis 'di nyid na 'dug bzhin gser 'bum rnyed cig grub bo snyam mo/_/ji 
[\[297b.5\]]tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag 'byor pa nad kyis btab par gyur nas des bsams pa bdag shi ba dang 'di dag 'bye bar 'gyur gyis thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas des de dag la smras pa/_bu dag shing skam po dag sta gon gyis shig_/de rnams 
[\[297b.6\]]kyis shing dag sta gon byas pa dang /_des smras pa/_me bus shig_/de rnams kyis me bus pa dang /_des smras pa/_mgal pa re re nas phyung shig_/de rnams kyis mgal pa re re nas phyung ba dang /_me de shi bar gyur to/_/des smras pa/_bu dag khyed 
[\[297b.7\]]kyis mthong ngam/_yab mthong lags so/_/des tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa/_mgal pa tshogs pas me 'bar ltar/_/spun tshogs pa yang de bzhin no/_/mgal pa phral na shi gyur pa/_/mi rnams kyang ni de dang 'dra/_/bu dag nga shi nas 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]khyed cag gis bud med kyi tshig mnyan par mi bya'o/_/bud med kyis ni bza' dag 'byed/_/sdar ma rnams ni ngag gis 'byed/_/ngan la smras pas gsang tshig 'phel/_/'dod pa yis ni mdza' bshes 'byed/_/de dag 
[\[298a.2\]]gzhan ni dong ngo /_/'byor len de nyid na 'dug pa dang des de la smras pa/_bu khyod kyis ji ltar gyur kyang gang po gtang bar mi bya ste/_sems can 'di ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin no zhes bsgo ste/_bsags pa kun gyi 
[\[298a.3\]]mtha' zad cing /_/mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung gyur/_/phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/_/gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/_/zhes smras nas dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to/_/de rnams kyis de ras sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_
[\[298a.4\]]dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams kyis khyogs brgyan te bkur sti cher byas nas dur khrod du khyer te bsregs so/_/de nas mya ngan bsang ba byas nas smras pa/_gang gi tshe bdag cag gi pha gson pa de'i tshe ni srog de la rag las na da de dus las 'das 
[\[298a.5\]]na/_gal te de 'tsho nam yal bar bor te 'dug na khyim zhig par 'gyur zhing nye du rnams kyis kyang dpyas par 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag cag zong thogs te yul gzhan du 'dong ngo /_/gang pos smras pa/_gal te de ltar na bdag kyang mchi'o/_/
[\[298a.6\]]de rnams kyis smras pa/_khyod 'di nyid du 'dug la tshong khang gi bya ba dag byos shig_/kho bo cag kho na 'dong ngo zhes de rnams kyis zong khyer te yul gzhan du dong ngo //_//'dul ba gzhi/_bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/_gang 
[\[298a.7\]]po la ni dgos pa thams cad gtad nas de nyid na gnas so/_/chos nyid kyis phyug po'i khyim dag na nyin re zhing 'god pa 'bog pa yin pas/_de dag gi chung mas bran mo de dag mngags te 'god pa nod du btang ba las gang po tshong pa dang /_tshong 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]dpon dang /_ded dpon dang /_gzhan yang rjes su 'tsho ba dag gis yongs su bskor cing 'dug ste de dag gis skabs ma rnyed do/_/ji tsam na de dag langs te dong bar gyur pa de'i tshe de dag la nyin bar gyi 'god pa phog go/_/bu mo de dag ring 
[\[298b.2\]]zhig lon te 'ongs pa dang /_kye ma bu mo khyed cag ring zhig ci thogs zhes spyos pas de dag gis smras pa/_gang po tshong pa dang /_tshong dpon dang /_ded dpon dang /_gzhan yang rjes su 'tsho ba dag gis yongs su bskor nas nyi ma'i 'od zer 
[\[298b.3\]]lta bur gzi brjid 'bar zhing bzhugs te/_gang gi tshe de dag langs te mchis pa de'i tshe phog go/_/de dag gis smras pa/_gang dag gis khyim na bran mo'i bu dag dbang phyug la dbang byed pa de dag la yong yang de ltar 'gyur ro/_/'byor 
[\[298b.4\]]len gyi chung mas bran mo la smras pa/_ring mo zhig tu ci'i phyir thogs/_des skabs de rgyas par smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_khyod 'or che'o/_/khyod kyis dus shes par byos la song shig_/des dus shes par byas nas song ba dang myur 
[\[298b.5\]]du thob bo/_/gzhan dag ni ring du thogs par gyur nas de dag gis de la dris pa/_khyod ni ci ste myur bar 'khor/_des thams cad smras nas de dag kyang de dang lhan cig 'dong bar brtsams so/_/gang po yang tshong pa dang /_tshong dpon dang /_
[\[298b.6\]]ded dpon dang /_gzhan yang rjes su 'tsho ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing 'dug pa las de dag kyang dong nas/_des de la nyin par gyi 'god pa phog go/_/de dag gis kyang myur du thob bo/_/de dag gi jo mo dag gis smras pa/_da myur du 'khor 
[\[298b.7\]]ba 'di la rgyu ci yod/_de dag gis smras pa/_jo mo thu mo snyun mi mnga' bar gyur cig_/de'i tshe gang gi bran mo mchis pa de'i tshe phog lags gyis bdag cag de dag dang 'grogs te mchi'o/_/de dag mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/_gang dag gi khyim 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]na bran mo'i bu dag dbang phyug la dbang byed pa de dag la yong yang de ltar 'gyur ro/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na 'byor len dang /_'byor skyob dang /_'byor dga' rnams lhan cig tu dga' zhing mthun pas rgya mtsho chen po nas gru bo 
[\[299a.2\]]che grub ste 'ongs so/_/'byor len gyis chung ma la dris pa/_bzang mo gang pos khyod legs par bskyangs sam/_des smras pa/_ji ltar ming po 'am/_bus bgyi ba bzhin du legs par bgyis so/_/gzhan dag la khyim thab dag dag gis smras 
[\[299a.3\]]pa dang de dag gis smras pa/_gang dag gis khyim na bran mo'i bu dbang phyug la dbang bgyid pa de dag la yong yang de ltar 'gyur lags so/_/de dag gis bsams pa/_bud med dag ni mdza' bshes kyi dbyen du 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/ji tsam dus 
[\[299a.4\]]gzhan zhig na ka shi ka'i ras kyi tshong khang gi sgo phye ma thag tu 'byor len gyi bu 'ongs nas gang pos de la ka shi ka'i ras yug gcig bskon no/_/mna' ma dag gis mthong nas smras pa/_bu 'di sus byin/_des smras pa/_khu gus byin no/_/gzhan dag 
[\[299a.5\]]gis mthong nas kyang rang rang gi bu btang ba dang /_ka shi ka'i ras kyi tshong khang gi sgo ni bcad/_ras sbom po dag yod pa'i tshong khang gi sgo phye ba la de dag kyang ma stes te/_phyin nas de dag la gang pos ras sbom po dag bskon no/_/de dag gis 
[\[299a.6\]]mthong nas khyim thab dag la smras pa/_khyed cag gis gzigs sam/_kha cig la ni ka shi ka'i ras yug stsal la/_kha cig la ni ras sbom po dag go/_/de dag gis lan btab pa/_cig gdon mi za bar 'di ltar ka shi ka'i tshong khang gi ras 
[\[299a.7\]]kyi sgo ni bcad la/_ras sbom po'i sgo bye ba la bab pa zhig ma yin grang /_de dag gis smras pa/_da dung yang brtag par bgyi'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na sha kha ra'i tshong khang gi sgo phye ba na 'byor len gyi bu 'ongs nas des sha kha ra phor bu gang 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]thob ste/_des de khyer nas khyim du song ba dang mna' ma dag gis mthong nas smras pa/_bu 'di sus byin/_des smras pa/_khu gus byin no/_/de dag gis kyang rang rang gi bu btang ba dang /_sha kha ra'i tshong khang gi sgo ni bcad/_bu 
[\[299b.2\]]ram gyi tshong khang gi sgo phye ba dang /_de dag kyang ma stes te/_bu ram gyi tshong khang gi sgo bye ba'i khar 'ongs nas de dag gis bu ram zhig thob bo/_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyed kyis gzigs sam/_gcig la ni sha kha ra stsal la/_gzhan 
[\[299b.3\]]la ni bu ram stsal lo/_/de dag gis de mthong ste/_ji ltar khyim bgo ba byed par stsol ba de lta de ltar khyim thab dag bye nas de dag phan tshun gros byas pa/_bdag cag gi khyim gtan zhig gis bgo bar bya'o/_/gcig gis smras pa/_
[\[299b.4\]]phu bo chen po sbran pa snyam/_gcig gis smras pa/_re zhig ji ltar bgo bar dpyad do/_/de gnyis kyis rang gi blos dpyad pa/_gcig gis ni khyim na yod pa dang zhing na yod pa'o/_/gcig gis ni tshong khang na yod pa dang yul gzhan 
[\[299b.5\]]na yod pa'o/_/gcig gis ni gang po'o/_/gal te phu bo chen pos khyim na yod pa dang zhing na yod pa blangs na/_bdag cag gis tshong khang na yod pa dang /_yul gzhan na yod pas rang 'tsho bar nus so/_/'on te tshong khang na 
[\[299b.6\]]yod pa dang /_yul gzhan na yod pa blangs na/_'on kyang bdag cag gis khyim na yod pa dang /_zhing na yod pa dang /_'tsho bar bya zhing gang po yang mnar bar nus so snyam nas/_de gnyis kyis de ltar gros byas te 'byor len 
[\[299b.7\]]gyi drung du song nas spun zhig par 'gyur gyis bdag cag khyim bgo'o/_/des smras pa/_khyim 'jigs par byed pa ni bud med dag yin pas legs par brtags te bya ba snyam/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_bdag cag gis brtags 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]zin gyis bgo'o/_/des smras pa/_gal te de ltar na gzu bo mi lnga zhig bos shig_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_bdag cag gis snga mo zhig tu bgos zin na gzu bo mi lnga ci dgos kyis gcig gis ni khyim na yod 
[\[300a.2\]]pa dang zhing na yod pa dag go/_/gcig gis ni tshong khang na yod pa dang yul gyi mtha' na yod pa'o/_/gcig gis ni gang po'o/_/des smras pa/_ci gang po'i skal ba mi sbyin nam/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_bran mo'i bu de la bgo skal 
[\[300a.3\]]sus sbyin/_der ma bas kyis de nyid bdag cag gis bgo'o/_/gal te khyod bzhed na khyod nyid snoms shig_/des bsams pa/_pha na re bdag la khyod kyis bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang yang gang po gtang bar mi bya'o zhes bsgo 
[\[300a.4\]]bas gang po blang bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas smras pa/_gal te de lta na gang po ni kho bos bkur ro/_/khyim na yod pa dang /_zhing na yod pa dbang ba gang yin pa de ni rings par khyim du song nas smras pa/_mna' mthu mo phyung shig_/de phyir 
[\[300a.5\]]byung ba dang slar yang ma 'jug shig_/ci'i phyir/_bdag cag gis khyim du gtogs pa bgos zin to/_/tshong khang na yod pa dang /_yul gzhan na yod pa dbang ba gang yin pa de yang de ma thag tu tshong khang du song nas smras pa/_gang po mar 
[\[300a.6\]]bobs shig_/des babs pa dang /_da phan chad ma 'dzeg shig_/ci'i phyir/_bdag cag gis khyim bgos te/_yul gzhan na yod pa dang tshong khang na yod pa ni bdag gi yin no/_/des smras pa/_bdag gi bgo skal byin cig_/
[\[300a.7\]]des smras pa/_khyod bran mo'i bu yin na khyod la ci'i phyir bgo skal byin/_der ma zad khyod nyid kho bo cag gis bgos te phu bo chen pos thob bo/_/'byor len gyi chung ma gang po dang lhan cig 'grogs te gnyen zhig gi khyim du dong ba na bus pa bkres 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]nas ngu bar brtsams so/_/des smras pa/_gang po bus pa dag la g.yar stsus stsol cig_/des smras pa/_kAr ShA pa Na phog shig_/des smras pa/_khyod kyis gser 'bum snyed kyi spogs byas na bus pa dag gi g.yar stsus ma mchis
