[\[300b.2\]]pa lta ci kho bos khyed cag gi khyim 'di 'dra ba mkhos su 'bebs par 'gyur bar shes sam/_gal te kho bos shes par gyur na gser 'bum phrag du ma spags pa zhig_/bud med kyi gos kyi mthar ma sha ka sgyu ma can dag thum po byed pa de ni 
[\[300b.3\]]chos nyid yin te/_des ma sha ka sgyu ma can zhig phog ste g.yar stsus snoms te byon cig_/des de khyer te tshong dus su song ba las mi zhig gis rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis bdas pa'i shing las khur cig khyer te grang bas sbrebs nas 'dar zhing 'ong ba 
[\[300b.4\]]de des mthong nas dris pa/_kye nang rje ci'i phyir de ltar 'dar/_des smras pa/_bdag gis kyang ma 'tshal te/_cung zad du na shing khur 'di thogs nas bdag 'di 'dra bar grang bar gyur to/_/de shing brtags pa la mkhas pas des 
[\[300b.5\]]shing de brtag par brtsams pa dang /_de na tsan dan sa mchog yod par mthong nas des de la smras pa/_kye nang rje rin ji tsam du btsong /_/kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgyar ro/_/des shing khur de blangs nas tsan dan sa mchog de phyung ste/_tshong dus su 
[\[300b.6\]]song nas sog les dum bu bzhir gshegs te/_bu ram de rnams kAr ShA pa Na stong du btsongs nas de nas de la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin te 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim ga ge mo zhes bya ba na 'byor len gyi chung ma 'dug gis/_der shing khur 
[\[300b.7\]]'di khyer la gang pos bskur ba yin no zhes byos shig_/des de khyer nas ji ltar gyur pa dag smras pa dang /_des brang brdungs nas smras pa/_'di ltar de nor 'khyams na shes rab kyang 'khyams sam/_ci btso ba tshol du btad na btso rgyu gang 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]yin pa de nyid med par bud pa bskur to/_/ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na grong khyer slo ma lta bu'i rgyal po tsha ba'i rims chen pos thebs nas myog myog por gyur pa de la sman pas tsan dan sa mchog bstan to/_/de nas blon po rnams kyis tsan 
[\[301a.2\]]dan sa mchog btsal bar brtsams pa dang /_de rnams kyis tshong dus su brgyud pa las thos nas de rnams gang po'i drung du song ste/_tsan dan sa mchog yod dam/_yod do/_/rin ji tsam du btsong /_kAr ShA pa Na stong ngo /_/de rnams kAr ShA pa 
[\[301a.3\]]Na stong gis nyos nas rgyal po la byugs pa dang sos par gyur to/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_gang gi khyim na tsan dan sa mchog yod pa'i khyim de ci 'dra ba zhig yin snyam nas/_rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_'di ga las 'ongs/_blon po 
[\[301a.4\]]rnams kyis smras pa/_lha gang po las so/_/gang po 'dir khug shig_/der pho nya song nas smras pa/_gang po lhas bka' stsal to/_/des dpyad par brtsams pa/_rgyal po bdag la ci'i phyir bka' stsol/_des yang bsams pa/_des tsan 
[\[301a.5\]]dan sa mchog gis snyun gdangs par gyur pas de'i phyir bdag la bka' stsal gyis tsan dan sa mchog thams cad khyer te 'gro'o snyam nas/_des tsan dan sa mchog gi dum bu gsum ras kyis khud du dkris te/_gcig lag tu thogs nas rgyal po'i 
[\[301a.6\]]drung du song ba dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_gang po tsan dan sa mchog cung zad yod dam/_des smras pa/_lha 'dir mchis so/_/'di la rin ji tsam/_gser 'bum mo/_/gzhan yang yod dam/_lha mchis so zhes des dum bu sum car bstan pa 
[\[301a.7\]]dang rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_gang po la gser bzhi 'bum byin cig_/gang pos smras pa/_lha gsum gyis ni stsol cig_/gcig ni lha la skyes su 'bul lo/_/gsum gyis byin nas rgyal pos smras pa/_gang po khyod nga'i thugs su 'thad kyis 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]mchog ci 'dod pa gsol cig dang sbyin no/_/lha gal te thugs dang 'thad par gyur na lha'i yul du sus kyang mi gtse bar mchis par gsol/_rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba shes ldan dag deng phyin chad khyed kyis gzhon nu rnams la bsgo bar bya'i/_
[\[301b.2\]]gang po la ni ma yin no/_/ji tsam na tshong pa lnga brgya tsam pa rgya mtsho chen po'i gru bo che grub nas grong khyer slo ma lta bur lhags so/_/tshong pa'i tshogs kyis nang khrims su bcas pa/_bdag cag sus kyang gcig pu tshogs las gar te tshong pa'i drung 
[\[301b.3\]]du 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/gal te song na de la kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu dbab bo/_/brungs kyang tshogs te blang bar bya'o zhes bcas so/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_gang po yang sbran pa snyam/_kha cig gis smras pa/_bkren pa de la sbran na ci yod/_de'i 
[\[301b.4\]]tshe gang po phyir byung ba na/_des tshong pa lnga brgya tsam rgya mtsho chen po nas gru bo che grub nas grong khyer slo ma lta bur phyin no zhes thos nas/_de grong khyer du ma zhugs pa nyid du de dag gi drung du song ste dris pa/_shes ldan dag rdzas 'di dag ci yin/_de 
[\[301b.5\]]rnams kyis smras pa/_'di dang 'di dag yin no/_/rin ji tsam/_ded dpon gar phyin yang khyod kho na dri bar bas so/_/des smras pa/_gal te de lta yin yang 'on kyang rin thang smos shig_/de dag gis gser sa ya dang brgyad 'bum du rin btab 
[\[301b.6\]]bo/_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag thag bcad pa'i gser sum 'bum khyer cig_/zong 'di dag ni kho bo'i yin no/_/lhag ma ni nang du phyin nas sbyin no/_/de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes pa dang /_des gser sum 'bum yang blangs nas thag gcad 
[\[301b.7\]]pa'i phyir byin/_rang gis rgyas kyang btab ste song ngo /_/de nas tshong pa'i tshogs kyis tshong pa'i g.yog gis mi dag rdzas ci yod ltos shig ces mngags nas de dag song ste dris pa/_rdzas 'di dag ci yin/_'di dang 'di dag yin no/_/bdag cag 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]la 'di 'dra bas ni mdzod dang bang ba gang bar 'dug go/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_gang yang rung ma gang yang rung ste/_'on kyang 'di btsongs zin to/_/su zhig la/_gang po la'o/_/gang po la btsongs na chen mo zhig khugs mod/_de rnams kyis 
[\[302a.2\]]smras pa/_des thag bcad par byin pa gang yin pa de khyod kyis rin du yang mi byin no/_/des thag bcad par ci byin gser sum 'bum mo/_/des phu bo de dag las brkus yang dag go/_/de rnams slar log ste tshong pa'i tshogs la smras pa/_rdzas de dag ni btsongs zin to/_/
[\[302a.3\]]su zhig la/_gang po la'o/_/gang po la tshongs na chen mo zhig khugs mod/_des thag bcad par byin pa gang yin pa de khyod kyis rin du yang mi byin no/_/des thag bcad par ci byin/_srang sum 'bum mo/_/des spun de dag las brkus yang dag go/_/de rnams kyis de bos nas 
[\[302a.4\]]smras pa/_gang po tshong pa'i tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pa/_sus kyang gcig pus zong mi blang gis tshong pa'i tshogs kho nas blang bar bya'o zhes bcas na khyod kyis ci'i phyir blang /_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang gi tshe khyod kyis khrims su bca' ba byas pa 
[\[302a.5\]]de'i tshe ci kho bo'am/_kho bo'i phu nu bo dag la bsgo'am/_khyod kho bo nas khrims su bca' ba byas/_khyed cag nyid srungs shig_/de nas tshong pa'i tshogs khros nas kAr ShA pa Na drug bcu'i phyir bzung ste nyi ma la bzhag pa rgyal po'i mi gang gis mthong ba de dag gis rgyal po la 
[\[302a.6\]]smras pa dang /_rgyal pos bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag de rnams khug shig_/de dag gis de rnams bkug pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed cag gis ci'i phyir gang po bzung ste nyi ma la bzhag_/lha tshong pa rnams kyis khrims su bcas pa/_sus 
[\[302a.7\]]kyang gcig pus zong 'jal tshong mi bgyi'o zhes bcas pa las/_'di gcig pus 'jal tshong bgyis pas so/_/des smras pa/_lha gang gi tshe 'di dag gis khrims su bca' ba bgyis pa de'i tshe 'di dag gis ci bdag gam bdag gi phu nu po dag la bsgo'am zhes rmar 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]gsol/_rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang po'i shags bzang ngo /_/de rnams skyengs nas de btang ngo /_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po la rdzas shig gi dgos pa byung nas des tshong pa'i tshogs bkug ste bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag nga la rdzas che ge mo 
[\[302b.2\]]zhes bya ba zhig dgos kyis de nga la phul cig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha gang po la mchis so/_/des smras pa/_nga de la bka' mi stsol gyis/_khyed nyid kyis de las nyos la nga la phul cig_/de dag gis gang po la pho nya btang ste tshong pa'i tshogs 'bod 
[\[302b.3\]]do zhes byas so/_/des smras pa/_kho bo mi 'ong ngo /_/de nas tshong pa'i tshogs thams cad 'dus te de'i khyim du song nas sgor bsdad de de la phrin btang nas gang po tshong pa'i tshogs sgo na sdod kyis byung zhig ces spring ngo /_/de nga rgyal dang nyam du shed dang bcas 
[\[302b.4\]]pa'i dregs pas byung ba dang /_tshong pa'i tshogs kyis smras pa/_ded dpon ji ltar nyos pa bzhin du zong byin cig_/des smras pa/_gal te ji ltar nyos pa bzhin zong byin na kho bo tshong pa chen po yin mod/_de dag gis smras pa/_rin nyis 'gyur gyis byin 
[\[302b.5\]]cig dang tshong pa'i tshogs mchod par 'gyur ro/_/des bsams pa/_tshong pa'i tshogs ni mchod par bya ba yin no snyam nas/_des sa ya dang lnga 'bum nyis 'gyur du byin no/_/lhag ma ni khyim du sbas nas des bsams pa/_ji ga zil pa'i thigs pas bum pa 
[\[302b.6\]]dgang bar nus sam/_rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/_rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya ba'i phyir des grong khyer slo ma lta bur dril sgrogs su bcug pa/_shes ldan grong khyer slo ma lta bu na gnas pa'i tshong pa dag nyon cig_/ded dpon gang po rgya 
[\[302b.7\]]mtsho chen por 'jug par 'gyur gyis/_khyed cag las gang ded dpon gang po dang lhan cig sho gam med pa dang /_lag can pa'i gla med pa dang /_gru btsas med par rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par spro ba de dag gis rgya mtsho chen por 'dong ba'i zong sta gon byos 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]shig_/tshong pa lnga brgya tsam gyis rgya mtsho chen por 'dong ba'i zong sta gon byas so/_/de nas ded dpon gang po dge mtshan dang /_bkra shis dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba dag byas te 'khor tshong pa lnga brgya dang rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa 
[\[303a.2\]]las/_gru bo che grub nas/_grong khyer slo ma lta bur 'khor to/_/de lta bur lan drug gi bar du rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa las gru bo che grub nas slar 'khor to/_/phyogs kun du gang pos lan drug gi bar du rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa las gru bo che grub nas slar 'khor to zhes sgra 
[\[303a.3\]]grags pa dang /_mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa dag zong thogs te grong khyer slo ma lta bur dong nas/_de dag lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas/_ded dpon gang po gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas smras pa/_ded dpon rgya mtsho chen por bzhud do/_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag lan drug 
[\[303a.4\]]gi bar du rgya mtsho chen po nas gru bo che grub ste/_slar 'khor ba las bdun par 'jug pa khyed cag gis mthong ba'am thos pa 'ga' yod dam/_de dag gis smras pa/_gang po bdag cag shul ring po nas khyod kyi ched du lhags te gal te mi 'jug na khyod nyid tshad ma yin no/_/des 
[\[303a.5\]]bsams pa/_bdag la ni nor gyis cung zad kyang mi chog pa med na 'di dag gis don du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/_de de rnams dang lhan cig tu rgya mtsho chen por chas so/_/de dag gis nam tho rangs kyi dus su ched du brjod pa dang /_pha rol 'gro byed dang /_bden pa mthong ba 
[\[303a.6\]]dang /_gnas brtan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang /_gnas brtan ma'i tshigs su bcad pa dang /_ri gnas pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang /_thub pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang /_don gyi tshoms kyi mdo dag gsang bstod de bton pa dang /_des de dag thos nas smras pa/_shes ldan 
[\[303a.7\]]dag glu bzang po zhig long shig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_ded dpon de dag ni glu ma lags so/_/'o na ci/_de ni sangs rgyas kyis bka'o/_/des sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos nas ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas spu zing zhes byed nas gus pa dang bcas pas dris 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]pa/_shes ldan dag sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de su zhig yin/_de rnams kyis smras pa/_shAkya'i sras dge slong gau ta ma shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas de bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[303b.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod de/_ded dpon de ni sangs rgyas zhes bgyi'o/_/shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das de da ltar gang na bzhugs/_ded dpon mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na 
[\[303b.3\]]bzhugs so/_/des de snying la bzung nas de rnams dang lhan cig rgya mtsho chen por zhugs te gru bo che grub nas slar lhags so/_/de'i phu bo 'byor len gyis bsams pa 'di rgya mtsho chen por 'gro 'gro bas dub par gyur gyis 'di khyim dbub par bya'o snyam nas des de la smras 
[\[303b.4\]]pa/_khyod kyi don du tshong pa dang /_tshong dpon dang /_ded dpon gang gis bu mo bslang ba phu bo la smros shig_/des smras pa/_bdag 'dod pa ni ma 'tshal gyis gal te gnang na rab tu 'byung ngo /_/des smras pa/_gang gi tshe bdag cag khyim gyi 'tsho nam la ma zhugs pa de'i tshe rab tu 
[\[303b.5\]]mi 'byung bar da ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung /_des smras pa/_de'i tshe ni mi rigs lags so/_/da ni rigs pa lags so/_/des de gdon mi za bar gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas gnang ngo /_/des smras pa/_phu bo rgya mtsho chen po na nyes dmigs ni mang la mnog ni chung ngo /_/der 
[\[303b.6\]]'jug pa ni mang la slar 'khor ba nyung bas khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad du rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par mi bya'o/_/khyod la rigs pas bsgrub pa'i nor phal po che yod la khyod kyi nu bo dag la rigs pa ma yin pas bsgrubs pa yin pas gal te de dag na re lhan cig 'khod 
[\[303b.7\]]par bya'o zhes zer na 'dug par mi bya'o zhes smras nas rim gro pa gcig khrid de mnyan yod du song ste/_mnyan yod kyi skyed mos tshal du 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la phrin pa btang ste/_khyim bdag ded dpon gang po khyim bdag blta bar 'dod nas 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]skyed mos tshal na sdod do zhes spring ba dang /_mgon med zas sbyin gyis bsams pa/_gdon mi za bar chu'i bzhon pas dub nas/_da ni thang gi bzhon pas 'ongs so snyam mo/_/de nas dris pa/_kye nang rje zong ji snyed cig khyer te 'ongs/_de la zong ga la yod/_rim gro pa 
[\[304a.2\]]dang gnyis pu ste de dang bdag tu bas so/_/mgon med zas sbyin gyis bsams pa/_gang bdag gis skyes bu dam pa de la bkur stir ma byas par khyim du bod pa ni bdag rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no snyam nas/_des de bkur sti chen pos khyim du bos nas sku mnye byas te khrus 
[\[304a.3\]]byas nas zan byin te dga' ba'i gtam byas te 'dug nas/_mgon med zas sbyin gyis dris pa/_ded dpon dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/_khyim bdag bdag ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal 
[\[304a.4\]]lo/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ro stod bstod nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/_kye ma'o sangs rgyas/_kye ma'o chos/_kye ma'o dge 'dun/_kye ma'o chos legs par gsungs pa nyid/_de la ni da skyes bu gtso bo 'di 
[\[304a.5\]]lta bu yang rang gi skye bo dang gnyen bshes kyi tshogs rgya chen po dang /_mdzod dang bang mdzod rgyas pa rnams kyang spangs nas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'dod par gyur to/_/de nas khyim 
[\[304a.6\]]bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ded dpon gang po khrid de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs nas chos 'chad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 
[\[304a.7\]]skyes dang chas te 'ong ba gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin skyes dang chas te da ltar 'ong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes ni 'di lta bu med de/_'di lta ste gdul ba'i skyes 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]bu'o/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas te/_ded dpon gang po dang lhan cig phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[304b.2\]]gsol to/_/btsun pa ded dpon gang po 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na/_de bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu dbyung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim 
[\[304b.3\]]bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ded dpon gang po la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod kho nar de skra byi ba dang /_snam sbyar gon par gyur te/_
[\[304b.4\]]skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang /_lag na lhung bzed dang bya ma bum thogs pa dang /_dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog gsungs pas de/_/skra byi snam sbyar gon pa'i lus ldan zhing /_
[\[304b.5\]]mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa gang po bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs 
[\[304b.6\]]gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa gang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis mdor bsdus pa'i chos thos pa ji lta bus gcig pus dben pa bag yod pa dang rtun pa 
[\[304b.7\]]dang ldan la bdag nyid la bdag nyid gtod cing gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mdor bsdus pa legs par bshad du gsol/_gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa dang rtun pa dang ldan la bdag nyid gtod cing gnas na/_rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu byung bar bgyid pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na ma mchis pa de mthong ba'i chos de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bgyis te bsgrubs nas 
[\[305a.2\]]bdag gi skye ba ni zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad do/_/bya ba ni byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gang po legs 
[\[305a.3\]]so/_legs so/_/gang po gang khyod 'di skad du srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes bya ba nas de lta bu'i chos mdor bsdus pa legs par bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar smra ba ni yang legs so zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin te/_de'i phyir rab tu nyon la yid la zung 
[\[305a.4\]]shig dang bshad do/_/gang po mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs sdug pa dang /_chags pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang /_'dod pa dang ldan pa dang /_kun du chags par 'gyur ba yod la/_de dag gal te dge slong gis mthong nas 
[\[305a.5\]]mngon par dga' ba dang /_mngon par bstod pa dang /_lhag par chags pa dang /_lhag par zhen cing gnas nas de dag la mngon par dga' ba dang /_mngon par bstod pa dang /_lhag par chags pa dang /_lhag par zhen cing gnas pa de la kun du dga' ba 'byung ngo /_/
[\[305a.6\]]kun du dga' ba yod na dga' ba dang /_yid bde bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' ba dang yid bde ba yod na kun du chags par 'gyur ro/_/kun du chags pa yod na kun du sbyor bar 'gyur te/_dga' ba dang /_kun du chags pa dang /_kun du sbyor ba dang ldan par gyur pa'i dge slong ni 
[\[305a.7\]]gang po mya ngan las 'das pa las ring du gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/gang po rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra dang /_snas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri dang /_lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro dang /_lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya dang /_yid kyis rnam 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]par shes par bya ba'i chos sdug pa dang /_chags pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang /_'dod pa dang /_ldan pa dang kun du chags par 'gyur ba rnams yod la/_de dag gal te dge slong gis shes nas zhes bya ba nas/_mya ngan las 'das pa las ring du gyur pa zhes bya'o zhes 
[\[305b.2\]]bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/gang po mig gis rnam par shes pa bya ba'i gzugs sdug pa dang /_chags pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang /_'dod pa dang ldan pa dang /_kun du chags par 'gyur ba yod la/_de dag gal te dge slong gis mthong nas mngon par mi dga' ba dang /_mngon par 
[\[305b.3\]]mi stod pa dang /_lhag par ma chags pa dang /_lhag par mi zhen cing gnas na de dag la mngon par mi dga' ba dang /_mngon par mi stod pa dang /_lhag par ma chags pa dang /_lhag par ma zhen par gnas pa de la kun du dga' ba mi 'byung ngo /_/kun du dga' ba med na dga' ba dang yid bde ba med par 'gyur ro/_/dga' 
[\[305b.4\]]ba dang yid bde ba med na kun du ma chags par 'gyur ro/_/kun du chags pa med na kun du sbyor ba med par 'gyur ro/_/kun du sbyor ba med na dga' ba dang /_kun du chags pa dang /_kun du sbyor ba dang mi ldan pa'i dge slong ni gang po mya ngan las 'das pa la nye bar gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[305b.5\]]gang po rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra dang /_snas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri dang /_lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro dang /_lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya dang /_yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos sdug pa dang /_chags pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_yid du 
[\[305b.6\]]'ong ba dang /_'dod pa dang ldan pa dang /_kun du chags par 'gyur ba yod la/_de dag gal te dge slong gis shes nas zhes bya ba nas/_de ni mya ngan las 'das pa la nye bar gyur pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/gang po ngas mdor bsdus pa'i gdams ngag 'dis 
[\[305b.7\]]khyod la gtams na gang du gnas par 'dod/_gang du gnas bca' bar 'dod/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mdor bsdus pa'i gdams ngag 'dis bdag la gtams lags pas gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi mthar mchis par 'tshal lags so/_/gang po gro bzhin skyes 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]gnas pa'i yul gyi mtha'i mi rnams ni gtum pa/_gzu lums can/_rtsub pa/_gshe ba/_spro thung ba/_'phya ba yin te/_gang po gal te khyod la gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams mngon sum du/_sdig pa tshogs par mi 
[\[306a.2\]]dbyung ba'i tshig rtsub pos gshe bar byed/_zher 'debs par byed/_'phya bar byed na/_de la khyod ji snyam byed/_btsun pa gal te gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams bdag la mngon sum du sdig pa tshogs par mi dbyung ba'i tshig rtsub pos gshe bar 
[\[306a.3\]]bgyid/_zher 'debs par bgyid/_'phya bar bgyid na de la bdag gis 'di snyam du sems te/_e ma'o gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni rung ba dag yin no/_/e ma'o gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni blo dang ldan pa yin te/_de 
[\[306a.4\]]dag bdag la sdig pa tshogs par mi dbyung ba'i tshig rtsub pos gshe bar byed/_zher 'debs par byed/_'phya bar byed kyang lag pa'am bong pas ma brgyab snyam mo/_/gang po gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni gtum pa zhes bya ba nas 'phya bar byed pa 
[\[306a.5\]]yin no/_/zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/_gang po gal te gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams kyis dbyug pa'am mtshon gyis brgyab na de la khyod ji snyam byed/_btsun pa gal te bdag la gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams kyis dbyug pa'am 
[\[306a.6\]]mtshon gyis brgyab par gyur na/_de la bdag gis 'di snyam sems te/_kye ma'o gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni rung ba dag yin no/_/kye ma'o gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni blo dang ldan pa yin te/_de dag bdag la dbyug pa'am mtshon gyis 
[\[306a.7\]]brgyab kyang thams cad kyis thams cad du srog dang bral bar mi byed do snyam mo/_/gang po gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni gtum pa zhes bya ba nas 'phya bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_gal te gang po gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams kyis 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]khyod thams cad kyis thams cad du srog dang 'bral bar byed na de la khyod ji snyam byed/_btsun pa gal te bdag la gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams kyis thams cad kyis thams cad du srog dang 'bral bar bgyid na/_de la bdag nyid 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[306b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos lus rnag can 'dis/_skye ba dang /_ngo tsha ba dang /_rnam par smod pa gang dag mtshon gyis kyang 'debs par byed/_dug kyang za bar byed/_thag pas kyang 'gegs te 'chi bar byed/_g.yangs nas kyang mchongs 
[\[306b.3\]]te 'chi ba yod na/_/kye ma'o gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni rung ba dag yin no/_/kye ma'o gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha'i mi rnams ni blo dang ldan pa yin te/_de dag bdag gi lus rnag can 'di las tshegs chung ngus grol bar byed do snyam bsam 
[\[306b.4\]]par bgyi'o/_/gang po legs so legs so/_/gang po khyod bzod pa dang des pa 'di dang ldan par gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi mtha' gnas par nus pa ni khyod yang legs so/_/gang po song la ma bsgral ba rnams ni sgrol cig_/ma grol 
[\[306b.5\]]ba rnams ni khrol cig_/dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs phyung shig_/yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las zlos shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang pos bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su 
[\[306b.6\]]yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos te lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas mnyan yod 
[\[306b.7\]]du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/_mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi zas kyi bya ba byas nas zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms las slar log ste/_gnas mal ji ltar longs spyad pa mkhos su phab nas/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_gro bzhin skyes gnas 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]pa'i yul gyi mtha' gang na ba der chas te/_rim gyis rgyu zhing song ba na gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i yul gyi mthar phyin to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_gro bzhin skyes gnas 
[\[307a.2\]]pa'i mthar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa rngon pa zhig mda' gzhu lag na thogs te [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gshor du 'gro ba des mthong nas des bsams pa/_dge sbyong mgo reg 'di mthong ba ni kha rje ma rung bar byas so snyam du bsams nas gzhu rna drung du bkang ste/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[307a.3\]]pa gang po gang na ba der brgyugs pa dang /_de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang pos de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bla gos bsnyil te smras pa/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dgang dka' ba 'di'i don du zhugs pas 'di la snun cig_/tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gang gi don du 
[\[307a.4\]]mkha' la bya rgyu [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnyis zin gyur/_/g.yul ngor mda' mdung mda' bo che thogs mi rnams 'chi 'gyur la/_/bkren pa nyon mongs yul ngan rgyu zhing mchil pas nya zin pa/_/sdig pa rab mang lto 'dir khyod kyis 'tsham rims mda' 'phongs shig_/
[\[307a.5\]]des bsams pa/_rab tu byung ba 'di ni 'di lta bu'i bzod pa dang des pa dang ldan pa yin na/_ci'i phyir 'di la mda' 'phang snyam du bsams nas de sems mngon par dad par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang pos de la chos bshad de/_skyabs su 'gro ba 
[\[307a.6\]]dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bzhag pa dang /_des ri khrod pa gzhan lnga brgya ni dge bsnyen byas/_lnga brgya ni dge bsnyen mar byas nas gtsug lag lnga brgya rtsig tu bcug ste/_khri dang /_khri'u dang /_stan nang tshangs can dang /_sngas nang tshangs can dang /_
[\[307a.7\]]gor thabs brgya phrag du ma 'bul du bcug go/_/zla ba gsum po de 'das pa dang des rig pa gsum lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas dgra bcom par gyur te/_khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas/_dbang po dang nye dbang po'i lha dang bcas 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon sum du smra bar bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na shing gi rna cha can gyi nu bo gnyis longs spyod srabs shing yongs su zad pas gtugs par gyur nas de gnyis kyis smras 
[\[307b.2\]]pa/_byur lta bu de bdag cag gi khyim nas song gis tshur shog lhan cig gnas par bya'o/_/des smras pa/_byur lta bu de gang zhig yin/_gang po yin mod/_de ni kho bo'i khyim nas dpal byung ba yin gyi byur lta bu ni ma yin no/_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_dpal yang rung 
[\[307b.3\]]byur yang rung tshur shog lhan cig tu gnas par bya'o/_/des smras pa/_khyed cag gi nor ni rigs par bsgrubs pa ma yin la/_kho bo'i ni rigs par bsgrubs pa yin pas khyed cag dang kho bor lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o/_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_bran mo'i bu des rgya mtsho 
[\[307b.4\]]chen por yang song yang song nas khyod kyi longs spyod dag bsgrubs pas khyod de la spyod pas rgyags su zad/_khyod kyis ni rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par ga la nus/_de de gnyis las nga rgyal bzung nas des bsams pa/_bdag kyang rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya'o snyam nas zhes bya 
[\[307b.5\]]ba nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/ji tsam na gru bo che de rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gis tsan dan sa mchog gi tshal du bdas so/_/sa mkhan gyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag tsan dan sa mchog gi tshal zhes grags pa gang yin pa de ni 'di yin 
[\[307b.6\]]gyis 'di las 'doms la long shig_/de'i tshe na tsan dan sa mchog gi tshal gyi dbang po gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba yin te/_de yang gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi mdun sar song ngo /_/de nas tsan dan sa mchog gi tshal sta re lnga brgya tsam gyis bcad par brtsams so/_/gnod 
[\[307b.7\]]sbyin mi dga' ba zhes bya bas tsan dan sa mchog gi tshal sta re lnga brgya tsam gyis gcod par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dpon po mkhyen par mdzod cig_/
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]tsan dan sa mchog gi tshal sta re lnga brgya tsam gyis 'gums na khyod kyi phrin las sam bgyi ba gang lags ba de mdzod cig_/de nas gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen po gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi 'dun ma byas nas mi bzod pa skyes te/_rlung nag po chen po 'jigs su rung ba 
[\[308a.2\]]bslangs nas tsan dan sa mchog gi tshal gang na ba der chas so/_/sa mkhan gyis smras pa/_shes ldan 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshong pa dag nyon cig_/rlung nag po chen po'i 'jigs pa zhig yod do zhes grag pa gang yin pa de ni 'di yin gyis ngo lon som shig_/de nas tshong pa'i tshogs de rnams 
[\[308a.3\]]'jigs skrag phongs te ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas spu zing zhes byed nas/_lha rnams la gsol ba byed par rtsom ste/_zhi ba dang ni chu lha lus ngan nor lha sogs/_/lha mi lto 'phye gnod sbyin lha mi dbang po rnams/_/bdag cag shin tu nyam thag 'jigs par gyur lags kyis/_/bsnyengs 
[\[308a.4\]]bral de ring bdag cag rnams kyi mgon mdzod cig_/mi rnams kha cig bde sogs khyod la 'dud/_/gzhan dag tshangs dang khyab 'jug lha chen dang /_/sar rten shing dang tshal la brten pa la/_/sha za'i rlung gis zin pas skyabs tshol 'dud/_/shing gi rna cha can sems las chung ngur 'dug pa dang /_
[\[308a.5\]]tshong pa rnams kyis smras pa/_ded dpon bdag cag ni sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam nga bar gyur na/_khyod ci'i phyir sems las chung ngur 'dug_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bo la nu bos bsgo ba/_phu bo rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa ni mnog chung la nyes dmigs mang ste/_
[\[308a.6\]]sred pas ldongs pa phal cher 'jug kyang slar 'khor ba nyung bas khyod kyis rnam pa gang gis kyang rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par mi bya'o zhes bsgo ba las/_kho bos de'i tshig ma mnyan te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pas da ci byar yang med do/_/khyod kyi nu bo gang yin/_gang po yin 
[\[308a.7\]]no/_/tshong pa'i tshogs rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'phags pa gang po de ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin gyis/_de nyid la bdag cag skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o zhes de thams cad kyis tshig mthun par 'di skad ces 'phags pa gang po de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]'phags pa gang po de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po la mngon par dga' ba'i lha gang yin pa de dag tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa khyod kyis 
[\[308b.2\]]gcan ni sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam nga bar gyur gyis dgongs su gsol/_des bsams te/_de nas sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na gro bzhin skyes gnas pa'i mtha' nas mi snang bar gyur te/_rgya mtsho chen po gru'i dngor skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug pa de lta bu'i 
[\[308b.3\]]ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas rlung nag po de ri rab la phog ste rdugs pa bzhin du slar log par gyur to/_/gnod sbyin dbang phyug chen pos bsams pa/_sngon chad ni rlung nag pos gru gang la reg pa de shing bal gyi 'da' bu bzhin 'phangs pa dang 'jig par 
[\[308b.4\]]'gyur na da rlung nag po de ri rab la phog ste/_rdugs pa bzhin du slar log par gyur pa'i rgyu gang yin snyam nas/_phan tshun du brtag par brtsams pa las/_ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa gang po gru'i dngor skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang des 
[\[308b.5\]]smras pa/_'phags pa gang po tho btsams te ci bgyi/_gang pos smras pa/_rga ba'i chos can khyod nyid kyis nga la tho 'tsham mam/_gal te ngas 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs ma thob par gyur na/_khyod kyis nga'i phu bo ming lus par byas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[308b.6\]]dbang phyug chen pos smras pa/_'phags pa tsan dan sa mchog 'di ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i don du srung lags so/_/gang pos smras pa/_dpon po ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[308b.7\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang che/_'phags pa ci bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngam/_byung ngo /_/gal te de lta na da gang ma gang ba de khong shig_/de nas tshong pa'i tshogs de rnams srog byin te/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po la sems mngon par dad nas gru 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]de tsan dan sa mchog gis bkang ste chas pa dang rim gyis grong khyer slo ma lta bur phyin to/_/de nas gang pos phu bo la smras pa/_gang gi ming gis gru bo che grub ste 'ongs pa de ni de dbang bas khyod kyis rin po che ni tshong pa 'di rnams la gos shig_/bdag gis ni tsan dan sa mchog 'di rnams kyis bcom 
[\[309a.2\]]ldan 'das kyi phyir tsan dan gyi phreng ba'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]brtsig go/_/des tshong pa de rnams la rin po che rnams bgos so/_/de nas gang pos tsan dan sa mchog gi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhig brtsig par brtsams te/_des bzo bo dag bkug nas smras pa/_shes ldan 
[\[309a.3\]]dag ci nyi ma re re zhing kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya len nam 'on te tsan dan sa mchog gi phye ma pho sum gang len/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa tsan dan sa mchog gi phye ma pho sum gang 'tshal lo/_/ji tsam na ring po ma thogs par tsan dan gyi phreng ba'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[309a.4\]]brtsigs te byi dor thams cad zin par gyur to/_/de na zhogs ma dang phye ma'i lhag ma gang yin pa de dag kyang btags nas de nyid la zhal zhal du byugs so/_/des spun de rnams phan tshun du thams cad bzod pa gsol du bcug nas smras pa/_sangs rgyas 
[\[309a.5\]]la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs la zhal zas gsol cig_/'phags pa gang po bcom ldan 'das gang na bzhugs/_mnyan yod na'o/_/lam ji srid mchis/_mnyan yod na dpag tshad brgya lhag tsam mo/_/re zhig rgyal 
[\[309a.6\]]po la brtag par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du gyis shig_/de dag rgyal po'i drung du dong nas lha bdag cag ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs te zhal zas gsol bar 'tshal na/_lhas bdag cag la bstang du gsol/_rung gis de bzhin du 
[\[309a.7\]]bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po khang steng du 'dzegs nas rgyal byed kyi tshal logs su kha bltas te/_pus mo lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs te 'dug nas me tog gis gtor/_bdug pas bdugs nas khyim pa zhig gser gyi bya ma bum 'dzin du bcug ste gsol 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]ba 'debs pa la zhugs pa/_tshul khrims rnam dag shin tu rnam dag blo/_/zhal zas dus su rtag tu don gzigs pa/_/mgon med gyur pa rab tu gzigs nas ni/_/shin tu thugs brtser mdzad de gshegs par gsol/_/de nas me tog de rnams 
[\[309b.2\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me tog gi khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]byas te/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du rgan rims bzhin gnas par gyur to/_/bdug pa ni sprin ltar spungs so/_/chu ni bai DUr+ya'i phur ma lta bur gyur to/_/tshe 
[\[309b.3\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mtshan ma la mkhas pa yin pas thal mo sbyar ba byas te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsun pa spyan 'dren pa gang nas mchis/_kun dga' bo grong khyer slo ma lta bu nas so/_btsun pa grong khyer slo ma lta bur ji srid cig mchis/_kun 
[\[309b.4\]]dga' bo dpag tshad brgya lhag tsam yod kyis song la dge slong rnams la khyed cag las/_gang dang gang sang grong khyer slo ma lta bur song nas zas za bar spro bas tshul shing long shig ces bsgo shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[309b.5\]]bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas tshul shing blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshul shing blangs so/_/de'i tshe yul chu mig can na gnas pa'i 
[\[309b.6\]]gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa gang po shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des kyang tshul shing blang bar brtsams pa dang /_de la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa zan 'di ni/_/ko 
[\[309b.7\]]sa la bdag po'i pho brang ngam/_/rab sbyin khyim dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi/_/khyim [(]kyi [,]gyi [)]zas kyang ma lags so/_/grong khyer slo ma zhes bya ba/_/dpag tshad brgya lhag mchis pa der/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis ni bzhud 'tshal bas/_/gang po khyod ni ma gsung bzhugs/_/
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]de shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba yin gyi/_des rdzu 'phrul ma bskyed pas de 'di snyam du sems te gang gi phyir bdag gis nyon mongs pa'i tshogs mtha' dag btsal cing bor la spangs shing so sor spangs na/_bdag mu stegs can dang thun mong ba'i rdzu 
[\[310a.2\]]'phrul la sgyid lug gam snyam nas des brtson 'grus la gnas te rdzu 'phrul bskyed pas ji srid tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gnas brtan gsum pa la tshul shing ma byin pa de'i bar du des lag pa glang po che'i sna lta bu brkyang nas tshul shing blangs te/_de nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_
[\[310a.3\]]gau tam 'di na mngon shes drug po nyid/_/grags pa dang ni thos pas 'thob min la/_/tshan gyi yon tan rnams dang ngag dang ni/_/yid smon chen pos kyang ni ma yin gyi/_/bdag 'dra yongs su rtog par byed pa rnams/_/rga bas dar yal gyur kyang zhi ba dang /_/tshul khrims lhag mthong 
[\[310a.4\]]stobs dang bsam gtan stobs/_/rnam pa du mas mngon shes drug ldan 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di ni nga'i dge slong rnams kyi mchog yin te/_nga'i nyan thos mchod pa'i tshul shing blang pa la dang po tshul shing len pa 
[\[310a.5\]]rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste yul chu mig can na gnas pa'i gnas brtan gang po mchog yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la ngas dge slong dag khyed kyis dge ba mi spyoms pa dang /_sdig pa mi 
[\[310a.6\]]bcab par gnas par bya'o zhes bshad mod kyi/_'on kyang grong khyer de na mu stegs pa rnams gnas pas khyed las gang gis rdzu 'phrul gang thob pa de des grong khyer slo ma lta bur song la zan bza' bar bya'o zhes sgo shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 
[\[310a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces ngas dge slong rnams kyis dge ba mi spyoms pa dang /_sdig pa mi bcab par gnas par bya'o/_/zhes bshad mod kyi zhes bya ba nas song la zan bza' bar bya'o zhes 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/rgyal pos grong khyer slo ma lta bu rdo ba dang gseg ma dang gyo mo rnams sel du bcug ste/_tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab dri zhim po'i pog phor sna tshogs bshams/_dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dpyangs/_me tog sna tshogs chal bar bkram ste dga' dga' ltar 
[\[310b.2\]]byas te grong khyer slo ma lta bu la sgo [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yod la rgyal po de la yang bu bcu bdun yod de/_grong khyer gyi sgo rer so sor rgyal po'i bu rnams 'byor pa mchog dang bkod do/_/sgo chen por ni slo ma lta bu'i bdag po'i rgyal po rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang shing gi 
[\[310b.3\]]rna cha can dang rgya skyegs kyi rna cha can dang zha nye'i rna cha can 'dug go/_/ji tsam na lo ma 'drim pa dang /_shang tse 'drim pa dang snod spyad 'drim pa dag rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags pa rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/_ci btsun pa gang po bcom ldan 'das gshegs sam des smras pa/_'di 
[\[310b.4\]]dag ni lo ma 'drim pa dang /_shang tse 'drim pa dang /_snod spyad 'drim pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/ji tsam na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa rnam pa du mas lhags pa dang rgyal pos yang dris pa/_ci 
[\[310b.5\]]btsun pa gang po bcom ldan 'das gshegs sam/_des smras pa/_ma lags te 'di ni dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa rnam pa du mas lhags pa lags so/_/de nas dge bsnyen zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras 
[\[310b.6\]]pa/_kha cig seng ge stag dang glang po che rta klu dang khyu mchog bzang po bcibs/_/kha cig rin chen gzhal med khang dang ri dang shing mdzes shing rta 'bar la rten/_/gzhan dag nam mkha'i ngos las chu 'dzin glog gi phreng bas brgyan pa lta bur ni/_/rab 
[\[310b.7\]]tu dgyes bzhin lha yi pho brang lta bur rdzu 'phrul dag gis gshegs par brtson/_/kha cig sa brtol gyen du 'byung /_/kha cig nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'bab/_/kha cig stan las sprul par byed/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mthu la ltos/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]'das kyis gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du zhabs gnyis bkrus te/_gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/_sku drang por bsrang nas dgongs pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag go/_/ji tsam na bcom 
[\[311a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa'i zhabs kyis dri gtsang khang du bzhag pa nas rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/_sa chen po 'di g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos so/_/chem chem/_rab tu chem chem/_
[\[311a.3\]]kun tu rab tu chem chem ste/_shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/_nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/_lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/_byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/_mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/_dbus mtho 
[\[311a.4\]]na mtha' dma'o/_/rgyal pos tshe dang ldan pa gang po la dris pa/_'phags pa gang po 'di ci lags/_des smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa'i zhabs kyis dri gtsang khang du bzhag pa des na sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos 
[\[311a.5\]]par gyur pa lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gser gyi 'od zer gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od bkye ste/_des 'dzam bu'i gling gser zhun ma lta bur snang bar gyur to/_/yang rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i mig phye nas dris pa/_'phags 
[\[311a.6\]]pa gang po 'di ci lags/_des smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer bkye ba lags so//_//
